45b8: shes rab kyi rang bzhin las byung zhing shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gsal lo/ / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po shes rab gzungs kyis rang bzhin bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/

46a1: de skad ces gsol pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs// shes rab gzungs kyi rang bzhin ni// rgya cher bshad kyis shes par gyis// ji ltar thabs kyi
46a2: sbyar ltar/ / gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams// rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa// lha mo'i tshogs su sbyar nas kyang // gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mar sras// rdo rje mnyam pa'i gzung
46a3: rnams la/ / mnyam pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya// bro gar glu tshig la sogs pas// rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgrub ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad thabs dang shes rab
46a4: phan tshun dra bar 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhes pa dang 'bo rnams kyi mi gsopa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin ni thabs dang shes rab du 'brel ba'i rang bzhin can du
46a5: bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo zhes gsol to/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa chos thams cad ni thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel ba ste/ gnyis
46a6: su med par shes par gyis shig/ de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dra bar 'brel ba'i don bshad du gsol// sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/
46a7: 'brel ba'i don ni 'di lta ste// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// phan tshun 'brel ba'i tshul du snang // chos kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las// sprul pa bye ba cir yang snang // gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel// rnal
46a8: 'byor gsang ba'i mchog yin te/ / rtsal dang ldan pa'i gsang sgo ba// 'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya// gsang 'dir chud pa'i bu rnams la// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' 'di bsgrags// gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di//

46b1: rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas// lnga nyid zung du 'khril ba ni// g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril 'khyud sbyor// g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang // rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o// g.yon gyi sgra rnyan dril bu dang // rtags kyis
46b2: mdzes par gsal ba la/ / 'byor zhed 'ad pa'i mdangs ldan pas// chags shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa// rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te// kha dog lnga yi 'od 'bar bas//
46b3: bcu drag chas ni sreg pa rnams// rims kyis bskyed dang gcig car bskyed// dbang po'i rim par sbyar bar bya// gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang // gnas nas gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// phyag rgya rgyal por
46b4: rgyal mor bcas/ / brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khril 'khyud sbyor// sa dang nam mkha' spyan rdo rje// byams dang rdo rje kun bzangs dpal// nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni// gzhi gnyis dag gis mnyes sbyor ba// bsam bya la sogs
46b5: de bzhin no/ / rdo rje sgo dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje 'khril 'khyung gsang ba'i tshegs// rnal 'byor longs spyod che sbyar bas// mnyes nas skongs phyir rim bzhin dbul// gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis// gsang ba'i
46b6: don rnams sgrub par byed ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje de rdo rje kun du 'brel ba'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dus
46b7: pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings su bdag cag rnams kyi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs dra ba'i dbyings su
46b8: shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni thugs kyi rig pa las byung la/ thugs kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje kho na yin pa'i phyir ro// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dra ba chen po'i tshogs bdag cag

47a1: rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa rdo rje chen po rig pa'i don// dra ba 'brel ba'i dbyings nyid ni// nges par bshad kyis rtse gcig nyon// thugs/
47a2: kyi gsang chen rig pa 'di// nges pa'i rdo rje yin pas na// rdo rje dbang yul 'brel ba'i don// thams cad 'byung bas dbyings shes bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin sogs bcas// 'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te// gzugs rnyan
47a3: ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas/ / rim pa'i tshul bzhin sbyar byas nas// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ro zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de thams cad dus bzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
47a4: snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid
47a5: du gcig par mthong ngo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam par rtogs pa yin te/ chos thams cad ni dus bzhi'i ngang du rdzogs par
47a6: shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dang la dus snga phyir snang ba med do// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa chen po'i dus nyid bdag cag rnams la rgya cher
47a7: bshad du gsol/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i yi ni tshi/ ga/ mnyam pa nyid kyis dus rig na/ dus zhes bya ba'i ming yang med// dus bzhi nyam par rab shes na// chos nyid
47a8: mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no/ / rdo rje dus kyi lha mo'i tshogs// 'das dang da ltar byung ba dang // mi 'byung ba yi cha rnams la// dbang sgyur mnyam pa'i rgyal mo rnams// 'jig dang skye dang smin pa dang // 'gag par gyur pa de dag tu// rdo rje

47b1: rnam thar tshad med dang / / sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi// shes rab 'khor dang dpal gyi dkyil// de bzhin rim par rdo rje yi// gru gar la sogs yo byad kyis// mchod dang 'jug tshul gong ma bzhin// cha rnams dus las
47b2: me 'da' bar/ / lha yi nyi ma rnams la'o// bde ba chen po la sogs pa// tsho bu'am yang na phyag rgya rnams// spyir ram re rer sbyar bar bya// 'das la rnam thar tshogs bskul te// da ltar byung dang mi 'byung la// tshad med sems
47b3: dang mnyam par bskrun/ / mnyam pa'i rgyal por de 'gyur te// bde gshegs dus kyis rgyal por 'gyur zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi zla'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom/
47b4: bar zhugs so// de nas yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nyi zla'i tshogs su mthong ngo // de skad ces gsol
47b5: pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yin par shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni byang chub
47b6: sems las byung zhing snying rje'i rang bzhin can yin no/ / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje dang byang chub sems kyi don bdag cag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
47b7: stsal pa/ chos rnams kun gyi yo byad ni// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// yo byad de dang ma ldan na// don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor byang chub sems rdzogs pa// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i zla rgyas tshul// snying
47b8: rje ye shes shar ba ni/ / mkha' la nyi gsal shar ba'i tshul// don gnyis rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// nang byong ngas ri pa yin/ 'ings la bzod pa ni// rdo rje dus kyi rgyun tshogs kyis// tshogs chen rnam gnyis bskrun par bya//

48a1: skar tshogs dbus na zla nya ba// bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa bzhin// bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa// bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas ni// mdzes pa'i nyi ma bcu drug gis// zla dkyil 'od kyi phyagaH
48a2: la/ mdzes par spras pa'i bde ba de// bcu drug tshigs kyis bsod nams bskrun// phyeng rdzogs tshogs 'phel de phan chad// mau dmigs chos la blo spangs yin// rje ni dzin mi dmigs pa// mtshan ma shes bya ba srabs
48a3: pa ste/ bsod nams tshogs kyang mi dmigs pa// mnyam pas stong par gyur pa na// thams cad chos skur rdzogs pa ste// sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de// 'di la rmad 'byung sems bskyed de// zla ba dus kyis
48a4: mtshan ma dang / / gsang ba gnyis kyis mchod pa bya// phra mo'i drod du byung ba dang // s+yAd te rang las byung rnams la// rtsa ba bcad phyir yongs rdzogs pas// the tsom med par dang blangs na// dus de nyid du nyi ma 'char// dus 'dri
48a5: rgyan gyi bar bcad na/ / bsnyen pa dag gis zlogs par dka'// bar chad byar na gso zhing bskar// mkha' la zla gsal gra rgyas na// sa la rnal 'byor grar rgyas pas// bsod nams spel ba chen po dang // bsngo ba chen po'i
48a6: las rnams bya/ / des ni 'bras bu chen po yang // nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba yi// rigs 'dzin sa la slebs phan chad// dpal chen bcu drug sa la 'dug ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de rgyun du gnas pa
48a7: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bzhengs pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yig rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
48a8: bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin la// rgyal ba thams cad ni yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du shes par gyis shig/ gsol pa/ yi ge'i phyag rgya'i don gang lags pa bdag

48b1: cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te/ rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs su gsal// sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya //
48b2: ge'i phreng ba nyid la rdzogs// yi ge phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnams// rgyun du bsgrub par bya ba yin// des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin 'thob// rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa// rdo rje na pa dang nyi tshod la// yi ge'i tshigs bskyed tshom
48b3: sbyar la/ / phung lhag bcas sbyar de bzhin no// 'di ni don la nye ba'i lam// bsod nams bskrun par de myur ro// kun rdzogs tshogs kyi rgyu de sa ni// yang dag tshogs chen ci 'dra ba// mchog gi bde ba dam pa dang / de
48b4: nyid chen por de nyid 'gyur/ / 'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba 'thun// thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs// mdza' 'phrod sman dang dgyes sbyor ldan// lha dang rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ril// ma/
48b5: lus tshegs pas chos 'di spyad// skad cig yud dam thar cig gam// yud tsam nyin zhag zla re'am// lha yi nyi ma bkra shis kyis// tshogs la bab pa'i dus 'di dag/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus tshan yin// ji ltar
48b6: 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams/ / phyi dang nang gi khyad par gyis// gtsang ma'i kha zas 'byung po la// rnam rtog rtog bral rgyal ba la/ ji ltar 'byor bzhin nan tan bya// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga la// chos kyi don du mi 'gyur
48b7: ba'i/ / skyon bzhi po dag spangs nas ni// de las bzlog pa'i tshul ldan pas// rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bur// gdung ba'i 'du shes nyer bzhag ste// ji bzhin 'dod par nye bar sbyar // lha rnams nye bar bya ba dang // bgegs
48b8: rnams zhi bar bya ba dang / / don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir// las 'dir spyad par shin du bcas// tshogs 'di blo chung gsar zhugs pa'i// mdun du brjod par bya mi rigs// rdzas dang yo byad thams cad kyang // cis

49a1: 'dul de lta songs kyi sbyar/ / des na las 'di khyad par yang // tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te// bsnyen pa dag la goms byas nas// bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// rgyud
49a2: kye rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor bde ba'i tshogs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas yang smra ba'i seng ge sems dpe'i rdo rje nges 'das pa brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
49a3: snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags zab mo skyong ba'i skyon dang yon tan ci log pa
49a4: bdag cag gi rig pa la snang bar gyur to/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gsang sngags chen po'i don ni rab tu spyad par dka' bar shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
49a5: nagasang sngags kyi tshogs ni shin du me dang 'dra ste/ me ni rgyun du bcangs shing spyad legs na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyad du yod do// me nyid ji lta ba bzhin du spyad na me'i phung po chen por 'gyur te/ spyod par byed pa nyid
49a6: kyang bsregs/ / khyim nas khyim yang bsregs// rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad kyang bsregs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gsang sngags 'di ni chu dang 'dra ste/ chu thabs kyi zin cing spyad legs na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga'
49a7: bder spyad du yod de/ tshul dga' ba der thar chu chen po la 'bogs par nus so// chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la mgoms pas ni spyod par byed pa de g.yeng zhing 'chi bar byed do// gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni
49a8: gcan zan gdug pa can dang 'dra ste/ / gcan zan gyis sems can gzhan gyi srog gcod par byed pa yang thabs la mkhas pas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du dbang du 'du'o// thabs kyis ma zin na srog gcod par byed do// zhan

49b1: yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste/ sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu thabs kyis yos su zin na ni dbang du 'du zhing spyad du yod la/ thabs kyis ma zin na ni 'tsho
49b2: ba'i srog dang 'bral bar byed do/ / de bas na gsad pa chen po 'di ni spyad par dka' bas sngon gyi dus kyi tshe na yang spyad nyes pa'i log pa'i lam pa can mang por byung ngo // don dang lam la mkhas pa'i skyes bus
49b3: thabs kyis zin cing spyad legs na ma nor ba'i lam du zhug pa yang mang por byung bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs spyad pa'i thabs la yongs su mkhas par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis
49b4: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags log pa'i lam las byung ba ni gang gang lags// spyad legs pa'i thabs las byung ba ni gang gang lags/ bdag cag la rgya cher bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol
49b5: pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs nyes legs kyi rim pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / nga ni dran pa thog ma'i tshe/ gsang ba spyod
49b6: pa'i don 'di dag/ des don phal cher nub par gyur// tshul 'dra tsam zhig gnas pa la// kun kyang phal cher spyod mod kyang // don dang phrad pa ngas ma mthong // kun kyang log pa'i lam spyad do// log pa can nyid gang zhe na/ 'di
49b7: la mi gnas 'di nyams dang / / 'di las log dang log tshul spyod// 'di tshul ma yin 'dir ma nges// g.yo rgyus bdeni bcos 'gal ba'i lam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ bskal pa kun bkod bya ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas mngon byung rgyal po
49b8: de/ mya ngan 'das par gyur 'og du// byung ba'i rnal 'byor bzang rgyan de// mi shes byis pa'i 'khor rnams la// tshul 'chos log pa'i tshogs bskyangs pas// tshom bu lnga brgyar bcas pa zhig/ don las gol zhing 'khor bar log

50a1: de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rmad byung gsang ba'i bstan pa 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshad ma rnams// phal cher me gnas skabs dag tu// mi shes ngan rtog can rnams kyis// dkrugs 'gyur bka' baspyad nyur
50a2: bor te/ nor pas bdag nyid sun 'byin cing // bdag yin gzhan 'di ma yin zhes// bdag bstong gzhan la smod pa log/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ bkal ba de nyid dus dag la// rnal 'byor dpa' spyon bya ba zhig/ don la blo shing
50a3: ma bye zhing / lam gyi thabs la mi mkhas pas// nges don bka' yi gzhung bor nas// chos ma yin pa'i chos spyod cing // gzhan dag nges don spyod pa la// khyod kyi de ni don ma yin// don mchog bdud rtsi gang yin pa// de ni nga yi cho
50a4: 'di yin/ / zhes ni bdag stong gzhan la smod// 'di yang srid pa log pa'i lam// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ sngar byung rgyud kyi rjes gnas pas// rdeng med bzhin du dpon bstabs na// tshig gnyer dregs pa'i dbang des ni//
50a5: shes bzhin du ras gcod pa'i// tshul 'chos sems kyi g+ha g+hA can// smon thabs blun pa'i sde can yin// de yang ji lta bzhi na/ dge slong dri med spyod pa zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor tshul 'dra zhing // don la mkhas pa'i rjes su byung /
50a6: bu 'bum gyi 'khor rnams kyis// rgyud kyi rdzas su byung ba yis// don med dge slong de nyid la// tshig gi gnyer chen ljang phab pas// gdung 'tshob ces ni dpon bstabs te// che ba chen po'i dregs pa skyes// mi shes bzhin du rgya
50a7: bcos te/ 'dra tshul log pa'i chos spyad pas// tshom bu 'bum dang bcas pa zhig/ dregs pa chen po'i ru drar lhung // de 'dra'i tshul dum spyod cig/ mdza' 'drin bslang ster zhing rnams dang // rnyed dang bkur stis 'tshe ba'i 'khor//
50a8: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur dogs nas// sgo ris rkyang tshan so sor gcod// 'khor 'di bdag gi smin bya yi// gdul bar bya ba'i zhing yin gyis// gang dag 'di dang ma 'brel zhes// nyon mongs tshig gis sgo byed nor// de yang ji lta bu 'a

50b1: rnal 'byor na zhi gnas pa zhes/ / bya ba'i chom bu lnga brgya zhig/ shin du gsang sngags spyod do zhes// dgon pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// yul khams chen po de dag gis// gnas par gyur pa'i mi rnams kun// 'dul bar bya
50b2: ba'i zhig tu spyod/ / gzhan gyi sde bar gyur pa yi// dge slong don dang ldan pa zhig/ yul dir ched du 'ongs nas ni// rnal 'byor nges pa'i lam mchog cig/ rgya cher bstan par bsams pa las// dge slong dgon par gnas pa
50b3: des nyon mongs tshig gi bsgob byas/ / 'khor 'di bdag gi nying yin gyis// khyod ni 'di la ma gtogs shes// sgo dang tshan dang ris bcad pas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i lam du lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal 'byor
50b4: chen por bsngos gyur la/ / sna 'gas ci rgyal gsog 'jog byed// gcig yid gcig gis 'byin byed pa// nam zhar longs spyod thob pa min// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor bde ldan shes pa zhes// bya ba'i tshem bur bcas
50b5: pa zhig/ gsang ba rgya cher spyod pa las// 'khor na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma// bud med bzang ldan bya ba zhig/ tshogs sbyor ging du bskos pa las// 'byor pa'i yo byad de dag la// ser sna'i sems kyis gsog 'jog byas/
50b6: las kyinam smin de mas na// yi dgas kyi yi lus sa skyes de 'dri tshul dum spyod cig/ gzhan yang nal 'byor chen po'i tshags// log par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// log sa sbyi ho la ga ma tho// sdig s+ho na
50b7: mi ldan yang / / bdag ni yang dag yin no zhes// bab chol bka' chu su byed bslad// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// chos sbyong ba yi rnal 'byor pa// bram de zhes bya ba zhig/ don dang lam la mi mkhas par// bdag ni mkhan po yin
50b8: nozhes/ kun la rgya cher sgra bsgrags nas// rgyal ba'i bka' brkus 'gro ba rnams// bslus par gyur pa'i rnam smin gyis// log pa can gyi 'jig rten pa// mu stegs spyod pa'i khams su gyur// de 'dra'i tshul dum spyod cig

51a1: tha tshigs nyams shing don la mugs/ / dregs pas don la khas 'ches phyir// rdo rje rgyal dbang thob 'dod pa/ khrel med spyi gtol mun sprul 'tshal// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor sngags kyi tshul spyod pa// bin ya tre
51a2: byab zhig/ tshom bu brgya dang bcas pa byung // rna ba nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal gyis// don la mkhas pa'i tshul bcos phyir// rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang mnos pas// ri bos srog chags mnan pa
51a3: bzhin/ / nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bo yis// 'khor ba'i las spyod las ngan pa'i// srog chags phag gi rigs su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ mnyam pa'i don nyid ma gtogs par// tshig tu mnyam zhes rjod byed cing /
51a4: chags sdang gnyis la mngon 'chel ba// rnal 'byor las kyis 'khor ba'i lam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// dge slong bde sbyin bya ba zhig/ tshim bu stong dang bcas par de// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i las la spyod// la la chags
51a5: la mngon par 'chel/ / la las sdang chen bsod par spyod// chags sdang las kyi rnam smin gyis// rak+Sha srin po'i khams su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ gang dag rnal 'byor blo chung rnams// rdo rje gral tshogs
51a6: dor glengs na/ / de la 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur te// swa zhum mi dga' 'byor byed blar// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// dge slong lha sbyin bya ba zhig/ rnal 'byor dang ba'i sar slob tshe// rnal 'byor don ldan mang po rnams// bar cher
51a7: tshogs par gyur pa la/ / nges don gsang ba'i don glengs na// lha byin 'khor bcas de las byol// don gleng ba la mi dga' zhing // ngan pa'i sems kyis phrag dog skyes// rang gi gnas su song nas ni// mkhas pa de la mi
51a8: snyan brjod/ / las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// bskal pa dpag tu med pa ru// yang dag don las gol bar 'gyur// 'khor ba don med gnas su 'khyams// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal 'byor nyid kyis rnal 'byor la

51b1: shin du gdug pa'i dug ma ngas gtong / / tha tshig btsan po rjong lta bu// 'joms byed rnal 'byor rang bgegs so// de yang ci lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor rnam dag blo gros zhes// bya ba'i don ldan mkhas pa zhig/ mi 'jigs
51b2: blo gros zhes bya ba'i/ / thabs dang don la mi mkhas pa// sde ba mang po sbyor ba'i sar// rnam dag blo gros 'khor bcas 'ongs// mkhas pa don ldan bzod thob la// rngan sems phyar ka'i sgro skur btab// las kyi rnam smin
51b3: de yis ni/ mi 'jigs blo gros mnar med lhang // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ lta ba dmigs bu dang bral bas// yang dag dbu ma'i lam mi gsal// spyi yul tsam la ltos spyod pa// de na rnal 'byor long ba'i tshegs
51b4: de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ / rgyal po rab gsal 'dzin pa zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig byung // shes rab lta ba'i mig med par// rnal 'byor mang tsam tshul bzung nas// sgra thos tsam gyi bzhud spyad pas// mig med 'khor
51b5: ba'i khams su lhung / / de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ de la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// log pa'i tshogs su spyad pas ni// 'khor ba log pa'i tshogs su 'gyur// des na 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// shin du gsang
51b6: ba'i chos 'di rnams/ / gol sa che bar rgyal bas bshad// thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa yis// don dang ldan par bya ba gces// thabs la mkhas par spyad pa yi// legs pa'i lam gyi rnal 'byor pa// sngon 'das dus
51b7: na byung ba yi/ / rtsal can rnams kyi don bshad pa// skyes bu mchog gi spyod pa 'di// yon tan sgra bsgrags sus thos pa// ming tsam gyis kyang de thob cing // dran pas ngan 'gro las skyob yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// shin tu
51b8: gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di/ / lha gnas gsum du grags pa las// lha yi bu ni 'od ldan te// mi rtag 'chi ba'i dus bab nas// 'chi ka'i snga ltas byung ba'i tshe// mi dga' bar ni 'du shes gyur// phyi ma'i 'du shes bskyed pa las// mig tsang

52a1: zas su za ba yi/ / blun pa'i srog chags lus len par// rang gi mngon par shes pas mthong // shin du 'jigs pa'i 'du shes kyis// skyabs kyi yul rnams yid la byas// gzhan gyi dran pa mi gsal bar// gsang
52a2: ba chen po'i tshigs chen gyi/ / mtshan ni rna ba'i dbang pos thos// thos pa yid la dran byas pas// ngan 'gro'i lam las slar log ste// tshogs che ni spyod pa'i skal ldan pas// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas su skyes// de bzhin
52a3: thos pa dag par spyod/ / rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs 'di la// gang zhig dga' zhing 'dun skyed pa// gzhan gyi bar chad mi 'byung bar// ji ltar mos pa de myur 'thob// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bram ze'i bu ni byams ldan te/ gsad
52a4: ba chen po'i tshogs 'di dag/ spyod par mos nas kun du btsal// btsal bas rnyed par ma gyur te// sa phyogs zhig tu 'dug nas ni// shin du ngus nas smras pa ni// e ma'o bdag gi las re pham// skyes nas rgas par
52a5: gyur bar du/ / tshogs chen zab mo'i don btsal na// don dang ma phrad las re ngan// da 'od ji ltar btsal na rnyed// cal byas rnyed par yod mi 'gyur// thugs sde bdag la skyabs su 'chi// gdung ba sgra cher phyung ba las// nam mkha'i khams nas
52a6: sgra phyung ste/ skal dang ldan pa'i bram ze khyod// de ltar yi dam la brtan pa// khyod ni don gyi skal ba can// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis// khyod la byin gyis rlob par mdzad// de bas lta ba ma g.yel bar// sgrib pa skyang
52a7: ba'i thabs dag la/ / mkhas shing brtson par bya dgos te// rang gi rtsa rnams bkros nas ni// khrag chen dag gis mchod pa de// 'dod chags dag pa tsan dan chus// dmigs nas rgyal ba kun mchod nas// de ma thag tu don thob
52a8: 'gyur/ de skad lung bstan thob nas ni// dga' ba'i bsam pa cher g.yos te// lung bstan pa ltar de spyad pas// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i sras su gyur// de bzhin mos pa dag par spyod// grong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs pa/ thams

52b1: cad du yang de bzhin te/ / tog ni rtse mor gyur pa bzhin// yongs kyi nub pa ma yin no// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// lha yi bru zhes bya ba ni// dge ba'i rgyal po bya ba de// tshom bu 'bum dang bcas pa zhig/ gsang ba rgya cher spyad pa las//
52b2: lha bu rin chen 'od ldan de// shin du dang ba cher g.yos te// lha rdzas yo byad mang po dang // bcas nas gsang ba'i gnas der phyin// dga' zhing 'dun pa'i tshul gyis ni// gus par gyur te der gnas pas// cho 'phrul chen po
52b3: bzhi thob ste/ / lha gnas kun du bgrod pa dang // 'byung chen lus las sprul pa dang // ri bo gdeg dang 'phang ba dang // mi 'chi tshal gnas pa thob// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog bzhin du// mthong ba dag pa'i chos de nyid// skal
52b4: par nub par ma gyur to/ / de bzhin 'jug pa dag par gyis// mthong bas chos 'di yongs dag pa// ye shes sgron ma'i mig rnyed nas// bla med snying po can rnams kyis// lam rnyed lam du zhugs pa bzhin// de yang ji lta bu
52b5: zhen bram ze kun da bye ba zhig/ chos kyi mig ldan don mthong nas// gsad chen bzhung bzhin spyod pa la// bram ze ke ni bya ba zhig/ dad pas don gyi rjes su 'brengs// gsang chen 'dus pa'i tshigs mthong ba// chos kyi mig
52b6: dang ldan gyur te/ / don gyi snying po mthong bar 'gyur// lhun grub rtsal chen rdzogs pa yi// rigs 'dzin chen po'i sa nyid thob// de bzhin mthong bas dag par gyis// gzhan dag 'dir ni mngon spyod la// dga' ba'i yid kyis
52b7: phyogs byed pa/ de ni dngos dang 'dra ba ste// 'bras bu la yang mthon dman med// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig la// tshom bu bcu dang bcas pa'i 'khor// rigs
52b8: 'dzin spyod pa'i don la zhugs/ / sngags spyod 'bras bu cher thob ste// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po dag/ thob pa kun du grags par gyur// de la gzhan gyi sde pa yi// bram ze dge slong bya ba zhig/ shin du dag pa'i sems bskyed nas/

53a1: 'jug cing bslab par zhugs pa las// rgyal pos ma gnang gsang sgo bsdams// bram ze dad pa ma log par// 'byor pa'i yo byad ci yod rnams// rgyal po'i 'khor du phul nas kyang // rgyal po gnas pa'i yul phyogs
53a2: yid kyis phyogs te smon lam btang / / rtse gcig par ni smon lam btab// rjes su yi rang dam par ni// yid la byas pa'i bsod nams kyis// sgrub par byed pa'i rgyal po dang // sgrub dang mi ldan bram ze gnyis// 'bras bu mthon
53a3: dman med par thob/ / 'di ni tshigs med don po che// thabs la mkhas pa'i rigs 'dzin yin// de bzhin spyod pa gzhan dag la// dga' bas rjes su yi rang gis// dge ba spyad dang ma spyad gnyis// 'bras bu mnyam por thob
53a4: par gyur/ / bsam yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyal rnams 'dir bslabs 'dir mkhyen pas// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bshes gnyen du// kun gyi bdag por gyur pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ sngon gyi bram ze gas la
53a5: byin gyis/ / gsang chen 'di yi don brlabs nas// rang gi sems la goms byas na// sems nyid bden pa'i don mthong ste// chos rnams kun la mkhas par gyur// kun gyi rtsab sems yin pas// sems las chos byung
53a6: 'bum phrag yas/ / chos kyi rgyal por der gyur nas// sangs rgyas smra ba'i seng ge zhes// zhing khams kun du grags par 'gyur// de bzhin bslab pa dag par gyis// tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni// skye la nyan thos
53a7: bsam yas la/ / sbyin pa'i tshogs chen spel bas ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi byed do// ci phyir len gcig mnyes pas// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin// nam mkha' khyab pa'i rgyal ba dang // nyagacig snang ba'i rgyal bgaci
53a8: so so ma yin tha mi dad/ / sku dang gsung thugs gcig las med// 'dul ba'i ngog khyad par las// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan par zad// des na khyad par de ltar snang // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// las rnams dag pa'i bram ze ni/

53b1: dge ldan gsal ldan bya ba gnyis// dga' ba'i dad pa so sor skyes// gcig la gcig ni tha tshig byas// gcig gis nyan thos bsam yas la// mchod sbyin bya ba rgya cher byas// gcig gis tshogs mchod rgya cher byas//
53b2: tshogs la spyod pa'i gsal ldan ni// 'di tshe gcig la mngon sangs rgyas// sbyin pa spel ba'i dge ldan ni// bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis grub// de bas gnas 'dir spyod pa dag/ rnal 'byor gsal ldan tshul
53b3: bzhin spyod/ / 'di dag rtag tu su 'chang ba// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// che yon rtag tu ci 'dra bar// don gyi gzugs dang bcas par 'thob// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// khyim bdag mes byin bya ba de// tshom bu rgya dang
53b4: bcas po zhig/ rgyan gyi rtag par 'di spyad pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' ni// 'khor dang bcas pa ci 'dra bar// skye ba de yis nges par thob// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// don du nges par sgrub pa'i tshogs// rtog
53b5: nas smra ba'i gang byed pa/ / goms dang brjod dang smos pa yis// chos kyi rgyal por de 'gyur zhing // yon tan spyi gtsug nyid du 'gyur// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// drang srong rnal 'byor ka la ya nas// drang srong rnam pa mang po
53b6: 2/ tshogs 'di yon tan rgya cher grags// don rnams nges par bshad pa las// drang srong mang pos rig 'dzin thob// ston par byed pa'i ka la yan// gsang bdag chos kyi rgyal por gyur// 'on tang gsang ba'i don 'di dag/
53b7: snod dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba la// bstan tam bshad dam brjod par gyis// des ni yon tan chen po dang // nga yi spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur// des na 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam ni// rnal 'byor
53b8: gsang ba'i tshogs 'di yin/ / rnal 'byor gang zhig blo ldan pas// skad cig tsam 'amathar cig la// rgyal ba'i tshogs 'di rab bskrun na// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor mtha' dag dang // tha

54a1: tshig zab mo skongs nas kyang / / chos kyi mig ni thod bar 'gyur// des ni cho gas spyad yon tan dang // log par spyad pa'i skyon rnams ni// sngon byung gleng gzhi bshad pa yin zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsung so//
54a2: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'das pa sngon byung gi le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de'i
54a3: zhal du shin du re zhing bka' sdong ba'i tshul gyis lta zhing kun du brjid par 'khor gyis bskul ba'i sal sta gon du gnas shing cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas 'khor phal mo ches rnam par bskul bar rig nas rnal 'byor
54a4: gyi phyag lus kun sa la brdabs nas a la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab pa/ / e ma rdo rje sems chen po// rang rig mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'bar// mgon po yon tan bsam las 'das
54a5: rgyal 'thob khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / e ma rang snang dbyer med sku// rnam dag bsod nams mtshan gyis brgyan// dpe byad 'bru bkod blta mi doms// sku lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma rnam dag nam mkha'i
54a6: dbyings/ / gcig gsung sna tshogs sgrar rig mkhyen// bsam 'das brjod med rdo rje'i gsung // gsung lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma gsang ba nam mkha'i thugs// mnyam nyid mi g.yo so sor gsal// kun
54a7: rig snying po ye shes mchog/ thugs lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma mi mdzad mdzad pa che// ma chags chags bral 'dod chags mdzod// thams cad sgrol ba'i las chen po// phrin las mchog la phyag 'tshalo//
54a8: rgyal tshab khyod la gsol ba ni// byams mgon thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// sprul pa'i go chags ru bsnyams te// 'khor ba'i skyes lings chen po la// sdug bsngal shin tu gsang ba'i phyir// thams cad dur khrod/

54b1: chen po ru// byin gyis brlabs pa'i las chen mdzod// a ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las// sems dpa' rdo rje chen po des rnal 'byor pa'i phyag byas nas// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la zhus
54b2: pa a la la ho bde ba chen po'i mchog gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po/ / yang gsad bla na med pa'i bdag nyid/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rmad du byung ba'i tshig shin tu rdul pod pa gsol ba 'tshal ba 'di shin du ngo mtshar
54b3: lags so/ / 'di dag 'dul ba'i dbang du dgongs te/ ji ltar 'tshal ba'i bsam pa rangs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des kun du 'dul ba'i dus
54b4: mkhyen nas bka' gsar rmad du byung ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dur khrod rgyan gyi rol pa las rmad du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i tshig 'di
54b5: gsungs so/ / hUM he he phaT/ hUM hUM bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN Da la a ra li i u la ti ba li traM staM/ kha li ho/ na sha staM b+ha ya hUM/ bruM phu tsa khA hi phaT phaT ha la hUM/ zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs cu mtha'
54b6: yas pa thams cad dur khrod kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ shin tu rnam par 'thor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'khor gzhan
54b7: gyis yid tshed du mi 'gyur ba'i sku'i chos bstan pa ni sku kun du dur khrod kyi bdag po chen por bsgyur nas dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad dang / he ru ka'i gnas ban+d+ha dang / dpal gyi chas brgyad dang / dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po da
54b8: dang / don gyi rtags chen po bcwa brgyad dang / dur khrod kyi longs spyod sna tshogs pa bstan pas zhala'i 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gzigs pa las sems dpa' rdo rje des mkhyen te// bka' gsang dbang chen 'dis don du ni

55a1: bshad tshig tu bsgrags par rig nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la shin du ldem dgongs kyi tshig tu smras pa/ bka' gsang rmad byung chen po 'di// sbas pas zab cing rtogs dka' ba// mtshon pas don 'byin mi shes pas
55a2: nyon mongs rang dga' spyod snyam pa'i/ / shin du byis pi'i blo zhan ri 'a// nges pa'i shes rab mig ljongs te// don gyi rtsal shugs chung ba yis// dga' ba de'i longs spyod bskrun snyam nas// mtshan ma rang dga' spyod bsgrubs kya
55a3: rang bzhin 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ / rgyud phung 'bras bu tshig gyur nas// myu gu brlag ste ga la 'byung // gtan tshigs de bas 'di don dag/ rtsal zhan dag la bstan man zhes// gsang bdag rgyal po kun gsung na// ci khyod
55a4: rnams kyis mi shes sam zhes rnam par smras pa las/ 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis slar gsol pa// e ma 'o sams dpa' chen po de lta bu'i rgyu tshig chen po dag 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor gyi nang dam pa 'dir gsung ngamangon
55a5: te mi spyod dam/ cang ma lags grang / ci blang dor mdzad dam/ e ma snod du ma gyur pa ni gang mchis/ thams cad byang chub kyi snying po can lags na/ thong kun du rab tu thod/ rnam par rab tu gsungs/ 'gag pa mi mda' mi
55a6: 'gog gsung / / ci phyir mi gsung thogs med sras// rgyal ba'i sras po dus 'di lags// gsang ba'i snying po snod 'di lags// bka' gsang dkyil 'khor gnas 'di lags// gsang ba'i dur khrod tshul 'di lags// snying /
55a7: rje zhe sems khyod la 'dud// gsang ba yang gsang khyod la 'dud// gsang ba ye gsang khyod la 'dud// dkyil 'khor rgyal po khyod la 'dud// 'khor lo snying po khyod la 'dud// gsang chen snying po tshul tsa lags// bka
55a8: gsang dkyil 'khor thabs ci lags/ / 'bras bu bde ba'i don ci lags// ma 'ongs pa yi rnal 'byor dag/ bsgrubs na dang len 'tshal ba yi// rig par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci lags// 'byung chen rgyal pos bshad du

55b1: gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ / sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de shin du bzhad pa chen pos rnam par bzhad de// a a he he'i gang rgyangs bsgrags pas 'khor thams cad kyang gang rgyangs kyi sgra chen po sgrogs
55b2: mdzad de dgyes pa'i 'od zer las shes rab kyi dpal de dgyes pa'i rol mi sna tshogs lid long pyad par byung ngo / / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa das lus kun bsrang ste/ dur khrod kyi chas sna tshogs gsar zhing
55b3: rtags bcwa brgyad 'bar bar byas nas brjid pa'i gsung gis gsang sngags rgya mtsho dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs don gyi bsgrub pa rtags kyi rol pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag bshad do// gcig tu yang dag
55b4: des grub pa'i/ / don la rton byed rnal 'byor rnams// thogs med nyid du 'grub 'dod pa// ji ltar brtso blag mkhan dag gis// ras dkar spangs pas tshon 'dzin ltar// rnal 'byor las rnams dang por ni// skongs dang
55b5: sbyor ba'i las rnams gces/ / zab mor 'jug pa'i sngon logs nas// sems nyid gting nas char gcad phyir// theg pa dman pa'i skye bo dang // lhan cig ci la'ang mi rnal lo// de las gyur pa'i yo byad dag/ rus sbal
55b6: mgo la 'ongs pa dag/ shin du 'khrugs pa'o sems chen gyis// rgya mtshos bshugs te spang bar bya// gal te gang zag dbang gis ni// nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba na// mgon tshun chos nyid chu bab nas// skong ldog
55b7: gargya cher bya/ / sgrub rtsom sngon nam yang sngon nam// zhag grangs dag gi sngon logs nas// sdig sbyangs byang chub sems bskyed de// dge ba'i don la 'dun par bya// slongs mo dang slong la dga' ba// slong la 'tsho ba'i tshe spyod
55b8: rnams/ / sde dang chan dang grar byas te// snying rje khud pa'i zhing du bya// sman dang 'bru dang rtsi rnams dang // bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa dag/ btags sam phye mar sbyar nas kyang // klung ngam chu klung mtsho chen du// dor te chag med

56a1: sbyin par bya/ dge ba'i yon bdag dang blangs te// nad gso shes slob spyod sgom grwa// btsugs te ngas gnas mchog bya zhing // dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod chen bya// gsung sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs pa yi// gle gra ba
56a2: zab mo kun bsten te/ / brjod dang bsnyen bkur bsti gnas kyis// rgya che yangs pa'i las rnams bya// ye shes tshogs rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir// shes rab tshogs kyi sbyin mchog dag/ bsten tam glegs bam
56a3: la sogs pa'i/ / blo mchog ldan pa rnams la sbyin// bsgom dang goms par bya ba yis// kun gzhi dag par bya ba'i phyir// ting 'dzin bye ba mang po la// blo mchog yid kyi rtsal di sbyad// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te/ DU
56a4: sbyangs lhag pa'i shes rab lta/ / shog ma srung dang sho gam lam// mi bde'i gnod pa kun bsal te// tshad med snying rje'i 'khor lo bskor// sbyin pa'i 'khor lo rgyun mi gcad// chu 'am sa 'am nam mkha' 'am// me 'amad
56a5: bzhin rlung rnams la/ / sku gdung spel mchod ring bsrel rnams// brtsam pa'i las chen 'khor lor bya// mtshams med zlog par kyed pa yi// lus sem rgyud yu la blags te// 'phags pa'i sprin tshogs pho brang du// sbrul
56a6: snyed lus kyis mchod sems bshags/ / rgyal mnyes las ni gyis shig pa// thabs chen spyod pa'i las chen las// rnam gzhi me yi las mchog bya// des ni mtshams med zlogs pa yin// thugs rje 'byung ba'i 'khor lo/
56a7: dag/ gang ltar goms ltar 'bad rtsol bya// bstan pa skyong ba'i tshogs rnams la// sbyin mchod spel ba'i las rnams bya// de la sogs pa'i dge ba'i tshogs// don du mi 'gyur kun spangs la// nan tan tshogs kyi dpung chen
56a8: bskyed / 'di ltar las chen ltar sog pa// gzhan du bskyed pa ma yin te// rtse cig don ldan rnal 'byor pa// rgyud ldan sdod ldan bya phyir dang // gal te rtsal zhan ma grub na// dge bsags ltang chen kun bsdoms te// las kyi

56b1: bsags pa don bgrangs shing / / gdung ba'i shugs phyung rtsal sprugs na// nyi shar chu klung zla brnyan ltar// rang bzhin shugs kyis 'grub par gces// de phyir phra mo yan chad kyang // bdag gi don du 'gyur bar bya// de ltar sbyang
56b2: ba spyod pa yi/ / phra mo'i rnal 'byor blo 'phel ba// chung du chung sogs mthar zad nas// skod pa'i rnal 'byor 'khor lo yis// zhig dang ral dang chags 'dres dag/ bskang gso gzhug pa'i las 'di bya// las chen skong ba'i
56b3: khyad par gyis/ / gnas su brtag par nges med de// mi sdug skyon can bkrag mi shis// spangs te med par gyur pa yi// shin du sar pa'i gnas chen dag/ bskang ba'i gnas su de 'gyur ro// de ltar yid 'ong gnas btsal nas//
56b4: drod ldan bla ma spyan drangs te// sri'u rgyal chos spyi bor bskur// de yang dmigs kyis zhu ba dag/ maN Da la khar sil tsam dag la// me long snying po ltar bcas te// gtsang ma'i sgra las rdzas byas pa// yid 'ong rnam pa'i mchod
56b5: pa la/ rkyen gyi rnal 'byor sna tshogs kyis// brgyan te klubs pa'i sprin phrang rnams// mnyes nas skongs phyir rgyal la dbul// phyi 'khor skyong ba'i mgon po la// 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa yi// yid bzhin longs spyod rkyen dang
56b6: bcas/ yon tan cha las smon bcol mchod// mnyes nas skongs pa'i stongs su 'gyur// khams gsum snying rje'i gnas rnams la// yo byad byin tshogs chen po las// 'dod pa'i bsam pa rangs byas ni// mgu bas
56b7: skongs pa'i stongs su 'gyur/ / bgegs su gyur pa'i bgegs ris kyang // mnyam pa'i don gyis sems mi 'byung // dmigs kyi kha zas sna tshogs las// bgegs rnams mgun thams cad kyang // mnyam pa'i don gyis
56b8: skongs pa'i rgyur/ / cung zad tsam du snang ba yin// de ltar skong ba'i las rnams kyis// bskor bar bya ba'i dmigs rnams ni// rnam pa lngar ni snang ba ste// kun du nyams pa chen po dang // rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams//

57a1: de bzhin zlas nyams zhar nyams lnga// bskang ba'i thabs kyang lnga yod de// spyad pa'i thabs kyis bskang ba dang // rdzas dang don dang ting 'dzin dang // man ngag gsang ba'i thabs chen no// de dag la yang lnga lnga ste// spyod/
57a2: pa'i tshul gyis bskang ba la// rnam pa lnga ru bshad par bya// dang po 'bum lnga khri gsum ste// rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsum po// yan lag nyams par gyur pa la// stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya// zlas nyams brgya ldacu
57a3: gsum mo/ / zhar gyis nyams par gyur pa la// bco lnga gcig gsum dag gis skongs// rdzas kyis bskad pa'i thabs mchog ni// gal te bsrung ba 'ga' zhig las// byang chub tha tshig ral gyur na// gti mug rigs kyi thatshig/
57a4: bskad// dmang rigs bla ma spyan drangs la// nyes 'gal mi bcab stong du bshags// gser la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// byang chub sems skyed rgyud sbyangs mnyen// rdo rje tha tshig ral gyur na//
57a5: zhe sdang rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // rje'u rigs bla ma spyan drangs ste// nyes byas mi bcab 'bum du bshags// shel la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des bla// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bsgom brtson bya/
57a6: rin chen tha tshig nyams gyur na// nga rgyal rigs kyi tha tshig bskar // rgyal rigs bla ma spyan drangs te// nyes byas mi babab brgyad khrir bshags// bai dUr+ya la sogs rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des bla// skrag dung
57a7: ring bsrel rnam par spel/ / pad mo'i tha tshig ral gyur na// 'dod chags rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // gdol rigs bla ma spyan drangs la// nyes byas mi bcab brgyar bshags bya// bye ru la sogs rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang
57a8: brlag nor des bslu/ / bshad bya zab mo'i glegs bam brjod// las kyi tha tshig ral gyur na// phrag dog rigs kyi tha tshig skad// bram ze rigs pashes spyan drangs la// nyes byas mi bcab bco lngar bshags// in dral

57b1: sogs rdzas rnams kyis/ / tha tshig gang brlag nor des bla// mchod sbyin bsod nams las chen bya// des ni bskang pa'i las chen 'grub// don gyis bskang ba'i thabs mchog kyang // rnam lnga'i tshul du bshad par bya// chos
57b2: kun nam mkhar bsgoms nas kyang / / bag chags bzang ngan thams cad kun// ci yang med par blo la bzhag/ de la goms byas nyes pa med// kun la mkhas pa'i bla ma la// rgya che yangs pa'i chos mnyan de// bsam
57b3: pa'i las rnams rgya cher bya/ / yid kyis dmigs pa'i las dag na// rtsa ba nyams pa skongs par 'gyur// gal te yan lag nyams gyur na// chos nyid nam mkha'i don ston pa'i// glegs bam zab mo kun brtags /
57b4: don rnams rgya cher brtags par bya// des ni yan lag nyams pa med// zlas ni tha tshig nyams 'gyur na// bla ma skyes bu mkhas pa la// gzhung chen tshugs pa'i bstan pa zhig/ ston pa'i yon bdag gnyer blangs te//
57b5: blo yi rtsal can kun bsdus te// dam chos bdud rtsi bstan pa bsgrags// gal te zhar gyis nyams gyur na// bstan pa'i glegs bam rgya chen rnams// bris nas chos kyi sbyin par bya// des ni zhar nyams skongs par 'gyur//
57b6: ting 'dzin rtsal gyi thabs mchog ni// bag chags can gyis spyi gtsug tu// rtsa mar 'od ni me long tsam// shin tu 'bar zhing 'tsher gsal bas// chags dang bcas pa'i phung po bsregs// rnam grol sems kyi rang bzhin dang /
57b7: 'od kyi rang bzhin gcig pa las// dkar dang dmar dang mthing ka yaM// 'od kyi thig le gsum du 'gyur// dkar po spros pas khyad pa che// dmar po spros pas chags pa che// mthing ka thugs kyis bon te// rnam gsum cig/
57b8: tu 'dus pa las// ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags bsregs// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig skongs// dkar po rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la// dmar po 'bud pa'i rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i bag chags rnam par gtor//

58a1: dmar po chu zla dkyil 'khor las// mthang ka ye shas chu byung bas// dngas po'i ldan ljin thams cad bkrus// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// rdzas bsreg pa la
58a2: me dgos kyang / / bag chags tshig la ma mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes me byung bas// mtshan ma yi ni bud shing bsregs// 'jig rten gtor la rlung dgos kyang // mtshan ma gtor la rlung mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes rlung
58a3: byung bas/ mtshan ma'i rdul chogs rnam par 'phyag/ lus bkru pa la chu dgos kyang // sems bkru ba la chu mi dgos// mnyam nyid chu bo khrus kyi rdzing // ye shes chu bo'i rgyun byung bas// bag chags ldan ljin thams cad krus
58a4: oM kro d+hi shwa ri sarba pA be sho d+ha ya/ oM AHhUM/ re ye khaM/ de skad tshig tu brjod pa yis// nyams pa'i chad pa mi 'byung ngo // gcig tu bskang ba'i las chen yang // rigs kyi rdzas dang yo byad rnams// gnas su bsags
58a5: na byin brlabs te/ / phyi nang mtshams cad brtan byas nas// so so rigs kyi dam tshig la// 'gal bar gyur pa gang dang gang // mchod dang bshags dang gnod bkur te// yan lag brgyad kyi tshul bzung nas// bsam gtan
58a6: gnas sbyangs rdzas bsab pa/ / gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig la// shes nas rtogs par bya rgyu las// ma rig log pa'i mthu yis na// tha tshigs drag po yal gyur na// pho brang nam mkha'i ling ga la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
58a7: dbus gnas par/ / a yi rang bzhin 'od gsal bar// gsal 'byo 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drug tu brdabs pa yis// 'od 'dril bskal pa'i mtha' gsal bas// gti mug ri bo'i mun gsal te// byang chub
58a8: mu gu 'bar bar 'gyur/ / de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o bde gshegs pa tshig las// byang chub sems bde gsal 'bar ba// don du mi gtong gzhi bskyed de/ sang sa rgyas

58b1: gdung chen rgyud snyam las/ / ji ltar zla bar ri ltar// rgyu las byung ba'i rang bzhin las// byang chub myu gu nub ma khar// gzugs kyi phung po'i zhing khams su// bde mchog mkha' mnyam dbyings chen gsal// gnyen pos
58b2: 'joms pa'i thabs chen las/ / bskar ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// byang chub bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// slongs 'gyur bsab pa'i don du sbyar// sarba ta thA ga ta
58b3: bu ta sa ma ya ho/ / de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // spyi bo ba de'i tshul phyag rgya sbyar// zhe sdang rigs kyi tha tshig las// pho brang rnam shes ling ga la// rdo rje bum pa'i dbus gnas par// hUM gi rang bzhin 'od gsal bar//
58b4: gsal 'phro 'phrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyi drag tu brdabs pa yis// 'od 'dril rdo rje'i pha lam gyis// zhe sdang ri bo blags nas kyang // shes rab me long 'od gsal 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor
58b5: can gyis tshig 'di brjod/ / e ma'i rdo rje tha tshig rnams// sems chen ye shes gsal 'bar ba// thugs mchog gdung chen rgyud snyam las// ji ltar ral gri so rgal ltar// de las gyur pa'i rang bzhin las// shes
58b6: rab me long nub ma khar/ / rnam shes phung po'i zhing khams su// gsal 'bar ye shes thig le 'phro// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen gyis// bskar ro bskal pa'i thugs dam bskur// gsang ba'i don gyi rdzas
58b7: mchog 'dis/ / thugs mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam bskar// skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyar// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // snying gi brda' yi tshul phyag sbyar// nga rgyal rig kyi
58b8: dam tshig las/ / snyoms nas dang du blang rgyu las// log pa'i nga rgyal de mchoms// tha tshig drag po yal 'gyur na// pho brang skye rgyu'i ling ka'i dkyil// rin chen 'bar ba'i dbus gnas par// sra yi rang bzhin 'od gas

59a1: 'bar/ / gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag du brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril rin chen 'khor lo yis// nga rgyal de'u chen brlag 'gyur nas// bsod nams ljon shing me tog 'bar// de ltar gsal
59a2: bar gyur pa na/ / rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma rin chen tha tshig las// bsod nams yon tan 'od 'bar ba// don du mi gtong bzhir bskyed de// rgya mchog gdung chen rgyud snyoms las// ji ltar mkha'
59a3: la 'khrigs 'thibs ltar/ / rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// me tog 'od mdzes yal ma khang// tshor ba'i phung po'i zhing khams su// che ba'i ye shes mnyam 'bar bas// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen
59a4: las/ skang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskrad// gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// sku mchog skal pa'i thugs dam bskad// skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta rang na sa ma ya ho// de
59a5: skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang / / bral ba brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// 'dod chags rigs kyi dam tshig las// rtogs nas spyod par bya rgyu las// 'dod log rgya mtsho ma ngoms te// the tshog drag po yal 'gyur nas// pho brang pad ma'i ling
59a6: ga'i dkyil/ / pad mo 'bar ba'i dbus gnas par// oM gyi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag du brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril pad mo'i mtshon cha las// 'dod chags rgya
59a7: mtsho skams gyur nas/ / pad ma chos kyi ye shes 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o pad mo'i tha tshig las// pad mo'i ye shes 'od 'bar bas// don du mi gtong bzhi
59a8: bskyed de/ gsung mchog gdung chen rgyud bsnyams nas// ji ltar pad stong tsher ma ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// pad mo'i ye shes nub ma khang// 'du shes phung po'o zhing khams su// rtogs pa'i chos nyid

59b1: 'od 'phros pas/ / gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskar // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// gsung mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skongs gyur bsam pa'i
59b2: don du sbyar/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // lce yi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// phrag dog rigs kyi dam tshig las// rtogs nas spyad par bya rgyu las// phrag dog log bzung dbang gis
59b3: mtha tshig drag po yal 'gyur ba/ / pho brang gsang ba'i ling ga'i dkyil// rdo rje ral gri dbus gnas par// ha yi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa las/
59b4: 'od 'dril rdo rje'i ral gri yis// phrag dog mtshon cha gsibs gyur nas// rdo rje ral gri ye shes 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o phrin las tha tshig las rdo rje ngal gri
59b5: 'od 'bar bas/ / don du mi gtong bzhi bskyed de// phrin las gdung chen rgyud mnyam las// ji ltar nyi gsal sprin sgribs ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rdo rje 'od chen nub ma khang // 'du byed phung po'i ning
59b6: khams su/ / ye shes mtshan cha'i 'od 'phros pas// gnyen pos 'joms po'i thabs chen las// bskang ro bskal pa'i thugs dam bskad// gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// phrin las bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams
59b7: skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyar/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // lus kyi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// des kyang skongs pa'i las chen 'grub// man ngag thabs kyi don mchog ni// rtsa ba
59b8: yan lag de rnams las/ / gdo dag nyams par gyur pa la// man ngag thabs mchog lnga yis bskang // nyams pa chen por ltung 'gyur na// bla mar gyur pa'i skyes bu dag/ rgyal po dgu yi spyan lam du// bsgrub pa chen

60a1: po dgu brtsam zhing / / mchog chen dgu yi brtul zhugs spyad// rang gi gzungs ma gang yin pa// bla ma dgu la gzungs mar dbul/ de bzhin rtsa ba yan lag dang // zla dang zhar las nyams pa la// bsgrub pa don gyi
60a2: khyad par rnams/ / bdun nam lnga 'am gsum 'am gcig/ rim po bzhin du sbyar byas na// des ni stongs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// bskangs pa'i yul yang rnam lnga ste// bde gshegs rgyal ba mtha' dag kyang // mdo bcu
60a3: nanam lnga ste/ / gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags phrag dog 'di lnga dag/ rtsa bar gyur pa'i don gyis na// gzhi yang thams cad 'dis bsgyur bas// nyams dang ma nyams tha tshig dang // longs spyod spong len zas
60a4: cad rnams/ / 'di rgyu yin par rig bya ste// rgyu nyid rgyur btags dbang gi na// bsgyur bas dug 'gyur sman chen ltar// de nyid tha tshig btsan por bsgyur// 'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang //
60a5: pad mor las lnga'i rigs su 'dus// de dag thugs dam mchog nyid kyang // rnam lngar 'dus par bstan pa la// rtogs nas bsung bsgrub dam bcas pa// so sor 'gal zhing chag nyams na// so so nyid du bsab pA u0f7f/
60a6: su yi chag nyams gnas su gzhag/ gsung gi 'gal 'khrul so ru bsab// thugs kyi 'gal 'khrul gsor med de// rdo rje snying po'i tha tshig la// bskangs pas skongs par gyur pa yi// rtags chen dag kyang 'di lta ste/
60a7: rgyal ba sangs rgyas rigs 'dzin gyi// gdung chen dag las byung ba yi// sha ri ra zhes bya ba de// thams cad ltas su ston par byed// shel gyi za ma tog nang du// dag par bcug ste btsas pa las// nyams pa'i tshang ba
60a8: byung ba'i tshe/ / kha dog gnag cing 'bros par 'gyur// nyams pa skongs sam sor chud cing // gal te dam tshig ma nyams na// kha dog dkar zhing 'tsher bar 'gyur// legs pa'i yon tan 'byung ba'i tshe// grangs mang brgya

60b1: tsher 'phel bar 'gyur/ / gal te gnag gam ri gsal na// sbur te bsgrims nas bskor zlog bya// 'on tang nyams pa mi phog cing // de dag so ru gso ba na// rtags che 'di ni bsten bya ste// 'di dag shin du brtags na ni//
60b2: dkar la 'tsher bar gyur pa na// rtsa ba yan lag nyams pa rnams// skongs te so chung rtags yin no// des na rnal 'byor las kyi gcor// spyod dang skor ba'i las rnams bya// bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes de dang
60b3: ces gsungs pa dang / 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i bdud kyi sde pa las lha'i rigs su gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi 'khor 'phags pa'i rigs 'dzin pa nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdag po lha chen po lnga la sogs pa bka'i
60b4: snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs te/ 'khod pa las/ 'dod chags thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje bram ze thod pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ltar ma bgyis nam dad
60b5: ma gus 'gal 'khrul du gyur pa'i chang pa'i skye gnas dang rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur/ / bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ zhes zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes bka' stsal
60b6: pa/ 'dod chags kyi bdag po la sogs pa rnams dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa'i skye gnas 'dri ba legs kyis yid tshim par byed pa bshad kyis nyon cig/ rtsa ba yan lag 'di dag las// gal te zhig gam nyam gyur na//
60b7: rnal 'byor las kyi dang po las// lung gi gsang sgor zhugs pa'i tshe// don dang ljon pa'i bla ma yis// rdo rje tha tshig byin brlabs nas// lce la dam tshig chu bzhag pa// dmyal ba rdo rjer dmod btsugs nas// ya ge hU~M du byas
60b8: pa de/ snying gi dkyil du thim nas kyang // lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa'i// khro bo ra rak+Sha zhes bya ba'i// khrag mthung chen por gyur nas ni// snying khrag gzhibs te 'thungs nas ni// sdug bsngal chen por bsad nas kyang //

61a1: dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// gal te tha tshig ma nyams na// lce la bzhag pa arga ste// snying gi dkyil du thim nas kyang // ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang bar// gyur te sgrib pa kun sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas
61a2: sras su skyed par byed/ / 'dod chags dam tshig nyams gyur na// mngal gyi grong khyer chen por 'gro// zhe sdang dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// rak+Sha srin po'i rigs su 'gro// gti mug dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// mi gtsang
61a3: zas su za ba yi/ / rmongs pa'i phag chen lus su ltung // nga rgyal dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// dus sbal nag po'i lus su lhung // phrag dog dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// chu srin mgo dgra'i lus su ltung // dam tshig chen po kun
61a4: nyams na/ / ru dra nag po'i lus su ltung // las kyi rkyen dang ma phrad na// thar pa'i skabs ni mi srid do// sems dpa'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdag po rig 'dzin rnams kyis shin du tshong chen po
61a5: 'byin cing dus der e ma'o bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na bdag la ltung rgyu mchis te/ dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la btags pa'i tshe/ bka' la ma dad ma gus pas bka' la skud cing smras
61a6: long btags pa dang / ston pa dang grogs la smad cing spyas long btags pa la sogs pa ltung ba'i rgyu mang po bgyis pas// da ni bdag cag chad pa'i skye gnas su mchi bar nges na// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos
61a7: bzung ste bka'i 'khor du bkod pas da ni thar pa thob lags grang / 'on kyang 'gyod pa drag po 'dabang gis yid kyi sgrib pa ni byang chub sems kyis bshags// ngag gi sgrib pa ni tshig du 'don cing smras te bshags/ lus kyi
61a8: sgrib pa ni lus gdan khril phul te bshags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes gzung 'tshal na/ gnyen po ni gang lags/ thabs ni ji ltar bshags/ yul ni gang la bshags/ rgyu ni gang mchis/ bcom ldan 'dra

61b1: kyis bshad du gsol/ / bde bar gshegs pa thugs rjes bskyab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig 'dzin chen po mi thod can rnams nyon cig/ ltung bar gyur pa'i gnas rnams la 'gyod par gyur na/
61b2: zhus pa legs so// ltung ba'i gnyen po ni gang zhe na/ nyes byas rnams bshags par 'dod na gang 'gyod pa drag po skyes nas pa spu ni gzings mchim byin pa yin no// thabs ni rnam pa bzhi yad de/ gang zhe na/ shes ra/
61b3: chen po'i rgyud kyis bag chags thams cad rang bzhin med par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen po'i mes bag chags thams cad bsregs te med par bya ba dang / byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis bag chags kyi mnanag
61b4: thams cad gsal te de dag dag pa bya ba dang / spyod pa rlabs po che'i chus bkru ba'o// de la bshags par bya ba'i yul ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rig 'dzin dang / lha dang tha ma dang glegs bam dang / grogs po dang /
61b5: rten du gyur pa rnams so// bshags par bya ba'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa che chung bshags pa'o// nyon mongs pa rags pa mngon du gyur pa bshags pa dang / bag la nyal dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bshags pa'o// de'i
61b6: phyir ltung bar gyur pa'i las rnams 'gyod pa drag pos bsten la thabs la mkhas pas dpyad de/ sgrib pa che chung chashas kyis phye la gus par bshags pa gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rig 'dzin
61b7: chen po mi'i thod pa can rnams mgu zhing rangs te/ rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag byas nas// 'gyod cing gdung ba'i glu 'di blangs so// oM ye shes sku mchog rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// zla rgyas bzhin du spros pa mi mnga'
61b8: yang thugs rje nyi gsal 'od bzhin snyoms mdzad lha/ / bde gshegs bzhugs shing bdag la dgongs su gsol// brjod med shes rab mi g.yo chos mchog dbyings// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku rigra ldi

62a1: gamo cho 'phrul sprul pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa yi// kun du bzang po'i bla med mchod sprin gyis// mkha' dbyings rnam dag rgya chen yongs bskrang nas// byi nang
62a2: gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya cher mchod/ / kun du bzang mo yum gyi b+ha ga la// 'du 'bral med pa'i dang du ro gcig pa'i// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis mnyes gyur cig/ sems kyi rang bzhin chos dbyings nam
62a3: mkha' che/ / chos nyid rnam dag rgya che 'od gsal bas// rnal 'byor nyid dbyings smra bas ma las 'das pas// mnyam nyid byang chub sems la rtag tu 'dud// kun bzang rdzogs chen ye nas bdal ba la// byi nang
62a4: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni/ / snang srid rnam dag kun bzang yum gyi dbyings// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yab yum lhun rdzogs rnams// gsang chen rab rdzogs gzungs chen bdag nyid ma// gnyis med
62a5: thig le chen por 'od gsal ba/ / cir yang snang bas bde chen g.yung drung lha// 'du 'bral med pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan yab yum dang // byang chub lcam dral khro bo khro mo'i tshong/
62a6: rdo rje lha mo tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag/ ma ltar byams shing srid ltar gdung la sogs// nyes legs ltang 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod pa// dbang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol// thugs rje gdung ba ro brdo
62a7: thod pa can/ bdag cag dregs pa'i bdag po 'dir tshogs kun// 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub sems bskyed de// bla med go 'phang 'thob par bya ba'i phyir// bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i 'dul khrims dang // sku gsung /
62a8: thugs dang mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog/ 'dar dka' rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer// spyi dang lhag pa'i khyad par dam tshig rnams// snga phyi mnos shing gnyer du rma'o 'tshal// don las gol zhing ldog sems

62b1: ma mchis kyang / / gdod bya long yod snyam pa'i le lo dang // glong du gyur pa'i rtsal shugs nus pa yis// shes bzhin ma ldan dam tshig 'gal 'gyur te// dang po'i tha tshig bka' la brtags pa'i tshe// bka' la/
62b2: mgus 'gal bgyis dpyas long btogs// bar du bslab pa'i gnyer chen phog pa'i cha// bslab la mi brtson don la g.yel ba dang // tha ma 'di ni 'bras bu sgrub pa dang // bka' dang gzhung bzhin me lcogs don las
62b3: 'gal/ tshor dang mtshor sgrib pa che chung rnams// shin du mi shes ma rig dbang gis na// ston pa'i bka' dang dam las 'gal bgyis pa// dpa' bo thugs rje'i bdag la bzod par gsol// 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i
62b4: dus mtha' nas/ / las kyi dbang gis bdag cag ring du 'khyams// nyon mongs log par lta ba'i dug 'thungs te// sdug bsngal nad kyis shin du gdungs pa la// bde gshegs thugs rje sman pa'i rgyal po yis// de tshig
62b5: bdud rtsi thar pa'i sman stsal pas/ / nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i nad rnams zhi mdzad cing // bla med byang chub snying por 'tsho mdzad pa// byams mgon zugs rje'i'abig la skyabs su 'chi/ zhes dus nas/ a la la ho zhes brjod de
62b6: gnyen po drag par bsten nas lus gdan khrir phul te/ byang chub sems kyis rnam par 'dud pa'i don la rnam par sbyangs pas lus gcer bu zang mar phyung // gnod pa drag po'i 'gyod pa byas pas bde bar gshegs pa
62b7: rnams mnyes par gyur to/ / des sgrib pa byang zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i rtags lus gos dang bral nas ldan pa'i thod pa yang zla ba tshes brgyad par gyur to// sa thob pa'i rtags su de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam
62b8: rten du gnas par gyur to/ / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des dgyes te bka' stsal pa/ mi'i thod pa can rnams 'gyod pa'i las kyis bshags pa legs te/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur to// da ni shes bya'i

63a1: sgrib pa dag cing ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nyan pa'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kyi gsung la gsang sngags kyi sgra rnams nyon cig/ des ni sa nas sar 'bar zhing 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur//
63a2: de skad ces gsungs pas 'khor bsam pa rangs par gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las skrod pa las kyi sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
63a3: mchog nyid ting nge 'dzin rgyas shing rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// 'dus pa'i 'khor/
63a4: rnams kyang sna tshogs 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad ci yang med par mthong ngo // chos thams cad ci yang med par gsal bar
63a5: gyur pa dang / chos nyid stong pa'i nam mkha' las brag ca'i tshul du sgra 'di byung ngo // mi gnas mi rtog bsam dang bral// ma chags chags bral yul las 'das// ci yang mi 'byung cir ma yin// rang byung rang zhi brjod dang bral//
63a6: zhes sgra byung bas ston pa ni don gyi che ba byung // 'khor rnams ni rtsal sbyangs/ thams cad don la dam zhing chos nyid kyi nam mkha' mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po nyid snying rje rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhe/
63a7: bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la snying rje byang chub sem gyi gzugs brnyan nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhig shar bar gyur to// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams yang dag par rtog pa 'di ltar
63a8: skyes te/ e ma chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'di ltar yin pa las 'di ltar ma shes pa'i 'gro ba rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying pa 'di yod snying rje zhes snying rje byang chub kyi sems skyes par gyur to// de nas nyi ma'i snying po'i

63b1: 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra phyung ngo / / yongs la khyab pa'i nyi ma'i 'od// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// rnam rtog mun pa sel bar snang // yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'o// zhes sgra byung ba las chos thams cad byang chub seb/
63b2: kyi 'od zer du gsal bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i mchog gi bdag po de nyid cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams
63b3: kyis nyi ma'i snying po las chos thams cad kyi rgyu yi ge a dkar po shar bar mthong ngo / / de nas a la cho 'phrul sgra byung ngo // a ni chags med yi ge'i mdzod// cho 'phrul rtog pa kun gyi rgyu// nyon mongs skyon bral zla ba'i mdog/
63b4: cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// zhes sgra byung bas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis chos thams cad cho 'phrul gyi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de ci yang mi
63b5: mdzad pa cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du snang bar gyur to/ / de nas yum chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i de chos thams cad nam mkha'i b+ha gar byin gyis brlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
63b6: zhugs so/ / zhugs par gyur pa dang // 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad nam mkha' khyab pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo // de nas yum gyi b+ha ga'i snying po las 'od zer mthing ka 'phros nas nyi ma'i snying po'i a la skul
63b7: bas yi ge aM mthing ka 'phros te lding zhing gnas pa las cho 'phrul gyi rang sgra 'di byung ngo / / a ni e yi rang bzhin te// a la e byung mkha' khyab bdal// mi 'gyur thogs med bsam las 'das// mtha' dang dbus med kun du
63b8: bdal/ / zhes sgra byung bas/ thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byam chad par gyur to// de nas yang yum chen mo las kyi dbyings phyug mas yang zhing g.yo ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes khyab la snyoms par zhugs so// des 'dus pa

64a1: phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad rlung gi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo / / de nas rlung de las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ngo // a yi byin rlabs ye shes las rlung gi cho 'phrul yaM ru shar// thams cad 'degs pa'i
64a2: stobs ldan zhing / / rang bzhin g.yo zhing thogs med 'phyo// zhes sgra byung bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur to// de nas yum chos kyi dbyings phyag ma zhes bya ba des 'bar 'phro me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sa
64a3: 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo / / de nas me'i 'od zer la cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba// a yi byin rlabs ye shes las// cho 'phrul me yi snying por shar// 'bar bas
64a4: gsal byed ye shes 'phro/ / dngos po kun zad me klong 'tshub// ces sgra byung bas me'i skal ba 'byam klas so// de nas yang yum rin chen dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba des sdud pa rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// /
64a5: des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyi chos thams cad chu'i rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo // de nas rlabs kyi 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo // rgyu yi yi ge 'od zer las// chu yi snying po'i cho 'phrul shar// nam mkha'i
64a6: mtha' dang mnyam pa'o/ / rlung 'tsho thams cad rgyas par gyur// zhes sgra byung bas thams cad yum rin chen dbyings phyug ma'i rang bzhin gyis khyab par gnas so// de nas yus chen mo rdo rje dbyings phyug ma zhes bya bas zhing khams
64a7: thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo // de nas sa rdo rje 'bar ba
64a8: bya ba las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba/ mi dmigs pa las sna tshogs par// sna ba'i cho 'phrul 'di byung ba// rnal 'byor sa bcu rdzogs pa'i don// lhun gyis grub pas bde ba che// zhes sgra byung bas sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag du thug

64b1: su chud par gyur to/ / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de ri bo brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bor mthong ngo // de nas
64b2: de'i 'od las tshe 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo / / rnam dag shes rab mkha' klong nas// rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bo sha ra/ rgya che gting zab nam 'phang gcod// rtog pa'i ri bo 'joms par byed// ces sgra byung bas rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bos nyon mongs
64b3: pa'i ri bo thams cad zil gyis mnan no/ / de nas dbyings phyug ma chen mo lnga// shes rab zab mo'i gzhal yas yum gyi mkha' glong rnam dag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// b+ha ga'i snying po las tshe
64b4: 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo / / b+ha ga gsad pa'i 'od zer las// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang // nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings// zhes sgra byung ngo // byung bas
64b5: nam mkha' thams cad pho brang gi gzhal yas 'byam klas par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog de nyid chos thams cad sku la yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam phyag rgya thams cad
64b6: rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i bor rnams kyis 'aso pa kyad/ das pa'i chos thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i zhabs kyi gdan
64b7: khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad du rdzogs par mthong ngo / / de nas yang 'khor ba 'dod pa khams ni chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor rdzogs// 'khor ba gzugs kyi khams ni zhing chen gyi sa gzhi bdal ba la rdzogs
64b8: par mthong ngo / / ke rus la gzugs med pa'i khams rdzogs par mthong ngo // ri rab kyi kha mu tig gi btsal dang / as ma gar pa'i 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrigs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bar ba'i brag gtams pa la/ nyan thos

65a1: dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo // nor bu rin po che'i steng na rdo rje rtse gsum dang rtse lnga'i brag gtam pa la kri ya dang u pa ya dang yo ga rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo / rdo rje/
65a2: brag chen gyi steng dpad ma dkar po'i maN Da la la skyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad rdzogs par mthong ngo // pad ma'i steng na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi kha sbyor du bkod pa la dbang phyug po nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / mo
65a3: nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo / / dbang phyug pho mo'i steng byol song gi gtso bo brgyad ni rig 'dzin chen po'i rnal 'byor nyon mongs pa sbyangs nas shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir dpa' brtun stag dang / 'jigs byed
65a4: seng ge dang / gdug pa'i gzig dang / gtum pa'i don dang stobs kyi glang po dang / brjid pa'i ma he dang / 'dzin pa'i chu srin dang / zhe sdang gi sbrul rnams la rig 'dzin thams cad sal yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo //
65a5: gzhal yas chen po 'bar ba la yum kun du bzang mo rdzogs par mthong ngo // me dpung chen po dgu la ye shes kyi sgo dgu rtseg tu yongs su 'bar bar rdzogs par mthong ngo // zhabs brgyad la gsang ba'i yum shi / sgom bzhi
65a6: rdzogs par mthong ngo / / dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po bcwa brgyad ni ma mo chen po bcwa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par gsal lo// phyag 'tshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni pra men ma bcu dbyug pa 'phyar bi'i lag na khyud bcu 'bar
65a7: ba'i kha nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phro ba/ mkha' 'gro brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na seng ge kha glal pa brgyad kyi kha nas ral gri 'bar ba brgyad 'phro ba/ shugs 'gro brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na
65a8: stag 'che ba brtsegs pa brgyad kyi kha nas rdo rje sna tshogs 'phro ba/ ma mo brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na mi mgo brgyad rdo rje lu gu rgud kyis btags nas klad la bskor ba/ 'bar ma brgyad dbyug par 'byar

65b1: ba'i lag na me dpung 'bar ba brgyad las thu lum 'phro ba ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal lo// phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni khrag 'thung 'bar ba bzhi/ snying po dgu mo dgu za byed pa bcu gsod byed ma bcu ste bzhi
65b2: bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal lo/ / zhal nyi shu rtsa gcig ni srid pa za byed gsang ba'i dur khrod nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsal lo// spyan 'bar ba drug cu rtsa bzhi ni he ru ka yab yum drug cu rtsa bzhir gsal lo// dbu nyi shuH
65b3: gcig ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsal lo/ / g.yas kyi dbu bdun gyi spyi gtsug nas sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbul 'khor lo 'od zer dang bcas pa re re 'bar ba/ dbus kyi dbu mdun
65b4: las dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi dbu re re byung ba'i sku la rin po che'i mchod rten 'bar ba bdun du gsal ba/ g.yon gyi dbu bdun las dbu brgyan sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu la nor bu rin po che bdun du gsal ba
65b5: 'khor lo dang mchod rten dang rin po che de dag gi lte ba dang / bum pa dang / rtse mo las rgyal mtshan chen po bcu 'bar ba ni rgya bye'u lcags kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gdul bya sha ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / gcan zan gzig gi rgyal mtshan dang /
65b6: sprul pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen sbrul nag gi rgyal mtshan dang / dpa'o stag gi rgyal mtshan dang / gzi mdangs mi'i rgyal mtshan dang / dmar gsal khrag gi rgyal mtshan dang / rtsal chen seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / gtsu
65b7: chen dom gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan de rnams kyi rtse mo gcig tu 'dus te/ gser gyi gtsug tor tog stong 'bar ba'o// des na 'dus pa phal me tsho'i 'khor gyis zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad
65b8: du yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo / / dbu las byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rgyal mtshan chen po bcu la rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo // dbu'i gtsug tor rgyal mtshan rtse mo la gser gyi

66a1: tog stong ni rdzo pa tshan pa rnal 'byor nyid du gsal bar mthong ngo / / de ltar bathong zhing gsal bar gyur pa dang // chos thams cad sprul yongs su rdzogs pa'i don la 'khor thams cad dam zhing ngo mtshar skyes par gyu
66a2: rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis sku la yongs su bstod pa/ e ma'o chos kun sku la yongs su rdzogs pas chos kyi sku// rdo rje che mchog phyag 'tshal he ru ka/ chos nyid mkha' la skar tshogs rgyas pa'i sku// dbyar gyi char sprin gtiH
66a3: palta bu'i gzugs/ / chu rlabs lta bur brjod pa'i zhal gdangs shing // nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer bdal ba bzhin// theg chen dgu dang 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun// phyag rgya gcig tu dkod nas rdzogs pa'i sku// sku gsum ldan grub
66a4: chos sku tog stong 'bar/ / dbu k+ka kham nag ral ba gcod pan can// klu rgyal 'bum gyis klubs shing mchod kun 'bul// rdo rje gsung gi ljags sgra brdabs pas kyang // hUM dang phaT kyi sgra skad 'jigs par sgrogs// theg chen do//
66a5: dam gsang sngags sgrogs pa'i tshig/ 'bar ba'i smin ma mun rum glo go ltar 'gyur// spyan dmar zlog pa'i sdang mig nyi ltar 'bar// 'bar ba'i shangs nas skal pa'i tshub nag 'khyil// rdo rje thog dang gnam lcags ser chen
66a6: 'bebs/ rno dpal mche ba zang yag gtsigs pa yis// nyon mongs log lha'i tshogs la dam zhing 'khrug/ thed rus sha khrag rkang rus 'bu dang rnag/ za byed rngam pa'i zhal du chem che ma gsol// sbrul gdug ke rlon la sogs
66a7: 'jigs pa'i rgyan/ / rngam pa'i sku la shin du brjid par brgyan// za byed rnga ma dang 'jigs byed mang po'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan sprul pa'i pho nya mdzad// 'khor ba kun dang thar pa'i chos rnams kun// dpa' chen po'i
66a8: gdan du brjid cing rol/ / bgran gyi zla med che ba tsan gcig pu nyid// gsang mchog 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// de skad ces bstod pas chos thams cad sku la yongs su rdzogs shing sangs ma rgyas pa med par gyur to//

66b1: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid phyag rgya thams cad phyag rgya bkod pa'i pho brang du gyur to// sgobardzutsun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po tsham
66b2: nyid rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// nam mkha' don gyi glegs bam la// skar tshogs rig pa'i yigazis te// 'byung chen bzhi yi sgra s+thaH/
66b3: pas// sang sngags chos kyi rgyun mi 'chad// chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bdud rtsi rgyun kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
66b4: zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// stong gsum ba na da'i bzang khong du// srid gsum sems can dug chen las// dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsi sbyar bas// bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis rdzogs zhes gsungs so//
66b5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mchod pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i yo byad rnams// mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan yin te// srid pa
66b6: rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun/ / kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de bzlas brjod rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so//
66b7: 'khor ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las// sems can sangs rgyas snying po shar// sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa// thams cad bzlas brjod sngags kyi tshig ces gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po
66b8: sbyor ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba shes rab yum nyid la// snying rje thabs kyi rgyal po yis// 'du 'bral med par sbyar bas ni// thams cad rgyal ba'i sras su byed

67a1: ces gsungs so/ / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sgrol ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad gsungs so// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mtshon
67a2: chen gyis/ rang bzhin med par bsgral nas ni// mnyam nyid chos su chen por gtan// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sku gdung rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad
67a3: ces gsungs so/ / 'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la// gzugs khams par rim khri 'phang brtan// gzugs med bum nyen bum par bcas// gdung chen chos skur rgyun du gnas zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i
67a4: rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / nam mkha' me chus rlung rnams// rmang bzhi ri rab rten du snang // bang rim ri bdun bcas pa rnams// de nyid bang rim khri 'phang btan// ri bo bram nyen bum par bcus// 'di yang chos su
67a5: rgyun mi chad/ / sems dpa'i rdo rje des yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dzugs pa'i yan lag bzhi rmar rten// 'khor lo tshogs chen khri 'phang brtan// yan lag dang po bum brten bcas// lcang le cod pan phreng bas kluH/
67a6: zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des shi ba yongs su slong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ro yi sgrub lngas chen po ni// dur khrod chen po'i gnas rnams su// ro yi rdzas rnams
67a7: btsal nas kyang / / 'dod pa bskur ba'i sngags kyi gdab ro ma steng du gnas nas ni// r-i ye gnyen por bdag bsams nas// ro sngags rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas// rol bkrag dang ma dngas phyung na// grub par 'gyur ba
67a8: rtags yin te/ / rgyun mi 'chad par ting 'dzin bya// ro ni mgul bar gyur pa dang // gser 'gyur rtsis ni byug par bya// ro yi yan lag kun bcings nas// sngags ni dag par bzlas par bya// ro nyid langs par gyur pa dang /

67b1: ro yi cho 'phrul ston par byed// brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// de tshe ro yi lce bcad nas// ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur// de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi// rkyen gyis bskur na de ltar 'gyur// lce bcad ral gri mtshon
67b2: cha des/ ro yi ban da bcad pa dang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste// ban dgo ru bzung nas ni// lce yi ral gri thogs nas ni// lha min g.yul yang zlog par 'gyur// ro langs grub pa'i rkad mgyogs ni// dpag pa'i tshad las
67b3: 'das pa ste/ / skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa bzhis// phyogs bzhi dag tu kha stas nas// dus gcig mnga' yi rgyad 'phangs nas// mda' ni sa la ma 'babs par// bzhi ka bar snang las blangs nas// skad cig tsam gyis 'jig
67b4: rten skor/ / skyes bu lag tshed ma yal bar// de ma thag tu gnas su sleb// rol 'dod pa kun 'byung zhes// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// ces gsungs so// ro langs bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas yang
67b5: sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de rdo rje nam mkha'i them skus zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / nam mkha' rdo rjer bsgoms nas kyang // ting 'dzin reng bar gyur pa na// phan tshun
67b6: g+ha bru'i thabs tshul du/ / rdo rje sas la bgrod nas ni// nam mkha'i dbyings su song nas kyang // snang srid 'jig rten khams la blta// des ni sems yul yangs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'
67b7: rdo rje snying po de rgya mtsho chen po gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / rgya mtsho rdo rjes btams par ni// ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang // rgya mtsho chen por bgrod nas
67b8: ni/ rgya mtshor gnas pa'i sems can rnams// ting 'dzin rdo rjes bsgral bar bya zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de thogs med rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces

68a1: gsungs so/ / nam mkha' dag gi ling ga la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bsgoms te ting 'dzin rtas pa dang // zhing khams kun tu bgrod par bya ces gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpI
68a2: rdo rje snying po des nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / nam mkha' dag gi ling ga la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bsgoms te ting nge 'dzin
68a3: rtas pa dang mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad bsal zhes gsungs so/ / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rnal 'byor sdig
68a4: 'dzub rtse mo la/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal 'bar// bsgoms te ting 'dzin rtas pa dang / chu rgyun babs te gzhil bar bya zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des stong gi 'jig rten rgyang
68a5: mar 'phen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / rnal 'byor las kyi dkyil 'khor du// stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas// shin du gsal bar bsgoms pa dang / ting 'dzin
68a6: rtsal can rab sbyangs phyir/ / nam mkha'i khams su 'phangs nas ni// sa nas sa ru spar bar bya// de skad ces gsungs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
68a7: snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / rnal 'byor sdigs pa'i 'dzub mo la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba las// 'od zer 'bar ba 'bum 'bros pas// 'od zer de dag re re las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
