112b7: ni rdul snyad lha rnams su/ / i ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// u ni rdul snyed mi rnams sa// U ni rdul snyed dbyol song rnams// e ni rdul snyed yi dgas su// i ni rdul snyad dmyal ba rnams// oM na thams cad 'jigs par byed// oM na
112b8: thams cad zhig pa yi/ / yi ge 'khor lo tshigs chen 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi phred pas bsdus// zhes brjod do/ a ho/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang / gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid

113a1: kyis gsung ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang thugs dang / yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ho thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs sku 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar
113a2: mi tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis/ / 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam// 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med zla rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin/ ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs
113a3: pa thams cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur to/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yi ge 'khor lo sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phro
113a4: ba 'di ched du brjod do/ / rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon
113a5: rdzogs pas/ / phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor tham cad 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing // longs spyod 'byung ba ngan sod sto/ cir yang gzhan du 'gyur ba
113a6: 'grub/ / nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing // 'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang // chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten khams 'dir 'dor ba dang // thams cad stongs shing ltung bar 'gyur// dgug dang btang dang bcing
113a7: dang grol/ / gso dang gsad dang pha ma dang rgyal// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i// ming tshig gzugs sogs yid bzhin gyis// mun la snang 'brung ji bzhin du 'gyur bas cha gser 'gyur
113a8: sman gyi tshul/ / ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// mnyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan med cing brlag/ dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i

113b1: dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni/ / zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod// 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste// dngos po med las dngos po sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pa/ rtog pa'i dbang skur/
113b2: ti 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa// de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes// de phyir dngos dang dngos med par// 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis// bzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan
113b3: med pa yin rigs rgyud min/ / kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang yang min// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// thabs la thabs 'byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad med la tha
113b4: dad pa'i/ / nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol// 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog/ gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgyas rab
113b5: bstan na/ / dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
113b6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di
113b7: brjod do/ / ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyi grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ gru chad
113b8: bzhis brgyan par khyams ldan/ / kun tu gru bzhi sgo khrud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin spung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis rgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khrud// nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad ma

114a1: rin po che/ / gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas na mthong thos sdom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshigs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // thos byed sdom byed myong
114a2: byed rnams/ / btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// par byams la ni thub drug dang // mdun dang rgyab na byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas//
114a3: rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad ma ral gri dril bu 'bang // ut+pa la klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// 'thing kha dkar po ser leb rgan// ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyen lcug 'khril
114a4: ldem gzhon tshul can/ / gsal 'tsher lhun stag gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis 'grub//
114a5: sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang // 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// 'thun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston// ston nyid sgyu ma mi g.yor tshul// tshul nyid dbying
114a6: las g.yos pa med/ / ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// de tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la// so so 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang // las 'phro'i dbang gis so sor snang // dper na me long chu zla ba zhi// de tshe 'gro
114a7: drug thams cad la/ / / sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan// dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i gzugs// gzhan yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas
114a8: mchog tu/ / sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// sku yis chos rnams 'jal bar ston// me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad

114b1: sel/ / 'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na// byang chub sgrub pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du sku la snang // de nas sa bcu'i rim gyi 'byed// bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob// chos sku dpag med brjod du med// longs spyod zad/
114b2: med rin chen gter// sbal po bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod yul kun du maN Da la// tshegs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rabs yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam
114b3: yas mchog/ skye shi med pa g.yung drung sku// nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// zad mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa rig pa'i sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen 'i ye shes
114b4: sa/ / de tshes lnga kun kyang rdzogs zhes brjod pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi long ba zhing gi rdul snyed cig gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs
114b5: pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ho// dmigs bye dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi
114b6: khyab/ ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod me lang // mnyam dang mi mnyam kun gyi khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'bros spros pa med// ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i
114b7: snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // b+h+rUM li swa bi shud d+he/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika/
114b8: oM dzi na dze ka/ s+pho rang na d+hirka/ oM A ro li ka/ haM pradz+nyA d+hi ka/ mr-i d+ha twe shwa rI/ lAM d+he Sha ra te/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ bAM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badz+ra ra ti/ k+ShaM hi rA dza ya/ traM a ga dra ya/ tri ha hUM pad ma pad ma/ dz+hi ku ru ban tre/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma

115a1: !/ ba lhas ma la to// nA ga tA rA gaH/ oMn te rA ga yA me mA d+ha na swAhA/ las rab ya sAd/ rAs rA dzA ya s+yAH/ TA swar dzA ya swAhA/ mr-i shrI a ga ya stan/ rnga chub phrabs/ rU pra Sh+Ta a bes/
115a2: dwe baM su Sh+pe ni/ to gad d+he tsi ta te/ nA ya mAn ta kr-ita phaT/ hU~M bad mAn ta kri ta paT/ hA pra dz+nyAn ta kri ta phaT/ dAM bi b+ha rAn ta kri ta phaT oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma dwe kre d+he shwa rI dzA lI hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ra d+ha na d+ha ra ma hA kre d+he shwa rI dzA lA ni tA
115a3: phaT/ oM ma hA pad pa d+hA ra pahA kro d+ha~M shA rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kaR+ka b+ha ra ma hA krod+ha shwa rI dza la ni hU~M phaT/ hUM hU hUM badz+ra tsit+ta a a a badz+ra b+ha dras man ta oM/ oM mu ne hrI swA hA/ oM mu ne hI sA hA/ dze mun bu / mo mu m+'u sh+ma mo pu ne thaM hAH/
115a4: oM pu ne k+ShaM swAhA/ oM mu de ya swa hA/ oM e h+ye hi thA ga d+hAn ma hA ka ru Ni ka ru dri s+ya ho sa ma ya sta/ dzaHhUM ba ha~MHa~M a hUM swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ga/ pa pa ba ba pa/ dza dza dza dza dza/ pa pa pa pa pa/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ba pa ba pa pa/ ma ma mam
115a5: pa pab ba pa/ ya ya ya ya ya/ babab pa pa/ oM a hA sAr+tha// ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/
115a6: oM badz+ra sa ma ya ste/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya he/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab par grags so// rab tu grags so// kun tu grags so// de nas bcom
115a7: ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang / bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do// de nas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen po'i ye shes dang
115a8: byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i 'di su dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las pUd do// oM ma hA shA n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha~M/ oM ma hA A dang sha dz+nyA na badz+ra sA Ta Ad ma ko ha/ oM ma hA pra t+ya be ka NA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa

115b1: thA ba Ad ma ko hi/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha/ oM ma hA kri t+ya a nuShAn dzA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba Ad ma ko taM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma dA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ke he/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA thA ga badz+ra sA b+hA ba
115b2: Ad ma koH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na Shadz+ra pra b+he ba Ad ma ko ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA Ta Ad ma ko u0f85// zhes brjod pas thim par gyu ra/ gas
115b3: bar gyur 'bar bar gyur to/ / e mdo mtshar smad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgas kun gyi gsung// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung // gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni/
115b4: bsam gyis mi khyab kun du khyab/ sgra dang mid tshig so sor grags// thams cad gsung dgi phyag rgya'i mchog/ rgyud mchog sku 'thul dra ba las// bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung bas// thams cad pad ma'i dang gyur na// grol thar
115b5: lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra/ / rde skad brjod kyang gsung mchog yin// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang // lag 'gro ma lus thams cad skad// byang chub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus// bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags// grags
115b6: nyid ma chags dang du gsungs/ / gsung ba nyid na brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor mjal// dper na de bzhin sminas ngas bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go/ 'di ni gsung
115b7: mchog rgyal po yin/ / theg pa mtho dman thams cad kyang // de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// gdul bya'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung ba kun brjod kyang // de bzhin nyid las gsungs pa med// yi ge med dang
115b8: rig pa'i gsung / / ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang // thugs rje gsung gi byin rlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin// sung gi 'gre don rnams// de bzhin nyid las

116a1: pa g.yos kyang / / dper na brag cha'i sku bzhin no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dang / gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thasa?
116a2: cad kyis yan lag thams cad kyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod do/ / sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying
116a3: po phyag rgya 'da' dka'o/ / mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spang ba las// sku rabs phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// oM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprang ba// rgyal ba
116a4: kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ / bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas
116a5: thugs khar bkan/ / muM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// oM bsgred rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla btul 'bru sras dris
116a6: gsil zhing / / 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// lam basbed rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btu de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas
116a7: thugs khar bkan/ / sra bsgrer rtse mor rin chen 'bar// bzla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshal gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// paM bskyed rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru
116a8: lnga las su 'khril/ / btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// aM bsgreng rtse mor pad mar 'bar// zla ba tul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru

116b1: bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan/ / byaM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kha ra ba kan// ha bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul
116b2: 'bru bsngas dril bsil zhing / / 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// taM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis bsta/
116b3: ut+pa la klu shing la sogs mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen ste// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // bi wang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog phreng dang
116b4: los mchog dang / / mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i// las la 'khril zhing chos la brtan// dbu rnams 'byor zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi dang ngu 'khril// sgo bzhi khro ba'i
116b5: phyag rgya ni/ ni mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon// thod sbrul chen pos gnon pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// ljags kyu zhags pa s+pho ta to// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang // 'dud tshul 'khril ba god ma bzhin// thub drug
116b6: phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ / mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no// segs par dang ni bi war dang // go cha po ti rin chen smos// me dang chu ni rab tu bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'gro//
116b7: yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgyas tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam// yang na rje thal mo nyid// b+hag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor smra/ sa/
116b8: spyod ma bskul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur// de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog

117a1: gis rgyal brgyal mchog de shin du/ / bcu gnyis drug gi 'ad 'gro'abar// de la sogs te bsam mi khyag// phyogs bcu dras bzhi bas pa yas su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor stod// zag pa mtho dpa
117a2: thams cad dang / / phyin ci log rnams thams cad dang // 'i khro tshogs chen thams cad la// so sor 'thun par kun du sto// dper na gar mkhan nyid dra ba// lus las ma bkod sna tshogs ston// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad
117a3: ni/ / 'di zhes gcig ces brjed tu med// gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro// skyod dang spro ba'ang de bzhin nyid// mdor na bskul bskyed thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// gnas nyid me gnas gnas pa
117a4: min/ / de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yan lag dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs nas phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// /
117a5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// thugs kyi
117a6: dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ / sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya// 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga ni rab bsnyams la// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// lte brtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtsibs
117a7: bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas/ / gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi// bar khyams sgo khrud ldan par bya// sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la/ tsana'i 'bru tsam pad ma'i gdan// yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge la// phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri//
117a8: bcos bu ras na sna tshogs dang // rgyan phreng bro ba'i btul bas bskor// klu tshig bro gar rol mo yi// sprin dpung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod// yum dang 'jom sems ma yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i lam bzhin mchod// dbyibs

117b1: dang kha dog mtshan ldan par/ / zhal du gyur pa'i me pos la// bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// lam bzhi'i mchod par rab tu byin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// shin tu phral sbyangs pa yis// bsam yas dag la
117b2: 'ang de bzhin bya/ / rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshegs kyis// phyogs bcwa thams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyen 'jal reg na bde ba yi// sna tshogs rin
117b3: po che yi gzhi/ / mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang // kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar// dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal// klu dbyangs
117b4: tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra/ / bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis// bro gar la sogs
117b5: bsam yas kyi/ / phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// skal ldan kasal ba'i khyad par gyis// rim gyis yang na gcig car du// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// matod
117b6: pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ / gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag nyid chen
117b7: po mchod pa yis/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul drab bstan pa yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi//
117b8: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang mi gnas mi dmigs pa// mig g.yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// dam mkha'

118a1: la ni nam mkha' sgom/ / kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang //
118a2: yid 'thang dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor spos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// nga brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas//
118a3: phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang // rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// snying rjes chung ma zos par gzung // yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas// phyag rgya chen po'i 'phang du ni// dkyil 'khor 'jug gang tshad du bya// mkhas pas tshe
118a4: ga bzhin du bya/ / yang nas gzhi ra ba bsnyams la// dkyil 'khor khru kang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang dpung ni/ sum gyi tshad pa// pur bu srad bu tshon byad dang / kos rgyan mdzes pa'i yid 'ong grogs// thig bdag chog phun sum tshogs/
118a5: mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya// yang na lu ni bcu drug dang // nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad
118a6: tsam/ / nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sgom// ma mthong rmongs la bstan phyir mtshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du
118a7: dgyes/ / ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge 'am brda' 'am snying po 'am// phyag rgya 'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin brlabs ya mtshan sprang po che// 'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam// sa las
118a8: sogs la phyag rgyar byas/ / rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs na// spos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/

118b1: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snad dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam
118b2: tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin po che dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad po che// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te/
118b3: thabs la brtan pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu yi dang du byung // shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsol// rgyal ba mngon zung skyob
118b4: pa dang / / byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed nus pa'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje pa chen po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// mnyams
118b5: 'jug la rab brtson pas/ / zhag ni sum bcu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gris// dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyi rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de nyid la//
118b6: ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'o// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas pa// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang// 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs/
118b7: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i shes rab snang ba'o// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas
118b8: kyis kyang mi gzigs te/ rang byung ye shes gnas med snang // log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // bde ba chen po'i

119a1: dkyil 'khor na/ stangs dbul gnyis sam yang na lnga/ byas te dang ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa'i yid 'ad mnyam par 'gyur/ rgal ba mnyam pa'i ya shes de// gnyer na nye bar 'byung ba yin// ya mtshan
119a2: chen po 'byung bar nges dang med nyams na phung par 'gyur/ / zhes ched du brjod // gsang ba'i snying ba de khon nyid nges pa las rdo rje bkod pa gsang pad ma tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / danapa
119a3: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos tshal po sbran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las/ bad ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i d+hAn/
119a4: las nas pad mor bskyal// rtsa nas bstam zhing dkyil 'khor bsgyur// nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// tsaM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// rin chen dkyil 'khor gas pa d+mo sa//
119a5: gsang ba gsang mtshon gsang mchog las/ gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya/ gsang ba'i don nyid brtag pa las// gzhan du smrab bya ba yin// gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// yaM
119a6: phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las/ / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim// oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung // rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur
119a7: lag pa'i 'khor log zhal yas su/ / gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// d+haM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal sproHsa// oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyis// las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig
119a8: po nya mang po'i 'dra phro kun/ / khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin// spu byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// dri yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro tham// oM sa kyi da

119b1: rtsi bla med kyis/ / dang ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// 'thun pa'i gsang bsgrags gzhan du min// bskyed chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsang ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM oM swa aM ha rnams las
119b2: kyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/ / oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams
119b3: thob par ma byas par/ / nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan phrang ba dang // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na//
119b4: dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang // tshe ring bde skyid phun sum chog/ mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur zhes brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste
119b5: bcu pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul/
119b6: byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin o du shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du sgom// yang
119b7: na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ / gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin mum du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor sgom// gos rgyan bza' btung klu dang chag/ phra
119b8: gar tshogs kyi sprin phung gis/ / hu du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po// bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po/

120a1: yum gyi pad ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam tshogs kyi sbyin pas bstim// bsgrub pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor de// dkyil 'khor
120a2: lce yis blang / / mkha' 'gro gas la 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i steng du mangs pas bzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom// trAM du gyur pas/
120a3: rnam par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye shes skye med de bzhin nyid// snga mar snang ba mi g.yong
120a4: tshul/ / sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang gos pa med// snod bcud rgyu rnams dag rtogs shing // mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i'amanyan gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor kun du bzang po'i zhing // byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis
120a5: gyur nas/ yan lagam nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yis// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis// tshem bu lnga yi lha bkod
120a6: la/ / khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// chom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rim
120a7: kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso/ / thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tsham bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang // pho nya phyag bstan bka' nyan tshogs// ci
120a8: bgyi la sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ / dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub gdang gnas shing // spyod pa ci la 'ang thogs med pa// thams cad ye nas

120b1: dbyer med pa'o/ / rdo rje rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'bro 'bar bar rab tu bsgom// chags med tshul du bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad ma lus su gsung
120b2: thugs/ ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro// gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du thim// rigs 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar bar 'grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje rigs su rtse
120b3: pa'i gnas/ / sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// 'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phro// gnyis su med par bstim par bya
120b4: dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub/ / rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal
120b5: gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang / / ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas// dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya// le lo sgyid snyoms med pa yis// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang
120b6: mchog dam pa thob/ / bsgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni// rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bshad// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // gsad pa'i snying po de
120b7: kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs dgyes pa chen pos rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
120b8: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// klu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi

121a1: dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ / rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin kun dang bdud rtsi 'grub// A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams
121a2: cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzugs// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// rus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// me dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam
121a3: dag 'dzin mod kyang / / khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun du rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog/ shes rab mchog gi mchog 'gyur ba// sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum// rgyu 'bras khyad par
121a4: lhun gyis rdzogs/ / mkha' dkyil dag pa'i dbyings nyid zla// ye shes rgyal po stangs dbyal bsgom// rgyal 'i'i dkyil 'khod mtha' yas kun// ma lus par ni bsgom par 'gyur// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs
121a5: rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur/ / sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan na ma tshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam mtshad yang // skyon nyid
121a6: ngag ste nyes pa med/ / ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying ze kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
121a7: p hyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad cig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin
121a8: du gsang ba'i snying po sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / me togs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang

121b1: bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni/ / yi ge sgra rtags ming tshogs las// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyi
121b2: 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ / dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ g.yang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te//
121b3: byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tsho gas// dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// kun du bzad pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis// thugs kyi ye shes lngas bltas shing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba// bde ba'i ye shes
121b4: rol mo yis/ / ye shes dgyes la mchod pa dbul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba'i// rol mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi
121b5: dngos/ / phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma don rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba'i// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
121b6: lhur gyi grub/ / rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol
121b7: ba yis/ / bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom la mnyam sbyor gyis// rang 'byung kur ngo la lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad
121b8: dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs rus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// skal pa

122a1: zhing gi rdul snyed du/ / shin du sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i
122a2: dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ / / brnyes nas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur par yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil
122a3: 'khor ma lus la/ / 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog/ thos bsam bsgom la rab spangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung // snod ldan
122a4: nga tshul bzang la bstan/ / lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la phyir bas gal te byin// dus min par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang sbrebs pa yun ring gnas// zhes de bzhin
122a5: gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin du gsang ba man ngag gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid
122a6: kyi dkyil 'khor la dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so/ / oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams kyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thig le kun du rdzogs so// oM rdo rje
122a7: bsod nams thig 'i che/ / rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che toH/ oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan phrin las kun du rdzogs// ye nas lhun rdzogs kun du bza
122a8: 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che to/ / oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po d+hoH/ oM phyogs bcwa

122b1: 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ / rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub hoH/ oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung
122b2: thugs kyis kun du khyab/ / sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che ho// zhes ched du bsgrags so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
122b3: cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad do/ / ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang / brtags pa la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa'i lam dang bral
122b4: ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'tshal nas/ / rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// de rab tu tsha
122b5: ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang / 'di bas shin du grang yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i modo la rab tu slebs pa dang // pad ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs
122b6: pa brgyad dang / shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad du 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud ci/ bskal ba chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su nyams su myong ngo // de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dgas ltogs pa dang / skom pa'i sdug bsngal
122b7: gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su gyur pa dang / yod med par yang gyur cing shin du rarid cing skams pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang / dbang po ma
122b8: 'tsham par gyur/ bskal pa chen po drug du skyes so// de nas las kyi sgrib pa rdzun mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas/ yi dgas srin por bcu gtsug pa gtur lo ru minang 'go tu ba dang //

123a1: mgo sna tshogs pa dang / lus brgyal mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag sna tshogs pa dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / 'khor rab tu mang po dang / 'jig
123a2: pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i nga ro skra skad sna tshogs pa sgrogs pa dang / gzugs dang / da ro dang dri dang / kha rlangs kyis thams cad kyi bud zhes byed pa dang / rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung nag dang / grang ba'i dang tsha ba'i dbugs
123a3: kyi phyogs bcu kun du khams 'khrug par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing mnyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i rigs dang / lha ma yin gyi rigs dang / lha'i ris dang / tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'od gsal
123a4: dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus so// de sngon bsten pa'i stobs kyis thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i rdo rje bkod pa sgyu 'phrul dra bas
123a5: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid chen po bstan pa'i phyir/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen
123a6: po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba chen po rnam par spros pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las khro mo dbang phyug ma chen mo mngon du byung ste/ hi hi dgyes pa'i
123a7: gzim dngas kyis pad ma rgyas par mdzad nas ni gnyis su med par dgyes pa'i 'khril ba thim nas/ byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hA hA hUM baM shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dza la ma Na dral phaT baT phaT ta ha a ta ba hU~Md+hU paH/ zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten
123a8: drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa khyab par gyur to/ / khro bo dkyil 'khor gyis tshegs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu

123b1: g.yos/ / kun tu g.yos so// 'u 'a rab tu'ur rung / kun du rab tu'ar 'ur ro// che mche ma rab tu chem che ma/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu rab tu shig shig go// gtor gtor rab tu gtor gtor/ kun tu
123b2: rab tu gtor gtor ngo / / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong / khams na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen
123b3: po nyid 'jig byed chen po shin tu rngam pa skye bud nes byed pa 'bar ba chen po'i khrag 'thung / sku smug gnag cir yang 'gyur ba/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbus gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod
123b4: chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng / 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod kyis bdag po dregs pa khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang ba skum du bzhugs so// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung gi
123b5: tshogs thams cad de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rjer gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so/ / la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te/ lho phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad mar gyur te nub phyogs
123b6: su bzhugs so/ / la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun du las su gyur te byang phyogs su bzhugs so// de dag kun kyang 'jig byed chen po'i cha lugs dang / rngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang
123b7: gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gshin rje la sogs pa khyod shug gis gdan byas pa la bzhugs so// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so sor skul 'khyil ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// rigs lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu
123b8: stem te bsdus nas/ gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan te/ de nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum po'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po sna tshogs

124a1: pa bstan nas mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'ing ros glang po'i gtum chog tu smras pas/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer cing shin du gdag pa'i sems kyis khros nas rngam mo//
124a2: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas/ thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin du khros nas rngam pa'i skad kyis/ hUM hUM hUM ha ha ha/ khA hi khA ti khA hi/ zhes brjod pas
124a3: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs chen po'i de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nang grol kun drangs yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs nas phus kun 'chos so// de nas hUM
124a4: tA hUM b+h+yo e ar li dza dza zhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas par yungs 'bru gcig tsam gyi nang du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po'i yang rgyal po drag
124a5: pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rngo mo'i yang mo srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang 'khrug mo dang dbang mo dang / 'jug sring mo dang / gnon nu ma dang / dmar mo dang bdud rtsi mo dang / ni
124a6: ba mo dang / po chen mo dang srin mo dang / zab mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos pa dang / gcig bur spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan
124a7: byed ma dang / sna tshad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo mar chen mo dang / bram sna sngonag mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser nag chen ma la sogs pa bran dang / yang bran dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog dang /
124a8: lolo shing gi rdul snyed bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed chen po snang bar byas nas/ de dag kun gyes par rol pa'i dkyi

124b1: 'khor sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // oM hUM AMHbadz+ra pra be sha a la la hoHzhes brjod pas 'byung mo'i rgyal mo rnams shin du chags pa'i
124b2: yid g.yos nas pad ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/ dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo
124b3: dang / dmar mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / gsod byed ma dang / nag mo chen mo dang / dmar ser chen mo dang / sngo nag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la tshangs
124b4: ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dpad mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu ma rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang / zhib mo dang / be chen mo dang / zab mo dang srin mo
124b5: rnams 'khril lo/ / bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i skul khrag gis myos ma dang / gcig bu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag
124b6: bathung chen po kun du las kyi sku la me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed ma dang / sna tshad mo dang / chu lha mo rnams 'khril lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gi hUM zhes brjod pas
124b7: pad ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu brtsam par gyur to/ / de nas dkris te ha zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las dkar mo'i tshogs dang / kun po'i tshogs dang / rmongs mo
124b8: tshogs dang / thal byed ma'i tshegs dang / sbos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo'i tshogs darme sha can gyi tshogs dang / ma tshogs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi sha cha dang ngo mtshar du bcas nas 'thon to// 'thon

125a1: nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rang rang gi lag cha dang bcas nas 'bod do/ / de nas shin du gyes he he he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mos
125a2: tshogs dang / stag gdong chen mo'i tshegs dang / wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / gzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / kang ka'i gdod chen mo'i tshogs dang / ngur bya'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / 'ug pa'i/
125a3: gdong chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang / ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol shar gyi phyogs nas 'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do// de nas shin du
125a4: dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par khyab par byas nas phaT ces brjod pas rdo rje srid 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdod mi'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang / rdo sa mi // rnas rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas/
125a5: 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin du rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes pa'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas/ ma mo//
125a6: thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po bdud rtsi chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
125a7: la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ma ta a mri ta ma hA kro d+ha e aM aM zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi
125a8: snams nas gten nas mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtsho chen por chud pa las snum nas/ khro bo u tsusma ko d+ha phyung nas 'dam khu kun 'thungs pas dran pa slar rnyed de/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu

125b1: brgya/ / phyag stong brgyad brgya zhabs brgyad raH/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo // de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba'i
125b2: thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul lo/ / de nas de dag shin du 'dang zhang rab tu zad cing zhum pa'i dngos spras pa'i tshig/ 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan
125b3: tan ma bgyis na/ mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing / snying yang 'gas shing btubs 'gyur cing // la phyogs tshig nas brlag pa dang / dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar ma nas bor/
125b4: nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du gzhag go/ thams cad kyis mgrin cig tu smras pa bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang / ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol/ dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes/
125b5: su gsol// bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar/ g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i/ sems kyis blangs te s+t+waM/
125b6: bo yis/ gtsug tu gzhag te bkur bar bya/ de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub/ gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir/ smras pa bzhin du ma bzhis na bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying /
125b7: bkas btubs dum bur rul bar mchis zhes smras so// de nas de dag gi chung ma'i tshigs dang / srid mo dang ma dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dkyil 'khor du yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin cig tu
125b8: smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun// dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi// dpa' bo chen po bdag cag rnams las kyi dngos grub skul du gsol zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pachan

126a1: pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gis dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bkod do/ / gsang ba'i snying po 'on nyid nges pa las khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sprin rnam par smos pa'i le'u ste bcwo lnga pa'o// /
126a2: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dgadam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo khrag 'thung chen po btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dag gis sku dang gsung
126a3: dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo / / / oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI hi ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba dush+tsi ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa hUh+NahU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra mahA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba
126a4: Sh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rad na ma hA shI he ru ka ma hA tsan Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka hA na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad ma ma hA shI he ru ka ma hA tsiN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA
126a5: tsan Da sarba draSh+Thi ta ka tan hU pa tsatA trA hU~M phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga sa hA kro d+hi shwa rI sarba duSh+TahU~M badz+ra/ oM ma~M hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro hrIH/ rI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA s+yar+ya rad nas hA krod+b+ha shwa ro bo d+ham hU~M phaT/ oM hr-i ga tA sa ma ta
126a6: pad ma ma hA kr-i d+hishwa rI la hi h+NA phaT/ oM sarba a mo ga karma ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI bi sha trA~M baT/ oM badz+ra ke'u rih+na/ badz+ra tse 'u rita/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra be Ta li hi/ badz+ra na Na Da li ha/ badz+ra puka so hi/ badz+ra gam+ba riH/
126a7: sma sha ni ta/ badz+ra srid ha mu ka ha~M/ badz+ra bya kri mu ka he/ badz+ra sril mu ka he/ badz+ra sho na mu ka he/ badz+ra gri ta mu ka he/ badz+ra kaM ka mu ka he/ badz+ra wa khA mu ka he/ badz+ra hu lu mu ka he/ badz+ra ar+ya te dza te da dzaHbadz+ra a mu ka hUM/
126a8: badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra pa smi pa la ya pa ti hoH/ b+h+yob+h+yo b+h+r-i b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// b+h+yoN+yo N+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+ho// b+h+yoN+yo b+h+yo dz+yo b+h+yo b+ho b+h+yo// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo N+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+ho// oM ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ e ha hi a na ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoHoM badz+ra ko d+ha sa ma ya hUM/

126b1: o khro la khros pas ni mdzad pa// thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs sprang po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM// badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho// badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ a
126b2: li A li ta bi dang li daMSh+Ti kon ro'u dri kha ra pa yo ni khA hi ho/ / b+hUMhahe phaT b+h+yo// zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad kun tshig/ rab tu tshig kun tu rab tu tshig go// 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du
126b3: rab tu 'bar ro/ / thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang / rab tu gang / kun du rab tu gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i tshigs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros
126b4: pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan//
126b5: gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang pos 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa dom gyi sbar ba yis// dbang
126b6: phrug lha chen las sogs bzung / / smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang // dmar nag ldang nag 'jigs pa'i sku bag suM phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon// rngam pa'i sgra skad 'jigs par sgrogs// sbrul dang /
126b7: thod phreng nyi zlar bcas// stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'brel// gnas dang yul
126b8: gyi phyag rgyar dang / / sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes zhig / sras dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyis zhes ni chas te gnas zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug

127a1: gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar gyur to/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
127a2: 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di ched du brjod do/ / de la mchod sbyin dam pa 'di// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis su
127a3: med par bsgrol bar bya/ / 'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor pas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul// bza' dang bca' dang btud dang ba'o//
127a4: longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// bder gshegs yon tan rmad po che// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// lha srin la sogs smos ci
127a5: dgos/ / rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen por rdzogs gyur cig/ gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa na// dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
127a6: bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchod sbyin dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig
127a7: chen po 'di brjod do/ / bla med theg pa rab des na// nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang // byas la mi sog tshogs 'gyur te// tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs// bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu// 'dul ba'i dbang gis
127a8: gis tshul khrims dang / / ji snyed sdom pa bas ma yas pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing / sbrum mig g.yod lta bur tshul// srog med srog gcod gcad du med// srog

127b1: kyang skyes bu'i lo rtogs tsam/ / bden pa gnyis kar dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga' tshul te tha dad med// gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir// blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu la// ming dang
127b2: tshig tu brtags pa brdzun/ / brdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod pa// brdzun zhes brtags tsam yod ma yin// ma chags pa la chags pa dang // chags pa nyid na chags pa med// de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste// shin du chag
127b3: pa chen po yin/ / bla ma mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te// bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig
127b4: mchog/ gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig te// ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// bsrung zhing
127b5: bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga/ / rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' bo// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yis// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen
127b6: po thob 'gyur pas/ / 'das nas sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dag/ gsol nye bar mi brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed// nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// /
127b7: bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'dud// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung // dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun
127b8: gyi bdag nyid yin/ / rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni// gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la'ang bcu phrag gnyis su dbye// dam tshig 'di ni rmang po che// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs

128a1: btsun/ / sring gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa// tog 'dral dam tshig de snyed spro// gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// sgrub byed dam pa ma lus 'grub// de la sogs pa mtha'
128a2: yas mchog/ rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa de// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur// dam pa mchog dang dam pa yas// sras dang spun dang byin gyis rlob// bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs// 'jig
128a3: med kun du bzang por sbyor/ / ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis grub// nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang // de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ ces
128a4: brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to/ / gsang ba'i snying por kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
128a5: pa dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la// khros
128a6: pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyir bya/ / sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje pu rabs gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul// e yi tshogs
128a7: kyi dkyil 'khor du/ / lu gu rgud du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur g.yo// myos nas gal te 'tshig par 'gyurare// ba gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gzi chen lhun chen la// chag
128a8: pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ / rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par byas// rdo rje chags pa'i phu rabs gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thib par dbul// ba gyi tshogs

128b1: kyi dkyil 'khor du/ / lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// 'gug 'gyur rdo rje 'ang phyi bzhin 'brang // ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro gzi byin la// dga' ba'i yid kyis
128b2: mchod sbyin bya/ / yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur rabs gdab// rdo rje garba byin 'ab ba byung //
128b3: ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// gzi byin 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen 'phro// yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid bar
128b4: ba la/ / dad pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gtum po rngam po ldan rer 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phur ba sa ga ba// 'bar ba'i lhan ne'i tshigs su dbul// ya
128b5: yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ / lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdam// 'bar ba ltan ne'i byin gyis rlab// thams cad g.yo ba med par byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab
128b6: bsgrags na/ / gang 'dod las ni byed par bsgo// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/ shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can// thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin rlabs sprang po che// lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas//
128b7: 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas// so so'i las rnams bskos pa de// ji ltar khas blangs dam sa pa// mthogs myur du mngon par phyung // dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na// ji ltar rang gi mnas bor ba'i// sdom byas de las
128b8: 'da' ma byed/ / sdom byas de las 'das gyur na// mgo lus snying yang tshal ba bdun// ya k+Sha khro bos gtugs par 'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis// ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos// las de mngon du

129a1: ma byas na/ / rang gi khas blangs mnas por bzhin// ral myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro// rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i// las rnams yongs su bya ba dang // 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs// pra
129a2: men ma yang dngos grub thob/ / bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos// zhes bsgo'o// khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo 'di yin no// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu chag chen po yis// thams cad thams cad ci
129a3: 'dod par/ / thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// mdzod lha chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// 'dra bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel
129a4: bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed/ / lbos mo chen mo las sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni// lhan ner 'dod na ldan ner byed// rmugs par 'dod na rmugs par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen
129a5: mos ni/ / thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// bzhad gdong chen mo las sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// slas dang byi
129a6: mo bran mo yi/ / bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// sprad cing gtang bar bya ba ste// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal// gdong cig ma dang me reg drug/ dang ba'i dga' bas chags pa dang // khros pas ka
129a7: li rab tu bya/ / zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sbyong bar gyur to// gseng ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyis grub pa phrin las byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste// nye shu pa'o//
129a8: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin du rngam pa'i gdadas kyis klu 'di blangs so// hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma'i bum gyis gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba

129b1: bzhin/ / mche bzang yag za byed che hoHhUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brag stong ldir// gtum che ma ri rab 'bum pa snyil skad// a a hA la'i gang rgyangs che// dbyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che hoHhUM khre bo shes rab 'od po che// ye
129b2: shes dkyil 'khor kun du gsal/ / 'bar ba'i ye shes kun du 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho// hUM khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor cher chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i
129b3: gter/ / sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le tshe hoHhUM bdud kun gyis ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud des dud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho// rdo rje brag ste srab po rdorje/
129b4: chu bo sdud pa po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che ho// zhes ched du klu 'di blangs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
129b5: 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di ched brjod do/ / kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// gzung 'dzin spros la
129b6: 'phel ba yi/ / rnam rtog zhabs pas so sor zin// sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byam kun// don du mi 'gyur yod ma gsungs// de bzhin gshegs
129b7: pa thams cad kyi/ / phyag rgya gsang chen nges pa 'di// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// sgo dang skur bzhi pa yi//
129b8: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung // de ni nges par lung bstan te// sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin// sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas zhes brjod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med

130a1: par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/ / 'phags pa rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya ba las mtshan nyid dang rlung
130a2: thams cad kyi lung gi spyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te/ 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog go// gsang bar
130a3: snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra satwa mA yA dz+wal gu h+ya sarba A dang sha nA ma tan ta// bod skad du rdo rje sems
130a4: pa'i sgra 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ oM rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// oM snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang
130a5: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag/ kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas// dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas// rgyal ba kun la bstod bkor nas// spyan sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol// e ma'o sangs rgyas
130a6: kun gyi gsung / rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud// dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig bsgrub dang grub pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud// ma
130a7: lus gtan la 'bebs pa 'di/ / rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags// sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de// dra ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan// lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid// gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad// gsang ba zhes ni ji lta
130a8: bu/ / snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir// de kho na nyid ces ji ltar brjod/ nges pa zhes pa ci yi phyir// mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs// mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o// thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi// ston pa zhes ni ci yi phyir//

130b1: gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu// dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu// mi spyod pa ni ji ltar bya// rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod/ na ren 'byung ldan gang gi phyir// snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir// don yod grub pa ji lta bu// sbyin dang nam mkha'i dbyings
130b2: ma dang / / gos dkar mo dang mA ma kI// sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir// sa'i snying po ci'i phyir// nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // phyag na rdo rje gang phyir brjod// sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci// byams dang sgrib sel kun bzang
130b3: dang / / 'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir// dus bzhi bdug spos me tog dang // mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod// rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ci// lcags kyu zhags pa lugs sgrog dang //
130b4: dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod// yid dang chos bzang gnyis ci phyir// gtso bos bdag la nges par gsungs// gang phyir phun mong ma yin pa'i// nad dang gsang ba'i gleng bzhi las// ston pa bstan pa gnas dang 'khor
130b5: dus dang sdus pa ji ltar brjod/ / grags pa thun mong gling bzhi las// ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar// bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu// skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol// 'di ni gleng gzhi'i dri ba tshigs su bcad pa'o// thun
130b6: song thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng slang gnyis su ci phyir 'gyur/ / gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing // thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston// thun thong thun mong ma yin pa'i// sems lnga ye shes lnga yi rim// gang dang 'brel pa/
130b7: bshad du gsol// 'di ni gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o// skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso// sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' bsnyes shing // phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi rje// gzi brjid phung po phun sum chog// blta bya gang
130b8: la ci'i phyir/ / gang gis rtogs pas ji ltar 'gyur// rtogs dang mi rtogs khyad par ci// rtogs pa'i sgo na du ru gsungs// gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci// 'di ni lta ba'i dri ba'o// thun mod spyod pa ci'i phyir// thun

131a1: mong thun mong gang ci'i/ / shes rab tshegs dang thugs rje dang // rtogs dang phyogs cig spyod pa dang // 'brel dang rig 'dzin spyod pa ci// gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad// de yi 'bras bu gang phyir 'gyur// gang du de dang mi
131a2: ldan pa'i/ / spyad pa'i skyon nyid bdag la gsungs// 'di ni spyod pa'i khyad par gyi dri ba'o// thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi// rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub kyi// dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir// de nyid phyi nang gsang ba dang // 'dul thabs gnyis
131a3: su ji ltar 'gyur/ / ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rim gsum gang // lhag pa ting 'dzin zhes bya ba// gnyis la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang // phyi nad gsang ba'i rim pa ci// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji lta bu// gang phyir gzugs
131a4: brnyan zhes brjod cing / / gang gi gzugs brnyan gang la snod// phyi nang gsang bar ji ltar 'gyur// lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te// gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu// gnyis dang gsum dang drug bstan cing // don dam kun rdzob byang
131a5: chub sems/ / phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyor// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis ci zhig/ gang gis gang du gang tshogs nas// ji ltar spyad pas ci zhig 'grub// 'di dag bstan pa'i dgongs pa ci// gnas skabs gang dang 'brel bar 'gyur//
131a6: yan lag rtsa ba gang dang 'brel// dkyil dang 'khor du ji ltar brtag/ gsungs shig skyes bu mchog chen po// gang dang nges pa ma rnyed pa// kun gyi spyod par ma gyur pa// legs par gsungs shig rgyal mchog che// 'di ni dkyil
131a7: 'khor gyi dri ba dris pa'o/ / gang gis gang la gang dag tu// ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs// bdag gis ji ltar shes par bgyis// gang dang gang du ji ltar 'brel// skyon dang yon tan ji lta bu// 'bras bu rim pa bshad du gsol//
131a8: 'di ni 'jug pa'i cho ga tu// las kyi rim pa ji lta bu// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol// 'di ni dbang gi don mtha'//

131b1: dag la dri ba dris pa'o// gang la gang gis brten pa yin// dam tshig zhes pa ci yi phyir// rtsa ba dam tshig du zhig bstan// gang pyir rtsa bar brjod par bya// yan lag du zhig bstan pa gsungs// 'di dag lam dang bsnyen bsgrub dang // gang
131b2: zag gang don ji ltar 'brel/ / bsrungs dang 'das pa'i skyon yon ci// phyi nang gsang bar ji ltar gsungs// k+ta dang spyod dang sgrub pa dang // shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig tu// grub dang mi spang bsrung ci zhig/ rgyal mchog skyes bus
131b3: bshad du gsol/ / thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// mchog dang mchog gyur ma yin pa'i// bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu// gang gis gang du ji ltar grub// dgug dang bcing dang gso dang bsad// dbye dang bskrad dang pham rgyal
131b4: ci/ / gter dang mig rnon rkang mgyogs dang // rig 'dzin go 'phang ji ltar sgrub// rgyal ba mchog gis bshad du gsol// 'di sgrub pa'i dri ba dris pa'o// phrin las rim pa gang ci zhig/ gang gis gang du brnam par bya// thab dang
131b5: rdzas dang phur bu ci/ / ting 'dzin 'dug stangs dan khur ci// gdul bya rim pa gang ci zhig/ khyad par rim pa ji ltar bshad// 'bras bu yon tan ji lta 'gyur// gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal mchog gtso// the tsom legs
131b6: par chod par mdzod/ / 'di ni phrin las kyi dri ba dris pa'o// smad 'byung skyes bu gang zhig gis// dang po lam tshul ji lta bu// phyi nang gsang ba'i lam ci phyir// stong pa'i rnal 'byor snying rje che// phyag rgya cig dang spros bcas
131b7: ci/ / rnam smin dbang sgyur phyag rgya dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid ci// mthar phyin rnam pa du zhig gsungs// phyi nang gsang ba mthar phyin pa'i// 'bras bu bdag gzhan don nyid ci// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i don ji ltar// gang
131b8: ngag rtogs pa'i rgyal po ste/ / sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla na med// kun lam 'bras bu thugs chud pa// cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'i rgyud// skal ngan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i// gsang ba gsang chen mdo sde dang // 'dul ba chos

132a1: kyi phung po dag/ nam mkhar mtha' thug bshad pa kun// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros pas// ji snyed bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i lam// ma lus kun gyi snying po 'di// theg pa dman dang ma sbyangs dang // rigs chad dbang dang /
132a2: man ngag bral// ji ltar bltas kyang mi snang ba/ skyes bu mchog gi spyod yul pas// rdul snyed sbyangs pa'i gang zag la// gsang phyir gsang ba'i thabs dag gis// dngos grub mtha' yas grub phyir bstan// phyi nang snod
132a3: bcud ma lus pa'o/ / rten dang brten par bcas pa'i chos// ji ltar grags dang grags gyur pa'i// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig kyang // rkyen stobs nus pa so sor snang // khyad par rim par gang gnas pa// rang bzhin gdul
132a4: bya bde gshegs dang / / 'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang // ma bcos dang la tha dad med// rang snang las kyis tha dad pa'i// bye brag rnam par bstan pa kun// de bzhin nyid la dgod byi'i phyir// rgyal mchog bde chen yongs
132a5: gang bas/ / dri ba'i don 'di lung brtan ci// thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur pa'i/ gsang ba'i don la dgod du gsol// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gis rgyud las dri ba rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bshad pa rtog
132a6: pa'i rgyal po rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang // skyes bu mtshan dpe rab ldan cing // dpag med rgyal bas rab bskor zhing // rang 'byung dag pa'i gzhal yas na// thabs dang shes rab 'khril sbyor
132a7: zhing / / kun kyang de dang 'thun pa ste// 'dzum zhing sdig pas sos 'debs shing // dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bka' stsal pa// dpag med rgyal bas gsung ba dang // gsung dang gsung 'gyur thugs kyi rgyud// thogs ma bar dang
132a8: mthar dge ba/ / thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// cho ga rgyas par dris pa'i mchog/ nyon cig nga ni sems pa bshad// chos rnams ma lus gnyis med pa'i// rang rig byang chub sems nyid de// tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin

132b1: nyid/ rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// rang bzhin mtha' thug med pa'i chos// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// thugs su chud cing mngon rtogs pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpar bshad// rang bzhin thabs
132b2: dang 'bras bu'i don/ / nus pa'i rim pa stsal snang ba// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i don// sgyu 'phrul zhes ni bzhir bshad do// tha dad mi las tha dad pa'i// ngo bo thabs dang bdag nyid dang // byin brlabs shugs kyis
132b3: 'brel ba ni/ / dra ba'i don zhes bshad pa yin// ma brjod grags pa'i bstan pa nyid// sgro skur med dang zhal nas gsungs// dri ma med pa'i lung nyid do// las dang ye shes spyi nyid dang // rdzogs pas rdzogs phyir lung
132b4: nyid do/ / bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas// gcig dang du ma mi gnas kyang // so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud// 'di ston 'dis ston 'di phyir ston// don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas
132b5: lung gi spyi zhes bshad pa yin/ / gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba// sku dang gsung thugs bdag nyid de// rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo dang // thabs dang 'bras bur gyur pa nyid// gsang ba'i don du 'di brjod do// ngang gis dman dang
132b6: ma sbyangs dang / dbang dang dam tshig bral ba dang // rang brtags bsgribs pas sa'akhyad par// de dang de yi dbang gis na// ro myong bral phyir gsang bar bshad// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi// chos rnams thig le chen
132b7: po'i don/ / 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// ma lus ro cig dbyer med pa// ji snyed theg pa'i khyad par dang // bstan pa'i bye brag gnas pa rnams/ 'dir 'dus thams 'dis mtshon pa dang // rtsa bar 'gyur ba kho na yin
132b8: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ / byang chub sems nyid bde ba che// rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med// rdo rje sems pa'i bdag nyid de// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rab snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab che ba rnams// 'di lnga

133a1: ston pas snying po ste/ / snying po dang ni 'od bzhin no// rgyu dang 'bras bu bcud 'dus pas// snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems// mtha' dbus yongs su ma chad pa// dngos po
133a2: gsum gyis khyab gyur pa/ / yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin no// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig/ bdag dang gzhan don nus pa rdzogs// 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do// gang phyir dngos gnyis tha
133a3: dad par/ / log par brtags pa'i snang ba rnams// mun la snang dang gser 'gyur ltar// ro gcig thabs kyi de kho na// de phyir de kho na zhes brjod// dngos po sna tshogs dbyer med pa'i// tha dad don min don gcig min//
133a4: de nyid gsang ba'i nges pa ni// gzhi dang lam dang ngo bo dang // nges pas nges pa gsum du bstan// gang du theg pa bzhi gsungs pa// 'gro ba 'dren phyir ma nges pa// ro gcig theg par nges gnas pa// nges pa'i theg pa bla na
133a5: med/ / rang bzhin ma bcos rang 'byung las// bya byed rang gis bral ba yi// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul/ rang snang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o// rang bzhin mtha' dbus med pa las// rgyu rkyen las kyis so so 'khrul// de nyid
133a6: byang chub sems nyid de/ / mtha' dbus med par mnyam par gnas// de ltar so sor snang ba'i rgyud// nam mkha' dang ris phye ba ltar// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi// lam gnyis 'brel bar mngon bsgoms pas// thabs
133a7: dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ / bde chen thig le mngon snang ba// 'jug dang grol ba'i lam nyid de// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam du brjod// rang bzhin yongs kyi khyab pa yi// dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel ba yis// rim pa ji
133a8: bzhin stobs gyur pas/ / khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin// thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems// chos kun rang gi ngo bo nyid// zab mo bstan pa spyi'i lung // thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// rtogs pa'i cho ga rgyas

133b1: pa'i rgyud/ / bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas// shes rab sbyangs dang snying rje ldan// dang dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang // cho gas dag par sbyangs pa yis// dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin// rdo rje gsang ba'i theg
133b2: pa 'di/ / ngo bo nyid dang byin rlabs dang // mtshon dang rdo rje grub pa ste// rdo rje theg pa bde ba che// rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang // phyin ci log dang mi mos dang // dbang dang dam tshig med pa la// gsang phyir gsang ba'i
133b3: theg par gsungs/ / thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis// snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma la// gsang ba'i snying po bstan gyur na// bdag dang gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing // sreg dang sgribs par yun rings gnas// sgyu 'phrul
133b4: dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las mtshan gyi don gyi bshad pa dang po'o/ / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thun mongs ma gyur gsang ba'i don// thun mong ma yin 'khor dag la// phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang// dkyil
133b5: 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi/ / rdo rje pad ma 'brel ba yis// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur nas// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// nyon mongs lha dang shes bya rnams// skad cig yud la gsal byas te// thun mong khyad par gsang ba yi//
133b6: lam gnyis nges par ston pas na// ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin// de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba// 'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang // mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs phyir ro// thabs dang lam gyis khyad par gyis// kun
133b7: bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid/ / gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi// 'og min gnas mchog chen po der// yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas// skal med skye bo gdul ba'i phyir// sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas// sangs
133b8: rgyas kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas/ / gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa// 'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa// 'og min 'bar ba'i gzhal ya sa khang // phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// yon tan khyad par lpags pa na//

134a1: gsang ba yu gyi thug la// bcu gsums yi dbang phyug ldan// rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang // til 'bru'i tshul tu rab tu bzhugs// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i// rang bzhin don gyi
134a2: 'og min ni/ / rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba kun gyi bsten pa'i gnas// de dag nye bar mtshon pa yi// yid dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'o// sgoms dang bris dang byas las sogs// de dang 'dra
134a3: ba'i gzhal yas khang / / rgyal ba sngags dang byin rlabs kyis// dor gnas don byed mtshon pa'i gnas// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// bsod nams ye shes khyad par can// bsags pa sna tshogs las 'byung ba'o// rdzogs
134a4: longs spyod pa chen po ni/ gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yin// 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na// rigs bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku// gcig dang du ma rnams spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te// gdod nas theg/
134a5: mchog mdzod nyid byer// sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la// skad cig gcig gis spangs par mdzad// chos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa// dngos po tha da med byer zlum// khyab dang lpags dang tshad med dang // ye shes bzhi d+hi
134a6: 'khor lo bstan/ / chos dbyings 'dra 'bral med pa'i phyir// mu khyud zlum por kun nas bskor// sku gsung thugs dang byin rlabs dang // thugs rjes mi khyab med pa'i phyir// yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyibs su bstan// rang 'thung ye shes/
134a7: mtha' bral bas// phyogs bcur 'gro 'ong mi gnas pa'i// chad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phying// gan ca tshad med 'khor lo bstan// gdong nas byir rlabs ngo bo'i phyir// ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzad nyid de// 'gro bar 'dod
134a8: kong ba'i phyir/ / rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'i// chos kun de bong rang gnas te// bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir// phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med// thun mong la brten thabs

134b1: kyi 'bras/ / ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid// gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas// blo 'bur 'di ni lhag par mdzes// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// gdul bya'i rim pa mthon dman kun// stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal
134b2: 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar// thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas// lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis// 'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas// rtab rgyu 'bras bcu drug bstan// zhen dang spyod pa'i lam
