134b3: bral bas/ / 'dod yon ye shes lnga rol ste// bdag mchod kun mnyes las byung bas// 'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// mchags thabs dang ldan pa dang // che ba'i yon tan ldan
134b4: rdzogs pas/ / nyi zla pad ma rin po che// las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis// byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che// smon lam dbang gis de dag tu// thos pa rgya mtsho bsag phyir gnas// de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang // ngo bo
134b5: dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus/ / dus kyi mtha' la mngon rtogs pas// thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan// de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba yis// bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa// 'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag/ lag
134b6: na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad/ / dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs phyir// 'khor byin zla skal mchog ldan// gsang ba'i rdo rje 'tshang bsdus nas// 'dul ba'i 'khor la bstan par mdzad// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyis// sku gsuM
134b7: sku gsung thugs nges pa'i/ / de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis// gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs gyur pa'i// thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang // pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa// zhing khams yon tan bsam mis/
134b8: khyab// bye brag brgyad bcu kun 'dus pa'i// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan// gang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas// las dang spyod pa dka' thub dang // srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas// de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsung thabs dang shes rab

135a1: 'brel ba yis/ / ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba// mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis// rnam par snang phyir snad mdzad mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ni// tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste// yon tan rin chen lhar/
135a2: 'byung bas// rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa yin// dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi sgo// dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis// don rtogs gsung dang yi ge'i sgo// mtha' yas snang phyir mtha' yas mchog/ dpag med bus
135a3: je mdzad pa yi/ / 'gro 'od med pa'i thugs rje yis// 'gro ba skyob pa'i don mdzad pas// don grub ces ni rnam par bstan// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang // tha mal lnga nyid gnas dag cing // de las thabs des mngon byas pas/
135a4: der dbang sgyur te nyid snang ba// rgyal po nyid du brjod pa yin// steng 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'i// sbyor dang 'ju 'dul rlung gi rim// gang de thabs las mngon gyur pa'i// bde ba'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes//
135a5: dang ni 'du byed dang // rnam par zag med bde ba'i ros// dbang sgyur ye shes rgyal por bshad// gang phyir snang dang bsgoms dang bris// phyag rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog/ dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo dang ljang dang ris
135a6: ldan pa'o/ / rgyal ba kun gyi bde skyid cing // spyod dang de las 'byung ba'i yum// thams cad de las skyed pa lnga// tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang // dbang bsgyur rgyal mo rje rang bzhin// sra dang gsher dang drod dang bskyod// nam
135a7: mkha'i khams kyis gang phye ba/ / steng 'og thabs las mngon gyur pa// yul dang shes pa dbyer med cing // thugs rje shes rab 'brel pa yis// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis med gzigs pa spyan gyi mchog/
135a8: zag med stong pa'i klong chen gyis// skyed dang sdud dang gnas pa'i phyir// mtha' dbus bral ba'i de bzhin nyid/ nam mkha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod pa'o// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// las dang lta ba nyon mongs/

135b1: dang // shes bya'i dri ma mtha' yas pa// rtogs pas sbyong zhing sreg pas na// gos dkar ma du brjod pa yin// gang pyir las dang ting 'dzin dang // ye shes thugs rje bar med chus// gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas// chu
135b2: ni lA la k+Shi ru bshad/ / gang phyir rtogs dang thabs dag dang // ting 'dzin thabs kyi rlung dag gis// bgrod pa med pa'i zhing khams su// sgrol pas sgrol ma nyid du bshad// snying po rang 'byung ye shes nyid// kun brten
135b3: gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir/ / byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// sa yi snying por brjod pa yin// rang 'byung snying po byang chub sems// nam mkha' lta bur bsam brjod med// mtha' dbus sgro skur gang 'das pa//
135b4: de ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid// gang phyir thugs rje dpag medapas// 'gro ba chu po rgal gyi par// skyo ba med par gzigs pas na// spyan ras gzigs dbang pad ma'i gtso// rtogs dang dbyed te/ rdo rje yis// mtha' yi bdag rtog
135b5: mtshan ma dag/ 'joms pas phyag na rdo rje ste// thun mong nyid dang khyad par gyi// gsang ba'i rnam par shes pa bzhi// thun mong yul dang khyad par ni// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las// mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgoms
135b6: pa yis/ / lha mo bzhir ni mngon snang ba// byang chub sems dang bde ba dang / thabs kyi bde bas rab skegs pas// lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad// gol dang ma grol 'khor ba yis// phyi nang sgra yi bye brag kun// brag chas/
135b7: bur rjod mdzad pas// bar chad med pas phreng ba ma// tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa// dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyed// dbyings nyid tshim zhing yid bde bas// de nyid rdo rje gI ra ti ma// ro yis khyab cing gang sgyur ltar// bde ba chen
135b8: po bzhi yi gar/ / khyab dang mdzes dang tshim pa dang // mi gnas bkrol bas gar mkhan ma// rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang // yid kyi phreng ba bde ba'i gar// lha mo bzhi yi rang bzhin no// ma rtogs 'gro ba mtha' yas la//

136a1: rang bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis// yongs la pan 'dogs skyob pa ni// 'di ni byams pa zhes bya'o// rtogs goms mthar phyin khyab par gyis// las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim// sel ba 'di ni sgrib sel lo//
136a2: zabs dang shes rab gnas rtogs na// gang pyir spod len mi gnas pas// byi nang rjod bcud ma lus pa// bye ba med pa sa kun tu bzang // dgra dang gzhan du 'dzin pa kun// zug pa med pa'i shes rab kyis// lta ba'i dbug tsang
136a3: pas na/ zag med shes rab 'jam dpal sa// dbang po yi ge thig ler bcas// gnas dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis// mngon du skad phyir brjod pa yin// dus bzhi rim pa gnyis brgyad de// de nyid dgrol dang brod skyed
136a4: dang / spyod yul dag phyir brjod pa ni// dri dang bde bas dag tshim zhing // yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri// phyi nang khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor la// me tog thig leng bder bgrod pas// rdo rje sa tog bla na med// phyi nang sems la gnas
136a5: bcas pa'i/ / man papas ma pyir shes rab dang / ye shes snang ba blan med// rdo rjegs la ba'i ma mam// byin dkyil 'khor ma lus la// rang 'byung ting 'dzin bde pa yis// thams ca dpyad par gnas pa'i phyir // khyab byed
136a6: drirgyab ma/ / de bzhin nyid la dgongs pa yis// 'khor ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa// byang chub snying po tshar gcad pas// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su brjod// gzung 'dzin tha pa ye shes ni// gnyis 'dzin rtog pa'i gnyen po /
136a7: togs goms de yis 'joms pas na// ya mAn ta kri gshin rjegashed// gang phyir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// thabs dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul las// 'joms dang sgrol bar mdzad pas na// rta mgrin rgyal po de bshad do// 'khor
136a8: ba'i bdud kyis dug lnga la/ / ye shes lnga ru gsal goms pas// gnyis med rtsi ru gang 'khyil pa// sgrib zad bdud rtsi 'khyil par bshad// gang du lus dang bcas pa yis// dbang po yul dang rnam shes reg/ rang chud bcas pa'i

136b1: ye shes nyid/ / sgo ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// rang rgyud rtag chad bzlog pa dang // gzungs dang lha dang bde ba dang // thig le rig par bcas pa nyid// gang phyir gnas nas dgug pa dang // gang du'ang 'gro bar mi nus dang // de las 'da'
136b2: bar dka' ba dang / / stims nas bde bas dril bu ma// gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdam pa dang // gnyis su med pas bde chen po// rang lus snad srid bstan g.yog la// rtogs dang goms pa'i tshul gyis sbyar// de dag ma lus dran
136b3: byed pa/ / rigs pa'i rgyal po kun dbyer med// kun bzhi rdo rje mi phyed pa// kun tu bzang por de bshad do// ma lus 'dus byas ma byas chos// ma lus zag med khyab pa'i dbyings// rtogs dang shes dang gong gyur pa// kun tu bzang
136b4: mor de bshad do/ / mi shigs thig le bde chen po// ye shes lnga ldan dadas ma'i bcud// rang 'byung lus can kun gnas pa// ston pa rigs pa'i gsung can nyid// d+ha ra rma tsakra chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi e stsogs tshul du
136b5: ni/ / lus sbas pa yi tshul dag gis// lus can kun la khyab par gnas// rang 'byung thugs kyi bde ba nyid// rgyu ba bral ba'i snying po ste// pa ra ma a r+tha byang chub sems// nam mkha'i ye shes thugs kyi klong // ma ni ma ta dran rtog
136b6: yid/ / rnam shes rgyu ba'i dran rtog rnams// ye shes nam mkhar gsal 'dod pa// dran rtog rig pa 'khor du gnas// zag med rnam shes bsam mi khyab// ma lus nam mkha'i ye shes su// bde chen rig pa'i mi rtog par//
136b7: bsdus te nyams la gnas par mdzad// bde ba chen po ma skyes pa// nam mkha' lta bur mi byed pa// nam mkha'i ye shes dbyer med sku// dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas// 'di zhes nye bar bstan pa ni// e sogs bzhi
136b8: yi tshul gnas te/ / phyi nad par 'khyams gdod par bcas// gsang ba'i 'og min rgyan rdzogs pa'o// thig le baM dbyibs spros pa med// brjod med bstan pa gsungs mdzad cing // byin brlabs bde chen mi rtog pa// 'khor

137a1: la sdang bar mdzad pa'o/ / ma ni ma nu ma ta ste// sdom byed dran rtog yid kyi dngos las can rnam shes de dag gis// gsal bar go bar 'khor du brjod// chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid// thig le bcu drug sems
137a2: lnga'i dngos/ / mi rtog lhan cig skyes pa'i don// byin rlabs mngon sum tshul gyis gsal// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le zag med skyes pa'i dus// bsam med lhan cig skyes pa'i tshe bde ba chen
137a3: po'i dus su 'dod/ / shes pa rten dang brten par bcas// thabs kyi rim pa la brten nas// rlung gis bsdus pa'i don gyis ni// rang rig thabs kyi rgyal por gas la// gang dang gang la gang du ni// gang gis gang che
137a4: gang gsungs pa/ brjod 'byung rtsa bar de gyur pas// gleng bzhi zhes ni bstan pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dbyer med ye shes cig gi dang // rdo rje 'chang chen kun bzang las// sna tshogs sku ni rnam par
137a5: 'phrul/ / de tshe rgyal ba thams cad kyang // lha la rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// lha min ston pa phrag dog rje// mi la thub pa'i dbang po ste// byol song sgra yis 'dul mdzad pa// yi dgas drag pos gdung ba sel// dmyal ba sdug sngal
137a6: chos kyi rgyal/ / gdul ba'i sprul sku ngo bor shar// la la lha las 'pho ba dang // la lar lhums zhugs bltam pa dang // dka' thub bdud btul sangs rgyas nas// 'khor lo bskor te mya ngan 'das// gnas la nges pa yod
137a7: min te/ / dmyal ba yi dgas byol song dang // mi dang lha dang lha min te// so so'i gnas te gang yin pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba ston pa'i gnas// lha rnams dang ni mi rnas dang // lha min yi dgas dud 'gro dang // dmyal ba so so'i
137a8: 'gro ris dag/ rang rang mos dang las dbang gis// 'dul tshul tha dad dbang gis 'khod// rang rang mos pa'i 'phrang ba'i tshe// rang rang brda' skad tha dad pas// rtogs dang grol bar gang gyur pa// rang rang ji bzhin ston pa'i

137b1: du/ / bstan pa'i theg pa sna tshogs te// rang rang zhen pa mtha' yas phyir// tshul dang mos pa'i dbang gis na// theg pa sna tshogs tshul du snang // theg gcig mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul// gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang la/
137b2: dgu dang brgyad khri la sogs pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul gyis snang // sku dang gsung thugs las dag gis// 'dul dbang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de tshe 'gro ba so so yang // rang gi
137b3: gzhi rtsa don rig nas/ / rim pa lnga 'am thabs cig gis// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sa la gnas// rang rang cha 'dzin sprul pa'i lus// sar gnas 'khor gyi dang po yis// de dag zhus pa'i lam gsungs pa// blo dang tshi/
137b4: dang yi ger bsdus// rgud ces bya ba rgyun du grags// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang // sgrub pa phrin las lam rim ni// phyi dang nang dang sbas pa ste// rang bzhin gnas dang
137b5: mngon byed pa/ / thabs kyi rgyud ni gsum du gsungs// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// skyed rdzogs thabs rim gang bstan pa// sgra/
137b6: 'phrul dra bar 'dus pa ste// de ltar grags pa'i chos rnams kun// rtogs pa'i cho ga kun bshad pa'i// rgyun chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog/ thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// dus
137b7: gsum rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs/ / rdo rje sems pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsar pa me long gi rgyud chen po las gleng gzhi rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang zag thab
137b8: ni thun mong du/ / blo yis yul du gar gyur pa// de ni thun mong yul nyid de// gang zag thabs dang ston pa nyid// de yi spyod yul ma gyur cing // thabs chen gsang ba dang ldan pa// de ni thung mong ma yin pa'o// de nyid skye bo

138a1: 'khor gnyis dor/ / rnam gnyis tshul du snang bar mdzad// phung po khams dang skye mched nyid// rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa' dang // sems ma nyid du lhun gyis grub// gsang yul dbang po rnam shes reg/
138a2: ma lus 'joms phyir khro bo ste// rtag sogs mtshan ma las skyes phyir// yum ste las kyis mi gnas bshad// yid chos bzang po bzang mo nyid// chags sogs nyon mongs drug po nyid// thub pa sprul pa drug tu bshad//
138a3: de nyid phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes yul// dbang po dus dang lus chos bzhi// mtshan mnyon mongs yum nyid de// de nyid sems phyir ma skyes pas// lhag pa'i bden gnyis 'brel ba las// byang
138a4: chub sems lnga rnam par 'phrul/ / dngos po snang grags chos thams cad// skye ba med dang 'gag med dang // gnas pa med dang dmigs med dang / 'gro 'od med pa nyid du snang // bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang //
138a5: gzhan phyir de dag ma rtogs pas// rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang // shin du gab sbas gsang ba'i don// de nyid legs par bshad pa'i che'i// ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba la// ma rig gtogs rkyen dbang gis// 'khor ba'i
138a6: sdug bsngal ngo bor snang / / de nyid bde gshegs snying po ste// dngos med dngos po'i snying po can// 'gro ba rnams ni smin bya'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las// sprul pa rnams ni rnam par 'phrul// sku dang gsung thug
138a7: sna tshogs kyis/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang // ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gci// yab dang yum dang gnyis med dang // gang la gang gis gleng bslang ba/ brda' dang dgongs pa tshig
138a8: gis te/ / bstan pa'i tshogs ni snang bar 'gyur// phan pa rlung gi sbyor ba yis// thabs des yum la gang bskul bas// gnyis med 'brel ba'i chags pa'i 'od// sa ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs// bde chen lha ru gas

138b1: byas shing / / nam mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas// bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro// skye dang dga' dang gnas pa dang // 'gro 'ong nyid las shes par 'gyur// gang gis gang la gang bslang pas// gang rkyen dbang gi de dag
138b2: las/ ye shes gsal bar gang snang bas// snang srid lus dang dngos por bcas// nam mkha'i ye shes cing yang snang// nang gi gle bslang thabs chen yin// gang phyir thabs kyis shes rab la// chags pa'i klu dang sbyor bas
138b3: bskul/ / shes rab thabs la lan bskul ba 'ang // shad pa yi klu gar dang // sngags sbyor ba yi rim pa yis// phyag rgya bzhi yis mngon sbyar bas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyu ba rlung gi sbyor ba yis// dgug dang
138b4: bklag pa'i thabs nyid de/ / dbab dang gzung dang bskyil ba dang // zlog dang gzung dang sbyar ba yis// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen po// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// mthar thug rim pa las 'byung ba'i// kun kyang sems
138b5: lngar snang ba ste/ / thabs las byung ba'i thig le dang // shes rab gsang ba'i thig le dang // gnyis med bde ba las byung ba// sems lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing // kud dag sung thugs las
138b6: byung ba/ bye brag brgyad bcu kun 'dus pa// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te// swa gsung thugs dang ye shes lngas// thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel ba yis// 'gro ba kun la rgyas btab pa'o// snod bcud bde ba'i rang bzhin
138b7: gyis/ / ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas// g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin// skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang / skyes bus mthar phyir ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par
138b8: gnas/ / 'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis// gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od// dkyil 'khor la sogs so sor gnas// gang zag blo dang 'tsham par bstan// rten dang brten can las byung ba'i// rang 'byung ba de chen

139a1: mi rtog pa/ / lus med lus la gnas pa yi// khyab pa gnyis med gang ba'i tshul// gang zur zag med bde ba yi// ting 'dzin bde ba khyad par can// rang bzhin brtags dang snang ba dang // byin rlob nus pa'i lha'i
139a2: ni/ / phyi nang snod bcud sku gsung thugs// ma lus sbyor ba gsum las byung // rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag/ rim par bsten dang sbyor ba dag/ 'then dang sdud pa rlung gis te// dngas mar ye shes rlung gis 'jug/ steng dang
139a3: 'og las byung ba yi/ / bde ba'i thig le rim pa dag/ dngas snyigs rlung gi khyad par gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nyid// rkyen gyis nus pa phreng ba ltar// rgyu cig nus pa so sor snang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig
139a4: rten pa'i/ / lam ni rtsa dang thig le dang // rlung ni phyi nang dang sa snyigs dang // lam dang rgyu ba'i tshul las byung // gang phyir med dang nus pa med// stongs dang log pa'i nus mthu yis// rang lus 'jig dang sdug bsngal
139a5: zhing / / dbang po ma tshang dman par gyur// gang phyir thun mong thun mong min// sems lnga ye shes lnga bstan pa// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du// gzungs ma rigs la rten bcas pa'i// sems lnga yun ring thung
139a6: bcas pas/ / bdag gzhan chos rnams ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te// dngos po me yin dngos med min// bdag gzhan gnyis ka gnyis med min// rang 'byung ba chen sgyu ma nyid// rdo rje brten po rang snang
139a7: ye shes sgyu ma lhun gyis grub/ / rdo rje sems pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las gleng bslang ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshangad bya ba// kun gyi shes bya yul
139a8: bshad pa/ / chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gcig dang tha dad kun bral ba'i// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sgo skur kun bral mnyam pa las// rtogs dang ma rtogs byed par las// sna tshogs chos na

139b1: rnam par 'phrul/ / gzhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i// rang bzhin dbyer med de bzhin nyid// dngos med dngos po yus 'das la// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ngo bo sna tshogs rang snang ba// gnyis med thabs chen rdorje
139b2: e ma'o gnyis medabade chen las/ / sna tshogs gnas dang longs spyod dang / rigs dang kha dog tshe tshad dang // bde sdug dbang po bye brag dag/ rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul// sgyu mchu zla 'ja' tshon ltar//
139b3: byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas// las dang rkyen gyis gang snang ba// rang rang zhen pa'i tha dad gyis// dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'i// rtog pa'i nus pa sna tshogs mthong // rang bzhin gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings// lhan
139b4: cig skyes dang kun brtags pa'i/ / ma mthong log zhen rtas pa yis// 'khrul 'khor log pa'i stobs su snang // 'khor ba ma bsal dag pa yi// zhing dang spyod yul longs spyod dang // ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdza
139b5: 'phrul dang / / mngon shes ye shes dpag med pa'i// sna tshogs sku dang gsung thugs dang // yon tan phrin las rang snang ba// bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub pa'i don// sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar// ma bsags ldan
139b6: gyis grub pa'i sku/ / sna tshogs kun dang dbyer med pa'i// kun la yid bzhin 'thun par snang // kun kyang rang 'byung byang chub sems// bden pa dbyer med don du snang // gang phyir nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// gang la de
139b7: ltar snang ba las/ / yang dag cig tu gzung du med// ma bcos rang 'byung zhi ba nyid// rnam par dag pa'i snying po ste// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su mkhyen// sgro dang skur ba kun bral ba'i//
139b8: thams cad rang snang snying po las// sna tshogs ma lus rnam par 'phrul// dngos dang dngos po med min zhing // gang la de nyid yul 'das pa// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa// phyogs ras mtha' dbus rgya dpag

140a1: med gang gis shing la khyab par ltar/ / mkha' sogs rdul bral 'byung ba'i bcud// zag pa med pa'i snying po nyid// lus can kun gyi dbang po dang // dngas mar 'brel bar gang snang yang // mthong ba log pa'i
140a2: stobs kyis sbyar/ / bdag gzhan med pa'i rang snang yin// ma lus thams cad dbyer med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab bcud lnga'i rgyun// longs spyod thabs su bcas pa nyid// 'gro ba kun la khyab par gnas// gang yang thabs
140a3: dang shes rab kyi/ / rdzu 'phrul dra ba'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bzhin dbyer med byang chub sems// bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid// 'das dang da ltar ma byon gyi// rgyal ba rig 'dzin mtha' yas dang // ma lus kun gyis rtogs byag/
140a4: phyogs med khyab pa'i ngo bor gnas// gan snang ma lus de bzhin nyid// ma bcos ma byas zhi ba ste// gcig dang du ma las 'das pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// ma lus
140a5: gnas pa de dag kyang / / rtogs pa'i khyad par dbang po yi// mthong tshul dag dang ma dag gis// rang bzhin yul du ma gyur pas// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa'i// dbang da man ngag 'brel ba yis// de nyid mthong rtogs
140a6: don phyir bsha/ kang phyir rdo rje slob dpon nyid// yon tan yongs rdzogs nus pa can// dad dang brtson 'grus btul shugs can// shes rab khyad par gang ldan la// dbang dang dam tshig man ngag dang // rgyu rkyen 'brel ba'i nus
140a7: pa yin/ / bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pa// thabs kyi phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i gsang chen snying po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste// phyi nang bdag gzhan ma lus pa// thams cad dbyer med de
140a8: bzhin nyid/ / thabs bral kun la rgyas btab pas// mun pa'i tshogs su gyur pa yin// mun snang dug dang gser 'gyur rtsi// thabs mkhas rang bzhin nges 'gyur ltar// gang de'i lta spyod tingad 'dzin gyis// de ma

140b1: thag tu de bzhin 'gyur/ / dbyer med nam mkha'i rang bzhin du// kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas la sogs// ma lus tha dad med pa ltar// thabs mkhas ma lus de bzhin 'gyur// tha mal pa dang log pa dang // dka' thub can/
140b2: dang rkyen rtogs dang // phyi nang can dang tha dad can// gtsang me can dang phyogs rtogs nyid// mnyam nyid lta las gang 'das pa// ngo bo nyid dang thabs dag dang // dbang po la sogs log pa yis// de nyid gnod pa'i
140b3: stobs su 'gyur/ / gang la gang gis zin pa'i nang // thabs dang brtson 'grus legs pa yis// de ltar brtson pa'i khyad par gyis// de nyid ma spang rnam par dag/ gang phyir de nyid nges pa la// rtogs dang
140b4: ma rtogs khyad par gyis/ / tha dad chos su gang snang ba// dngos la de ltar gnas pa min// rdo rje skye med shes rab ste// ma long thabs nyid sna tshogs snang // gnyis med 'bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid// ma lus dbyer
140b5: med dam pa bshad/ / de nas rtogs sgo bshad bya ba// gang la gang gis don med pas// lha dang spyod dang lam 'bras dag/ 'di nyid dron gnyer gzhan med pa'o// gang gis de dag de don du// tshig dang sngags rdzas dka' thub kyis
140b6: gang bstan de yi byin rlabs kyis/ / bdag gzhan phan par gang 'dod pa'o// gang las gyur pa de zhig pas// lus sems 'byung ba'i bgal gnas// phyin chad pa na gnod chos med pas// dka' thub 'bad rtsol mi dgos so//
140b7: gang phyir byed pa'i rgyu bzhi dag/ mnyes dang dag pas bde bya'i phyir// las dang dka' thub drag shul gyis// grol zhing thar par 'dod par snang // bde bzhi bcu drug tha dad lam// khams gsum mthong bsgom song tshul gyis// rang
140b8: don zag pa kun bral nas/ / rang don thar pa mya ngan 'das// rkyen rtogs pag chags sad pa yis// 'byung med bcu gnyis rang brtags nas// ma rig 'khrul 'khor rgyu 'bras zad// yid bzhin bde ba mchog gis// tha dad med

141a1: pa'i rig bI sems pa de na brdzun khyad par cir bltas pa/ / gsal la mi rtog snying po nyid// bdag gzhan nus pa'i stobs su snang // chos rnams sgyu ma mig yor dang // brag cha chu zla 'dra ba yi// de nyid mtha'
141a2: dbus bral ba ni/ / bden gnyis 'brel ba dbu ma'i tshul// rdo rje dam pa gsum bkod de// dngos spro sgyu ma las grol nas// dag pa'i rten 'brel la rten nas// ye shes sgyu ma mngon sum shar// gang phyir las dang bya ba dang // khrus
141a3: dang gtsang sgra la brten nas/ / sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthu stobs kyis// sgo gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa// de dag las 'thun khyad par nyid// de kho na nyid bzhi rtogs nas// las dang ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas// rdo rje
141a4: 'chang ba'i sa la gnas/ / ting 'dzin rig pa gtsor byas nas// sngags dang phyag rgya bsam pa yis// cha lugs ji bzhin mngon sbyar te// goms pas bdag gzhan don grub pa'o// thabs dang grol ba'i khyad par gyis//
141a5: dbang po yul dngan pa shes dang // snang srid byi nang snod bcur kyi// spyod yul ji ltar 'gyur ba kun// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i thabs kyis rgyas btab pas// ma lus rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// snang srid
141a6: dpa' bo thabs chen de/ / rang bzhin dbyer med dag pa yi// sna tshogs 'phrul ba rang snang bas// ma lus gnyis med ye shes yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thabs dang rig pa gang zin pa// gzhan gyis dor ba'i 'khor
141a7: ba'i chos/ / ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor 'gyur// ma lus gcig dang tha bral ba'i// ji ltar 'thun pa'i snying po la// so so'i don ltar mi gnas pas// bskyed pa lha dang gzhal yas dang // rdzogs pa'i nam mkha'i ye shes dang /
141a8: dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ru// snang ba rkyen gyis sgyur ba ltar// ma lus de yi ngo bor 'gyur// de dag bltas pa'i khyad par gyis// rang re'i mos dang bsam pa dang // nub pa'i rim pa cir snang yang // nam mkha' dang ba'i/

141b1: rang bzhin las// nyi zla gza' skar sprin khu rlangs// rang 'byung rang dngos 'gyur med ltar// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// dngos dbang don las ma g.yos pas// de dag de ltar nyid snang bas// de nyid nam mkha'i khongs su
141b2: 'dra/ / de nas gtan tshig bshad par bya// ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la// byang chub snying pos kun khyab pas// kun gyis mthong goms bya dgos pas// so so thun mong gtan tshigs dang / thun mong ma yin la sogs pa// rgya
141b3: mtsho klong dang chu bo ltar/ / ma lus 'dul shing 'byung ba yin// thun mong bzhi sogs gang yin pa// log lta phyogs 'dzin dgag pa dang // dngos dbang thabs dang 'brel mtshon phyir// thun mor gtan tshigs brjod pa yin// gang
141b4: phyir gtan tshigs thams cad kyis/ / rang las 'phrul phyir me long nyid// ma lus gcig dang tha dad min// gang gi mtha' las yongs grol te// dbus su gzung med gtan la thebs// gcig dang du ma bral ba'o// rgyu dang rkyen
141b5: dang 'bras bu ste/ / thabs de gdod nas dag pa gsum// ma lus rang snang rtogs pa nyid// mtshan nyid de yi mtshan nyid do// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// ma lus rtogs pa bzhir
141b6: shar te/ / de nyid rtogs pa bzhir snang ngo // ma skyes dang las gang snang ba// chu dang rlabs bzhin gcig pas na// de dang der cig dbyer med pas// dngos po lo rgyus nyid kyis shes// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// rtsa ba chags
141b7: sdang lnga nyid de/ / gzhi rtsa ma bcos skad cig ma// de nyid rang spyir gar snang ba// rtogs pas spyi dang rang mtshan shes// snod bcud rgyud rnams mtha' yas dang // mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dngos po snang
141b8: grags chos rnams kun/ / ma bcos de gi nyid du gnas// ma lus snying po thig le dang // lnga bdag brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis rgyu// sa ya bcu gsum rtsa yin lag/ ro dang gnas skabs kun las grol// dang po gnas dang gnyis

142a1: pa gnyis/ / gsum pa ma lus khyab byed pa// nyams su myong byed gtan tshigs so// thig le gnas dang yig 'bru dang // de yi byin rlabs 'dres pa yis// bde ba chen po mngon du snang // chu las chu bo thadad
142a2: de/ / rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs dang // lam dang zhing sa'i 'bras bu ltar// thabs kyi khyad par snang ba yin// dngos ma lnga las gang byung ba// ji snyed lus sems rtsa thig le// khams lnga'i ro dang bcud snang ba// ye shes
142a3: chen por gtogs pa yin/ / gsum dngos brgyad sogs kha dog drangs// gnas pa gang yin de snod de// so so'i bcud kyi khyad par las/ byang chub sems nyid gsal bar snang // don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// bden
142a4: bzhi dbyer med dngos ma nyid/ / ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le cig dang du ma nyid// bral ba'i ye shes chen po nyid// cig dang du ma las grol ba'o// bcud 'dus thig le
142a5: gnyis ro rgyu/ / rlung dang gdams dag rkyen ldan pas// 'bras bu ldan cig skyes par snang // rang las gnas pa thabs kyis gsal// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro// rtswa yig bcas pa bcud 'dus pas// thabs
142a6: dang rlung gi gdam pa yis/ / ma lus lhan skyes mngon sum gsal// bde dang stong nyid mi phyed pa// rang rig bde chen ma skyes gzugs// ma lus 'od dang rnam pa ltar// dbyer med tshul du rang snang ba'o// bde bas skyed/
142a7: ba'i rtog pa lnga// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa nyid// ma lus ye shes chen po nyid// ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab bo// dbang po snod bcud bcas pa yis// yab yum 'brel bar bcas pa'i bcud// sems lnga'i
142a8: rgyud du rang snad ba/ / mnyam pa bzhi yi tshul du gsal// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba mthar thug pa'i// gtan tshig mtha' yas bshad pa ste// rdo rje me long bshad pa'i rgyus// gang gis rtog

142b1: pa de nyid ni/ / ma lus rang snang sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rang snang ba// zag med rang 'byung dang las 'char// chos rnams 'bras bur lhun rdzogs pa'i// bdag dang gzhan don lhun rdzogs pa// ma bcos ji
142b2: bzhin dang bzhag las/ / ldan gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // gang dag gang ste la gang rten pas// lhun gyis grub pas 'bras bu nyid// ma bcos sgyu ma lhun grub nyid// dus bzhi phyogs bcu ma lus par// skrun
142b3: grub 'bras bur rang snang ba'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul drab gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las lta ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sgyu 'phrul dra'i
142b4: mngon rdzogs pa'i/ spyod pa'i khyad par ma lus pa// 'di dag bshad par bya ba ste// rang bzhin thabs dang mngon gyur pas// spyod pa ma lus bstan pa yin// e ma'o rang rig snying po las// bde sdug gnas dang longs/
142b5: spyod dang // tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa// la lar mngon par chags pa ste// la lar drag shul zhe sdang spyod// la lar ri bos non pa nyid// la lar ldongs pa'i mun pa nyid// la lar phrag dog snang ba yin// la lar
142b6: ser sna 'thab brtsod de/ / la lar 'tshal dang bya ba btang // rtsol dang mi rtsol la sogs pa// de la sogs pa mtha' yas rnyed// chos dbyings mtha' yas mu med pa'i// nam mkha' dbyings ni mtha' yas par// spyod
142b7: pa'i khyad par de nyid do/ / rang 'byung thams kyi spyod pa nyid// ji ltar bsam zhing brtags pa ltar// rang bzhin dbye ba med pa'i phyir// sgo gsum byed spyod bsam mi khyab// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// ma
142b8: lus sangs rgyas gnas gyur kyang / / ma rtogs thabs dang bral ba'i phyir// bde sdug sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag dang ldan pa la// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag/

143a1: byang chub lam du bde bar bshad// thabs dang mi ldan skye bo yis// thabs dang bya ba sna tshogs kyis// mdzad spyod dka' ba sna tshogs pa// mi dang lha las thar pa med// dper na dug dang ldan pa la// thabs
143a2: kyi khyang par ji bzhin du/ / rtogs pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rgyun// rang bzhin gnyis med dag pa las// brtags pa'i bye brag khyad par gyis// mi mthun pa de sdug sna tshogs myong //
143a3: ma bcos dbyings las g.yos pa mdo// gang dag thun mong ngo dag las// las dang bya ba sgo nas ni// smad dang spyod dang spyod 'gyur phyir// 'di skad spyod pas spyod par gsungs// rang bzhin rgyal ba'i spyod pa yis//
143a4: rAdang rabs ltar khyab gyur kyang // sdong len bya ba sna tshogs las// spyod pa thabs kyis zin pa med// gang phyir thabs dang shes rab dang // sgra dang rtogs pa sna tshogs kyis// thun mong yul du ma gyur pa// thun mong
143a5: ma yin thabs spyod de/ / la lar thun mong nyid du ste// thar pa dang ni mthar pa// kun tu rgyu dang mu stegs dang // bud med dang ni ma rabs dang // rgyal po dpal po dka' thub can// byis pa la sogs tha dad de// la lar dgod
143a6: dang drag po dang / / gshe dang 'jigs dang zhi ba dang / la lar de bzhin chags chen po// g.yo rgyu spyod dang g.yem par ston// zhi dang chu dang phrag dog spyod// 'dod dang longs spyod gzir ba dang // klu bro gar dang 'jo sgeg dang //
143a7: bzhin 'jigs dang sdig pa dang // ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe// zhing khams rdzu 'phrul spyod pa dang // ngo mtshar cho 'phrul du ma dag/ gang dang gang gis mdzad pa dag/ skye bo ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mdzad pa mtha'
143a8: yas rnam par ston/ / zhal tshangs dang khrol khro// thar pa na chung mdzes dang rol// gdung dang rmongs dang sdug bsngal ba// rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'i// sku yi rol pa mtha' yas ston// byin gyis brlabs dang rang

143b1: snang dang / / brda' dang rig pa ting 'dzin dang // tshig tu chags sdang rmongs pa dang // shin tu rgyal dang phrag dog dang // 'jam dang dal dang snyan mi snyan// rtsub dang drag dang sbom pra dang // ring thung rol mo lha klu dang // mi dang mi min//
143b2: 'byung ba'i sgra// khyim bdag dbang chen legs dpon dang // chags can gtum po la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa// dag dang ma dag tshul gyis ni// gsung gi rol pa mtha' yas snang // la lar byams dang
143b3: sdang ba dang / / g.yeng dang mi ga yeng rmongs dang ri// sdud da dang mi sdud yal ba dang // grol dang ma grol rdo rdul dang // ma rig ye shes la sogs pa// thugs kyi rol pa mtha' yas pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang // mtha'
143b4: yas dbyer med dam pa nyid/ / lung dang rig pa man ngag gis// tshad ma dag gis gang gcal ba// shes bya khongs su chud par 'gyur// de nas chos rnams ma lus pa// bdag gzhan phyi nang dbyer med pa'i// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
143b5: tshul gyis snang / / mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid// dran dang shes bzhin brtan po yis// dus gsum rgya mtsho gting lta bur// mi g.yo gsal ba'i dang gyur nas// sgo gsum mnyam par sbyor ba yis// dang po rtogs pa'i
143b6: spyod pa ste/ / de bzhin nyid la gsal brtan te// stong pa shes rab spyod par bshad// de nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa// rang 'byung byang chub sems nyid phyir// gang snang dang rgyud dngos med de// rgyu ma mig yor brag cha dang // rmig
143b7: rgyu chu bur la sogs pa/ / gong ma'i stobs dang 'di nyid stobs// mnyam par sbyor bas bsgom par bya// gang lam ltangs mngon byas dang // ting 'dzin rim pa gnyis med pas// kun la snying rje'i spyod pa dag/ dam pa 'di ni spyang
143b8: par bya/ / rang bzhin ched du dmigs pa dang // khyab dang shugs las gang byung ba'i// snying rje'i spyod par rnam par spyad// de nas sgyu ma lta bu nyid// rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis// cir yang bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir// rigs pa

144a1: dbu mar gang gsal ba/ / nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan du 'bar// sa bon gang las thabs chogs// 'phro 'du'u nas mngon gyur pa// rdo rje gsum gyis ngo bor snang // de nyid gcig dang lnga gsum gyis// brten 'bar
144a2: mdzes par gsal gyur te/ / mdun dang gzhan du bskabs dag sbyor// gcig dang des med rim pa dang // 'khor lo zhes bya bzhi ru gyur// gang gis gang de ma brtan par// 'phro 'du sgoms pa don med de// sgron bral gsal
144a3: brtan 'dris pa yis/ / gang bsgoms gsal bar mngon du 'gyur// tha mal zhen rtog zlog pa dang // lam gyi 'brel bar bya ba dang // dngos grub 'bras la myur 'jug pas// rtags kyi lha ni bsgom par bya// de ltar brtan
144a4: 'gyur gsal ba la/ / bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa'i// sgo gsum sku gsum thugs gsal bas// thun mod spyod pa rnam bcad la// sgo gsum mnyam bzhag rjes thob med// gang gis de ltar gsal bya'i phyir// phyogs
144a5: cig spyod pa brtsam par bya/ / de nas rtsa ba goms pa dang // bslab bya khyad par mthar phyin ltar// gang de rim par brtan 'phel phyir// yan lag spros pa rnam par bsgom// lhag par bcu gcig dgur ldan pa'i// cig/
144a6: las rgyas bsdus phye ba yis// 'khor lo'i rtsa ba lha dag kyang // yab yum gnas dgong gsal bar bsgom// de dag lhag pa'i lha dgu dag/ yan lag tshul du spros te bsgom// 'dul ba gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis// mdzes
144a7: pa'i tshul dang gdugs pa 'dul/ / lha dang zhal phyag dbu grangs kyang // rtsa ba yan lag spos tshul gyis// dkyil 'khor grangs dang gang sbyar ba'i// rim par spros shing bsgom par bya// grangs dang grangs med tshul
144a8: dag gis/ / dpag tshad rgyang grags mkha' dbyings su// zhi dang lo la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs sna tshogs bsgom// dang po'i bar dang tha ma'i par// rig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsal brtan nas// sku gsung

144b1: thags dang ldan pa yi/ / tshom bu rim pasgom par bya// dgon pa'i rim pa 'am nags tshal dang / chu 'gram ri rtsi dur khrod dang // skyon bral yon tan rdzogs pa ste// dgra dang phyogs mtshams skyon med pa'i/ brtag pa'i rin
144b2: pa ldan pa yis/ / shis dang 'thad pa'i sa phyogs su// gzhal yas rim rtsegs mdzes ldan pa// rgyan dang bcas pa ldan byas la// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i shes rab thabs// mi ldan gong sa'i 'od kyis spyad// bdag
144b3: dang gzhan gyi nus pa yis/ / mnyam nas tshogs la 'jug par bya// yo byad lnga ldan thogs med par// cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin btsam// bro glu gar dang ting 'dzin bcas// bar chad med par bsgrub par bya// gal te 'dod
144b4: pa ma rdzogs par/ / sgyu ma'i lus de ma brtan na// yid kyis rdo rje gsum gsal bas// rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin de// phyin chad 'jigs bral khyung bzhin no// de bas 'brel ba'i spyod ldan na// dbang sgyur zag med
144b5: sa thob ste/ / brgya dang snying sogs 'jig bral zhing // gling dang 'jig rten brgya stong du// 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul mtha' yas snang // 'jig pa med cing mi ldogs// dpa' bo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhan don spyod pa'i
144b6: khyad par dag/ 'dul ba'i dbang ni sna tshogs kyis// rnam par brtse ba sna tshogs spro// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// shes rab phyi yi spyod pa ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nang
144b7: du 'jug pa'i rim pa yi/ / spyod pa'i khyad par cho ga dag/ de nas rim pa 'di dag bshad// lus can 'gro ba thams cad la// tsakra bzhi dang sku gsung thugs// spor dang 'bar ma 'khyal ba dang // 'brel dang ma 'brel
144b8: khug pa dang / / 'dzin dang 'dzag dang gnas pa dang // de bzhin khyab dang 'khrul pa'i rtsa// gang du rgyu dang gnas 'dzin pas// rtsa zhes de la mngon bshad de// de dag rgyu dang lam 'bras dang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas//

145a1: bde ba chen po skyed par byed// gong dang 'og gi rang bzhin las// spyi dang khyad par kha sbyor 'byung // sa bon khyab byed 'khor lo yas// thams cad khyab cing 'dzag pa'i rtsa// dngas snyigs rlung dang 'brel ba yis//
145a2: gang de po so'i bcud rkyen gyis// zag dang zag med bde ba skyed// lus kun khyab par gnas pa nyid// dngas mthur gyi rlung dang 'grogs// gang na sgra sbyor 'khor lo can// des kyang kun khyab chub can// 'khrul zhing 'khor
145a3: bas 'khor lo ste/ / gsung gi 'khor lo ngag gi rten// rdzogs dang ma rdzogs gang mi gsal// sgra sbyor dag dang ma dag gyur// bde dang snyan dang mi snyan dang // bya dang dri za bung ba dang // chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs byed// mdog
145a4: dmar las khyab klu la sogs/ / u tha'i rlung dang 'grogs te gnas// d+harma tsakra srog gi rten// ma lus bzhi rtsa kun gyi srog/ rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dang ldan// dngas ma lnga 'dus kun gyi gtso// phyi rim rin chen
145a5: sul mdadas 'dra/ / mi shigs thig le bde chen po// rin chen phung po za ma tog/ sna tshogs ye shes lnga'i bdag/ thung ngu a'i rang bzhin can// srog gi rlung dang 'grogs te gnas// phyi rim pad ma 'dab brgyad de// chos nyid
145a6: ye shes yon tan dang / / rang rgyud bzhi la yan lag brgyad// thun mong phyi yi rim pa yin// 'di la rtsa gsum rim pa ste// zag pa'i rtsa dang mngon shes rtsa// chos nyid rim pa gsum du gnas// rlung yang cig gam gnyis
145a7: yin te/ / de las bye brag dpag med pa'o// gnas pa dang ni lba ba'i rlung // gnas pa srog dang ye shes te// grub bzhini mngon par brjod// phyin can dang gyen thur can// de re 'ang dngas snyigs khyad par gyis// ris pa bca
145a8: dumangon snang yin/ / gnyid dang 'gro ba'i sa bon gyis// chags sdang dran rtog kun gyi gzhi// gang du gnas dang gnas ma yin// rgyu zhing 'phro ba rlung gis te// bde dang sdug bsngal ji snyed pa// myong zhing skyed par byed pa

145b1: yin/ / 'di ni gnas dang mi gnas kyis// srog dbang dran pa dbang sgyur bas// gnas dang 'pho ba pha rol dag/ gnas pa srog gi rlung can do// gang du 'khrul ba 'dzed pa de// pa lus 'gyed cing spro ba yin// gyen thur
145b2: 'dzeg cing 'gengs 'byung ba'i/ / sgo gnyis lus kun khyab pa'i rtsa// drug bcu rtsa bzhi snying po can// phyi rim bzhi yi rgyun du 'khyil// dbus nas 'khyal ba thig le'i ru// 'phen pa bde ba'i rlung dang 'grogs/
145b3: gang du'ang 'khrul cing sprul pa'i phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lo shes rab nyid// de 'og gru gsum 'bar ba'i rtsa// gyen du 'bar dang thur du 'phro// 'od kyis 'bar ba'i sa bon can// rtse mo'i 'ogo mas reg pa'i #
145b4: gtum mo lte 'og 'bar ba'i rtse/ / skyes bu chags pa slong ba ltar// 'di dag bde ba bskyed pa ste// gnas sa tshad dang bcas par gnas// de'i 'og g.yo ba rlung gi rten// 'byed dang 'dzum pa'i las can nyid// de dang de
145b5: gnyis gang ldan pas/ / lus kyi dngos sdigs 'dis 'byed pa// bye brag brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis rtsa// 'dus pas sku gsung thugs yin te// lte ba thur du 'dzag pa'i rtsa// rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i bde ba'i gnang // rgyu ba rlung
145b6: ni thig le'i rten/ / 'gyed cing 'dud pa g.yas g.yon te// bcu drug 'dus pa'i srog rtse gong // rtsa gsum mgrin par 'dus pa ni// sgra sbyor 'khor lo ngag gi gnad// de nas dngas ma'i thig le la// ma lus 'dus pa'i
145b7: tshul du gnas/ / rig pa'i rtsal bcud 'dus pas// thogs med gsal ba'i mngon shes 'byung // phyi rol zag pa'i rtsa nyid la// bde ba chen po'i bcud 'dus pas// bde chen nyams nyid skye par 'gyur// chos nyid
145b8: thig le mi g.yo ba/ / dngas ma 'dus pa'i bcud thim pas// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yi// zag med ye shes bde ba che// nam mkha'i dbyings ni rgya che ba// thog mtha' med par khyab par 'gyur// 'di nyid rtogs dang ma rtog

146a1: las/ / 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// spyod pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur// thabs kyi khyad par phyag rgya lnga// bskyod pa rlung dang 'bar ba me// thig le chu dang 'dzin pas// bde chen nam mkha'i phyag har
146a2: gsal/ / bde bas bde ba'i don mthong bas// rtsa dang thig le rlung dag dang // bde ba rang rig sa skyes pas// de nyid bde chen pi rtog pa// rang chud bral bas zag pa med// rang chud med pa'i bde ba nyid// dngas ma'i thog les
146a3: kun khyab pa/ / phyi nang dbang par bcas pa yis// bde ba rgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'char// ma lus bde ba chen po nyid// de la de yis rgyas btab pas// bde ba mi rtog lhan cig skyes// phyag rgya gcig tu gsal bar gnas/
146a4: gang du 'khor lo rtsa bcud ldan// sa bon yi ge bde ba dang // khams lnga ye shes ro ldan zhing // stong dang bde ba'i thig le 'dres// rtag tu dran par gnas pa nyid// rang 'di ltar gnas pa'i byed/ 'khor la rje bcud ga le bcas lhad pe she
146a5: sku gsung thugs/ / rang lus snang ba snod bcud kun// spros bcas phyag rgya'i grangs su gsal// bcud lnga ye shes kho na'i phyir// dngas snyegs dbyer med thig le'i don// so so'i kha dog dbyibs tshul dang // sbas
146a6: ba'i sku gsung thugs dag la/ / dbyer med gsal ba'i reg pa yis// ma lus bde chen mngon du gsal// de nas bde ba chen po nyid// gar thabs rlung gis dbang sgyur nas// ma lus bde ba'i rigs pa 'char// gtsang
146a7: dang mdzes pa bral gyur nas/ / bshud pa lnga dang 'dod pa lnga// thig le bcud dang dngas mar bcas// thig le chen por 'dres pas na// mi 'gyur 'chi med che la gnas// rang rig bde ba chen po nyid// thog ma za ma med
146a8: par gnas/ / thig le rgyu ba rlung dang bcas// zag med dngas ma'i snying por thim// mngon shes lnga ldan zag pa med// dngas ma'i snying por lam mthar phyin// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag

146b1: thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i/ / bden gnyis nyi zla'i khyad par las// ma lus thams cad gsal bar snang // gang du thabs dang bral ba yi// gnas dang bde sdug btang snyoms dang // longs spyod tshe dang kha dog dang // bdag
146b2: dang bdag gi zhen bcas pa'i/ / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg dang dran pa sna tshogs kyis// zhen dang 'ching ba'i rang bzhin gyis// rang bzhin bzhi ni gsal bar 'gyur// de las tha mal 'khor ba'i lam// theg
146b3: ma med nas lus gnas pa'i/ / bde chen nam mkha'i snying po nyid// lus gnyis rtsa bcu da ma lus pa// thabs dang shes rab sku gsung thugs// srin bu 'khrugs pa'i yi ge lngar// dbang po gnyis dang 'brel te gnas//
146b4: thabs dang man ngag ldan pa yis// rgyal rigs rje'u dang bram ze dang // dmangs rigs ches ma gar mkhan ma// rdol ma nya tshod ma nyid dang // ma dang skrag ma sring mo dang // mthar sgeg lus 'tshong ma la sogs//
146b5: dngos grub skye ba'i zhing du bshad// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug dang // bco brgyad bcud ldan rab yin te// nyi shu la sogs 'bring du bshad// rtsa lnga tha ma'i tshad yin te// gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs// las
146b6: dang bya ba ma lus pa/ / che ga'i sbyor ba rab tu brtsam// gnas pa 'byung ba'i bcud bzhi la// 'byung bzhi gsal rkyen gang phrad pas// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las// lhan cig skyes pa gsum cig las// nyams
146b7: su ye shes lnga shar ba/ / ma lus bde ba chen por 'gyur// gnas bzhi rtsa bcud thig le las// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyag rgya bzhir ldan mnyam sbyor bas// dngas snyigs rlung gis ngos bzung
146b8: nas/ / dngos po lhan cig skyes pa dag/ bdag po gdung can sbyar ba yi// 'phro 'du btang dang bzung ba dang // bzlog pas nyi zla dbyer med mod // dang po 'jug pa las sogs nas// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang bdag par// lam lnga

147a1: sems lnga mthar phyin pas/ / stobs kyi khyad par gsal bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// 'og min nam mkha'i shar sgo nas// nyi zla dus cig shar ba la// dus tshed gza' yis ga
147a2: gang bzung ba/ / nyin mtshan med pa'i ye shes nyid// 'phen pa rlung gi sbyor bas 'byung // rnal 'byor rig par snang ba yi// khyab pa nam mkha'i 'jig rten na// bde chen mdzes pa'i me tog la// bcud kyis khyad pa
147a3: gang gnas pa/ / thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// shes dang b+ha ru'i bung bsdus nas// rnal 'byor bcud kyis rgyas 'gyur nas// bcu gsum sa la lhun gyis grub// 'khyud pa'i gar thabs las byung ba'i// bde ba chen/
147a4: bo mi rtog pa// skad cig cha las byung ba yi// zag med ye shes snying po ste// ma lus dngas ma'i blo snang ba// zhen bral stong rtog mi gnas pa// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ste// ma lus khyab par gnas pa yin/ 'du
147a5: shes zad pa'i rang bzhin te/ / skye dang 'grib pa'i thig le nyid// bco lnga rdzogs pa'i tha ma nyid// sbyor ba kun zad stong pa'i dang // de nyid byin rlabs las gyur pa// phyogs dus snod bcud ngo bo nyid// thig le rdul bral
147a6: zhen pa med/ / sgyu ma gzugs brnyan brag cha sogs// ma lus bde chen rang bzhin du// thun mong dran thog rang 'gags nas// bde chen sgyu ma mngon sum snang // bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// bcud lnga zhu ba'i
147a7: ye shes ro/ / thams cad rtse gcig dran pa nyid// dbyer med thabs dang shes rab ste// dran pa cag tu myong ba nyid// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// sa ya bcu gsum grangs med pa// thig le bde ba nyid snang ba/
147a8: rang rang ma 'dres thig le la// sku gsung thugs dang dran pa dang // ye shes lnga'i rgyas btab ste// ma lus thig le'i tshogs su snang // rang 'byung bde chen rig pa'i lha/ cig dang grangs las 'das pa yang // nyi zla gnyis

147b1: kyi gdan la bzhugs/ / khyab pa'i thig le'i gung nang na// bzhugs nas bdag po rten bdag can// rtsa bcud 'brel ba'i rgyan dang bcas// ka ba gsum dang pho brang bzhin// lde mig gnyis la 'byed pa bzhi// sgo bzhi phye bas/
147b2: gzhal yas khang // lha dang bcas pa mngon du 'gyur// dgon pa dur khrod ldan pa yi// gsang ba'i 'og min 'bar ba nyid// rim pa phyi nang par ldan par// nyi zla pad ma'i gdan stengs nas// dus gsum thig ler ro cig
147b3: pa'o/ / bde chen gnyis su med par bzhugs// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// tshem bu'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// thun mong dam tshig ting 'dzin dang // byang chub shes rab snying rje lnga// gzhan du thabs dang shes
147b4: rab dang / spyang dang glu gang rgyan dang bcas// ma spangs rol par longs spyod pas// ye shes nyi zla rgyun 'char ba// rlung sems ye shes bcas pa nyid// rgyu ba med pas zag pa bral// nam mkha'i mthar thug par nyid du/
147b5: zag med bde ba rgyun mi 'chad// de nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor te// bde chen mngon du gang bar snang // de dag lam la zhugs pa yi// phyi nang gsang ba ma lus pa'i// spyod pa'i khyad par thams cad kun// 'dir ni rgyas pa
147b6: bstan pa yin/ / thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa// skabs la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang yang rung bas spyod par bya// dang po rtogs nas mthar thug pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i 'am
147b7: spyod la/ / spyad bya yul zhes gang 'dod de// thams cad byung dor med par spyod// thabs kyi lha spyod ting nge 'dzin gyis// pad ma la ni 'dam bzhin nam// mun snang gser 'gyur thabs bzhin du// thabs la mkhas pas
147b8: spyad par bya/ / skyes mchog thabs dang ldan pa yis// zhing dang spyod yul dam pa la// chags bral bde bar gang spyad pas// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi longs spyod la// bde ba chen por longs spyod cing // lhun gyis grub pa'i

148a1: bdag por 'gyur/ / gang dag thabs dang mi ldan zhing // don med lam la ma 'brel par// sgra dang tshig la brten pa yis// gsang ba'i spyod pa gang brtsams pa// gang bsgrubs snang bar mi 'gyur gyi// nus//
148a2: med g.yul du zhugs pa ltar// bdag gzhan gnyis ka brlag pa dang // mthong ba'i chos la sdug bsngal zhing // ngan 'gro log pa'i gnas su 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po
148a3: po las spyod pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang // lhag gnyis ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang // byang chub sems dang tshogs
148a4: nyid kyi/ / dkyil 'khor don ni bshad par bya// gang phyir dbang yul rnam shes kun// gzhan snang tha dad ma yin pa'i// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// ma bces rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ma lus kun gyi snying po//
148a5: ste// phyogs bcu 'das dang ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yin// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// sna tshogs rang bzhin dbyer med par// de nyid rang bzhin chos sku yin//
148a6: de nyid 'jig rten brtan g.yo ste// ji ltar snang grags thams cad kun// nges pa'i rang bzhin bzhi bcu gnyis// rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs skur bshad// de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs te// kun du sku dang gsung dang thugs//
148a7: yon tan 'phrin las bas ma yas mchog/ rang bzhin sprul skubasam mi khyab// ji snyed 'gro ba ma lus kyi// lus can snyed la gang gnas pa'i'o// rang 'byung zag med ye shes gzugs// mi shigs thig le bde chen
148a8: po/ / nam mkha' lta bur kun khyab pa// mi gnas chos sku'i rang bzhin yin// de nyid rtsa ba'i rang bzhin las// ma lus snod bcud rang bzhin can// rtog pa ma lus dkyil 'khor te// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rang

148b1: bzhin nyid/ / de nyid thig le phra rags par// snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// de yis de 'dul snang ba'i rgyu// sprul pa rang bzhin zhes bshad do// gang 'dir phung po 'byung ba dang // rnam shes dbang po yul dus dang // nyon
148b2: mongs rtag chad yid chos bcas/ / gang la mngon par mi snang yang // rang bzhin ma bcos dkyil 'khor te// kun la khyab par snang ba yin// rang snying dngas ma lngar ldan pa// dngas ma'i phung po 'byung ba dang // dbang po
148b3: yul du bcas pa yi/ / rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid// sku gsung thugs su rang snang ba// ma lus kun la rgyas btab po// bcud 'dus thig le chen po nyid// nyi zla 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bde ba'i thig le rang snang
148b4: ba/ / ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul dag gis// thabs kyis mngon du gyur na yang // gnyis med thig le bde ba'i ro// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin snang // de dag yab yum sku gsung thugs// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid// 'du//
148b5: 'bral med par ye gnas pa'o// gang phyir rgyal ba thams cad kyi// zag med ye shes rang snang ba// dpag med yon tan rgya mtsho nyid// ye shes 'og min pho brang ste// zag med yon tan rgyan ldan pa'i// 'khor la 'bar
148b6: ba'i pho brang dbus/ / mi 'jigs phung po'i gdan stengs na// bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo bskor// bka' sdod skyes bu mdun na gnas// gzhan yang rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tsho gas// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las//
148b7: rang rang rigs lnga gang gyur pa'i// rnam thar dbu dang ye shes phyag/ so so'i bzhugs tshul ldan pa yis// mdun rgyab phyogs bcur 'khod pa nyid// yab yum 'brel ba'i tshul gyis gnas// rang 'byung ma bsgribs ye
148b8: shes phyir/ / zag med tshogs gnyis las byung ba'i// nam mkha'i khams dang rgya mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten drangs med rdul dang bcas// bkod pa phun sum tshogs par gnas// gang de zag med ye shes kyi// phyag dang

149a1: zhal dang thabs ldan pas/ / zhal mthong rigs la dbang sgyur bas// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur// rgyal ba de dag ma lus pa'i// gsung mchog brjod du med pa nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mthar thug pa//
149a2: brda' dang don dang byin rlabs dang // gsang ba la sogs ci rigs par// dam pa'i chos sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs// zag med ye shes rgya mtsho yi// byin brlabs cho 'phrul mngon shar ba// // a A/ i I/ u A/ e
149a3: AM/ o o/ ri rI li lI/ aM aHka kha ga g+ha da/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyAnya/ ta thA da d+ha na/ Ta tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ 'di dag rab tu phyung ba yis// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i//
149a4: nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho dang // 'khor ra yug dang lhun po dang // 'bab chu steng ka mtshe'u bcas// de na gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams// rang rang longs spyod bde sdug bcas// phyi nang snod bcud bcas pa rnams//
149a5: ma lus g.yo zhing ldeg par byed// sgra po che yang sgrogs par byed// de dag sbyangs nas mi gnas par// gsung gi ngo bor byin rlabs te// de dag stong nyid la thim pas// ma lus stong pa nyid du 'gyur// a ni stong dang mi stong
149a6: gi/ dbu ma dmigs su 'ang yod ma yin// ji snyed snang grags chos rnams kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// gang phyir de yi rang bzhin yang // rang bzhin cho 'phrul ting 'dzin dang // gsang ba bris par gang snang ba//
149a7: rig pa'i khyad par snang ba yin// rtsa ba dang ni rgyan zhes dang // lha yi yi ge mngon snang ba// rang bzhin sku gsung thugs nyid de// khyab pa'i tshul gyis ma lus snang // gang du thugs rje byin rlabs dang // ting 'dzin rig pa'i
149a8: cho 'phrul te/ / rang rang khyad par mngon snang yin// 'di dag rang bzhin sna tshogs pa// gang du ji ltar gnas pa kun// yi ger ma gyur med par gnas// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i gsang ba'i

149b1: thugs/ / mthar thug med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin// zag med rgyas pas kun khyab can// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa// gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis// ye shes ma bsgribs gsal ba yis// nam mkha'
149b2: dbyings lhur gsal mkhyen pa/ / dus gsum chos dang 'gro ba dang // zhing khams rgyal ba dpag med dang // ri dang rgya mtsho rdul bcas pa// snga phyi ma bsgribs da lta nyid// me long lta bur mngon du snang/ dpal ldan nam
149b3: mkha'i dkyil 'khor sku/ / ye shes lnga yis kun khyab can// kun mkhyen stobs bcu mtha' thug med// nam mkha'i dbang phyug bde chen po// mngon shes rgya mtshor pha rol byon// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams
149b4: cad kun/ / sad dang sangs rgyas bdag nyid can// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ bde ba chen po sgyu ma nyid// rang 'byung thugs las gzhan pa min// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// gdul
149b5: bya gang gi de dag tu/ / sna tshogs mngon par 'phrul pa yin// gang du 'gro gtum gdug ldan pa'i// srid gsum dregs pa'i bdag po dag/ thugs rje 'khros pas gdul ba'i phyir// khro bo'i de bzhin gshegs par
149b6: mdzad/ / sku ni ri rab lta bu nyid// zhabs dang phyag ni rdul rnyed de// gang de gdul ba'i khyad par gyis// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dang // dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag la sogs// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbu la sogs// de
149b7: bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba'i/ / phyag zhabs zhal yang de skyed de// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa des// ji snyed phyogs bcu 'jig rten du// cho 'phrul bzhi las sogs pa yin// mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs
149b8: kyis/ / dregs pa che dang dbang phyug dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug brgya byin dang // dri zag shin rje gnod sbyir bcas// gdug pa'i nga rgyal rgyu 'bras can// rgyu 'bras rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// ma lus pa dag ma btang par//

150a1: nga rgyal khrog tu ma zhum pa yis// ji skad smras kyang rang rang gi/ nyon mongs rgya mtsho ma skams par// thugs rje zhel mnan tshul gyis// de dag mngon du btul bar mdzad// la lang dpal chen khrag 'thung ste/ la
150a2: lang rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid/ / la lar rin chen khrag 'thung ste// la lar pad ma de bzhin gshegs// la lar sna tshogs las su bcas/ nga rang btsun mo tshogs dang 'khril// rigs kyi mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// mdog
150a3: dang cha lugs de bzhin te/ / de bzhin sras dang bka' nyan dang // ponya yang sprul la sogs pa// rdo rje ba spu bu gnas// po nya bye ba drug bcu dag/ phyogs bcu kun du rgyas bkye ste// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa yi//
150a4: gdug pa'i tshogs ni de dag kun// ma lus dus gcig btul nas ni// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod// de dag gsung yang sna tshogs te// sprul pa 'gyed pas gsung gcig tu// khams gsum sgra yis gang bar mdzad//
150a5: hAM hAM hUM bi shra kro d+ha dz+wa la ma Na Da la phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la ha la hUM phaT/ pha Ta phaT phaT/ tra ta tra ta tra ta/ kro Ta kro Ta kro Ta/ ha la ha la ha la/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha ba rta// da ha dadad ta/ grih+Na grin gri hA/ pa tsa
150a6: patsa pa tsa/ tsun da n+din da nind/ gardzag rdza gardza/ hU~M hA hUM/ b+h+r-its+tshib+h+yo/ paT dz+wa la raM/ zhes pa'i sgra yis thams cad gang // ji srid nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// ri dang gleng dang rgya mtshor bcas// 'khor yug stong gsum
150a7: 'jig rten bcas/ / ma lus g.yo zhing sgras bkang ste// gdug pa'i tshogs de 'khor bcas pa// gang gi dbang du ma btang bar// gdug pa dus cig btul bar mdzad// de tshe de yi 'khor g.yog kyang // zhum pas spras shing
150a8: gsol btab nas/ / rang snying phul nas dam mnos te// smod btsugs rang gi lam la bzhag/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang // la lar gti mug rmugs par mdzad// la lar chags la chags chen po// la par

150b1: g.ye ma la g.yes par ston/ / sdang la drag shul spyod pa ste// nga rgyal can la ri bos gnon// zhe las slong dang zhi ba nyid// gsal dang zhel gnon pa dang // chags khro dang ni sdang khro dang // rmongs khro gnon khro la sogs par/
150b2: bskal pa zheng gi rdul rnyed du// rang gi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// gdul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs su// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa ni thugs kyi sprul pa snang bar mdzad// gang phyir spros med goms pa nyid// de nyid te
150b3: 'dzin dkyil 'khor te/ / phye nang snod bcud ma lus pa// ji snyed phyogs bcur gnas pa kun// rang rig rgyal por gnas pa nyid// 'di nyid po mo ma ning dang // mtshan med la sogs gang yang min// dngos dang dngos med las
150b4: 'das pa'i/ / de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// rig pa skye ba med pa'i ngang // 'di nyid gsal bar bsgoms par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// skyes dang ma skyes la sogs pa'i// tha snyad med la mi gnas
150b5: shing / / blo yi sbyor ba las 'das pas// 'di ni de bzhin nyid ces bshad// 'di la rim pa med pa ste// skyes bu mchog gi yul du gsungs// ma lus rang rig rdo rje nyid// khyab pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' ste// rnam
150b6: ngag rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ / dam pa'i ting 'dzin chen po nyid// gang gis ma lus mngon gsal nas// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun// goms nas spros med de bzhin nyid// de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid//
150b7: mi shogs thig le dngas ma'i bdag/ bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyis su med// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid/ thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ye shes lnga yi ro dang bcas// bde chen skye ba med pa'i don//
150b8: zag mang khyab pa mngon du smin// ye shes nam mkha' gzugs can nyid// phyi nang med pa'i rang 'byung ste// gsal dang bde ba'i rang bzhin can// thabs dang thig les dbang bsgyur nas// lus can kun la gsal

151a1: par skye/ gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dngas ma nyid// rten can brten par bcas pa nyid// rang 'byung thig le bde ba nyid// phyogs cha med par gsal khyab pas// bde ba chen po'i lus su 'gyur// rang 'byung snying po
151a2: dngas ma'i lus/ / 'byung ba zag med snyed por thim// thig le spros pa med pa ste// thams cad ma lus khyab par snang // rang lus rtsa btsud phyi nang kun// snyigs mdangs mar smin byas te// dngas ma ye shes snying por gsapa
151a3: de nyid rgyu ba med pa yi/ / rang 'byung thig le spros pa med// dngas ma zag med stobs las snang // gang phyir skyes dang sprul pa dang // brtags pa'i gzungs ma las byung ba// dbang po gnyis ni bsrubs pa las// skad cig bcu
151a4: drug mtha' yi tshe/ / nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa gsal// sems lnga rdzogs pa'i snying po nyid// brjod med rang snang bstan pa nyid// ma lus sku gsung thugs gnas pa// 'khyud pa'i gar gsum
151a5: bsdam pa yis/ / gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus pa// rang rig ye shes gzugs su snang // thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ byang chub sems kyi thig le ste// rten dang brten par bcas pa nyid// rang nyid gsal bar byin rlab
151a6: nas/ ji ltar snang srid chos thams cad// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal// ma lus bde ba chen po'i rigs// dam pa'i sbyor ba snang bar 'gyur// 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad//
151a7: gang phyir mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor pas// dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'i// rang rig skye med de bzhin nyid// ma bcos rang rig 'od gsal ba// de bzhin nyid de dang por bsgom// de nas snying rje nam mkha' ltar// /
151a8: gsal la stong pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom// yang na sgyu ma brag cha dang // chu zla'i tshul du bsgom par bya// de nas rang nyid yi ge nyid// gsal la brtan zhing goms pa yi// ma dag pa ni sbyang byas te// dag pa'i mtha' lnga

151b1: bsam par bya/ / e yaM baM su laM/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dag/ rig pa rang snang tshul du bsgom// de dbus rin chen khang pa dag/ mdzes pa'i tshul dang ldan pa ste// brtsibs bzhi 'khor lo lte bar bcas// mu khyud
151b2: zlum po thog mtha' med/ / gru chang blo 'bur bar khyams dang // sgo bzhi rta babs them skas dang // lnga rtseg pha gu dra phyed dang // 'dod yon ka ba zar tshags// mi sgrib gsal ba'i rgyan dang ldan// mi 'jigs la sogs lnga
151b3: dbus gdan/ / nyi zla pa dam la sogs pa// lnga dang gsum dang bzhi gcig go/ rim pa 'tsham pa'i gdan stengs su// sa bon cho ga las byung ba// gtse gzungs mthing ka rdo rje 'dzin// 'khril sbyor 'dzum pa'i byin rlabs te//
151b4: dbang bskur cho ga lnga ldan pas// sbyor bskul sras bskyed so sor dgod// chos dbyings dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin// mnyam nyid rin chen ser po lho// sor rtog pad ma dmar po nub// bya grub ral gri ljang khu byang // btsun mo rig
151b5: 'thun dril 'dzin 'khyil/ / 'khor lo'i rtsibs mtshan shar lho nas// sa snying dkar po myu gu 'dzin// sgeg mo dung mdog me long 'khril// nam snying sngon po ral gri 'dzin// phreng 'dzin mA le nam mkha' mdog/ spyan ras
151b6: le brgan pad ma dkar/ / 'gi ti bi wang dmar mo mdog/ rdor 'dzin ljang ku las kyi rigs// phyag gnyis brgyad nas gar mdzad ldang// gru chad bzhi la rim pa bzhin// byams pa dkar ser klu shing 'dzin// sgrib sa pa dmar ser
151b7: glegs bam bsnams/ / kun bzang dmar ljang rin chen ste// 'jam dpal dkar ldang ut+pal bsnams// btsun mo rigs dang 'thun pa ste// spos dang mar me me to ga dri// 'khril zhing 'dud pa tshul bzhin bzhugs//
151b8: bsgo bzhir rim pa ji bzhin du// stobs chen gshin rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzhin// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// mthing nag ser nag dmar nag dang // ljang nag rdo rje thod dbyug dang //

152a1: thod sbrul rdo rje rgya gram dang // yum yang so so'i phyag mtshan bcas// sgo bzhir rngam tshul 'khril sbyor ba zhugs// khyams kyi mdun dang rgyab tu ni// kun bzar yab yum nam mkha'i mdog/ phyag rgya mangs
152a2: sna tshogs te/ / mnyam pa zhag ye shes 'phro ba'i steng// rdo rje dril bu mtshan pa'o// thub drug dkar ser mthir ka dang // dmar nag ser nag du dka ste// phyogs bzhi ste nga 'og shar nub tshul// bi wang go cha seg par sgrom// po ti
152a3: chur shes par bya/ / mi skyod byed po la sogs pa// rdo rje 'char bas rnam par brgyan// gzhan dag rang rang gis yin te// ya mAn ta krid rtag pa'o// thub drug kun bzar brgyan pa nyid// sku gsung thugs 'bar byin rlabs
152a4: ldan/ / rdo rje 'phro 'du snying por ldan// cho ga'i rim pa shes par bya// dngas ma bcud ldan ye shes nyid// ma bcom de bzhin nyid yin te// ye shes nam mkha'i dang dang 'brel// kun la khyab pa'i snying rje yis// khyab byed bde
152a5: ba'i snying pa nyid/ / tha mal rtog pa gang dag nas// bde ba chen por byin gyis rlob// 'byung lnga dngas ma'i snying po nyid// thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te// d+harma tsakra chos kyi dbyings// mi shigs thig le kun gyi gnas/ nus
152a6: pa'i khyad par phra rags bzhi/ / thig le'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes nyid// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid// rgyal po lnga ru bshad pa yin// 'byung lnga dngas mar bcas pa ni// dgyes pa bskyed
152a7: phyir btsun mo ste/ / mig sogs bde ba'i rnam shes dang // de yi ngo bo yul bcas ni// gnas pa rtsa bcud thig ler bcas// nang gi sems pa yab yum nyid// so so'i rtsa bcu gnas pa'i rten// dbang po dras
152a8: bzhir bcas pa nyid/ / phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni// gnas dang dus kyi phye phyir ro// gang de dang sa mas bskyed pa yis// lus kyi chos bzhin rtag chad bcas// sgo bzhi yab yum shes par bya// bde chen yid ches rang

152b1: rig nyid/ / kun bzang ro yi bde ba nyid// nyon mongs drug gi yul rnams su// sprul pa'i thig ler rang shar ba'o// 'dul ba bzhi yis don mdzad pa// sprul pa'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// kun kyang dngas ma'i rang bzhin
152b2: las/ / ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa// gnas dang ngo bo lngas brgyan pa// ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab pa'o// sa bon sku ste yi ge gsung // bde thugs sku gsung dkyil 'khor ldan// 'phro 'du rtsa ba'i thig ler bcas// ma
152b3: lus kun la 'di gnas pas/ / yan lag nyid du 'di shes bya// stong nyid rdo rje la sogs pa// sngon byas rang rgyud med pa yi// rigs brtags gzungs ma blang bar bya// rang rgyud sgo gsum dag byas la// lha yi rnal 'byor/
152b4: lus su bya// rdo rje snying po ge sar nyid// phrad pas dang gsher ba chu// dro me bskyod pa rlung nyid de// bde ba'i dngas ma nam mkha' nyid// b+h+rUM dbyibs b+ha ga bde ba'i gnas// sna tshogs 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang // nyi zla pad
152b5: ma nus pa'i gdan/ / che ba'i yon tan rdzogs par ldan// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro// lnga phung 'byung lnga dag pa yi// rang bzhin de dang mnyam sbyar bas// ye shes phra rags gnyis su med// thabs dang shes rab
152b6: 'brel pa yi/ / dbang po yul dus rnam shes bcas// rang rang bde bar skyes pa'i lha// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med cing // rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob nas// thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer
152b7: dag gis/ / brtags pa rang gi rtog pa zlog/ dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la// zlog bya ngas kyang mi dmigs so// bde ba'i thig le sa bon la// thabs bzhi rlung gi gar thabs kyis// dga' ba'i tshad ldan nus pa bcas//
152b8: dngos 'di lhan cig skyes par brtan// bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// bde ba chen por ro cig phyir// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas// bcud 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni// yon tan kun

153a1: kyi ngo bo bas/ / che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas// de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'char// rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal po yis// ma lus lhag pa'i lhar brlab phyir// gsung gi snying po brjod pa/
153a2: mdzad// bruM pi shA bI shud d+ha/ hUM badz+ra d+h+rig/ oM dzi nu dzig sraM rad na d+hig/ oM a ro lig/ hA pra dz+nyA d+h+rig/ mr-i d+hA tA shwa ri/ e dwe sha ra ti ma~M mo hA rat+ti/ b+he rA ga ra ti/ taM badz+ra ra ti/ k+Shi te rA dza ya/ traM a gar b+ha ya/ hriH
153a3: pad ma ba da ya/ d+hi ku ru pa na hr-i hUM la s+yai sa ma ya stau/ traM mA laM sa ma ya ho/ hI gi t+yai ra go he/ a nr-i t+yaM rA ga yeya mi// me d+ha ra na swA hA/ thi lAM ni sa raM pa ya swA hA/ hUM swa rA dza ya swA hA/ muM shrI a raM ga ya swA hA/ dza d+ha pe bri pra/
153a4: sha/ hUM puSh+pa a be sha/ paM dI pa suM ki na~M/ ho gan d+he tsid te/ hUM ya mAn ta krid dza phaT/ hUM bi g+ha nAn ta krid hUM phaT/ hUM pad mAn ta krid baM phaT/ hU~M pra dz+nyA na ta krid baM phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT
153a5: mahA ra da nat+ta ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM ma hA pad ma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT// oM ma hA kar ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsid ta hUM/ a a a badz+ra ba tra sa man ta oM/ oM mu ne kri swAhA/
153a6: oM mu ne hU~M dr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne su~M swA hA/ oM mu ne pr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne sha~M swA hA/ oM mu na ye swA hA/ oM e ha hi b+ha ga b+ha na/ ma hA ka ru NI ka tri sha ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHoM aHhUM swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dz+ra dz+wa dz+ra dz+ra dz+nyA/ sa
153a7: sa sa sa saM/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM AHhUM/ swA hA/ oM sgyu 'phrul dra ba gnyis med pa'i// gsang ba zab mo sku gsung thugs// gdod nas bdag dang dbyer med pa'o// da lta nyid du dbyer med shog/ oM badz+ra/
153a8: sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ste/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya to/ dza hUM ba ho zhes brjod pas sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mdzes bdag/ gnyis med ro cig 'dres nas kyang // stong gsum dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// oM A hU~M swAhA/

153b1: sems pa// b+h+yahA// d+hId+hid+d+hod+ha/ s+yA a A ma/ dz+dzaHnAd+ha/ n+dan+nad+hA d+hAhrAd+hAts+tsha/ bad+hU ba por bldan pas// gtso bo lnga dang gtsu myol// brel ba sum bcu rgya gnyis dang /
153b2: po khro mo dang / sgo bzhi rib 'bru ma la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa ra snying po mdzod// 'khor l-i gnyis rtsisaM rtsibs sku bcas// 'khyams dang skor bcas lha yi rim// rang rang phyag mtshan gdan dang bcas bzhu/
153b3: thabs tshul bzhin gnas pa'o// de nas rgyal ba de dag gi/ dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la// dbang bskur byin rlabs bya ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i sngags ni gsung bar mdzad// oM ma hA shA n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma
153b4: haM/ oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Atra ko hi/ oM ma hA pra ta be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa man ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ang ma ko ha/ oM ma hA kri ta/ a nulA na badz+ra sA ts+tsha ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba
153b5: ta thA ga ma hA kA ya badz+ra sI b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsid ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko ha/ oM sa be ta thA ga ta ma hA a nur ka badz+ra sA thA ang mako ta/
153b6: oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pra dze badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad mako ha/ zhes brjod ye shes sgra gsung thugs// rtse gcig thim pas gsal bar 'gyur// tsid te 'og min 'bar ba'i gnas// rin chen 'bar ba rdzogs pa'i mdzod// mi shigs
153b7: thig le za ma tog/ rgyal bkun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// tsid ta'i khams lnga'i snying po la// bde ba'i thig le phra rags nyid// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid du// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por brjod// gad dngas ma ye shes lnga/ gang
153b8: mi phyed rdo rje ragasal/ / drag lnga ye shes bskyed pa dang / btsun mo dga' ba de'i ngo bor brjod// khams lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes nyid/ rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i thugs// rnam shes bzhir bcas thig la nyid/

154a1: thugs kyi sems pa nyid du bsha/ de yi gang la dbang myur ba'i// la bzhi thig le bde ba'i bcud// b+h+ra ma'i bde bar gang 'char ba// yul bzhi rim par bshad pa ste// dbang sgyur gnyis med gang yin pas/
154a2: yum 'brel ba'i da bor bshad// rdza bcud thig ler bcas pa'i ta naM// so sa'i nus par bcas pa nyid// gang la de dbang de ye phyir// 'din gyi yi rim par bshad// gang de khams lnga' ba 'i yis// mnyes dang thig le bkod
154a3: pa dang / / nam ma pa'i lags pa da/ nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te// zag med pa de ba'i rang bzhin gyis// phyogs bcu'i ning khams mnyes par mdzad// dgug dang bcing dang mnyem dang gsal// thabs lam bcud du 'brel pa
154a4: gsungs/ / gang de thabs chen gsal byas pas// lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs// bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba// ma lus 'joms las khro bo'o// bcud las 'das pa'i hUM gsum nyid// byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid// yul gsum
154a5: bral bas chos kyi dbyings/ / ma lus rnam dag kun tu bzang // dngas snyigs snying por 'brel pa yis// nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas pas// thig les btul nas bstan pa 'chang// sprul pa'i sku ru bshad pa yin// kun kyang ye shes
154a6: lnga yi ro/ / khyab pas gnas pas rgyas btab cing // ska srid pa chen sku gsung thugs// dran pa rtag tu gsal bzung ba'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// gseng rtse sna chog dri pa'i dbu phye nang rim pa da bu ce can/
154a7: po byin rlabs 'phags pa ste// yon tan byin rlabs kun gyi gnas// gsang ba'i pad ma'i rang bzhin du// rdo rje gnyis med thig le ral// rta zla zil ba'i theg la nyid// ban tshun 'dres pa rlung gis bye// gsang ba'i khams las
154a8: ye shes rol/ / snyigs ma'i phung po lnga dag nas// dngas ma lnga yi rang bzhin gsal// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs par gsal// gsang ba'i 'byung ba lngar bstan pa// dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes// rigs mchog yum gyi

154b1: phyag rgya lnga/ / snyigs ma bral ba'i dus na blta// thig le thugs kyi bde ba rnams// rang rang thig le bde bar gsal// ye shes rnam shes dngas ma rnams// bde ba chen po gsal bar shes// dam tshig bde ba'i chos kyis sgegs//
154b2: sgo gsum 'brel cing thig ler chags// gang du bde ba'i sgra bsgrags te// bskyod cing 'pho ba'i gar gyis mnyes// thugs gang thig le brten pa'i gnas// gang yul bde bar dbang byed pa'i// rten dang bcas pa'i bde ba yis//
154b3: rang rang thig le skyed par byed// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thugs dang thig ler bcas pa nyid// dgug 'dzin 'khyud cing gnas pa dang // thig le rlung dang stod smad bsdams// bskyod dang 'bebs pa'i thabs yin
154b4: te/ tshim dang thig le dor ba dang // ye shes gsal bas bde sems rgyas// rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar brtags// gsang yul dbang po reg pa dang // rnam shes gang yin ta krid de// bde ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas// rtag
154b5: chad mtshan ma bdag med pa/ / sgo ma'i rang bzhin gsang ba'i sngags// shes skyo ba den phyir gsang ba'i sngags// shes pa gsum 'das sgrib bsad pa// rang rig byed pa yin ces bya// rgun gsum zan pa'i chos dbyings
154b6: nyid/ / rtogs bya kun du bzang mor bshad// 'khor ba'i sa bon nyan mongs bcas// zil ba'i thig sngon lam bzhin du// thal sbyor thig le'i 'phro 'du yis// gsang ba'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston// sa bon thig le ma skyes
154b7: gzugs/ bstan pa rim pa gsum du bstan// 'dod pa'i yan lag sum brgya dang // drug bcu rtsa bzhi la sogs pas// tha mal zhon pa rang grol nas// rdo rje ze'u 'bru 'brel bskyed pas// rang 'bar thig le gzugs su chags
154b8: yab yum lnga phyi thabs kyis gzung / / nyi ma zla ba shar ba'i 'od// rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis// 'khor ba'i mun pa kun bsal nas// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gsal// de nyid gsang bar shes par bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus

155a1: ga bzhi bcu rtsa lngar gnas pa yi/ / thugs kyi rang bzhin snying po nyid// rang rang mtshon pa'i rtags yin te// rgyas dang bsdus pa'ang de bzhin du// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// dril bu pad ba rin po che// rdo rje/
155a2: 'dzin pa'i rim bshad pa'o// gzhan gang gnas su rdo rje shes// dang po thugs dang g.yon 'khyud pa'o// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad ma dkar po rdo rje che// ut+pal glu shing s+pho ti ste// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng
155a3: ba dang / / bi wang gar sgur pog me dang // byug pa so so rim shes bya// ni mgo rdo rje thong rgya gram// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho ta ho// 'od 'phro mnyam gzhag rdo rje thal// ye shes rtse lnga chos khams dril// thugs la brtan pa nyid
155a4: du gsungs/ / thub chen nges par phyag gnyis shes// seg par go mtshon bi wa brdab// sgrom stob s+pho ti chos 'chad tshul// me dpung bum par shes par bya// gzhan yang 'thun pa skabs kyis brtag/ mi mthun khyad par rgyas
155a5: par bstan/ / rdo rje rini chen pad ma dang // rgya gram dril bu brgyad shes bya// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' se gol// rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan so// pad ma 'khor lo ral gri lce// rgya gram khu tshur go cha mche// gzhan yang skabs dang 'thun pa
155a6: ste/ / rang rang don nyid rtse gcig pa'i// thugs kyis rtags su shes par bya// dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas// gcod dang mi phyed dga' ba dang // ma gos bde ba bskyed pa nyid// rnam par mi rtog rim par shes// /
155a7: yon tan skyed dang tha mal gcod// de bzhin ma gos ye shes nyid// so so yon tan cha las byung // rang rang rtsa bcud thig le'i dbyibs// so so nyid ltar rang gnas te// bde ba'i thig le nyid du shes// rang 'byung dngas ma'i thig
155a8: le nyid/ 'brel ba'i tshul gyis kun snang ba// khu ba rtsa'i dbyibs gzugs nyid// rang rang las dang rtog pa dang // snying po phyag mtshan dbyibs bzhin pas// bde chen thugs su gsal brtan pa// thugs kyi dus su shes par bya//

155b1: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le gsal ba'i rang bzhin las// thugs mtshan che ba'i ye shes nyid// dpag tu med par rab sdang ba// bde ba chen po'i thig le'i 'od// ma lus de der snang ba nyid// ma lus gnyis med
155b2: thig le yi/ / bde ba chen po'i ye shes lnga// de las phye bas mtshon pa'i sgo// thugs kyi rang rtags bsam ma khyab// bde ba thugs las gzhan ma yin// gang phyir dkyil 'khor 'di dag kyang // thun mong gnas su bsgoms/
155b3: pa dang // mi shigs thig le'i snying po la// sku gsung thugs nyid gsal bar bya// don dam thig la ba rtse la// rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar bya// nas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir// bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bshad//
155b4: ga'i rim pa ji bzhin gyis// rang snying rgyu yi sa bon tAM// dag pas rim pas gsal ba la// rang rgyud 'byung lnga nyon mongs lnga// rang 'byung lnga ru spang ba'i phyir// 'byung ba lnga nyid bsgom par bya// e ya raM su ke nga raM/ so sa/
155b5: las rnams byas nas ni// nam mkha' gru gsum zla gam rlung // khrag gi dpa' klong 'khrug pa dang // gti mug ro dang nga rgyal ri// zhe sdang me nyid bsnyem par bya// mdog kyang rim par shes bya ste// las dang rang bzhin shes
155b6: bzhin brtag/ bruM las dur khrod gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng dang // bar khyams gnyis ni sgo dang bcas// thod phreng sbrul gyi zar chags// zhing gi gdung dang ka ba ste// sprin nag dur khrod rgya dang
155b7: bcas/ / khro mo bdud rtsi lha mo dang // thod pa lnga gsum rtsig pa can// nyi zla'i rgyan can bsam byas la// dregs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang // dri za gshin rje gzhon par bcas// de bzhin bsal bar bsgom par bya//
155b8: gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// cho ga las byung rim pa yis// gnyis med gsal bas de brten phyir// dbang bskur byin rlabs rim bzhin bya// sbyor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis// gdug pa ma lus btul nas ni// rang

156a1: rang rim pa gsal gyur nas/ / hUM gis phyogs phyogs gdan la bzhugs// ha brgyad sa bon las byung ba// dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs// rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma// lbos mo dang ni gtum mo dang // sme sha
156a2: can dang ma tshogs ma'i/ / so so'i cha lugs rngam 'thon nas// sprul pa bzhi po la tha ma zhing // rang rang las mdzad snying po sgrogs// 'dus te phyogs phyogs gnas par bya// he brgyad sa bon las byung ba// stag dang seng ge wa dang
156a3: khyi/ / bya rgod rkang ka 'ug pa dang // pho rog la sogs 'phra men rnams// 'phro 'dul las dang phyogs mdog mtshan// rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin bas ma// phaT bzhis rta dang phag gdong dang // sbrul dang spre'u gdong rim pa bzhin// las
156a4: dang sku mdog phyag mtshan yang / / rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin// de dag 'khor lo dbus dang lnga// yab yum phyag rgya 'brel bar gnas// rtsibs mtshan gru chad bzhi dag la// gnas kyi ma mo dgod par bya// bar 'khyams dang por
156a5: 'phra man brgyad/ / phyogs mtshams rim par dgod par bya// sgo bzhir sgo brngam tshul gnas// bar 'khyams tha ma dag la ni// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul nyid// rim pa bzhin du
156a6: bkod par bya/ rin chen thod pa'i dbu rgyan dag/ gnas skabs dag tu 'tshal bar bya// sku gsungs thugs kyang de bzhin te// yan lag dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// gang phyir nam mkha'i ye shes nyid// spros med dam pa nyid du 'dod//
156a7: bde ba'i thig les kun khyab la// chos nyid snying rje kun du snang // thig le rang snying sa bon rgyu// zag pa med pa'i snying po yin// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po can// thi gi le gong 'og kun dang 'brel// gnas pa khong stong tshul dag gi//
156a8: ma lus kun la khyab pa yin// dz+haiM sgo g.yo ba'i sa sgo can// skyod dang las kyis khyab byed pa// lus khyab gnas dang las dag ni// khyad par so sor snang ba yin// de steng ti la ka'i rang bzhinani// 'bar ma brgyad dang ldan pa nyid//

156b1: zhu dang 'bar ba'i las byed pa/ drag mo zhes kyang 'dod pa yin// thig le sgo nas 'dzag pa'i bcud// gsher dang 'dzag pa'i bam snying can// sdang dang bebs pa'i rang bzhin can// lus can gnas pa gsal bar bya// gang la gang rten
156b2: de yi rten/ thig le rtsar bcas bde ba'i rten// de nyid bskyed dang gnas gyur pa// brten pas sa yi dkyil 'khor nyid// 'khor lo gzhal yas rang bzhin te// rim pa gong 'og 'brel pa can// lus la gnas pas dur khrod de/
156b3: kha dog rtsa dang bcud 'dus pa'i// rgyan dang gdan du ldan pa nyid// gang la rten pa'i thig le nyid// gnyis med bde ba chen po'i lha// sa bon yi ge bde ba yis// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa nyid// gcig kyang khams lnga'i bde ba'i
156b4: ros/ / ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas// lus la thig le chen po gnas// gnas dang bcud dang bde ba nyid// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// nam mkha'i ye shes dpag tu med// 'jug pa bzhi dang rim pa brgyad//
156b5: thig le gcig gis khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs zad pas zad byed de// dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar nyid// yul dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin las// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // gnas kyi thig le bde ba can//
156b6: dur khrod ma brgyad gsang ba ste// gnyis med 'phra men nyid du bshad// thig le thabs dang bcas pa nyid// dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i sgo dang 'brel// snying po thig le nyid du sbyor// gang dang lhan cig skyes pa las// bde ba chen po skye
