156b7: pa med/ / ma lus bde ba chen po nyid// khyab pa rgya yongs ma chad pa'o// ma lus 'dus pa'i bde ba'i ro// sa yang bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha'// rang 'byung khyab pa chen po'i gzugs// kun 'dus shig le chen por
156b8: gsal/ / rnam thar gsum ldan e yi gzugs// bde ba bskyed dang thig le bskul// 'phro dang bsdud dang bsdams pa'i rlung // rdo rje pad ma 'dus pa'i sa// rten dang bral ba bde ba'i sa// shu kra thigi le gang gsher ba//

157a1: gsang ba chu yi rang bzhin yin// de dag phyag rgyas gang sbyar bas// bde ba'i drod ni rang 'bar skye// b+h+rUM las gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma rtog/ sna tshogs 'dus pa'i snying po can//
157a2: khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min te// yon tan rdzogs pa'i dngos gzhi can// dga' bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo dang ldan// 'bab 'dzag thig le'i sgras dang ldan// bde banyi zla rgyal ba bzhugs// thig le 'dres pa bde ba'i// 1
157a3: 'brel ba'i bde ba'i lha/ / 'thung dang rngub pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor ba'i sa bon zad byed pas// zad byed khro bor de bshad pa'o// dpag med thig le'i rang bzhin gang // sa ya bcu gsum po zang na// bde ba chen po ya
157a4: shes gzugs/ / sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig bzhugs// 'du shes gsum ldan byin rlabs te// gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas// dbang thob rnams la rgyas btab po// gsang ba thig le chen po ni// rang 'byung bde ba
157a5: chen po nyid/ / rnam rtog rgyu ba chad pa yi// rdo rje pad ma'i bar na gnas// 'og sgo snying po pad ma ni// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// gsang ba sku gsung thugs nyid du// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gnas// ma lus/
157a6: 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// gnyis med bcud du gyur pa na// de yi bde ba chen po nyid// khyab pa'i tshul gyis gang bar bzhugs// ye shes rgya mtsho lhan cig skyes// gsang ba'i thig le bde ba'i ro// nyi zla 'dres pa'i tshul gyis snang //
157a7: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad// de nas rgyal ba thams cad kun// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par// rdo rje khro bor snang gyur te// bskyed cig gdug pa 'dul ba yi/
157a8: drag po lha yi sngags dag dang // de yi gzhal yas snang bar mdzad// b+h+rUM pa~M shwa bi shud d+he/ dz+nyA na kA pa la dan pany+tsahUM/ ma hA de bstir baM/ Ur+ya tsan tra maN Da la hUM// de steng so so'i sgra nyid dag/ gsal ba'i rim pa dgod

157b1: pa bya/ oM b+hu bah+ma shI he draka ma hAn ta u0f7f sarba duSh+TAn ta ka han datab tsa ts+tsha tA paH/ oM badz+rA mad+ha shrI he ru ka pa hA tsata ra sarba du Sh+TAn ta ka na da ha ba tsa hU~M dz+dza d+ha phaT/ oM dang namahA shrI hi da ka ma hA tsaN Na sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsats+tsha dz+dza hU~M phaT/ ma~M pad+ma mahA shI tsaH
157b2: kam hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsu hUT+Ta hU~M phaT/ oM kar+Na mahA shrI he ru/ ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra dang kro d+hi shwa dza la na hUM phaT/
157b3: oM ma hA sA d+ya ngan ma hAkro d+hi shwa ba dam hU~M u0f7f/ oM shI sha ta sa man ta pad ma ma hA krota/ shwa ri ba'i hU~M phaT/ oM sarba a mo ka ma hA d+hi sha bi sha sha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ko rata/ badz+ra tsi ta/ badz+ra pra mo hAH
157b4: badz+ra pa ta li ti/ badz+ra puka sita/ badz+ra g+ha sma riH/ badz+ra sma sha ni ha/ badz+ra tsaN Da liH/ badz+ra sa~M ha muShI he/ badz+ra b+ha kri muShI he/ badz+ra sril mu khI he/ badz+ra shon mu ShI he/ badz+ra kr-ita mu ShIH/ badz+ra ka~M ka mu ShIH
157b5: badz+rakaka mu Shi h+ya he/ badz+ra u li ka muSh+Ti he/ badz+ra u li ka mu ShI he/ badz+ra ar+ya te tse ting tsa/ badz+ra a mo g+ha d+h+waM/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra basmi sa ma ya ba to hoH// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo d+d+ho b+h+yo b+h+yo// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+hU d+b+ha b+h+yoT+Ta b+h+yo// b+h+yo b+ho b+hu b+hU ts+tsha b+h+yo b+h+yo/
157b6: b+hu b+hu b+hu b+h+yo b+ho b+ha b+ho// badz+ra ma nu rak+Sha si/ badz+ra prabA ni/ badz+ra r-iNi/ badz+ra biSh+pe be/ badz+ra kr-i ma ri badz+ra in+dan/ badz+ra sud+ya ye/ badz+ra bi dag lam/ badz+ra sau me/ badz+ra a mita/ badz+ra d+han dam badz+ra dak+Sha se/ badz+ra bag sha saM badz+ra raH
157b7: badz+ra dra ti ma ta~M/ badz+ra e ka dza raM/ badz+ran mo ha daM/ badz+ra si ti kaM badz+ra pa ya b+he/ badz+ra ma hA mA ran/ badz+ra ag+ne badz+ra ba hi/ badz+ra tsa man+ti/ badz+ra pA dza na/ badz+ra ba ru ni badz+ra ma hA ka la/ badz+ra tsakral badz+ra sum pa ka lan/ badz+ral ma po d+hang /
157b8: duswa ru lu hU~M/ mahohi mnam rtsu bto/ ra~M/ oM badz+ra gro d+ha ya ma badz+raM/ oM krol khros pas ni mdzad pa// thugs rjes mod pa la rnam pa'i tshags// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs mang po che/ de nyid du ni bdag la

158a1: phyogs ba ma sa sa t+ya oM badz+ra kra d+ha sa ma ya baT/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+has ma ya ho// ma li/ u li ta la ta pa li dang Sh+Ta g+hon ra trA~M/ ba ra ya ga ni khA u0f7f ho// drug te bar sbyor// gsang sngags drag ces bu las ni// phyogs pargya
158a2: tshig cang rab tu tshig/ kun du rab tu tshig par gyur// 'bar dang rab 'byam kun du 'bar// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor khro tshogs kyis// gang zhig rab gang kun du gang / 'khrugs dang rab 'khrugs kun du
158a3: 'khrugs/ / 'thor zhing rab 'thor kun du 'thor// 'gul zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba yi// spra bo che yang sgrogs par byed// phyogs bcu'i gdugs pa ma lus pa/ thul zhing brgyal nas myos gyur te/
158a4: de dag bde bas bslang byas te// bde ba chen po dgyes pa'i gar// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par// rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs kyis byed// rdo rje gsang ba rang bzhin las// thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor
158a5: bsgyur/ / gdong nas thig le'i rang bzhin nyid// ma bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid/ ma lus thig ler rgyas btab pa// nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid// ma lus bde ba'i thig le nyid// khyab pa chen po'i rang bzhin te/
158a6: mtha' dbus bral ba bde ba che// snying rje chen por brjod pa yin// kun gyi rgyu ni thig la ste// ma lus sa bon rtsa ba nyid// mi shigs snying kha'i pho brang nyid// ye shes rdzogs pa'i gzhan yas khang // nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan
158a7: nyid de/ / rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas so// nyon mongs gdug pa'i gdan khri nyid// gdul bya thub pa nyid du bstan// phung po nyon mongs lnga dag pa// rgyal po lnga yi rang bzhin te// rang snying dngas mar bcas pa nyid// dbang phyug/
158a8: lnga ru brjod pa nyid// rnam shes yul du bcas pa nyid// rten dang brten par bcas pa yi// bde ba 'brimen bcud drug nyid// byi lta nang lha dkyil 'khor nyid// dgug dang 'dzin dang thig les bsdams// thig le'i rang bzhin

158b1: gnyis su med/ / dbu ma'i thig le bcas pa'i lam// dbang phyug nam mkha' dbang mo tshogs// dbab pa nye ba'i tshul bzung nas// thig le dbab pa'i thabs bzhi yis// phab pas rang rgyud dngos po bsreg/ dran 'byung rig pa'i
158b2: bro 'du tshogs/ / bde ba chen po'i don la 'jug/ gnyis med thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar// sku gsung thugs su kun gsal bas// gnyis med thim pas mdzes par mdzad// rang bzhin bde ba'i dkyil 'khor kun//
158b3: rig pa nyams myong dbyings la thim// dran rtogs 'byung ba nyon mongs kun// tshig pa gsum tu shes par bya// ye shes bde ba chen po nyid// 'bar ba gsum du shes par bya// byang chub sems kyi bde ba yis// ma lus gang zhing
158b4: khyab par gyur/ / thig le gong 'og steng 'og nyid// thig le gong ma nyid 'og tu// 'og ma nyid ni steng du 'bar// gcig gnyis lus kun khyab par 'thor// lus dang rtsar bcas 'gul ba dang // ldeg cing 'bar ba'i bde bas
158b5: gang / / bde bas dbang bsgyur tshim pa'i sgra// ma lus khyab par sgrogs par byed// sku gsung thugs kyi b+ha ga nyid// bde ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings// 'byung bzhi rdo rje pad ma nyid// reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba nyid// re dogs sna
158b6: bachad pa nyid/ / de bzhin nyid du blta bar bya// thig le 'dres pa'i bde ba yis// sa yang bcu gsum khyab pa'i yid// ma lus mkha' ltar dri med pa'i// rang 'byung phyogs med kun du snang // thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis//
158b7: 'byung bzhi rim pa'i dngas ma ste// sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags// b+ha ga pad ma'i snying po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bzhugs gnas bde ba chen po'i rten// sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod// phung po lnga dang nyon mongs
158b8: lnga/ / ye shes lnga yis zil gyis gnan// nyi zla pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid// thig le phrad pa'i dus nyid na// ye shes lnga yi ro dang ldan// gdul bya 'joms

159a1: ba'i khro bo lnga/ / 'byung lnga dbang phyug rnam par bstan/ myong dang yul bcas rnam shes yul// 'gra men nyid du shes par bya// phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sbyor ba ba'i// sgor bcas nyid du shes par bya// skal tshigs 'jug
159a2: thig le nyid/ / dbang phyug bde bar shes par bya// gnyis ka phyogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bde ba chen po spyan drangs pas// rtog pa'i bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jug/ rim pa gnyis med brda mja' mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi thig le
159a3: nyid/ / gnyis su med par thig par mdzad// rnal 'byor dbang phyug pho mo kun// bde ba chen po mnyes par gyur// sangs rgyas gab che snying po la// ma lus bde ba'i rang bzhin ldan// thig le gnyis med bde ba'i ro// ye shes lnga
159a4: ldan zag pa med/ / phyi nang gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las// lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar 'gyur// sa ya bcu gsum gnyis 'dus pa'i// thig le rdo rje'i
159a5: rang bzhin nyid/ / gnyis med 'khril pa zhes bya ste// rang rig bde ba chen por thim// sangs rgyas rin chen de yi dbyig/ kha sbyor snying po za ma tog/ sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang las// ma lus thig le gnas par mdzad// sku
159a6: gsung thugs kyi pho brang ni/ / bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid de// rdo rje snying po rtsa dang 'brel// gnyis med bde ba'i thig ler gnas// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud nyid de// gsang ba yon tan rdzogs pa'i
159a7: mdzod/ / snying po'i lam la gnas par bya// rdo rje zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// gnyis med thig les gang ba yi// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'char// brten las byung ba'i rten can nyid// gang la gang gis mnyam sbyar bas//
159a8: zas chen ma 'ang byung ba yi// bde ba chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid// rang rang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// gdul bya'i ngo la dgongs mdzad de// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad// rdo rje rdo rje dril bu

159b1: dang 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs/ / de bzhin 'khor yug bcas pa 'dags// bzhin 'khor lo dgra sta dang // brnga rab tu 'tshal ba'o// nor bu rin chen rtswa zhags dang // rdo rje dgra starab tu rdebs// chags mchon/
159b2: pad ma chen po dang // dril bu rnga yi sgra sgrogs pa'o// las ni ral gri shol chen dang // 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa ste// bar ma rdo rje dud dmar 'jug/ ster chen po rab rdebs pa'o// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo yang //
159b3: 'khril bas pad ma rag tu stog// gnas dang yul gyis phyag rgya ni// byis dbyug mda' gcu rgyal mtshan dang // byas snod de rje za rdeg tshul// khyis snod dung dam dbyis r+b+ba dang // mgo lus 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas/ ste
159b4: 'og phyi nang snol ba dang / / byis ldag khog pa dral zhing lta// rgyu mgo zhing khur rgyu gri dang // rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrogs dang // dral bu 'khrol bas slong bar byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i
159b5: tshegs/ / bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyis zhes na chas te gnas// kun kyang mdzes pa'i rgyan dang bcas// zhal 'dzum steg mig 'khril tshul can// dbu skra ral pa ltang lo
159b6: bcings/ / shad pa yi klu len cing // dmar la rdul lde ma chags pa'i tshul// snam zheng che la rked pa phra// nu 'bur stong smad bye zhing 'gyed// dmar la klan zhing 'dud tshul can// gus dang steg pa'i ngang tshul 'chang//
159b7: so so'i gdan la 'khod pa ni// srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang // tshangs ma dmar sar pad ma bsnams// lha chen kar lang tri shul// gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang// gzhon nur dmar mo mdung thang 'phen// brgya byin
159b8: dkar me i na 'dra gdengs/ / rdo rje ser mo tsa na dan 'thung / bdud rtsi dmar mo pad ma snams// zla ba dkar mo bun ta ri// be con ljang gnag dbyug tho 'phyar// srin mo dmar mo du dakhrag 'thung // za ba ljang nag pa su 'dren// dga' ba dmar

160a1: mo ka tar 'chang / / stobs chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma// rdo rje ser mo spu gri gcod// 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor bsrungs dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar// gsod
160a2: byed dkar mo ral gri so/ / me mo dmar mo gsal shing 'chang // phag mo nag mo mche zhags can// rgan byad dmar mo zhing chung za// sna tshogs dkar mo thod khrag 'thung // chu lha dmar ser sprul zhags 'dzin// rdo rje nag mo
160a3: lcags kyu 'dzin/ / rdo rje ser mor mgo zhags// rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// rdo rje ljang gnag dril 'khrol 'gying// so so brjid pa'i stabs ldan pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// rnam par spro ba'i rgyas pa'i phyir// sku
160a4: dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang / / yon tan phrin las khro ba'i phyir// lnga bcu brgyad ldan bye brag lnga// sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang // sku mdog bzhugs tshul rim pa dag/ rim rnams ji ltar 'gyur ba brtag/ de ltar bsams
160a5: dang bris pa dang / / brjod dang mos pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar 'tsham par bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// rngam pa'i zhal gdangs spyan zlog cing // mche gtsigs phyogs bcur gom pa yis//
160a6: 'jigs pa'i skang skyabs ga ma pas// 'jigs byed btsun nam par 'gyu/ a ma a ma ma ma a a am// babababababab babab/ d+had+d+had+haHd+d+had+hAd+hadz+nyAH/ u0f89u0fa4// ts+tsha d+d+ha d
160a7: +had+had+haH/ hUM ka ra bi dza ya/ ni la daN Da/ ya mAn ta ka ar+ya a tsa la// ha ya grI ba a pa rA dzIta/ a mri ta kun Da li/ trai lo kya bi dza ya ma hA pa la/ hUM hUM hUM hU~M hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT
160a8: phaT/ 'di dag mngon du phyung ba yis// ri bos bzhi 'gul byed cing // rgya mtsho ma lus 'khrug pa dang // sngags kyi sgra chen grag par 'gyur// hUM mdzad rnam rgyal dbyug sngon can// gshed po mi g.yo rta mgrin dang

160b1: gzhin 'joms bdud rtsi khams gsum rgyal/ / stobs chen khro bo 'di dag gis// rang rang bgegs kun rnam par gzir/ ma lus 'jigs shing 'joms par mdzad// gardza gardza/ ha na ha na dA ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ba rad+ha
160b2: hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tshin da tshin da/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang // blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// skal pa'i
160b3: me ri nang rol tu/ / this 'am bas ma 'am dmigs bya ba// mthing ka dkar po mthong nag dang // ljang sngon dmar gnag dud kha ldeng // dkar ljang dud dmar mdog tu sdang // khro bo lus dang grib mar gnas// 'khor lo rkye rdo rje
160b4: stir/ / drang srong 'bar bar bcas pa dang // gshin rje'i rkang bzung zhing dbyug 'phyar// ral gri bden bral stir dbyug gshog/ ba dan brgyad thogs be ram nyid// rin chen ni mgo gsum gyi dbyug/ rdo rje rtse gsum ni mgo
160b5: dang / / zong gshol gtun shing g.yas g.yon thogs// yang na zhal sum phyag drug ste// blo ldan rnam par bsams nas ni// bgegs dang gdug par rnam par 'jig/ pho brang 'khor dang rnam par sgom// de nas gzhan
160b6: yang bshad bya ba/ / rang lus rten dang brten pa yi// dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal bar brtag/ lte ba snying ste sku gsung thugs// thig gis cha chen cha chung bcas// gnas bzhi dngas ma 'byung ba ste// khog pa dur khrod gzhal
160b7: yas khang / / ka ba gdung dang rta babs dang // zla bre rdo rje rab dang // 'khor lo dra ba dra phyed dang // nyi zla skar khung rdzing bu dang // bskyed shing g.yas g.yon 'khor lo brtsegs// cod pan nyi zla pad mar bcas// rgyal ba bzhum
160b8: pa'i gzhal yas khang / / rang byung rtsi ta'i 'khor lo na// thig le ye shes lnga bdag nyid// ma lus thig le 'dus pa'i ngos// cho 'phrul stan dang gdug pa 'dul// so sor 'khor lo dgod pa yi// ting 'dzin rdzogs pa'i tshul

161a1: du bsgom/ / 'byung bzhi dngas ma yum nyid de// bde ba'i dngas mnam mkha'i khams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rang bzhin khams lnga'i rang bzhin bcud // zla ba nyi ma gnas pa yi// shrI ra tsi ti 'khrig le
161a2: nang gi gdug pa 'joms pa dang / / spyod yul bde bar sbyar pa dang // thig le so sor dgod par nus// phye bas rim pa'i 'khor lo ste// bdus pas thig le chen po nyid// thig le ye shes lngar ldan pa// thabs nyid dngas ma
161a3: yum du bshad/ / rnam shes thig le nyams myong nyid// tha mal 'joms pas khro mor snang // gnas kyi thig le tsar bcas pa// 'phra men nyid du shes par bya// gnas bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo nyid de// sgral tshogs la rten bde ba'i
161a4: bcud/ / phro zhing snang ba dbang phyug ma// gnas rten bcu yi thig le la// 'joms pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed// nyams myong skye dang rnam pa med// spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad// zla ba nyi ma la rten te// sku gsung thug/
161a5: gyilam rgyud de// thig le g.yo dang 'bar ba dang // ri dogs med dang rnam par dran// bde ba'i yan lag bzhi ru 'gyur// 'khrud pa gar gyi phyag rgya bzhis// rdo rje snying po'i pad mar 'brel// bskyed pa rlung dang mnyam sbyar bas//
161a6: nyi ma zla ba dus cig 'char// de nyid kun du khyab pa las// ma lus lhan cig skyes par 'gyur// bde ba chen po gnyis med pa// kha sbyar bsrub pa'i thabs las skyes// thabs las byung ba'i gsang thig le// ma lus 'dus pa
161a7: bcud kyi 'o/ / rten las rten can nyams myong ba// lhag pa'i ye shes thabs las skyes// chos dbyings la sogs ye shes lnga// thugs nyid mtshon phyir mtshan ma ste// gang la rten dang 'bar dang 'dzag/ bde ba'i rlung dang
161a8: nam mkha'i khams/ / de bzhin btsun mod gyes skyed pa// mi phyed gnyis med lhan cig pa// gang de thabs las byung ba yi// dngos gnyis yul dang dbang po'i tshogs// lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le nyid// ma lus bde bar

161b1: rang snang ba/ / gnyis med 'dus pa'i stobs las byung // gnas yul phyag rgya'i thig ler bstan// dgug dang 'khyud dang bsdang dang 'bebs// ye shes 'jug pa'i sgo yin te// skal tshigs rgyud pa'i thig le'i rgyun// dbang
161b2: phrug mar ni shes par bya/ / ba spu thig le 'bral ba nyid// 'phra mo bsam mi khyab snang ba// grangs las 'das pa'i phyag rgya ste// bsam byas nam mkha'i zhing du sbyar// sku bzhi las byung gsang thig le// khams gsum
161b3: bcud 'dus bde chen po/ / yungs kar lhung med brtan pa las// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang // thig le bde chen thabs sbyar ba// thob dang goms pa'i rang bzhin las// zhen pa'i 'du shes bral 'gyur bas// rang dbang
161b4: med pa'i rtags 'byung ste/ / sbar zhing mnan pa'i cho ga bya// snang dang rig pa sna tshogs chos// bde ba chen po'i thig ler brten// nyi ma'i snying po lta ba ltar// bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don// ma lus bde chen rgyan du skad
161b5: de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad/ / 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ji snyed ma lus chos bstan pa// rang 'byung ye shes chen po ste// de nyid dngos po sna tshogs mchog/ ji snyed brten g.yo snang ba'i chos//
161b6: chen po rigs pa gnas pa'i chos// ma lus kun la 'thun snang ba// rang 'byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// de dag gdod nas ma skyes pa'i// rdo rje shes rab stong nyid de// gang yang dngos min ngo bo nyid// shes rab yum gyi rang
161b7: bzhin no/ / ji snyed nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// rang 'byung byang chub sems kyi gzugs// ma lus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dpag med 'thun par sdang ba ste// me long dang pa'i rang bzhin nyid// sna tshogs gzugs dang
161b8: 'grel ba bzhin/ / ma lus rig pa'i thig le las// ma lus sku yi dkyil 'khor snang // ji snyed rab 'byams ma lus pa'i// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang / zin dang ma zin gnyis ka'i sgra// nges pa dang ni ma nges pa'i//

162a1: 'khrul dang ma 'khrul sna tshogs pa// brjod dang bsam dang 'phrul pa dang // byin rlabs mtha' yas rang snang ba// byang chub sems kyi gsungs mchog ste// nam mkha'i sgra dang brag cha ltar// rang rgyud med
162a2: pa'i rig pa nyid/ / bsam pa mtha' yas ji snyed par// ma lus gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang rgyud brtan po min par gnas// gang du nam mkha' mthas klas par// bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar// nam mkha'i char
162a3: dang chu bur dang / / sprin dang chu rlabs phung po ltar// ye shes bde dang sdug sngal dang // nges dang ma nges dam pa dang // dman dang chags dang chags bral dang // zin dang zhen dang ma zhen dang // rnam pa rnam med brtags pa'i chos// dran
162a4: rtog rig pa gang yang rung / / ma lus rig pa rang snangs pa// snga ma dran pa'i rnam pa'am// rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams myong ltar// sna tshogs snang yang rang rgyud min// gang yang rang rgyud kun bral ba'i// ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa
162a5: rnams/ / rang rgyud med pas gzugs brnyan te// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rang 'byung ye shes skye 'gag med// ma lus mi phyed rdo rje'i gzugs// rnam pa mthar thug med pa//
162a6: nyid// yon tan lhun grub rang snang bas// de yi brnyan ma rang bzhin 'char// mtha' thal rang 'byung dkyil 'khor ni// cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir// yang dag brtan par mi gnas pas// ma lus gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor
162a7: shar/ / bde chen rang 'byung lhun grub nyid// yon tan rdzogs pa'i nor bu ltar// dpag med chos su sdang ba'i phyir// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan te// skye bo dag dang ma dag pa'i// gdul bya mthon dman rim pa la// rig spyad spro ba
162a8: skyed pa'i phyir/ / dang po nas bzung mthar thug par// rang rang bsam pa de bzhin du// de dag ngo la de ltar snang // gzugs brnyan gyi yi rim pa ste// thun mong yul du gyur phyir ro// ma lus tha dad med pa yi// phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs

162b1: pa'i lus/ / bcud ldan bde ba mdzad pa'i gnas// mi shigs thig le kun gyi dngos// rang 'byung bde ba chen po'i gzugs// dngas snyigs 'brel ba'i nus mthu las// zag pa yod dang med pa yi// dngos po gnyis kyi chas su
162b2: snang / / rgyu yi thig le'i rang bzhin la// nus pa'i khyad par so so yis// 'byung ba dang ni yum nyid dang // bde ba chen po la sogs pa// thig le nus pa'i stobs las snang // ma lus 'khor lo'i snying po nyid// thig le 'bar
162b3: ba bde ba'i gzugs/ / rtsa yag bye brag bcas pa ni// bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ba// ma lus brten can dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus snod bcud kun du snang // thabs chen gsang ba'i rim pa nyid// khams
162b4: bzhi las brten thig le nyid/ / g.yo dang 'dzag cing gnas dang thim// bye brag gsum las rgyud pa yis// gru dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la// zhugs dang 'thungs pa'i spyod yul lam// me long dang pa'i ri bo yi// rtse byin ma
162b5: lus bltas pa ltar/ / bde che gzugs brnyan nyid du snang // rim pa bzhi yi thig le nyid// bde ba'i 'du byed gang bskul ba// gnas bzhi'i thig le'i bye brag gsal// mu tig phreng bas rgyus pa ltar// 'dzag dang 'bar ba'i
162b6: thig le nyid/ / til 'bru 'bras bu smin pa ltar// ma lus til gyi phung po ltar// thig le'i lus gnas pa yin// nyams myong gsal bar 'bar ba'i tshe// 'dar dang rdul dang pa spu ljang // 'bar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i gang/
162b7: rnam par rol pa'i tshogs su snang // snang srid bde ba chen po nyid// tha ma la nub cing brtan gyur na// thig le nam mkha'i stobs kyis sbyang // rtse gcig nam mkha'i mthong stobs kyis// thig le stong par thim pa na// ye shes nam
162b8: mkha'i gzugs su nges/ / snang srid snod bcud ma lus kun// bde chen rig pa'i gzugs brnyan du// rgya mtsho 'dzings nas ltas pa ltar// ma lus de ltar snang ba yin// rig pas nyams su myong ba dang // spyod yul dag pas

163a1: nang du bshad/ / rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i gang zag gdul ba dang // gsang ba'i nyams myong mngon bstan phyir// thabs dang shes rab mngon par 'phrul// thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi// cho ga'i
163a2: bya ba kun ldan cing / / dbang bskur byin rlabs sbyangs pa dang // brgya phrag gsum dang drug bcu dang // drug bcu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa yis// chu skyes snying po rdo rje can// nyi ma me shel 'od 'byung ba// rang 'byung rlung gi phyag rgyas myod//
163a3: nor bu chu 'dzag rang dbang med// ma lus rig pa'i thig ler bsdus// rgyu ba'i rlung ni chang ba na// rig pa stong pa'i thig ler thim// a ta la rten thig ler rim// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin las// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par snang //
163a4: gsang ba'i thig le la rten pas// ma lus bde chen 'khor los sgyur// lus kyi thig le dang por te// de nas rig pa'i thig le yin// de nas ye shes thig le nyid// tha ma chos nyid thig ler thim// de nas dus gsum 'du
163a5: 'bral med/ / bde chen nam mkha'i khams nyid de// zab cing rgyu ba med pa yi// rang brgyud zhan chags kun bral ba'i// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan shar// ma rtogs khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan te// rtogs pas nyams myong //
163a6: gzugs rnyan nyid// mthar phyin ye shes gzugs brnyan 'di// dman dang yan lag ma tshang dang // dbang dang man ngag med pa dang // dka' thub can dang ma smin dang // skal med yal ba'i yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang chen
163a7: dam pa nyid/ / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid// tha ma la thod pa bskyed pa'i phyir// cho ga brgyas par bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'od kyang // ji bzhin mngon du gyur
163a8: la/ lhag par 'di yis rtogs 'gyur bas// lhag pa zhes ni bstan pa yin// gang gis gang la gang mtshon pas// lhag par mtshon par nye ba dang // gang la rten te gang bsgrubs pa// lhag par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// 'dis/

163b1: ni lhag pa nyid du brjod// gang las gang de thabs 'di yis// mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs// thabs de gang gis mngon ston cing // dngos gzhi nyid ma yin pa'i phyir// gzugs snyan nyid
163b2: du bstan pa yin/ / gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis// de nyid 'dra bar snang ba ltar// ma mthong mos pa'i 'dul bya la// de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid de// dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan no// rgyal ba kun gyi rang
163b3: bzhin no/ / dpag med ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i// ye shes rang 'byung lnga'i gzugs// zag med gdul bya'i ngo la snang // de yi yon tan gzug rnyan gyis// zag bcas mos pa'i gang zag la// sku gsung thugs
163b4: kyi rnam pa nyid/ / 'dra bar mtshon phyir gzugs bstan na// gang phyir chos dbyings ngo bo la// tha dad dbye ba mi gnas kyang // mos dang drag po'i dbang gyur te// gang gis gang de mi 'dus pas// thugs rjes kun la
163b5: khyab pa'i phyir/ / longs spyod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan// zhen pa can dang nga rgyal can// thabs dang drag pos tshar gcod phyir// de ltar so sor 'tsham pa ste// lhag pa gzugs bstan gnyis su bshad// gang du bkra shis
163b6: yid 'ong ba'i/ / steng 'og phyogs bzhi bar mtshams dag/ legs pas yid 'ong bar chad med// phyi nang ri'i dgon pa'i mchog/ rang gis gzhi legs brtags la// pra dang nyams kyi ltas brtags la// ma dag mtshan ngan spangs byas
163b7: la/ dag cing nyams dga' blang bar bya// sa bzhi byin brlabs bkra shis pa// gal te cod pa zhi bya'i phyir// snang dang mi snang bdag po la// mgu bas bar chad med par bslang // gang de dbang du bya ba'i phyir// cho ga'i yan sha can rtsam
163b8: te/ / mchod dang mnyes pas tshim byas la// sa bzhi bdag gis dbang du bya// thun mong skyon gsal dag byas nas// mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing // dngos grub myur zhing nyams dga' ba'i// phyi nang dag pa chen por sbyang //

164a1: rang bzhin byin brlabs kun gyi dngos// gdod nas ma bcos gnas pa la// lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med pas// lha dang gzhal yas ngo bor brlab// gang de'i bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba
164a2: la/ rdo rje khro bo'i 'khor lo spro// hUM bzhi sngags dang bcas pas bsrung // de dag legs par bzung ba'i phyir// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad de// las kyi bya ba kun rdzogs nas// rgyal bkun la gsol btab la// 'dod pa'i don rnams
164a3: grub pa'i bar/ / dngos grub gter du ming gis gzung // gang phyir bshad pa'i cho ga yis// ma dag pa dang ngan pa dag/ rtogs dang ting 'dzin cho ga yis// mnyam pas re dogs med par gnas// dkyil 'khor phyi nang bshad pa bzhin// tshad
164a4: ni rjes su 'thun pa ste/ / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// yang na sor bzhi tshad du ste// yang na 'dzub gang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum bzhi nyid// yang na bcwa brgyad nyid du'am// nyi shu lnga yi tshad du bya//
164a5: yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad de// rang gi rig pa rjes mthun par// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i tshad// tshad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor de// yid 'ong byug bdug nyi shu lngas// mdzes shing legs par byas nas ni// gang dang 'bral
164a6: ba'i tshig brtsam/ / gzhan du longs spyod ma byas pa'i// ras bal du khrod rgyu las byas// gsar zhing grims la 'jur mdud med// byin brlabs lnga dang sku gsung thugs// thim pas ye shes thig skud de// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya//
164a7: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gsad pa'i 'phro 'du de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor yid 'ong pho brangs// ma nor gsal bas thig tu bshad// gang gis gang mtshon de bzhin te// kha dog lnga dang phung po dang // khams dang skye mched rnam shes sogs
164a8: ye shes dkyil 'khor mtshon phyir ro/ / rtogs pas 'khor ba'i rgya dral phyir// mtshon zhes kyang ni brjod pa nyid// ma mthong rmongs la ston phyir mtshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am// lnga'i chen gyis bri bar bya// gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya

164b1: pad ma in Di ni la nyid/ / rin chen lnga dang ldan pa yis// mkhas pas 'byor ldan ci bder bri// yang na 'bras dang sa lu la// kha dog bsgyur bas de bzhin no// dman dang 'byor pa chung pa yis// 'byung khungs lnga yis bri bar bya// thabs dang
164b2: shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ / rgyal ba bcu nyid thim pa yis// ye shes rin chen phyi nang med// dag pa'i de bor blta bar bya// oM aM hUM swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa ra da na sa ma ye hUM// 'bru bcu srung zhing 'bum pa yi// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis
164b3: brlab/ / zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// ye shes rin chen rtsig pa ste// dra ba dra phyed rta babs dang // rdo rje zla phyed 'dod yon dang // rin chenas gzhi skyed shing dang // rdzing bu dril bu g.yer khas spras// rtag tu bri zhing bsgom par bya//
164b4: gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor la// thod pasna lnga sna gsum dang // thod skam rtsig pa'i rim pa bzhin// tshangs dang lha dbang la brten pa// mchog chen brgyad ni yin par 'dod// lhag ma rnams kyis thog phub ste// gza' brgyad nyi
164b5: zla'i klo skar ldan/ / sprul dang thod pa'i phreng ba nyid// dra ba dra phyed rnam par spras// phyi nang rgyu 'bras gdug pa dag/ gdul phyir rta babs bzhir bshad de// sor phreng thod pa'i phreng ba dang // dbang po nyi zla'i phreng bas spras// khro mo sha lnga bdud
164b6: rtsi dang / / dur khrod 'dod yon ldan pa'o// dur khrod sa gzhi khrag dang bcas// skyes bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad// rag ta'i mtsho brgyad rba rlabs 'khyil// thod tshal brgyus pa dur khrod rlung // 'jigs pa'i sgra dang me 'ong ldan//
164b7: zhing 'phan phyogs mtshams brgyad dang bcas// lha chen thod pa srub stongs na// tsi ta'i tog las 'od zer 'phro// he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus bri zhing bsgom par bya// ma lus 'gro ba'i re skor bas// rin chen 'phreng
164b8: dang rgyan du ldan/ / mi 'jigs stobs sogs kun ldan pas// stobs ldan theg par gnas pa yin// spyod la skyon gyis ma gos pas// pad ma 'bar bas mdzes par snang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// nyi zla mdzes

165a1: pa'i gdan la bzhugs/ / bde chen don las mi 'da' bas// 'khril sbyor dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// yongs rdzogs sku'i brgyan du gnas// lam dang byang chub yan lag
165a2: rnams/ / rdzogs phyir phreng ba las sogs tshul// thugs rje 'khor ba mi gtong bas// chu srin klu phrug bzung ba bzhin// thugs rje bar chad mi mda' bas// 'brel ba bar chad med par gnas// brtson 'grus 'khor ba spod pa'i phyir//
165a3: ri dgas dag ni mnyam par gnas// zag med spyan gyis kun gzigs pas// dge sdig spyan gyis gzigs par bstan// ma lus zil gnon stobs rdzogs phyir// bya khyung dag ni gnas par stan// chos kyi 'khor lo skor byas
165a4: shing / / nyon mongs tshad pa'i gdung sel bas// thugs rje gdugs kyi 'khor lo bstan// ma lus cig tu 'dus pas na// tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan// lha rnams so so'i rnam pa ni// sku mdog sna
165a5: tshogs bzhugs tshul dang / / gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyan du bcas// pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams// de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang // gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul nyid kyis// gtso 'khor phyi nang lta tshul gyis// bzhugs thabs rim
165a6: pa so sor bstan/ / rang rang snying po gang yin pa// kha dog so sor phye nas ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir// rim pa bzhin du gsal bar bya// rang rang thugs mtshan gang yin pa// kha dog dbyibs dang bcas pa nyid// tham
165a7: kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/ / rim pa ji bzhin dgod par bya// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // dung chen ras chen la sogs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo nyid// rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod// de bzhin nyid la
165a8: dmigs med de/ / stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid// gang la rtog dpyor mi gnas pa// chos dbyings de bzhin nyid du bsgom// bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid// ye nas khyab kyang ma rtogs pas// phyogs med snying rje nam mkha'

165b1: ltar/ / rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya// rang 'byung ye shes rnam pas ni// yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las// zhe na 'dzin sbyangs nas yig 'bru yi// 'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rims kyis bskyed// bram gis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas//
165b2: gzhal yas khang ltar yin par sgom// rnam pa'i gang yin de dag dang // rang rig sa bon gnyis med las// 'dres pas gang yin gtso bo nyid// bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// 'khor yang mi phyed 'dres par bsgom//
165b3: yongs rdzogs smin cing rtas pa la// dza hUM baM hos gnyis med de// 'dod pa mthar thug par du bsam// las kyi bya ba kun zin nas// thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang // kun bzang mchod pa la sogs pa// lha mo brgyad dang bcu drug gis/
165b4: chod pa'i rim pa tsam par bya// rin chen lnga dang rta glang dang // 'bru dang pad mdzod khang khyim dang // bu dang chung ma bran khol dang // gnas dang zhing dang na bza' dang // rgyan phred bzang btung longs spyod dang // rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang /
165b5: mtshe'u dang khron pa lu ma dang // ri dang de'u dang bskyed mos 'tshal/ khor yug dang ldan pa dang // skye bo mang po bro klu dang // nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i// mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par mchod// dpa' bo sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga//
165b6: bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang byug pa mchog/ dag cing legs par dbul bar bya// thar pa la sogs zhing gi mchog/ dngos dang lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis// bsgrub bya ma lus kun sgrol te// rdo rje zhing du bskyed par
165b7: bya/ / lha mo mi mo rag pa mo// cho ga'i sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin// dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde ba chen po rol mo yis// phyi nang nam mkha'ithams bkang ste// rin chen lha mo yo byad dang // reg pa mnyam myong bde ba yis// rgyal
165b8: sras zhing gi rdul snyed la/ / gnyis med dag pa'i tshul gyis mchod// rol mo glu dbyangs bcas pa yis// dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya// rdo rje gsung gi bzlas pa yis// mtshan ma legs par snang ba na// sbyang dang

166a1: byin brlabs dbang bskur dang / / mchod dang brtan pa'i cho ga dag/ rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya// dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs bzhi ru// rnam bzhi las kyi me thab la// dus bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis// lha bzhi tshul gyis
166a2: mchod par bya/ / de nas gnang thob dbang phyung nyid// dkyil 'khor zhugs shing nus ldan nas// thugs rjes 'khor ba bsgral ba'i phyir// skal ldan slob ma gzhug par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che//
166a3: mngon du mthong zhugs bsod nams gang // 'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin no// gang du sku gsung thugs ldan pa// gang du mos pas spro bskyed phyir// rgyal ba kun kyang 'phrul mdzad de// sgo gsum byin gyis rlob par mdzad// rnal 'byor
166a4: cho ga rdzogs pas kyang / / gdul bya zhi dang khro ba la// so so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa dag/ bris dang brdungs dang blugs pa dag/ so so'i gnas su legs par dgram// ma lus sku gsung thugs
166a5: dkyil 'khor/ / 'di las ma togs lha gzhan med// gang du dbang dang 'brel ba ni// bcwa lnga'i rim pas byin brlabs phyir// bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor la// yab yum bco brgyad nas par bya// bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil
166a6: 'khor la/ / bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya// nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la// rgyas pa'i cho ga rim par dgod// 'di dag lugs dang 'bur dang bzo// bri dang bsgom pa dag kyang rung // 'di ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro// zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil
166a7: 'khor ni/ / mthun mo thun mong ma yin pa'i// sor bzhi 'dzub gang la rten te// phyi rol rnam pa'i rjes 'brad min// mthong dang brtan dang goms pa ni// rim pa bzhin du gsal bas 'byung // rgyud pa lam gyi rim pa yis// mthar phyin
166a8: nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ / dbang bskur thabs kyi rim pa yis// byin brlabs man ngag yid ches bya// 'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te// de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang // thun mong tshegs la sbyar ba'i phyir// 'byung lnga rgyu

166b1: dang bdag nyid dang / / mkha' dag byin brlabs so sor gdon// rang gi cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar brtsams pa grub par 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs zhes bya bar bshad// gzhan yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas// gang 'dod mngon
166b2: du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ / 'chi med tshe'i dkyil 'khor dang // mtshan ma pri'i dkyil 'khor dang // dug 'joms bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang // cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa// gang bsgrub don phyir gang bshad pa// de nyid bsgrub pa'i dkyil
166b3: 'khor ro/ / las bzhi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// rigs dang 'thun pa'i sa gzhi la// thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can// phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan pas// rdo rje lus su brtan bya'i phyir// rgyad
166b4: grags dpag tshad la sogs pa/ / sku gsung thugs su mngon gsal ba// rnal 'byor skal ldan spyod yul de// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mtshan ma rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis//
166b5: mthong bya don la sgrib pas na/ de dag sbyang ba'i cho ga bshad// tha mal zhen pas brtags pa'i don// lhag pa'i bden gnyis rtogs bsgoms pas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg/ dkyil 'khor lha'i mtshan
166b6: ma dag/ rnam pa ji snyed gnas pa dag/ rang rig rnam par 'phrul pa nyid// mtshan ma thig le'i ngang du sbyangs// thig le rim pa'i snang tshul te// phyi nang med pa'i byang chub sems// dngos dang dngos med kun sbyangs te// rang rig byang chub
166b7: sems kyi me/ / phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la sdud// rnal 'byor las rung goms pa yis// gzhan don rtsom pa'i don byed na// dang por nyes byas gsum sbyang phyir// rnam gsum khrus kyi rim pa tsam// gdug pa 'dul ba'i//
166b8: dkyil 'khor gyis// bar chad bgegs dang dpal byas la// bkug bcings bstims la rnal du gzhag/ bsrung dang byug gdug rgyan gyis brgyan// 'khor ba'i sa bon kun bkod de// las kyi cho ga thim pa dang // dkyil

167a1: 'khor 'phro 'du rim pa yis/ / 'khor bal khon sbyang bar bya// de tshe sdong bu gnas bkod de// sdong bu rel lha rnams kyi// snying po chang bar gdags pa dang // gsol gdab gnang byin sras su bskyed// 'jug pang
167a2: dbang bskur las rdzogs nas/ / khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// las bzhi ma'i las byas nas// rtog tshogs lha gsum dbyer med pa'i// rang rang gnas su dag pa la// sbyin sreg glu bro gar gyis mchod// las kyi bya ba kun
167a3: bin nas/ / thig le chen po dngal bsdu// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// ma lus byang chub sems nyid de// de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya// chos rnams ma lus thams cad dang
167a4: dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun/ / tha dad dbye ba mi gnas te// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang 'byung mthon dman med pa yis// sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid// ma lus bzhi rtsa snying po ste// rang 'thung
167a5: byang chub sems la 'dus/ / de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba// dngos po ma yin dngos med min// gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med min// mtha' dbus cha shas kun bral ba'i// zab cing yangs la rgya che ba// de bzhin gshegs
167a6: pa'i spyod yul te/ / rtog gi rnams kyi yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsad// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid las
167a7: skye ba med/ e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gas // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma'i ngo mtshar med kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
167a8: kun gyi gsang/ / gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs//

167b1: dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsar// 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gre 'ong med// ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems// dngos med
167b2: dngos po'i rang bzhin du/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid// g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas pa yi// phyi nang snod bcu dam lus pa// rang 'byung sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang // bsams dang dmig
167b3: dang goms pa yi/ / sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang // lha dang lha min gsang ba dang // sha za' byung po mi 'am ci// grul bum yi dgas klu rnams dang // rgyu ba'i srog chags ma lus dang // rtsa shing gel pa 'bras bu dang /
167b4: phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa// macos don gyi lha nyid de// byang chub sems su khyab par med// lha zhes gzhan du bstan pa yin// tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zad// byang chub sems la gnyis med par// rtogs pa'i don la
167b5: cig tu bstan/ / snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang // gnas pa'i don dang ma phrad pas// ma lus snying rje'i gnas gyur pa// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// mi 'gal don du rab sbyor ba// kun rdzob byang chub sems su
167b6: brjod/ / ji snyed rnam par bcas pa'i chos// ma lus mtha' yas bstan pa kun// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin du// sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med// de dag ji ltar gnas
167b7: kyang rung / / byang chub sems las gzhan min yang // than mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad// rang lus phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la// rang 'byung 'khor lo drag gnas pa// g.yo ba yam gis bskyong byed pa// 'gro ba kun gyi
167b8: lus la gnas/ / 'phen dang sdad pa'i rang bzhin can// snyigs pa'i dus su 'ang bde ba 'char// smin pa gra gsum smad na gnas// rnam thar ska gsum rtsa bdud can// 'bar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gnas// rang

168a1: lus bde chen smin byed pa/ / de la gang rten bde ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rin chen gab rtse la// thung ngu a snying lte bar gnas// 'khrul zhing 'dzag dang gnas pa'i rtsa// rdo rje dbu ma'i lam dang 'brel// khyab cing rgyas
168a2: pa'i snying po can/ / sum bcu gnyis gnyis rtsa yig ldan// d+harma tsakra snying po'i gnas// rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad kyi dngos// dngas snyigs shes pa brgyad kyi rten// rngub bzhi yis shes par bya// dngas ma 'dus//
168a3: pa'i thig le nyid// a la brten pa'i hUM gi sdud// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// bde ba mngon shes chos nyid la// rim pas mthar byin 'byung bar 'gyur// bcu drug sgra sbyor thig le can// 'dab ma a li ldan pa yis//
168a4: ma lus sgra skad bdag nyid can// khyab pa gsung gi bdag nyid can// sde tshan bcu dang ldan pa nyid// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i lam yin te// thabs dang shes rab bskul ba yis// bde ba 'byung 'gyur the tshom med// sum bcu
168a5: rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor na/ / thig le de yi mnyam pa'i dbyings// ma lus 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig/ lus can kun la khyab par gnas// kun gyi dngos yin kun gyi rtse// ma lus kun 'dus gnyis su med// spyi tsug
168a6: 'dus pa'i snying po nas/ / rkang mthil gsang pa'i gnas yan chad// sku gsung thugs kyi ka bas bzung // snod bcud rgyud rnams rang bzhin bcud// dngas snyigs 'dres pa thabs kyis 'byed// g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas
168a7: mthar phyin/ / skad cig rim pa skye 'gyur ba// khams lnga 'dus pa'i ro yi stobs// sems lnga rim pas shes par 'gyur// 'di nyid gsum du bshad pa ste// skabs kyi rim pas sbar ba nyid// rtswa dang thig le bde ba yis
168a8: phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul du bshad/ / / de nas rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // bram ze gdol pa gar mkhan ma// yid 'ong na tshed dar la bab// nus dang chags pa che ba dang // bka' blo bde zhing yid mi 'khrug/ lus ran

168b1: shamadangs dkar dmar byed/ / gang snyan dran pas yin 'phrog ma// bcwa brgyad bcu drug bzub zhi dang // bcu gnyis ldan pa'i phra mo la// sbyor ba tshang zhing rtags thung nas// ba mal spangs pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa yang
168b2: bcu gsam gnyi ldan pa'i/ / sang dbang 'dus pa'i khams lnga las// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel ltar// babs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// nyi mthab ce zad pa'i// ma lus 'dus pa'i rtse 'khor lo// 'brung 'jug
168b3: gnas pa rlung dang 'grogs/ / ldang bas pa mal shes pa 'gag/ g.yo bas nyams nyid rtse cig pa// smon pas yid cig 'dres pa ste// 'jug pa dzaHhUM baM hoHste// shes pa bde bar 'jug pa nyid// gnas pas yun ring gnas
168b4: pa ste/ / mthar byin 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// brjod bral thig le'i bstan pa 'char// ba mal zhen pa nub gyur nas// zhen pa ldog cing rig pa ze ma// rnam shes rgyal ba la sogs 'byung // yid 'ong gzi ldan phyag rgya ma//
168b5: mthong bas lus sems bde ba dang // zad pas sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur// dres pas bde ba brgyan po 'thung // babs dang ldan pas snang gyur na// bskal par sbyangs pas mi 'grongs pa'i// nam rtog zhen pa log
168b6: nas/ / da ltar bde ba chen por smin// thob pa brtan 'dod rnal 'byor pas// mthong dang thos dang lhan cig gnas// 'khrud dang zad dang spyad pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes skye// dbang dang mi ldan skal ngan dang // dman pas/
168b7: mi rtogs yul min pas// gsang ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rim pa'i ting 'dzin mapar phyin nas/ su dang gsung dang thugs ldan pa'i// tshem tha gsum par ldan pa yaM// sum bcu'i dkyil
168b8: 'khor bsgom par bya/ / gang du rgyas pa'i dbang gyur la// rigs lnga ye shes lngar ldan cig/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// bdun bcu'i rim pa bsgom par bya// mos chung gsang bar spyod 'dod pas// chom bu cig pa'i

169a1: dkyil 'khor te/ / bcu 'am yang na bcwa brgyad pa'i// tshom bu tha ma bsgom par bya// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor kun 'dus pa'i// tshogs kyi 'khor lo sgom par bya// du gdug pa 'dul ba li/ kyil long rim pa de bzhin ta/ mi
169a2: pa bskur ba'i khro bo ni/ / rim pa ma 'dres tsam du bsgom// rnal 'byor yo byad tshogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin spyod tshogs pa// ma lus tshogs pas tshogs zhes bya// dang por ded dang brtson 'grus dang // dam tshig
169a3: lta sogs sngon song zhing / / rim bzhin ting 'dzin mthar phyin pas// nus pa yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// skal ldan drod tshad mnyam pa 'am// mi ldan 'phro 'dus sbyangs pas grub// rab tu dben zhing yid 'ong ba// ri rtse gsang
169a4: 'dab chu gling ngam/ / dur khrod ri bor nags 'dabs te// skye bo 'dus dang rnam bral zhing // bar chad bral ba'i sa phyogs der// rnal 'byor rgyal po lta bu'i phyir// rin chen yid 'ong mdzes brgyan pa'i// 'khor khang phyi nang//
169a5: bar ldan pa// 'chags sar bcas par btsam par bya// rnal 'byor pho mo grangs mnyam pa// lha spyod ting 'dzin dam tshig tshad// bro gar 'du phro yo byad dang // klu tshig sgra yi yo byad dang // bza' dang btung ba'i yo byad dang // rgyan
169a6: dang bgo ba'i yo byad dang / / A li kA li mnyam sbyar zhing // nyi zla brtsegs pa'i ngo bor bzhugs// lha dang mi dang yo byad dang // gnas dang spyod pa kun tshogs pas// de dag tshogs bsu bshad pa yin// thabs dang shes rab
169a7: 'brel gyur nas/ / yab yum gsal ba'i ting 'dzin la// mtha' thug med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// nam mkha'i char bzhin kun gug la// yab yum gnyis med 'dres pa la// dbang bskur byin brlabs rgyan btags te//
169a8: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // bza' btung lha la lha rol zhing // 'od kyis ma lus tshim pa dang // 'gro mang bde ba thob par bya// bro lnga gar lnga stabs tshig lnga// bro gar rtse 'jo brjod pa yis// rigs kyi 'od zer 'phro 'dur

169b1: gsal/ / 'gro ba'i phyi nang mun gsal te// rigs 'dzin sa nas sa ru bskyad// klu lnga tshig lnga rigs lnga yis// phyogs phyogs bltas te brjod pa ni// 'gro ba kun gyis bde thob cing // chos kyi dung chen sgra yang sgrogs// phyi nang du/
169b2: kyi yo byad ni// rin chen ze'u brog rnachas dang // lag gdub rkang gdub mgul to dang // na bza' rgyan gyis gang rgyan pas// yid 'ong ting 'dzin gsal ba dang // 'gro bas lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// rlung dang nus pa'i stobs ldan
169b3: zhing / / sgo gsum bag chags zad 'gyur te// byin brlabs rlung la dbang thob pas// A li kA li mnyam sbyar ba// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i dus sbyar bas// bdag po gdung can phrad pa'i tshe// nye zla dus gcig shar ba'i tshe//
169b4: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// spyod yul nus pa kun bzlog nas// mthong lam rang gi mtshan nyid skye// zla ba 'am zla phyed dus mtshams sogs// bde chen nyams myong rkun mi 'chad// mthong ba'i don la mnyam gzhag pas
169b5: brtan zhing nges pas gdeng du gyur/ / sku ni phyag rgya chen po ste// bde chen zag med ting nge 'dzin// bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang // bde ba chen por rgyun mi 'chad// sprul pa'i longs spyod mdzad pa yis// 'jig rten khams mang
169b6: 'gro ba dag/ de tshe 'gro ba'i dbyings su sbyor// rdo rje lus thob de phyin chad// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung yin// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// ye shes
169b7: thig le de nyid la/ / ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ gang zag rim par 'jug pa rnams// dang por dngos don mthong ba yis// tshe 'dis sa la bgrod bya zhing // bsam byas lhun grub nyid
169b8: thob phyir/ / lta spyod ting 'dzin rim 'brel bas// bar chad med pa'i lam la 'bad// gnas skabs rim pa ji snyed kyang // tha mal ba dang log spyod dang // mos pa la sogs yul min de// nus dang grub pa thob pa yis/

170a1: gsang ba lam dang 'brel bar bya// rnal 'byor chen po lnga la gnas// rim nas rim par brtan gyur te// gsal ldan mi g.yo thob pa la// nyam nga med pa'i stobs ldan pas// pad ma la ni 'dam bzhin te// spyod pa
170a2: so so gnas pa yis/ / rtsa ba spros bcas rnal 'byor te// bsgrub pa dus kyi tshogs la gnas// yan lag tshogs kyi spyod par gsungs// gang phyir dkyil 'khor nges bstan pa// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa dkyil// ye shes
170a3: bzhi 'bros 'khor lo'i tshul/ / 'jig rten 'das pa dkyil nyid de// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du bshad// rig pa'i don nyid dkyil nyid de// cho 'phrul rang 'byung 'khor du gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de/
170a4: rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang // khro bo khro mo 'khor du bshad// lha yi ting 'dzin dkyil nyid de// spyod pa yo byad 'khor du bshad// gang la gang gis rgyas btab pa// goms dang rtas pa'i dbang gis ni// ji ltar snang grags chos
170a5: thams cad/ / de dang de'i ngo bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor ma lus par bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dbang bskur
170a6: cho ga phun sum tshogs/ / thabs kyi sa la sbyor byed pa'i// rtog pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang chen po// ma lus pa yi rgya mtsho nyid// rgyal ba kun gyi spyi gzugs te// 'khor tshogs ye shes rgya mtsho la//
170a7: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lhan cig tu// ye shes lha mo la brten nas// ye shes chen po'i dbang bskur bas// gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang chen 'gyur// ye shes rgya mtsho dbang phyug gis// dang po nas bzung bcu pa'i bar// ting 'dzin
170a8: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ / rig pa'i lha mo las brten nas// ting 'dzin chu bos dbang bskur bas// sa dang ye shes zhing khams dang // rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i rim par 'phel// mthong lam rdo rje sku thob pas// nges 'byed nyams

170b1: lda rnal 'byor la/ / rig pa nyams kyi dkyil 'khor du// rig pa rtsal gyis gzungs brten nas// zag med rdo rje sku la sbyor// rig pa brtan thob rnal 'byor pas// las dang skal ldan rnal 'byor la// lhag pa ga
170b2: brnyan dkyil 'khor du/ / rig ma'i phyag rgya mdzes ma la// dbang bskur byin brnyas brte byas nas// chog thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing // brgyud pa dbang gi man ngag gis// sbyor ba nyams ldan rnal 'byor thob// ye shes rgya mtsho tho
170b3: ldan zhing / / thugs rje rgya mtshos 'gro ba skyob// dam tshig dbang dang rig pa'i drod// dam par brgud pa'i dbang thob cing // dgongs bra ba den la mkhas pa dang // rkyen thub sa bon gzi brjid che// las dang bya ba ma rmongs shing // ma ye
170b4: brtson 'grus bar chad med/ / ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ltar// gzi chen gzhan gyi nyam nga med// byin brlabs 'dus pa'i nus pa can// tshig dang bden pa'i byin rlabs 'grub// de yis dbang bskur cho ga rtsam// dad dang dam tshig
170b5: ldan pa dang / / snying rje che la slob la brtsom// brtson 'grus shes rab pun sum tshogs// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// thos bsam bsgoms la rab gnas pa'i// 'gyur med brtan pa'i bsam pa yis// tha mal bsam pa
170b6: spang byas te/ / bla ma la ni de bzhin gshegs// 'dul dbang thabs mkhas bsam par bya// bla ma sangs rgyas des kyang ni// snying rjes nad pa bzhin bsam zhing // skyon dang mnar dang slu sems spang // rang rang nus pa ldan pa dang //
170b7: bdag gzhan don rus brtson 'grus ldan// brtul shugs gsum dang rab ldan zhing // dngos grub don du gnyer ba yi// gsang chen rigs su nges pa dang // gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur na// dbang dang man ngag sbyin par bya// ri
170b8: bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa mod/ / ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i tshul// tsan dang dri bsung ldan pa'i ri// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// ri bo dgod pa yod tan gnas// ma lus 'dus pa'i

171a1: dgon pa de / rnyed dang der ni gnas par bya// sa bcu mthar phyin gang zag la// zhing khams mtha' thug med gnas su// rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// ye shes lha mo la rten te// skad cig ye shes dbang skur
171a2: pas/ / bco brgyad yon tan lhun grub pa// skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs te// pad ma spyan gyi sa la gnas// yi ge 'khor lo sa la smin// bdag gzhan 'byed pa med pa yi// bde chen phyogs ris med par dgongs// 'phel
171a3: 'grib med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ / gzhan don yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// sa thob goms rten skyes bu la// ting 'dzin rig pa'i pho brang du// rgyal tshab skyes bu mtha' dag gis// rig pa'i lha mo na so med// rigs bral/
171a4: ting 'dzin stobs las grub// de la slob mas nges brten nas// ji ltar tshul ji bzhin du// ting 'dzin byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni// nyam myong dbang du rang shar te// thob dang brtan dang
171a5: goms pa yis/ / 'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu// 'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs te// skad cig nyid la rag lus pas// rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyal por bshad// lam zhugs rigs phyed rtags thob la// slob dpon
171a6: mthar nyi lam gnas pas/ / rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs par// rdo rje thig tshad sbyor brjod pa'i// / phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsal ldang pa// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs// sa tshogs ri pas dbang bskur ba'i/
171a7: sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor du// stobs ldan bu mo la brten te// thabs dang ting nge 'dzin dbang bskur pas// rdo rje tshe la dbang thob cing // cho 'phrul mngon shes ldan par 'gyur// dang po yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rigs
171a8: su nges pa'i bu mchog ste/ / dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rigs can la// drod ldan gnang zhing dbang thob pa// rgyal po lta bu bA ma yis// lhag pa gzugs brnyan byin ldan du// dad mos

171b1: brtson 'grus 'jug pa'i sems/ / mi ldog dang brtan tshul gyis bzhugs// dbu brgyan cod pan phred ba dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // go cha phyag rgya rgyal mtshan dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba// rang bzhin
171b2: ngo bos gnas tshul la/ / rdzas thabs ting 'dzin dbang skur bas// nus pa'i byin brlabs mngon pa shar gnas// theg chen rdo rje rigs su 'gyur// de nas skal ldan slob ma de// tha ma la 'du shes kun bzlog ste// rang rang
171b3: ltar byas gsal ba la/ / nus pa'i tshad dang nyams sbyar nas// nyan pa'i dbang dang bsgom pa dang // 'chang dang 'phrin las byed pa dang // rdo rje rgyal po slob dpon dbang // rang bzhin ngo bos gnas pa la// ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang
171b4: thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas/ / mi nus nus pa thob pa'i tshad// mi nus pa la bskur ba min// chad ldan rnams la rim pas bskur// rig ma las kyi phyag rgya mo// bcu drug bco brgyad ldan pa yi// dri zhing yon tan ldan pa la//
171b5: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyal ba kun gyi bcud 'dus pa'i// rdo rje pad ma'i rtsa 'khor lo// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa// thabs dang shes rab snod kyi mchog/ thabs gsum tshul gyis rtser bstims pas// 'dus
171b6: gsum rgyal ba thams cad kun/ / nyungs dkar tshad tsam rdo rje sems// rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las// gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te// rtsa bcud thig le'i ngo bo nyid// mar me 'od ltar gsal gyur pas// bde chen nyams dang /
171b7: rtags thob pa// da lta nyid 'byung the tshom med// rdo rje nyi ma rab ldan pa'i// bcu bzhi bcu drug rab lon pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i yon tan nyid// byin brlabs rig ma lha mor byas// chags pa bskyed pa thabs rnams nyid// blo dang ldan
171b8: pas mngon sum bya/ / de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas// bla mas gnyis med gtang bya'i phyir// byin brlabs sbyor ba byas nas yang // gnyis ka'i srin lag bzung nas ni// slob ma 'di la legs gtad la// gsang ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya/

172a1: kye bu 'di bzung bzang ba yin// di ring phan chad bu mchog khyod// sgo gsum lha ru mnyam sbyor bas// tha ma la dman pa'i lta ba spangs// bde ba chen po nyams myong bas// dka' thub theg pa'i lta ba spangs// thabs dang shes
172a2: rab gnyis med pas/ / bde ba'i nyams myong brtan par byos// brtan pa bar chad med bsgoms pas// rdo rje 'chang gi sa la 'gro// de bas skal ldan rigs bzangs kye// gtan du 'bral bar ma byed cig/ sbyor ba'i thabs dang ting 'dzin
172a3: dang / / rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas// thig le'i las la thogs pa med// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran rnyed// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// sa yang bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa// nyams myong brtan cing gnyis med sbyar//
172a4: rlung gis brten pa'i thig le nyid// ro cig dus mnyam tshul byung ba// drag pa ma yin dal ba min// dgongs pa nyams dang zhen chags min/ mA li kA li zhu pa'i sems// sangs rgyas phreng ba gnyis su med// rdo rje pad ma rab bskyed cing
172a5: 'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya las/ / nyi zla rtse phrad 'byor pa na// byed pa rlung gi thig le bzung // rgyu ba gcad cing thig le mnan// shes pa nam mkha'i ngang la gtad// dbang po shes rab che chung gis// lan gsum brtan par 'gyur ba 'am/
172a6: mthob par du sbyin par bya// rdo rje zla 'od mdzes ldan ma// dman dang rigs ngan rnam par spangs// rdo rje dbang pos ma phog cing // gzhan dbang longs spyod ma byas pa// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bco lnga'ang rung // thabs dang zas dang spyod lam
172a7: kyis/ / bsnyen pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// rdo rje lce dang srin lag dang // srin lag bcos ma la sogs pa// thabs dang byug pa'i yan lag gis// gsang ba'i pho brang rgyas par bya// 'khor ba zil gnon du rnyed nas// bdag po gdung can
172a8: rnam par sbyar/ / thig le myur bu la rtags byung nas// rgyu ba rlung gi tshad du zung // nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la// 'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen po// myong bas chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob// gal te rtsa dang bral ba na// phaT dang ldan na 'gro

172b1: bar 'gyur/ dngos rlung mnyam pas zin par 'gyur// bzlog pa 'dren pa'i hUM gis shes// sdud pa'i hUM gis bsdams gnas pa// thig les lus la khyab par byed// dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste// gnyis pas nus paskyed pa yin/
172b2: gsum pas nyams myong bskyed pa yin// bzhi pas de nyid brtan par byed// lnga pas brtan pas nyams blangs pas// mchog gi dngos grub che 'dis 'grub// rdo rje slob dpon gnang thob pa// nus ldan rab gnas cho ga brtsam// de nas
172b3: slob ma tshul bzhin pazhag/ / sgo gsum nyes pa kun bral ba'i// sgom pa'i dam tshig pog byas la// dbang bskur rim pa sbyin par bya// dbang gi nyams myong brtan bye'i phyir// gdams ngag rjes 'brun sbyin par bya// gdams pa/
172b4: nyams brtan la pa ri pa ste// lam thar phyin pa 'bras bu nyid// drod mthar phyi dang sa brgyad dang // grags chen sangs rgyas so dag la// rang rig rtas dang thugs rje yis// 'dren stobs mkha' 'gro gsum du snang // mkha' dang sgra
172b5: dang gzugs can gyi/ / pad ma can zhes grags pa yi// sbyor dang klu dbyangs snang ba dang // gzugs tsam brtan pas grol bar 'gyur// dbang skur rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos rdo rje dbyings dkyil 'khor// khro bo'i dkyil
172b6: 'khor yan lags/ / bsrub dang gdug pa gdul phyir yin// dang la rtsa ba'i dbang thob nas// phye ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang thob bya// gdul bya mos pa'i dbang brtson la// thun mong tsam du nges pa med// dang goganyis pa gsum pa dag/
172b7: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin// bzhin pa ldan lnga pa nyid// he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor ro// dus gsum rgyal bas byon brlabs pa'i// ma nor lam ston slob dpon la// mnyes dang bkur bar mi byed cing // rang rang nus
172b8: shing 'jug pa la/ / dbang bskur gnang ba ma byin par// gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang // skol dang bsgrub pa la sogs pas// bskal pa bye ba dpag med du// 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur gyi// dmyal ba'i gnas skye bar

173a1: 'gyur/ de ni dam pa kun brnyas pas// nad dang sdug bsngal mang ba dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyi tshe// de nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// byin brlabs ldan pa'i bla ma yis// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab ldan pa'i
173a2: rigs des skyes bu mchog nyid la/ / thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na// rgyal ba dang ni mkha' 'gro dang // rigs 'dzin grub pa po mo yis// tshe 'dir bsam pa kun skongs shing // byin brlabs dbang dang dngos grub kyi/
173a3: phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang gis gang la dbang bskur bas// tha ma la zhen pa dag pa dang // bde chen lam la mngon zhugs pas// dngos grub gang la thogs med de// las rnams gang brtsams 'grub/
173a4: pa dang // 'dod pa'i don la rol pa yis// sa bcu rim pa mthar phyin nas// pad ma spyan gyis thob ste// yi ge 'khor lo sa la gnas// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun grub pa// dbang gi 'bras bu
173a5: rang las shar/ / thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na// bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du// brtson pas 'bras bu tshol byed pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu stongs par 'gyur// / gang phyir slob dpon slob ma dang // dkyil 'khor rim
173a6: pa ji bzhin du/ / lus dang ting 'dzin byin brlabs kyis// 'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen po// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam chen po// ma lus chog
173a7: rgya chen po/ / dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi/ 'jug pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du// gsang ba kun la shes par bya// rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis// cha byad gus ldan mdzes pa yis// me tog ldan pas 'khor lo nyid// mngon byas
173a8: sku gsung bskul pa yis/ / dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems pa'i dkyil 'khor du// gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni// rdo rje slob ma byin brlabs phyir// slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya// de nas

173b1: slob ma 'jug bya ste/ / khrus byas dri zhim gos bzang gono// dang dang gus ldan rin chen bcas// gus bcas snyan pa'i tshig gis ni// lus dbul dag pa'i sems kyis gnas// bdud brtse 'khyil pa'i sbyor ba yis// bar
173b2: chang sbyor bsal bsrung ba bya/ / cho ga gang yin lhar bskyed la// mtshan ma rdzogs par nan tan bya// rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig lnga// 'bru gsum sku gsum thugs ldan sbyin// snying khar rdo rje brtan byas la// dam tshig legs
173b3: par dpog par bya/ / tsan dan dkar dmar byin brlabs chu// lan sum brung la snod dor ro// de nas rang gis dam bsgrags te// gsang ba'i don la nges par bya// rang rang 'brel pa'i lha nyid la// rin chen dor de brtag par
173b4: bya/ / sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la// bsti ma la dbyer med gnas pa la// rtag tu byin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir// legs pa brtan pa'i cho ga bya// mi shes rab rib bsal byas la// 'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya// de nas
173b5: lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi/ / dag pa rims kyis bstan par bya// de nas bla ma sangs rgyas la// ma lus ci yod 'thul bar bya// byin brlabs cho ga dag pa yi// dkyil 'khor mchod dang bsgoms pa dang // zhugs pa'i yon tan bas /
173b6: mi khyab// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas rigs su nges pa yin// dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan// rtsa ba yang lag kun thob nas// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro// de nas bla ma'i bka' mnos la// 'dod pa'i dngos grub/
173b7: grub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud las dbang bskur ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje dam tshig bla na med//
173b8: sdom pa bstan po dam bcas pa// 'di dag legs par bshad par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'das dang ma byon dus gsum du// rgyal khrims tha tshigs bkas bcad ltar// rim pa'i dmod po rab/

174a1: bcad pa'i// byin brlabs rang bzhin 'da' dka' ba// kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad// gang phyir dam pas byin brlabs pa'i// dam tshig chen po 'di nyid la// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba sras dang
174a2: bcas pa dang / / rig 'dzin rnams dang mkha' 'gro dang // lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang // klu dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha chen kyang // dam pa 'das pas 'tshig par 'gyur// dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
174a3: 'di/ / rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa la// sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams// log par spyad pas tshig par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyis bkas bcad cing // byin brlabs dmod por rang bzhin grub// dam pa 'di las gang 'das
174a4: pa/ / rdo rje can yang tshig par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la// dbang dang byin brlabs thob pa yis// dam pa'i tshul bzhin des spyad na// mi mthun phyogs rnams 'tshig par 'gyur// de phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas
174a5: kyis/ / dam tshig ces ni rnam par bsgrags// bla na med pa'i dam tshig ni// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// mtha' dbus 'gro 'ong las grol ba// bzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid de// gang gis don rtogs gnas gyur pa// /
174a6: don dam byang chub sems su brjod// ma skyes byang chub sems nyid ni// skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid snang ba// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ste// ma lus der snang ngo bo gcig/ rang ltar sgo gsum gsal rtogs pa// kun rdzob byang chub
174a7: sems su bshad/ / gsang ba bshad dang dbang bsrur dang // man ngag lung dang nyams chag skong // mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dngos grub ster zhing grol byed pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir// skad cig gdung
174a8: nyams mi bya/ / rang gi lha dang gnyis med nas// phyag rgya bzhir gsal rnal 'byor pas// rang gi sgo gsum mnyam par// chu bo lta bur bar chad med// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// theg chen gsang ba nyid yin pas// snod

174b1: med dman sogs log pa la/ / bsad bcu la sogs brjod mi bya// dang por gsad par srog gcig pas// byang chub snying por mi bral bas// rang srog rang gis gcod kyang sba// brtse gdung dam tshig bral mi bya// lam dang bsgrub/
174b2: pa'i rtsa ba dang // dngos bsgrub kun gyi rtsa ba dang // 'di dag nyams na kun nyams pas// rtsa ba zhes su bstan pa yin// yan lag thun mong dam tshig dang // thun mong min par shad par bya// dang por gsang ba'i lung thob nas// nus
174b3: pa mngon du snang bar du/ / bdag dang gzhan phyir thun mong gi/ 'gal dang sgro skur kun 'das shing // kun dang bsam pa dga' byed pa// thun mong dam las mi 'gal ba// thun mong dam tshig yin par bshad// thun mong ma yin
174b4: gang zag gis/ / thabs chen thun mong ma yin pa// nyon mongs lnga dang spyad pa lnga// bdud rtsi lnga dang shes pa lnga// grub pa lnga yi chos rnams nyid// skyes spu rigs phyed spyod yul te// thun mong rnal 'byor yul min pas// thun mong
174b5: ma yin zhes su bshad/ / dang po nas bzung rtags thob par// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// lus sems ma yangs rtse gcig pas// rnam po dang bcas dang du bla // sa thob goms dang mthar phyin par// ting 'dzin don la
174b6: gnas pa'i tshe/ / 'gal ba'i sgo gsum mi 'byung bas// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig la// rnam pa'i dam tshig ma lus 'dus// don las langs tshe snying rje dang // rtsa ba yan lag shugs ldan yin// sangs rgyas sa la gnas
174b7: pan/ / 'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig ste// rgya mtshodran bzhin thos spang sa med// srung med le gas dam tshig ste// dam tshig 'di ni rmang po che// bsten pa rtags dang ldan par du// spyi yi dam tshig bsrung bya zhing // bsgrub pa gang yin grub pa na/
174b8: khyad par rang rang rtogs pa yi// dam tshig med par 'grub mi 'gyur// gang zag gang la dga' ba la// dam tshig dka' thub sgo nas ni// gsang ba'i don la dgod bya'i phyir// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas bstan// dang po las/

175a1: can rnal 'byor la// rtsa ba thun mong dam tshig brtan// brtan nas nyams ldan gang zag la// thun mong min pa'i dam tshig bstan// rtogs pa'i 'jigs med gang zag la// 'da' nyams med pa'i dam tshig stan//
175a2: sa thob goms mthar phyin pa la// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig bstan// dngos grub rtogs pa kun dang 'brel// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje chen// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa 'di// thob nas
175a3: dam par gang bsrungs pa/ / yon tan chung yang 'grub par bshad// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dngos grub rtog pa ma lus pa// cho ga gang dang ting 'dzin gang // sgrub pa gang dang gang yang rung // ma nyams tshul du
175a4: rab brtson pas/ / myur du grub pa nyid du 'gyur// gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na// rdo rje 'chang nyid brlag par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan nyid// dam tshig rdo rje las byung bas// dam pa 'di la gang brten pas// yang
175a5: bzhin nor bu lta bur gyur/ / dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dang yan lag gi/ bsrung bya dka' thub dam pa 'di// kun gyis 'das pa ma yin zhing // gnas pa dam pa nyid yin te// las dang skal pa dman pa
175a6: dang / / rigs dman le lo'i che ba dang // rang bzhin ngan pa'i gang zag gis// blon po gang zhig 'da' byed cing // dngos grub gnyis la rgyab phyogs nas// dam pa rnams la smon byed pa// sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pas// rdo rje 'dzin
175a7: rgyal khros nas ni/ / bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad// mkha' 'gro ma dang rig 'dzin dang // kha 'bar gtum 'khrug rngam pa'i tshogs// de ma thag tu srog bcad nas// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// gal te 'jig
175a8: par gyur na ni/ / 'jig rten bzhin du skye 'gyur zhing // ji srid nam mkha' 'jig pa 'am// phyi yi rgya mtsho zad pa'i tshe// thar te gzhan du nam yang min// dam pa'i tha ma spong ba dang // rdo rje mchad la 'khu ba dang // byang chub sems

175b1: nyid mi dran zhing / / sngags dang phyag rgya yal ba dang // snod min gsang nga bshad pa dang // gsang ba'i don la skur ba ni// 'dir yang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing // skad cig 'gags pas de ma thag/ bar mi'i lus dang bral gyur pa'i//
175b2: rdo rje dmyal bar skye bur 'gyur// gang du rtsub yan lag bcas// bsrung dang dpog par bya ba'i chos// thun mong dbang dang 'brel bcas pa'i// thun mong sti yi yul gyur pa// de ni thung mong bsrung bya ste// 'di ni phyi yi dam tshig go// thabs dang
175b3: shes rab sgyur ba'i sems/ / thig le'i sems lnga'i lam gyi rim// rig pa ma lus gsal ba'i tshe// thig le gnyis med nyams su byung // de ba'i thig le bcung bskur bas// tshogs drug rang snang thig le'i grogs// ma lus thig
175b4: les byin brlabs pas/ / thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal// thig le rig pa khar dbyung min// 'khor lo kha sbyor bde ba yis// tha mal bde bar dbang por bsgyur// rgyal ba'i dgongs spyod thabs kyis myong // tha mal zhen pa
175b5: rnam par bzlog/ thabs ldan don la gsang ba'i don// rang snying 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lnga// 'char dang nub pa'i rim pa yis// thabs chen gsang ba'i thig le ltar// shes nas spang du med par gnas// rang 'byung gnas pa'i bcud
175b6: lnga ni/ / rang lus rten gyi don snang ba// khyab par rgyu ba'i tshul dag gis// dngas snyigs gnyis kyis tshul du gnas// rang lus rtog pa dngas snyigs dang // kha dog yan lag nyin lag gis// bde ba'i ye shes lngar shes dang // bde ba chen po nyid
175b7: du gsungs/ / khams lnga bcud las skyes pa yi// ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pas// rgyal ba snga ru yang dag gsungs// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje dril// nyi zla'i rim pa'i 'od gsal ba// sems lngas
175b8: mkha' la gsal ba'i tshe/ / rten can rten dang gnyis med pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes snang // ma zin rdo rje lce yis blang // gnyis kyi rtog pa ma lus pa// bde chen ro cig byin gyis brlabs// skad cig 'bral med bde ba'i

176a1: sems/ dus gsum mi 'bral brtan par gnas// rlung dang thig le'i bzlas pa yis// thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal// bde chen thabs dang nyams kyis ste// brjod dang tshig gis phebs pa min// gnyis sbyor phrad pa'i
176a2: bde ba yis/ tha ma la zad dang bde chen sbyor// gang gis sbyin par mi nus pa// da ltar nus pa rang gis myong // gzhan gyi rdzun pa'i don 'di ni// thabs kyis bden par mngon du bstan// tha ma zhen pa spang ba'i phyir// kha na ma tho bag
176a3: tsha bral/ / skyes dang nus dang gnas pa'i tshe// rang bzhin lnga ni shugs kyis grub// rang gi rtsa bcud so so las// bdud rtsi bral ba med par gnas// 'byung lnga dbang po gshugs sogs bcas// thabs ldan sbyor ba'i byin brlabs
176a4: kyis/ / bde chen lhan cig skyes par shes// nyi zla rlung gis zin pa yi// mtshan ma bral ba ngo bo las// zhen pa med pa'i thabs chen pos// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes lnga yi ro gad pas// ma lus rgyal ba lnga ru thug/
176a5: 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yin// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas pa// shin tu 'dus pa rnam pa gnyis// 'bring du rtsa ba lnga nyid dang / yan lag bcu ru shes par bya// shin tu rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni//
176a6: spyir ni sum brgya drug bcu ste/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid dang // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang // dus bzhi rgyal mchog nyid dang ni// bsrub med mnyam par rdzogs pa nyid// lhun grub bde gnas dam tshig dang // rnam dag
176a7: byang chub bzung 'dzin bral/ / rtogs nas don 'dzin dam tshig dang // sems la gnas bcas dam tshig dang // ye nas ma bcos dam tshig dang // 'dus byas rnam dag dam tshig dang // chos rnams dbyer med dam tshig dang // nye bas
176a8: thams cad 'jigs med dam tshig dang / thams cad 'jigs med dam tshig dang // g.yung drung tshe 'phel dam tshig dang // thams cad bsrung du med pa ste// 'di dag lta ba'i dam tshig yin// thams cad sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang / ma

176b1: lus bsgral ba'i dam tshig dang / / ma byin len pa'i dam tshig dang // brdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig dang // thams cad spyod pa'i dam tshig dang // dam rdzas spyod pa'i dam tshig ste// 'di dag spyod pa'i dam tshig yin// bsgrub pa'i dam rig
176b2: rnam gsum ni/ / rdo rje skyes gnas dam tshig dang // 'dren byed gnas stobs dam tshig dang // lam la ston byed dam tshig dang // rab tu rtogs byed dam tshig dang // sbyar byed byang chub dam tshig dang // thams cad dbang skur dam tshig dang //
176b3: rig 'dzin gnas stobs dam tshig ste// bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i dam tshig yin// yum gyur dbyings phyug dam tshig dang // thabs nyid shes rab sbyor dam tshig/ shes rab thabs su sbyor de bzhin// glang po brjid gnon dam tshig dang /
176b4: thams cad mi chung dam tshig dang // thams cad bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang // ting 'dzin phyag brgya'i dam tshig ste// bsgrub pa thabs kyi dam tshig yin// tshegs kyis mchod pa'i dam tshig dang // tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig
176b5: dang / / rigs kyi phrin las dam tshig dang // phran men tshim byed dam tshig ste// bsgrub pa'i 'phrin las dam tshig yin// yang dag don ston dam tshig dang // gsung mchog mtha' yas dam tshig dang // thams cad skad mjal dam tshig
176b6: dang / / ye shes med 'jal dam tshig dang // stong gsum kun grags dam tshig dang // ye shes gsun mchog dam tshig dang // bsam yas rdo rje gsung dam tshig/ mi gyur rdo rje dam tshig ste// bdag gis shes bya'i dam tshig yin// shes bya ting
176b7: 'dzin dam tshig bzhi/ / / nam mkha' sdang byed dam tshig dang / rten byed sa yi dam tshig dang // bsreg byed me yi dam tshig dang // 'khru byed chu yi dam tshig dang // g.yengs byed chen po'i dam tshig ste// shes rab lnga yi dam tshig dang //
176b8: phung po lnga yi dam tshig ni// thabs mchog lnga yi dam tshig yin// chos rnams gzugs brnyan dam tshig dang // sgra ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang // dri ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang // ro ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang // reg ltar shes

177a1: ba'i dam tshig ni/ / gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yin// kha dog lnga yi dam tshig dang // phyogs lnga yi ni dam tshig dang // dbang lnga yi ni dam tshig ste// gsum po spyir khyab dam tshig yin/ bde ba'i rang nyid dam tshig dang //
177a2: lhan grub ye shes dam tshig dang // mi 'jigs rgyal mchog dam tshig dang // mnyam rdzogs ldan grub dam tshig dang // phyogs dus dbyer med dam tshig dang // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang // chos la skyon med dam tshig dang /
177a3: brjod med spros med dam tshig dang // phyogs dus gnyis med dam tshig dang // gnyis med byang chub sems dam tshig/ 'dus ma byas pa'i dam tshig dang // thams cad rgyas 'debs dam tshig dang // thams cad mi 'gog dam tshig
177a4: ste/ / ngo bo ting 'dzin dam tshig yin// grub par bya ba lnga bstan pa// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig dang // rin chen 'byung ba'i dam tshig dang // pad ma chags med dam tshig dang // don rnams grub pa'i dam tshig dang // 'jigs byed rdo rje
177a5: dam tshig dang / / de bzhin sku nyid dam tshig dang // thams cad 'byor ldan dam tshig ste// sku yi dam tshig bdun du bshad// yang dag don ston la sogs pa// gsung gi dam tshig brgyad po nyid// rang la rdzogs par shes bya ste// 'bras
177a6: bu'i gsung bas bsgrub bya yin/ / rang rig dbang sgyur dam tshig dang // che mchog rnam dag dam tshig dang // rang bzhin 'od gsal dam tshig dang // byang chub sdom byed dam tshig dang // thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig drug/ thugs kyi
177a7: dpa tshig nyid du bgad/ / byang chub zhing bkod dmatshig dang / ye shes bzhugs gnas dam tshig dang / gzhal yas khang bstan dam tshig dang // sna tshogs kun sbyar dam tshig dang // zad med gter ldan dam tshig dang // bsgrub
177a8: zad me dam tshig dang / zang padag tang chen dang ga na// ya tad dam tshig pa na du bshad// thams cad byin rlob ma tshig dang // bdud snga mar gcod ma tshig dang / sems can don byad dam tshig ni// phrin las dam/

177b1: tshig gsum du bshad// spong gi rjed ma tshig dang // chags pa'i ye shes dam tshig dang // gti mug chen po'i dam tshig dang // phrag dog chen po dam tshig dang // nga rgyal ba de mchog dam tshig dang // nyon mongs lnga yi dam tshig ste// mi
177b2: spang ba yi dam tshig yin/ / gtan du ma yengs srung ba ni// mnyam pa lnga yi dam tshig dang // bded pa dbyer med dam tshig dang // su gsung thugs sbyar dam tshig dang // lam lnga rdzogs pa'i dam tshig dang // thams cad sbyor ba'i dang
177b3: tshig dang / / rdo rje log 'joms dam tshig dang // 'khor ba zil gnon dam tshig dang // ma bcos lhad grub dam tshig dang // thig le bde sbyor dam tshig ni// lta ba rgur bsrung dam tshig dang // ting 'dzin rgyun bsgom dam tshig dang /
177b4: bcing ba phyag rgya'i dam tshig dang // bzlas pa sgra snyan dam tshig dang // sgo gsum mnyam pa'i dam tshig dang // shes rab bde skyong dam tshig ni// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig yin// tha snyad zil gnon dam tshig dang // spyod la
177b5: bde 'byor dam tshig dang / / rig pa thod rgal dam tshig dang // ma bcos gnas dag dam tshig dang // rang 'byung gnas bral dam tshig ste// gcig car gnas pa'i bsrung thabs yin// thams cad skyed byed dam tshig dang // rgyud drug
177b6: sbyor byed dam tshig dang / / rtogs pas tshi ma byed dam tshig dang // khyab pa nam mkha'i dam tshig dang // gzhan don shugs grub dam tshig ni// dam tshig che ba bstan pa yin// dmyal chen dmyal ba phal ba dang // yi dgas byol song
177b7: srin bu dang / / gnod sbyin mngal srin kha 'bar lce// lha dang lha min ru dra dang // rtsangs pa la sogs 'khor ba ste// chad pa'i skye gnas bstan pa yin// bsrung ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// gal te stong pa'i don rtogs na//
177b8: skad dang nyams pa'i tshul med de// tshad pa'i yul las 'das pa yin// gang zag 'ga' zhig spyod yul ni// gal te rtsa ba'i dam nyams na// bla ma grogs po brgya dag la// bshags pa stong brag rgya ru bya// bzlas pa bye ba

178a1: phrag bdun bya/ / gtor ma 'bum phrag bdun du bya// sbyin bsreg 'bum phrag bcu gcig bya// de nas slar yang blang ba 'am// bla mas gnang nas gnas par bya// gal te yul de mi gnas sam// lo gsum pa na
178a2: tshad 'das pa 'am/ / gal te bshegs pa'i tshul mthong bas// ma dad 'dod pa'i sems skyes nas// bskal pa'i tshad las 'das pa ste// bskal pa chen po brgyad khri'i bar// bshags kyang dag par mi 'gyur te// rdo rje dmyal
178a3: ba zhes bya bar/ / mi zad sdug bsngal myong nas ni// ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa'i bar// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ bzla ba bdun du smra bcad bya// sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad dug//
178a4: bzlas pa bye ba tshad 'bum gcig/ gtor ma khri phrag cig tu gtang // de nas slar yang blang ba dang // dag dang tshangs par bsgrags par bya// dag pa'i snod dang mi ldan par// gsang ba ston cing 'chad pa dang // dbang ma thob par
178a5: bka' 'gom dang / / bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang // tshad dang ldan pa'i snod min la// gsang ba tshad du sgrogs pa dang // gsang ba nyams su mi len par// 'phyar bas kun la spel pa ni// tshad las 'das pa'i gang
178a6: zag ste/ / sangs rgyas kun la brnyas byed pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas khros pa yis// bdun rgyud tshun tshad brlag par mdzad// bla ma dang ni grogs rnams dang // pha ma gnyen bshes rgyal blon dang // rgyal 'bangs nyes me/
178a7: sdang pa ni// dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su bshad// zab mo dag la gags byung dang // bsgrubs pas 'dod pa mi 'byung zhing // bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang // mnyes ya kha 'byung ba dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i stags
178a8: su bshad/ / dang por bla ma'i lung thob nas// rang gis nyams pa ma tshor zhing // bde legs bsam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // bdag gzhan bsam pa'i khyad par dag/ sngon du yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// 'grub cing sngags pas thob
