178b1: pa ni/ / ma nyams don dang ldan pa'i rtags// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po yin// gal te ma nyams rtags byung ni// bskar gso'i cho ga myur du brtsam// gal te nyams la rtags med cing // legs par snang na mi rung te//
178b2: bdag gis bon tshig pa ste// bde ba zang byas gtan du sdug// mnyams rtags byung myur bskangs na// sngon gyi bag chags zad par 'gyur// / rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dam tshig
178b3: ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji snyed pa'i// rtog pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus bshad// rgyud kyi rgyal po ma lus
178b4: las/ / thun mong dag la mos zhugs pas// thun mong yo byed ting 'dzin dang // sngags dang phyag rgya 'bral goms pas// rtags dang nus pa mthar phyin pas// gang ltar dmigs pa 'grub 'gyur to// zag cas thun mong
178b5: dngos grub yin/ / de las gzhan pa bshad par bya// / gang du mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// dbang dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dag/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rim thob na// mi ldog brtan pa'i rnal 'byor thob// mthong nas bsgom laM
178b6: ma nges rigs/ / ting 'dzin gang bsgoms par tshad med// tshe 'dis dbang bsgyur 'jigs bral te// de nas sku lnga'i bdag nyid thob// mchog ldan mchog gis mchog thob pas// mchog gi dngos grub thun mong min// dad
178b7: dang dam tshig shes rab dang / / brtson 'grus brtul zhugs bzod pa thob// brtan cing snying rtse dbang rdzogs shing // bsgrub dang lam gyi sbyor ba shes// yid thub mi ldog brtan pa dang // nyams thob dang du len pa ni// cig/
178b8: dang lnga gsum gang zag gis// ri bo ri sul gsal bar dang // chu gling ngam grog brag rjod dang // dur khrod ri phug chu mdo dang // yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga' bar// cho ga byin brlabs rdzogs pa nyid// las kyi cho ga gang yin

179a1: pa/ bdag gam gzhan gyis byas pa na// bdag dbang bkra shis phun sum tshogs// dam tshig dbang dang lta ba dag/ sngon du bya ba rdzogs pa yis// sngon du rnal 'byor gsum thob bam// dang po yid brtan gang yin
179a2: kyang / / gang la yid kyis dmigs pa de// cho ga ting 'dzin 'brel ba nyid// rang rang rtag pa gnas bzhin du// tha mal pa dang le lo dang // the tsom dad pa'i stobs kyis te// gal te de dag mi ldan na// sa thob kyis kyang ma yin na//
179a3: gang zag skyes pos smos ci dgos// gal te dgug pa'i las byan// bdag nyid dbang drag khro bo ste// dmar thag dud ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// gang ltar gnas pa'i 'phro 'dra ni// zhags pa lcags kyu she dag ste// dmigs pa brtan
179a4: cing rtags thob nas/ / mngon du gyur gyi bar du ni// rang sngags brjod pa de yi mthar// che ge mo zhig dza hAM zhes// dgra dang bgegs dang lha dang gzugs// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ldan yang rung // tha ma la dbang med bzhin du dgug/
179a5: gal te de yi dgos pa dag/ myur du grub par ma 'gyur na// de dag legs par grub kyi bar// gang yin mkhas pas bcing bar bya// ngag dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// bdag nyid dbang drag
179a6: gsal ba yi/ / lce la dbang gi 'khor lo bsam// yi ge gsum ldan dgu bkod nas// 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams bkang zhing // pad ma ra ga zhu 'dra bas// gang thim bdag gi dbang gyur zhing // bden pa bdar zhing dag gis bcig/
179a7: yang na gang la gang chags pa'i// rdzas la ring du 'dod pa ltar// 'dod pa grub na dam bcas zhing // yid 'ong 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dga' ba'i thabs kyis bsten byas na// gal te 'gro zhing bro 'dod na// dbang drag phyag rgyas
179a8: bsdigs bcing gzing/ / dga' ba'i thabs kyis yid 'phrogs nas// rol mo sku mkhan dag de yis// 'dus pa'i gang zag chags pa can// bya ba thabs kyis bral ba ltar// bral ba med par gnas par 'gyur// ting 'dzin pacan

179b1: pa'i nus pa yis/ / gang yang rung ba'i sems can de// sna tshogs khro ba khro mo yis// 'od dang phyag rgya 'bar ba yis// bcings nas mdun du gnas par blta// dga' dang bsdigs pa rdzas kyi mtha'// ting 'dzin brtan pas nges par
179b2: 'grub/ / med las dngos por nges grub cing // mi mthun brgyad sogs nges 'grub na// yod dang snang ba'i 'gro ba dag/ dbang pos bskur ba spos ci dgos// gal te gso ba'i las byas na// las ni gnyis te btsams pas grub/
179b3: bdag nyid rtag par skyes nas ni// dbang bskur byin brlabs kun bstims nas// mdun du shel gyi bum pa ru// thugs las chu yi lA ma bskyed// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba der gyur nas// bum par lha mo 'od du zhu// nad dang sdug sngal
179b4: byang bar bsam/ / dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang // sman dang rin chen spos dang 'bru// bdud rtsi snying po che rkyen la// mA ma kA yi sngags kyis gdab// oM ma mA ki sarba pa pa du ru du ru swA hA// nad dang sdug bsngal ldan pa'i lus// bslus
179b5: bas 'tsho bar the tshom med/ / bdag nyid brtul zhugs bde ldan pas// sngon du bya ba sngon song bas// dgon pa bas mtha' rab dben par// ma smas ma rul chad ldan pa'i// dur khrod zhing chen mtshan ldan la// khrus dang byub
179b6: ba dug kun byas nas/ / pho mo la sogs yin pa yi// las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur// de dag ma Na Da la gtsang ma yi// dbus su legs par gzhag nas ni// bdag nyid khro bo gang yang rung // gsal bas tshangs pa brgya
179b7: byin rung / / rang sngags srog snying dza yis dgug/ phyag rgya bzhi yis dbab par bya// gal te 'dar dang rgod pa dang // ngu dang 'jigs pa'i sgra byung na// dam tshig phyag rgya snyan par bya// dam chu byin la mnas sbags te// gang 'dod/
179b8: las la ma dag par bya// gal te 'jig rten the tshom zos// de yis zos dang rgyal ba dang // 'bral du bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur// gang zhig ting 'dzin brtan pa yis// bar chad med par bsgrubs pa'i tshe// gdangs ldan yid 'ong/

180a1: dang po ste/ dri zhim 'od chags gnyis pa yin// dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs gsum pa yin// bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyams sor yin// zhing chen kha nas tri byung na// ting 'dzin rdo rje so yis bcad// ro langs brdabs na gser
180a2: du gyur/ / lce yi ral gris de bcad na// ci kyang mi tshugs go mtshon te// lha min g.yul yang pham byed na// dpa' bo stobs ldan spos ci dgos// de yi dbang po lnga dag la// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub yod// rang gi rtog pa
180a3: de bzhin du/ / mkhas pas bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// gal te bcu bdun bco brgyad ma'i// zhing mdzes bkru zhing byugs byas te// rgyan dang gos kyis legs par gdags// dri zhim dbang po dag pa la// bdag nyid dbang
180a4: drag rnal 'byor gyis/ / ye shes 'jig rten gang rung ba'i// lha mo yid 'ong 'od 'bar ma// sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bcings nas// rtags byung bar du snyim par bya// dri dang sgra dang 'od dag dang // 'dar dang 'gul dang dgod pa dag
180a5: dang po'i rtags ni yin par bshad/ / lha dang gtam dang gnyis pa ste// dngos su langs pa tshad yin pas// padam pa dar mnas bsgrags dbang du bsdu// gal te sbyar du sod pa na// cho 'phrul che zhing log ston na// dbang dag nga rgyal
180a6: chen po yis/ / dbang du bsdu dang zil gyis mnan// de dag chags pas rol spyad na// skad cig cho 'phrul bzhi thob ste// ske shi med par gnas pa dang // ma lus bde chen 'bar ba dang // zhing khams kun tu dgrod pa dag/ thogs pa
180a7: med pa 'grub par 'gyur/ / gtsang ma byis pa mamed pa// yid 'ong legs pa btsal blangs nas// dag cing bdud rtsis dri blugs la// 'da' hUM ma tas legs byug la// kha dog lnga yi gzugs kyis gdags// tshangs pa dang ni
180a8: brgya byin dang / / lha mo gang rung snying pos dgug/ rtag tu phyag rgya bzhis bstim zhing // bdag nyid ha ya g+h+ri ma 'am// ya mAn ta ka la sogs pa// gang rung khro bor gsal bsgoms la// drag tu dgug cing bstim par bya// rtaH/

180b1: byung mthar thug mngon gyur nas// legs nyes de yis smra bar 'gyur// gal te 'dang zhing mi brjod na// oM gyi 'od dang a mri tas// lce las thabs kyis dbang bskur zhing // ha ya grI bas gang mos bsdigs// legs par smra
180b2: par the tshom med/ / gal te gsang pa'i las byed na// gsal la brtan thob rnal 'byor pas// dur khrod shing cig bzhi mdo'am// lha 'dres mngon du gnas pa'i sar// bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// dung kha nag po 'od 'bar ba//
180b3: sman bzlog mtshon cha me ltar 'bar// sprul pa'i char ltar 'khrug par bsam// mdun du hom khum khru gang tshar// gru gsum dur sol khrag chen byug/ nang du ling ka bdud rtsi lnga// chags pa'i rgyu dang tsha ba dang // shes pa chags
180b4: pa'i rten las byas/ pho nyas mi rus bcas bkug la// bstims la phyag rgyas bcing bar bya// lcags sam nag po'i shing las byas// drag po'i phur bas gnam gsum gdab// hriHShI drag pos g.yas g.yon nas// khros pa'i
180b5: sems kyis bsreg byas nas/ / de nang drag po tsher ma can// nam phyed gcer bus bsregs byas nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// gal te dbye ba'i las byed na// bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka ste// rngam zhig gdug gtum pa
180b6: rgyal can/ / shin tu 'jigs shing sdigs par bsgom// nyi mas 'jigs pa'i dang rung dang // mun pas 'jigs pa'i gung ru la// gang yin de nyid dris la blan// lha dang lha min gnyis la gtad// rlung gi phyogs su de yis bskyor/
180b7: sprul pa po nyes g.yul 'gyed cing // 'thab cing rtsod par rnam par bsam// bar du khrag dang bye rog 'thab// mechu rlung gis 'bud bsams na// de ni gang yin su yang rung // 'bral zhing 'thab pa nyid du 'gyur// rgyal po bram ze blon po dag/
180b8: gdug pa gnod pa can gyi rigs// mig nas bslang bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid a par tsi ta ste// drag po khros pa'i tshul du bsgom// dgra bgegs gar yang rung ba yi// 'og tu rlung snying bcas par bri// steng du ming rus bcas

181a1: bskyon la/ bdun na gnas pa'i gdul byad // rlung lha rnga mo'i steng du zhon// po nya sprul pa mtha' yas kyis// 'khrid cing 'tshags par rab bsams la// gshin rje'i drung du khrid par bsams// 'di ni dbugs med
181a2: pargyal ba yang / / gzhan du drag pos phyin 'gyur na// srog dang ldan pas smos ci dgos// gal te dgra dpung tham 'dod na// bdag nyid mi g.yo mgon po ste// ji ltar gnas par rab tu bsgom// de yi gzugs brnyan bris nas kyang /
181a3: tsho gas de ru byin brlabs la// sngags ni bdun 'bum la sogs pa// lcags rna bdun las bcu gnyis tshad// ral gri snying por bcas pa la// gsal bar de dag rtags byung las// 'od dang sgra dang sa g.yos dang // ral gri
181a4: skad ni 'don pa na/ / byung bas g.yul las ldog pa dang // bskor bas dmag dpung bros par 'gyur// bdag nyid rgyal zhing che 'dod na// bdag nyid gsal zhing rtan gyur nas// zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal byas la// dur khrod ras la
181a5: med rus bris/ / sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bstims la// nges par bstan pa'i lhas byung nas// he ru ka yi zhabs kyis gnon// rta grin gad mo drag pos bsdigs// khyung gshog phyag rgya zil gyis gnon// bdag
181a6: dang byi'i sgoms nas gdon/ bdag nyid them pa'i 'og tu gnon// yang na bdag gi 'og tu gnon// rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgya yis// steng nas gnon cing bden pa bdang // bdag nyid de yi rgyal por 'gyur// dbul po gter dang phrad
181a7: 'dod na/ / bdag nyid las la goms pa yis// rigs lnga lhag pa'i lha gsal nas// so so'i phyag mtshan yungs 'bru tsam// dbang por mthong gi bar du ni// bsam zhing sngags bzlas bden pa bdar// mtshan ma brtan po gsal/
181a8: ban// gang na yod pa'i phyogs der dong // bden pa ting 'dzin sngags bcas mthus// 'dug gam smra 'am mthong ba 'am// phra mo der ni lhung bar 'gyur// de nas gter dang phrad gyur nas// dpral ba kun las thar par 'gyur// de nas

181b1: rdo rje rnal 'byor pas/ / mngon shes mig dang ldan 'dod na// bdag nyid lha yi rna la 'byor pa// rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mig sna lnga dang bdun pa'i zhag/ de yi zhun mar rung bar bcas// 'phrul gyi 'o ma dag gis
181b2: sbyar/ / rdo rje pra yis zhag bdun bsgrub// nyams dang drod rtags thob pa na// mig la legs par sngags kyis byug/ skad cig stong gsum bcas pa yis// phyogs bcu mngon par shes pas mthong // gang zag rgyud ni
181b3: brtag pa dang / / sdug bsngal drag pos zhon bzlog cing // so so dag pa'i zhing khams kyis// yid bde grub par bya ba'i phyir// mngon shes mtshan mas legs par bsgrub// rkang mgyogs thob par 'dod pa yis// bdag nyid
181b4: lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas/ / brtan zhing bar chad med thob nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste// ya ma las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ste// skad cig dpag tshad brgyar 'gro ba// de la gnas bsam ma yengs pas// rlung
181b5: gis khyab pa ji lta bar/ / dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yang // skad cig tsam gyis bgrod par 'gyur// gal te rdzu 'phrul bzhi dag gis// rig 'dzin go 'phang 'gro 'dod na// sngon du dag pa'i don thob nas// phyag rgya gsal bar gyur
181b6: pa'i tshe/ / nam mkha' lding gi zla ba la// hUM las rdo rje cho ga gsum// rim par brtan pa'i dbang thob nas// dngas ma'i phyag rgyal brten pas// rdo rje bzlar bcas rlung brten pas// gang 'thang zhing du bskyod pa'is// rdo rje rege pa 'dzin
181b7: pa yis/ / zhing khams dge ba'i bya ba 'grub// mdun gyi nam mkhar zla ba la// oM la cho ga'i tshul gyis bskur// brtan pa'i 'khor lo zla rlung gis// dngas ma'i stobs kyis lus gnas pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin
181b8: pa/ / zhing khams so sor skyong byas nas// rang gi bsam pa bsgrub par bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi zla ba la// traM las skyes pa'i chog g.yis// rin chen rlung zlar bcas pa yis// ting 'dzin drag po bskyod pa'i shugs// dngas ma lus

182a1: yid bcas pa yis/ / dag pa'i zhing lams kun bskyod de// lhag pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad mar bcas pa'i zla ba sgom// hriHlas sna tshogs chos mchog
182a2: sems/ / gsal brtan rlung gis stobs bstan pas// dngas ma'i lus yid gang yin pa// zhing bskyod bsam pa grub par 'gyur// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal byed sna tshogs bcas pa bsgom// a 'am
182a3: ha las rang nyid kyi/ / las kyi phyag rgyar goms par bya// brtan nas dngas ma rlung stobs kyis// zhing khams gang du mngon bsams pa'i// 'dod pa'i bsams pa grub par 'gyur// 'dis ni 'byung zhing dbang med cing // 'chi med
182a4: rlung la dbang thob nas/ / cho 'phrul bzhi yis zil mnan nas// mngon shes gdug pa 'dul ba yis// las rnams mi 'grub cig kyang med// de nas gzhan yang chags ldan rim// skal bas dman dang sbyor bas zad// bde ba'i don
182a5: 'dod bka' thub can/ / 'di dag don la thabs kyi dgod// thabs ldan lus kyi gong bu la// rang rang cho ga'i thabs ldan na// bde chen gar thabs sna tshogs pa// rnam par 'phrul pa'i ro yis byed// bde chen longs spyod chos kyi gnas//
182a6: sprul pa'i thig le bde ba'i ro// ma lus mkha' lnga'i rang bzhin gyis// rang lus ma bcos gnas nyid bde// brtul zhugs thig le gsum thob nas// sgrol ma dang ni thig le dang // gnas dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// bye brag brgyad
182a7: bcu kun 'dus pa'i/ / thabs kyis mtshon pa las byung bas// dngos grub cho ga sna tshogs 'grub// rang rten thig ler bcas pa yis// dngas ma'i rang bzhin khyab gnas pa// bskul ba thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// ma lus bskyod cing 'gagra
182a8: bar byed/ / dngas snyigs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i// rlung gi thig les dbang bskur nas// 'phro zhing 'dzag pa'i thig le nyid// rlung gis 'ching ba nyid yin te// thig le snyigs mar nyams gyur pa// thabs dang rlung bcud stobs ldan pas// pad ma la ni

182b1: chu bzhin no/ / rang 'byung thig leg rang bzhin las// rten dang zag pa snyigs ma dang // 'khor ba'i rtsa dang sa bon dang // le rtog thig le zhen bcas pa// rang 'byung nam mkha'i thig les 'jig/ rang lus bde chen snying po
182b2: la/ / nam mkha' sprin ltar mi byed cing // dngas snyigs bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid// thig le chu dang 'o ma dang // gnas pa rlung dang rten stobs kyis// dngas snyigs phye la dngas ma bstim// rang snying lus la 'od snang ba'i
182b3: phyi dang dngos rtog ma lus pa/ / rlung sogs 'khor le'i 'phen stobs kyis// der mi gnas par goms par bya// gang du sa bon snyigs bcas pa// nam mkha'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas// gang du rgyu bar bcas pa yis// de ma
182b4: thag par rnam par brlag/ rlung dang rtsa dang thig le bcas// thabs kyis bskul ba'i ro ldan pas// ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin pas// mi mthun zhan pas rnam grol bas// rang sems rten bcas thig le ni// dngas ma'i ye
182b5: shes blo ldan pas/ / kun khyab bde 'byung snying po can// gsang ba'i rig pa'i gter kha 'byed// phyi nang rgyu ba thig ler bcas// snying nang bde bar 'bar gyur nas// rang lus rtags su bde chen 'bar// mngon shes rin chen rtsa la
182b6: pog/ rig pa'i mngon shes lnga ru 'char// de nas mi 'gyur stong pa'i rtsa// 'gyur med kun snang rlung la thim// dman pas mi 'grub khyad par thabs// gsang ba'i thig le 'bab zhon gyis// rtsa bcud ting 'dzin 'brel ba'i stob/
182b7: bskal pa du ma'i stobs 'gags te// dngas ma'i ye shes rlung du grub// phyin pa med par mthar song pa// bde chen goms pa'i stobs las gyur// bcud lnga 'dus pa'i thig le ni// ro lnga 'dres pa'i bde chen de// bsgom dang
182b8: mthar byin khyad par gyi/ / bde ba chen po rigs mchog gnas// de nas gang yin brjod bya ba// zab mo kun rdzogs brtul zhugs can// dbang po dang zhing smin pa yi// chags can nyi zla nus 'dzin pas// spyi gtsug thig ler

183a1: 'khor lo dang / / gsang pa'i 'og min nus ldan pa// 'byor pa'i rten can 'di nyid gnas// thabs dang rol pa'i khyad par dang // ting 'dzin rlung gi dbang thob ste// 'byung bzhi snyigs phye dngas dus su// nyi zla 'dres te
183a2: gar thabs kyis/ / lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu// rol pa'i thabs kyis gang rtsen pa// bye brag brgyad bcu gnyis 'dus pa'i// pad ma'i snying po kun bkug ste// thig le dpa' bo lnga yi stobs// mi sdod 'phro ba'i rang bzhin
183a3: nyid/ / thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bcings la bzung zhing gnas par bya// de dang rtse phrad gnyis bzlog pas// bde ba'i myu gu gso byas pas// tha mal zhen pa kun bral nas// rtog dang lhan cig gang skyes pa// dngas
183a4: sdigs phye ba'i nyams dag gis/ / snyigs ma bag chags zhen bcas pa// de yi stobs kyis gnas mi 'gyur// gsang ba'i thig le stobs ldan pas// rigs ngan tha mal zhen chags dang // dran rtogs ma lus phan byas ste/
183a5: phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du// ma lus dpung btsugs rgyal bar mdzad// rdo rje pad ma'i snying po la// dga' ba'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i ro// phyogs bcu'i
183a6: rgyal ba 'dus pa'i tshe/ / zag med yon tan gter chen de// gsang ba thabs kyis stobs las grub// bde chen snying po thig le'i ro// dbab dang gzung bzlog 'byongs pa yis// rtsa gsum gang zhig thim pa'i tshe// bar chad med
183a7: pa'i bde ba dang / / thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon shes dang // skye shi med pa'i tshe 'thob cing // mi 'gyur chos sku thig le la// rgyu ba spangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas// bde chen cho 'phrul dpag med pas// gsang ba'i zhing khams
183a8: dag byed cing / / gsad pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bde chen nyams dang dga' ba'i gang// chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs pas// ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug par// klu ni sna tshogs len byed cing // mdzes dang ngo tsha spangs

183b1: ba'i tshul/ / mdog dmar rA dang ldan pa yis// rol pa'i tshul ni sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje bcud chen zla bcas zla// nyi ma chags pa dang bcas pa'i// pad ma'i snying po'i glengs mdzad cing // dga' ba'i 'od dang 'khrud pa'i ga
183b2: rlung gi snying po brjod byed cing / / srid pa'i myu gu 'gog par mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud chen po las bsgrub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
183b3: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa// bya ba las kyi rim pa dag/ bzhir ni gsal bar gsungs pa yin// dang por zhi ba'i rang bzhin te// de 'og rgyal bas rgyas phyir ro// rgyas pas dbang du
183b4: bya ba dang / / dbang mi 'dra ba bsgral phyir te// thun mong khyad par yon tan rdzogs// bya ba'i las la ma rmongs shing // nus pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rim pa ji bzhin brtsams par bya// gangs dkar 'dab sa dang yid 'dar ba//
183b5: zhi ba'i ljon shing me tog tshal// 'bras ldan rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no// sum mdor ma grogs gting zab pas// dbang du bsdu ba'i gnas su bshad// dur khrod mtshan cig rgya gram gnas// 'byung po 'dra sar drag po shis// zhi la
183b6: sa bzhi dkar ldan pa/ / zlum po gsum rim oM dang bcas// 'khor lo 'od dkar dang bcas pa// zhi ba'i thab kyi rang bzhin no// rgyas la ser po tsan dan bcas// gru bzhi rim gsum tra dang bcas// rin chen 'od zer 'gro
183b7: bcas pa/ / thab ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin// dbang las dmar chags 'od can// zla gam gzhu 'dra pad mas mtshan// rim gsum hri dang bcas pa ni// dbang du bya ba'i thab yin no// drag pos nag dung sol can//
183b8: gru gsum rdo rje rtse gsum gdeng// thod 'phred 'od nag rim gsum hUM// drag po thab kyi rim pa yin// 'o ma can dang gser can dang // chags pa can dang tshe ram can// phrin las bzhi ni so so yi// yam shing bsreg shing

184a1: nyid du bshad/ / ling ga kha dog so so ste// gnas kyang thag khung bzhi dang mtshungs// mar dkar 'bras kar til dkar dang // nas dkar chan dang 'o ma zhe// dngul phye gtor ma dkar por bcas// zhi ba'i bsreg
184a2: gtor rdzas su bshad/ / mar rnying bu ram sbrang rtsi dang // 'bras dang chan rnams ldong ros dang // me tog gser dang tsan dan bcas// gsar phye gtor ma ser por bcas// 'di dag rgyas pa'i rdzas nyid de// dpal dang gzi byin
184a3: rgyas par 'gyur/ / tsha ba'i mar dang chang sbyar dang // ram bu pad ma rag ta dang // 'bras dmar tsan dan zangs phye dang // gtor ma dmar po dbang rgyas yin// tshil chen mar dang tsha ba gsum// klung chen sha khrag sran chan dang //
184a4: ngag gsum thal mi tsha ba'i mar// ske tshe phye gsum mi khrag dang // mi rus spel mar bcas gtor mas// bsgral ba drag po'i rdzas su bshad// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum po// logs la zhi
184a5: ba'i la dkod la/ / de bzhin gshegs par gsal bas gdab// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// mgo rtse rgya mdud gru bzhi bcas// logs la rgyas pa'i lha bsgoms te// rin chen nga rgyal bcas pas gdab// zangs sam
184a6: b+hu ru dmar shing rnams/ / mgo ba rgya mdud rtse zla ga ma// logs la dbang gi lha dkod la// chags pa rdo rjer gsal bas gdab// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse gzur gsum// logs la drag
184a7: po'i lga bkod la/ / zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal bas gdag/ oM dang dr-i hri hA nyid las// 'byung lnga'i rim pa gsal stangs su// e baM ma ya thum las skyeng// zhal yas zlum po gru bzhi dang // blagam gru gsum ji bzhin dbyings
184a8: kha dog rang gi tshul bzhin bskyed/ / rang rang sa bon gdan stengs laM// 'o dad bzhin bro 'du'i cho ga yis// las bzhi gtso bo las bzhin bskyed// 'khor yang gtso bo'i cha 'dra ba// phyag mtshan rang dang thugs rtags la// las

184b1: bzhi rtags kyi mtshan ma ste/ / kha dog las kyis dbye bar bshad// dbang bskur las bzhi rigs kyis brgyan// las bzhi 'od kyi 'phro 'dra can// cho gas gsal bar bskyed byas la// spyan drang ba stem sogs las rdzogs bya// las
184b2: dang ting 'dzin bzhi nyid kyis/ / las bzhi rtse gcig ting 'dzin bya// gang du dmigs pa rtse gcig pas// las bzhi bya ba'i cho ga dag/ ma lus pa dag 'grub 'gyur na// phra mo'i lus rnams smos ci dgos// shar phyogs su ni kha
184b3: bltas te/ / dang ba'i yid ni mi g.yo bas// rdzogs pa'i dkyil krung la gnas te// ma rungs gdug pa zhi bar bya// lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te// dga' ba'i 'du shes rtse gcig pas// rin chen dkyil dkrung la gnas pas// dpal
184b4: dang gzi byin 'phel bar bya/ / nub kyi phyogs su kha ltas te// chags dang zhen pa rtse gcig pa// pad ma'i dkyil dkrung la gnas te// ma lus dbang du bsdu bar bya// / byang phyogs nyid du kha bltas te// khros pa'i sems kyis so bca
184b5: zhing / / ru sbal dang ni gyad stabs kyis// gdug pa bskal te lam du zhugs// so so'i sngags kyi rim pa dag/ snga dro zhi ba'i las byas te// gung la rgyas pa nyid du bya// dgongs ka dbang gi dus nyid de// drag po nam gyi gung la bya// nam
184b6: zla dus bzhir bsrubs pas na/ / nges par las bzhi 'grub par 'gyur// oM che ge mo sha na ti ku ru sA hA// sa che ge mos puSh+Ti ti ku ru swA tA// hI che ge mo ba sha~M ku ru hUM swa hA// hI che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ling ga'i gnas kyang
184b7: las bzhi'i dbyibs/ / dgug dang pur bu bzhi btab la// ri lu 'am lhag ma btubs pa te// so so lce yi zhal du stab// rtse mo zhi byed yan/ rgyas// sdong po dbang la rtsa ba drag/ khaM dang mngar skyur tsha ba'i shing // ro yi mchod pa de
184b8: bzhin te/ / rgyud gzangs rgyal po smad 'tshed ma// shan pa'i khyim nas ma blangs te// las dang 'thun pa'i ra skyes mnan// sa bon bzhi las rim pa bzhin// pa ba ka dang dbang chen dang // gzi byin can dang 'joms byed bzhi// su

185a1: mdog las bzhis phye ba ste/ / sku 'di sgom dang zhags pa dang // rtse gsum g.yon pa bgrang phreng nyid// rigs bzhis las bzhi byin brlabs dbu// spyan drang mchod bstan las rdzogs nas// lto bar bruM las
185a2: gzhal yas su/ / las dang mthun pa'i lha bskyed la// rang rang rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin// bsreg dang bro ga ra las byas pas// gang yang 'grub par the tsom med// zhe sdong can dang nga rgyal can// sdug bsngal bdug sems nad
185a3: gzir ba/ / de 'dra zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i las ni rtsom pa yin// tshe thung na dam dpal longs spyod// phongs dang nyam dang 'jigs pa dag/ dngas snyigs zad nas snying por thim// thig le me shigs bcud 'dus pa//
185a4: rlong nyid thig le'i rang du 'gag/ chu ba'i rlung la dbang thob cing // mngon shes skye 'jigs thob bral bas// bde chen nam mkha' ye shes nyid// rdo rje thig le 'gyur 'jig med// steng dang 'og las gang sbyang bas// sku gsum
185a5: thugs kyi pho brang dag/ bde chen til 'bru bcud bzhin du// nyi zla gnas pa'i bar du 'bar// 'bab pa thig le zla ba'i gzugs// kha bcad rlung gis bzung bya zhing // 'og gis phul zhing steng gis drang // ma lus bde chen khyab par
185a6: gnas/ / mi rtog gsal ba mthar phyin pa// seng phug zla ba rdzogs pa ltar// thabs dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i ye shes chen po la// ma lus yon tan rdzogs par gnas// chags can brtul zhugs bral ba
185a7: yi/ / lus dang dran rtogs bag chags bcas// rigs dang rigs min gang yang rung // sgo gsum ma lus bcas pa dag/ stong sgo'i gdul bya des 'dul yin// dang por gsang ba'i rim thob pas// rlung dang thig le'i las/
185a8: goms nas// bde chen byang chub sems kyi ro// sems lnga'i tshul gyis gang snang ba// g.yo thob brtan pa'i nyams nyid kyis// lus dang phyinang dran rtogs bcas// nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid du skye// lus dang snang bar

185b1: bcas pa yi/ / nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mi phyed pa// bde chen thig le a dang gnas// thig le stong pa'i ri mo can// gsal bar shes pa rgyu bas mngon// 'og nas bskul zhing steng nas mnan// dngas snyigs ba sre ba'i thabs la
185b2: 'jug/ bde ba'i rlung can ya ma gi sgo// / spyod pa'i sbyor bas gyen du phul// rgyu ba rlung gi snying po can// dpa' bo lam nas thur du then// rigs pa'i ye shes gnas pa'i rlung // stong nyid nam mkha'i dbyings su thim// byi nang
185b3: rgu ba chad pa dang / / rig pa thig le'i dang la gnas// bde ba'i rtags ni 'byung 'gyur te// 'dar dang rdul dad pa spu ldang // sgra dang lus bde rgyug pa dang // rgod dang brgyal sogs gang byung ba// brtan dang sbyang ba'i cho ga bya//
185b4: mi 'thun log pa'i chos brtags na// thabs kyi rim pa'i cho ga yis// gdon dang spos dang gnon pa dag/ ji ltar rigs par rtag par bya// rang lus thig le'i nyams myong la// bar chad med par gsal 'jug pa// tha mal zhen pa
185b5: sbyar ba dang / / bde ba'i dbang phyug smin pa dang // dran rtog rgyud sogs zhi ba dang // bde chen rgyas pas khyab pa dang // rlung dang bde ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang // dran rtog a yi dang du gnas// 'di ni nang gi rim
185b6: pa yin/ / de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las// gsang ba'i phrin las bzhir byung ba// bka' thub can dang tha mal dang // thun mong lam las bzlog phyir ro// 'dod chags zhen cing dbang po smin//
185b7: tshad ldan yul dang bcas pa yin// bde chen dgongs pa thig le'i gnas// yon tan khyad par kun tu rdzogs// gnyis med 'khril pa'i ngo bo ni// bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i gnas// gsang ba'i b+ha ga rgyas pa ni// zhi rgyas dbang drag
185b8: tshul bzhin dang / / nus pa byin rlabs gang ldan pa// gsang ba'i thig le'i tshul la gnas// pad ma gsang ba'i thab khung du// gsang ba'i sbyin bsreg gang phul ba// lo dang zla ba ma yin par// myur du bde chen lus su 'gyur//

186a1: thabs dang shes rab las 'byung ba'i// dngas snyigs bcud dang bag chags dang // nyi zla khu bar bcas pa ni// bde chen gsang ba mchod pa'i rdzas// gdung dang bde ba bral ba dang // zhen rtog de nyid chags pa yi// rang gi ling
186a2: gde nyid la/ / gsang ba'i phu ba ba'i rdzogs pa// gsang ba'i yul la btab pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i ting 'dzin la// las bzhi ma bcal rdzogs par ldan// rol pa'i tshul dang thig le gnyis pa da mdza rje snying po'i/ 1
186a3: dang sbyor tshul gang yin pa/ / gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i dus su blta// gnas pa rtsa yi tshul dag ni// kha dog dbyibs sogs tha dad pas// mchod rdzas nyi zlar bcas kun la// gzar bu gnyis bcas thabs phul bas// thig le chen por
186a4: 'bab par 'gyur/ / gsang ba'i don la dga' ba dang // rig pa'i btul zhugs spyod pa dang // dbang po dar cing smin pa dang // thig le'i don la mos pa dang // rlung dang bcud la goms pa yi// rnal 'byor po mo bcas pa kun/ dran rtog
186a5: phyi ma bcas pa'i yid/ / gdul bya'i don du de bshad do// gang dag thabs la mkhas pa dang // dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// thabs dang sbyor ba la tshon zhing // nyi zla rtsa sbyor dbang thob nas// bzung zlog 'byongs pa'i kar thabs
186a6: kyis/ / dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i don// sems lnga'i tshul gyis gsal bar skye// nyi zla zhon pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang // rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas// khams bzhi 'dus pa'i snying po las// bde chen thig le me tog pa// thabs kyis
186a7: de ltar mngon du snang / / thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis// skal med las kyis dman pa la// dbang dang brgyud pa bral ba yis// tshig dang rigs pa ci bstan kyang // rigs ngan rgyal sar bzhag pa ltar// bdag par gan
186a8: rlag 'jig par 'gyur/ / gang du gsad pa'i thig le nyid// gsang ba'i lam lngar nyams skyes pas// zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mkha' 'gro gsum la gang brten nas// ye shes thig le rgya dpag med// rim pas/

186b1: bathar thug gnas su 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la 'dris goms pas// rgyu ba thig ler thim pa dang // dran rtog nam mkhar gsal ba dang // bde chen sngon du smin pa yis// 'chi med sangs rgyas sa la spyor// 'jigs pa
186b2: kun las grol ba dang / / lha mo tshags kyis byin brlabs nas// rol rtsed sna tshogs bsgyur byed cing // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med cing // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing // rdo rje dbang gis mtshams sbyar nas// ye
186b3: ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog mnyes/ / nam mkha'i mthar thug bar du ni// bde chen ye shes zag pa med// ye shes rgya mtsho byin brlabs can// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa// rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bor 'gyur// rdo rje sema?
186b4: pa sgyu 'phrul drab gsang ba me long gi rgyud las phrin las mtha' yas pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsad pa'i lam la gang dga' bas// thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i
186b5: lam/ / rim pa nyid du bshad par bya// dad dang brtul zhugs che ba dang // theg pa chen por rigs des shing // snying brtsed dbang dang dam tshig ldan// sgrub la brtson pa'i gang zag gis// lus dang longs spyod 'tsho ba dang / bu dang chung sa N+Da
186b6: srid kyis/ / dang por bla ma mnyes byas la// thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa blang // phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rang 'byung ye shes rang sdud pa// gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis// / bden pa gnyis med 'brel ba nyid
186b7: byin brlabs sgra dang gtan tshigs kyi/ / rang 'byung ye shes mngon du snang // rang gnas 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// rtog ge spyod yul ma gyur pa// thabs chen thabs las 'byung ba yi// 'phel dang dga' bde longs spyod
186b8: phyir/ / rgyas pa'i las la 'bad par bya// dbang chen gzi byin chen po dang // rgyal rigs blon po bram ze dang // gdug pa dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// rjes dgug dbang gi las brtsam mo// dgra dang bgegs sogs ma rungs

187a1: pa/ / gang gis 'dul bar mi nus pa// gzir zhing 'du shes bsgyur ba'i phyir// drag po bsgral pa'i phrin las brtsam// gang yang rung ba'i dngos po la// dang po mi 'thun zhi bar bya// de nas yon tan rgyas par bya//
187a2: de nyid dbang bsdu las la sbyar// gang te dbang du ma gyur na// drag pos gzir te bsgral bar bya// gal te log par lhung srid pas// 'og min gnas su phaT kyis 'phang // nges par 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za// dang por sngon
187a3: bya'i las kyis ni/ / nus dang mi nus khyad par rtag/ de nas nus pa thob pa ste// de nas bde ba'i rtsal thob nas// thogs pa med pa'i phrin las 'grub// zag med lam la goms sbyangs pas// cho 'phrul bzhi dang phrin las bzhi// gdul/
187a4: bya zhing dang nus mthu dang // byin brlabs rtsal gyi khyad par 'phags// mthar phyin sku lnga'i zhing thob pas// ma rtsal chu dang rlabs bzhin du// dpag med yon tan ngo bo'i phyir// lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las yin// las dang nyen mongs gdug pa dang /
187a5: gdug bsngal rtog pa ji snyed pa// cho ga thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// lhan ne lhang der zhi bar 'gyur// nga rgyal rin chen bzi brjid kyis// dpal dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // tshe dang lang tsho stobs ldan zhing // yon tan nam mkha'i
187a6: mtha' dang mnyam/ / 'dod chags rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// bdud dang gdug pa rgyal po dang // lha dbang srin po mkha' 'gro ma// phyag na rdo rje'ang dbang du 'gyur// zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// cho ga rdzas dang sngags ldan pas// chos
187a7: sku rdo rje'ang 'jig 'gyur na/ / gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// rang lus bde chen kun gyi dbyings// rang lus thig le'i thabs mkhas pas// sbyor ba rlung gi goms stobs can// dkyil 'khor nang la gnas gyur pas// nyam
187a8: kyis las bzhi gsal gyur te/ / rim pa ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang // rang gi mngon par gsal gyur pa// nus pa brtan pas mngon du 'gyur// gzhan min 'khor lo pho brang nyid// gnas dang 'jug dang gzung ba dang // bstim zhing gnas/

187b1: pa gang yin pa// de dag nyid du bshad pa yin// d+harma tsakra gzhal yas khang// rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dkyil na// e baM ma ya las bzhi dbyibs// kha dog las kyis gtser gyur pa// bag chags sa bon snyigs ma dang // rtog dang tha mal
187b2: zhen pa'i rdzas/ / nyams myong 'gyur med bzhir gnas te// thig les de nyid zhi ba dang // rang lus phyi nang thig les rgyas// rlung dang thig le rtog par bcas// nus pas dbang du 'dus pa dang // thig les ma bcos nam mkha'i dang / srog
187b3: dang thig ler bcas bsdus pa/ / a yi dang du thim 'gyur te// rku ba dngas shing 'bar ba mnon// mi 'gyur dbyings la gnas par bya// rang lus thabs kyi ngo bo las// 'khor lo bzhi dang mi rlung dang // spyod pa rlung gis las rung bas
187b4: nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal/ / thig les rgyud dang lus rgyas pas// bde chen dbang thob zhen chags bral// ting 'dzin sbyor bas gang bskul na// rim pa'i rtags dang nus pa byung // kha dog grangs dang snying po dang // dbyibs
187b5: dang tshang dang thig le yi/ / khyab pa la sogs mtha' yas pa// bzhugs tshul de nyid de bzhin no// 'khor lo bzhi yi thab khud du// gtum mo byin za' las bskul pas// dngas snyigs rtogs pa'i bag chags dag/ mi shigs thig
187b6: ler mchod pa pu la/ / phyi nang rmya ba ma lus pa// rang byung 'khor lo thig le mchog/ spyod yul mthun mong ma lus pa// byi yi rnam pa lam byed pas/ thun mong gyi yi lam du bshad// de nyid na duHla po lo// shi las nang dunyams skyed pa/ ma pa'adi ni
187b7: nadu gad / dbang thob sbyangs pa ma rtogs pa// skal ngan rigs chad yul min pa// / gsang bas gsang pa zhes bshad do// dang po blo ldan gang zag ni// ma lus bden pa dbyer med la// rang bzhin rig pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// phung po
187b8: khams dang skye mched la/ / thabs dang shes gnyis med pa'i don// ye nas sangs rgyas rdzogs pa nyid// de nyid dus gsum ma skyes pa// gang la rten nas rtogs pa la// lam gyi yan lag kun rdzogs te// sa bcu rim par ma bkod rdzogs//

188a1: ma lus yon tan rang shar bas// thams cad ma lus mi 'da' la// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid// dbang po cig car spyod yul yin// gang su blo dang mos pa dang // rtogs chung mtshan ma dga' ba la// thun
188a2: mo sgo 'thun khyad par can/ / rim pa'i rnal 'byor brlab par bya// dang por phyi nang snod bcud kun// rang sa nyid ni mi dmigs pa// ma bcos ma gsal mi gnas pa// dngos po ci la'ang mi rtag cing // de nyid la yang mi rtog pa// 'dzin
188a3: rtog zhen pa mi gnas par/ / bsam dang bsam bya med tshul gyis// bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa// gang gi ngo bong ma grub pa// ci la'ang mi gnas sbyor ba yis// rang sar mi rtog ngo bo nyid// bcos pa med pa'i tshul du bsgom// gal te mtshan
188a4: ma'i rgyu ba dag/ chu las rnyog pa'i tshul byung na// ma bcos rang bzhin gzhag pa yis// ma lus rtog med de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin bzhag pas dag par 'gyur// nam mkha' dag par 'gyur ba'i tshe// sprin kyang rang 'byung dag pa ltar//
188a5: byung tshor dran tog ma lus pa// chos nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no// gang du snang srid ma lus pa// phyi nang med pa'i sems nyid de// de nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin du// goms shing nus pa brtan pa'i tshe// de nyid rnal 'byor de nyid ni// stong pa chen
188a6: po rnal 'byor yin/ / sgo gsum byed spyod ma bcos pa// ma brtags mi rtog cir mi gnas// 'di ni rnal 'byor rtse gcig pas// bya ba spangs pa'i spyod pa yin// de nas de las langs pa'i tshe// sgyu ma chu zla smig stu dang // 'dza' tshon
188a7: lnga ba chu bur ltar/ / snang yang dngos por gnas ma yin// rigs pa phyi nang ma lus pa// stong pa'i tshe 'phrul snang du zad// ma lus rig pa'i ngo bo ste// de yang rgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar// zhe nas
188a8: med pa'i tshul du bsgom/ / ye shes sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni// dpag med ngo bor rang snang yang // byin brlabs cho 'phrul rang snang ba// de ltar ma rtogs dman pa la// rang 'byung snying rjer 'char ba'i phyir// snying rje chen po rnal 'byor

188b1: yin/ / 'gro ba gang dang gang dag las// snying rje chen po gang gzigs pas// sna tshogs mdzad pa'i tshul nyid kyis// de snyed spyod la mtha' yas te// don dang 'thun par 'ba' zhig ston// tha mal pa dang thabs nyid dang // lus
188b2: ngag yid kyis ci 'tsham par/ / don 'gyur spyod pa bsam mi khyab// gang du byams dang snying rje yis// ma khyab ming gi rnal 'byor te// theg pa chen po'i rigs chad cing // dman pa'i rigs su gyur pa yin// rtsa ba med pa'i
188b3: sems nyid ni/ / chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// nam mkha'i ris dang dbyer med ltar// ma lus rang rgyud bral ba yi// ngo bo bden min brdzun pa min// chos rnams ming tsam dngos po med// sgo gsum 'di ltar brtan pa ni// /
188b4: thugs rje chen po spyod pa yin// de nas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bzhin gnyis med rigs pa ni// yi ge hUM du gsal bar bsgom// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// 'phro 'dus hUM du gsal bar bya// rdul phran de skyed 'du
188b5: pa las/ / thig le mi dmigs stong par blta// ma dang a las nyi zla'i gdan// gang bsgril hUM bcas gsal bar bya// rang rang gsung yang 'gal ba med// sgril ma'i snying po phyag mtshan te// 'phro 'du 'phra mo'i
188b6: rang bzhin sku/ / gsal la skyon dang bral bar bsgom// de nas rang rang tshad gyur pa'i// rigs pa'i phyag rgya chen po nyid// zhi dang khro bo skabs nyid du// ji ltar 'thad par bsgom par bya// yang na zhal cig phyag gnyis te//
188b7: yad na zhal gsum phyag drug bsgom// gnas cig gnas gsum gnas lngar yang // yan lag lha ni tshang bar bsgom// bsgom nas snyims te spyod yul kun// de ltar gsal bar brtag par bya// rtsa ba cig pa'i lha sgom
188b8: pa/ / phyag rgya cig pa'i rnal 'byor yin// sgo gsum bsgom pa rab 'bad pas// rnam par g.yeng ba'i chos spyod 'das// ma lus rtsa ba'i spyod pa ste// phyogs cig pa yi spyod par gsungs// de nas rtog pa'i yan

189a1: lag dag/ gnyis ka thabs dang shes rab tu// brtags te de ltar bsgom par bya// 'od zer 'phro ba 'bru gsum nyid// yang na ye shes lnga nyid de// gnas cig snying por gnas par bya// de bzhin gtso bo gtso mo dang /
189a2: sems pa dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo khra mo sprul pa dang // yid chos dag la'ang shes par bya// zhal dang phyag dang lha grangs dang // tshom bu spros pas spros bcas yin// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// chom bu
189a3: lnga la khro bcas bsgom/ / yang na sku gsung thugs ldan pa'i// tshom spu gsum dang bcas pa yi// khro bo khro mo 'khor du bsgom// rigs kyi gtso ste thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo tshogs dang bcas pa yi// mos pa'i tshul dang
189a4: sbyor ba yis/ / tshem bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// slob dpon mthar nye'i lam gnas pas// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa// rdo rje thig tshad bor tsam gyis// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa// sna tshogs
189a5: dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs/ / dang po rgyang grags dkyil 'khor te// de nas dpag tshad dkyil 'khor nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// de nas yo byad lnga
189a6: ldan pas/ / ting 'dzin mos pa spyod 'thun pa'o// skye bo tsam du grangs 'thun pas// tshem bus 'dod pa'i don bsgrub bya// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// pho mo 'dus pa'i grangs mnyam par// yo byad 'dus pa'i tshogs ldan
189a7: pas/ / dgon par 'khor khang rab brtsigs te// rang rang thabs dang shes rab tu// brtags te yo byad longs spyod cing // rdo rje glu bro gar thabs kyis// zhag ni gsum bcu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis//
189a8: tshel dbang sgyur zag med thob// de nas rgya phrag bcu drug gis// sku lnga lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// skye bo madz+ra ba kun tshogs pa// rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs zhes bya// 'byor pa'i longs spyod tshad pa ni// bde ba'i lodra

189b1: spyod tshogs su bshad/ / lha dang dam can kun 'dus pas// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs su gsungs// thams cad spyod pa mi 'dzin pas// tshogs gnyis rgyun du rdzogs byed pas// tshogs chen po ru nges par bshad//
189b2: bar chad med pa'i lam rdzogs pas// rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa med// lha mi cha byad 'dzin mod kyi// 'byung tsho 'phrul dbang sgyur thob// zhing dang longs spyod dag paM yis// gong nas gong du mnyam par sbyor// rdo rje rig pa
189b3: 'dzin gyi sgra/ / 'di khams kun la gnas par byed// gal te mtshan mar zhan dbang gis// rtogs pa'i skyabs ni chung gyur ni// byang chub phyag rgya rdo swA// mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa// chags lugs mngon du 'byung
189b4: na yang / / zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min// gang du sbyar ba'i yum rnams kyang // thun mong lam dang skabs gnyis su// nus pa'i khyad par che chung gis// phrin las bzhi ru bshad pa ni// dkar mo bong chung skad chen la// bzhin
189b5: lus gtsug pud g.yas su 'khyil/ / yan lag phra 'jam skad gsal zhing // rlung khar lci bas zhi ba bya// zla dang yan lag mang ba dang // phra zhing bshan la gzangs su ring // bzhin lus ser zhing gru bzhir gnas// rnam
189b6: 'phyangs sha dang nu ma rgyas/ / 'phel ba'i dusu 'di dag bzung // bzhin mdog pad 'dra sogs ka la// smin sgyus ring la stod smad phyed// lus dang chu rlung dri zhim zhing // bde ba ldan zhing yan lag med// 'di ni sdud pa'i
189b7: mchog du 'gyur/ / nag mo gru gsum rtsing mgo ma// khro gnyer byas pa'i lus ldan zhing // gtum zhing brling tshig 'dzem pa med// rtsang me'i tog bral gsod par bshad// gang du nus pa brtan thob pa// de dag sa
189b8: nas sar spyod pa/ / rig pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid// rnal 'byor rim pa'i lung ldan pa// ma skyes mnyam la dbang sgyur zhing // ma lus gsel bar mthar phyin pa'o// rang rig ye shes rgyud don phyir/ rang snang rig pa mngon byas pa//

190a1: rigs 'dzin mchog ste lhun grub pa'o// ting 'dzin nus pa'i mthu med kyang // sa sbyong sems dpa' skyed du med// bde gshegs nyid dang spyod yul cig/ rig pa'i skyes bu'i lung thob bo// gal te 'byung ba'i lus 'jig na/
190a2: bdag nyid sgog sum lta ba nya zhing // 'byung ba bsags pa'i lus las grol// ting 'dzin phyag rgya chen por smin// khyung phrug sbubs dang bral ba ltar// ma lus phyag rgya rgyu ma'i mchog/ rnam par smin ces de la mchod// 6
190a3: pa zad pa rdo rje lus/ / phyin chad 'gyur 'jig chos dang bral// bde ba chen po lung thob pas// zag bcas bslab pa'i chos dang bral/ zhing la dbang sgyur sprul pa'i lus// ting 'dzin longs spyod dpag tu med// bsgrubs pa'i
190a4: nus pa gang brtan pa/ / rdo rje lus gyur 'jig pa med// 'jig pa lnga bral zag pa zad// dbang sgyur gsum la dbang thob pas// bde ba longs spyod dpag tu med// grangs med bskal par don byed cing // mthong bas de bzhin
190a5: gnyis med rigs/ / rgyal 'tsha ba skyes bu sa spyod pa// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing // mtha' dbus bsam pa'i rgyun las 'das// 'jigs bral dbugs phyin mya ngan 'das// rang
190a6: snang dpag med zhal mthong bas/ / gzhan du blta ba'i yul dang bral// ting 'dzin rig pasgoms pa'i mthu// mtshan ma sdug po yul las 'das// 'jig rten stong phrag dbang sgyur zhing // gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i rigs
190a7: nam mkha' mtha' thug med pa ltar/ / bsgoms dang nus pa'i rtsal stobs kyis// bag chags mtshan ma'i tshad tshing la// ting 'dzin rig pa'i me byung bas// zhing khams rgya bral dpag med du// ting 'dzin rig pas gang sbyangs
190a8: ba/ / bsgoms dang ting 'dzin rig pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung thob pa// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin// de nas rig pa'i rtsal rdzogs shing // ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// mthar byin rig pa'i skyes bu ste// zhing khaMs

190b1: bya ba'i dbang thob cing / / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi sras// dbang dang cho 'phrul kun thob pa// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dgongs pas khyab// mnyam gzhag rjes thob khyad par gyis// rgyal ba'i lung mnod dka' la gnas//
190b2: zhing khams dag par kun spyod kyang // rmad 'byung gsang ba'i rang bzhin la// spyod kyang lta ba'i rang bzhin gyis// phyogs bral nam mkha' mi mthong bas// dbang dang dgongs pas mthar phyin 'gyur// dbang dang dam tshig brtul
190b3: zhugs te/ / dang por slab pa mthar phyin cing // thig le rdzogs par 'dod pa yis// gsang ba nad gyi don la sbyar// thun mong bya ba mthar phyin nas// lus dang spyod yul bcas pa dang // lha yi rnal 'byor ma lus pa/
190b4: bde chen thig le nyid du blta// lha dang bde bar mnyam sbyor bas// thig le bde bar snang ba nub// sku bzhi dkyil 'khor khams thig le// dngas ma lnga ru mnyam sbyor ba// ngo bo dang ni rkyen dag gis// thabs kyi rim pa skul
190b5: las shes/ / bde ba'i thig le nyams myong ba// mi rtog bde ba cha shas med// mi shigs thig le kun gyis bdag/ stong nyid 'brel pa'i ri mo can// tha mal bya ba kun bral ba// spyod pa nyid du bstan pa yin// thig le bzhu
190b6: pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ / 'dzag 'bar thim gang bde ba ni// sa yang bcu gsum bde bas brgyan// lus kun khyab pa'i thig le shum// til 'bru bcud kyis khyab pa ltar// ma lus khyab pa'i ros gang ba// ma lus 'od dang
190b7: snying po ltar/ / snang srid thig le chen po nyid// bde ba chen pos khyab par gsal// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ni// khams lnga 'dres pa'i snying po ste// mi shigs thig le bde ba'i bcud// ma lus bde ba'i rgyas brtab pra/
190b8: nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ste// thig le cig gis kun khyab pas// bde chen snying rjes cig tu 'khyil// de nyid bde chen phyag rgya ste// nang gi phyag rgya gcig par bshad/

191a1: de nyid nges par las rung bas// thig le bde chen dang bcas pa'i// bye phrag brgyad bcu ma lus par// so so'i thig ler sku 'phros shing // khams lnga ye shes ro dang bcas// sa bon thig le bde bas brgyan// me tog
191a2: thig le thugs mchog sgra/ / rang lus smin nas snang bar spro// gang nas gang la spros gyur pa// de srid thig le'i phyag rgya ste// bde ba'i thig les grangs las 'das// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// mi phyed ro yis gang khyab
191a3: pas/ / grangs 'das bde chen tsho ga rdzogs nas ma lus bde ba'i phyag rgyar snang // gang de de yis rgyas btab pas// de nyid bde chen thig ler smin// rnam par phyi nang snyigs mar bcas// bde chen thig le'i ngo bor smin// snyi
191a4: ma 'byung ba'i lus las 'das/ / snying por bar chad med pa'i lus// thig les tha ma'i snod gang pas// ma lus bde ba chen por smin// de nas thabs dang ting 'dzin dang // rlung gi 'dres pa'i stobs ldan pa// rin chen lung
191a5: gi thig ler zhugs/ / skad cig sngon shes lngar smin cing // 'gro ba ris dang thar par 'gyur// mi shigs a la thig le thim// 'byung 'jug med pa'i rlung 'thob cing // / 'gyur 'jig
191a6: sal gnas/ bal bats+tsha ma pa'i bad pa ny-id/ sang bzigs nyid // ga me thung du ma du rtsis/ sa me pachags thal// do na pags dang byung ga/ can da tha ba'i de na / ma nga
191a7: tsha ba 'am/ / rgya mtsho dang ni rlan bzhin no// rlung dang thig le rig pa dang // tshe dang longs spyod byung ba dang // 'dod lnga kun la dbang sgyur theb// bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni// ma lus zag med thig le ste// rgya bral rig pa'i thig le nyid//
191a8: snyigs ma'i zag pa rlung zad pas// ting 'dzin bde chen thig ler gsal// rig pa bde chen ror gsal bas// ci mthong bde chen phyag rgya nyid// 'dus pas sgyur ba'i spyod yul lam// mun 'gyur dug rtsi ji bzhin du// rgya dang bral

191b1: ba'i zhing khams dag/ bde chen phyag rgya chen por 'gyur// gang dag sgoms pa'i skyes bu ni// tha mal pa dang brkam chags pa// rnam pa'i spros pa ma lus pa// bsgoms dang ched du ma byas par// bde chen thig ler lhan
191b2: gyis grub/ / dper na chu dang rlabs bzhin nas// rgya mtshor phyin pa'i 'du shes ltar// goms pas bde chen gsal mthar phyin// rkyen dang gnod pa ma lus pa// reg dang mthong thos dran pas kyang // bde chen thig le nyas
191b3: su 'bar/ / bskal pa du mar gnas gyur cing // 'byung ba lnga dang spyod yul kun// rang lus bde bar bsre ba 'grub// gsang ba'i lam la goms byed na// mtshon byed rigs pa'i bde ba yis// lha cig skyes pa'i dga'
191b4: brtogs/ / mthar phyin lam gyi rim pa 'grub// dbang po dar zhing chags pa dang // bde chen mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas// e dang baM la gnas pa yin// byang chub rdo rje dril las 'byung // dngos po lhan cig skyes pa yis// ma
191b5: lus bde bar rtogs byas la/ / phyi nang sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// gang zhig rtags dang ldan pa'i tshe// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas// bde chen mchog la rol par bya// ye shes nyid zla ro dang mnyam len pas// re dogs
191b6: chad pa'i thig le 'byung / / lhung med gnas dang thim pa dang // bdag po gdung can phrad pa las// nyin mtshan bral ba'i snang ba ltar// dus cig nyi zla shar ba'i tshe// ma lus bde bas khyab gyur na// g.yo ba med pa'i tshigal 'char/
191b7: gal te nyams pa'i ltas byung nas// thabs dang nyams dang ro pa yis// rim pa bzhin du bslab par bya// tha bas dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// nyi zla 'dres pa'i thig le nyid// dngos bral lhan cig skyes pa nyid// rgyal ba kun
191b8: gyi phyag rgya yin/ / lhan cig skyes la gnas pa'i tshe// ma lus bde chen ro gcig pas// bde chen phyag rgya cig tu gnas// rdo rje pad ma'i thig le nyid// sa ya bcu gsum phrag gnyis rtsa// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis//

192a1: so so bde ba'i pho brang du thig les gang bar spros pa'i tshe// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// nyams myong ro yis rgyas btab po// lus kyi bde ba mthar phyin nas// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel las 'das pa'i// rig pa'i bde ba
192a2: la gnas bya/ / gal te nyams na bsam pa 'am// blta dang mnyan pa la sogs pas// bar chad med par bsgom par bya// rig pa bde bar gang smin pas// sgo gsum bde ba chen por smin// spyod yul rlung dang thig ler bcas//
192a3: goms pa'i thabs la dbang sgyur bas// rten dang brten par bcas pa yis// thig le rlung la dbang sgyur zhing // lha mo mi mo gnod sbyin mo// mkha' 'gro rnams la dbang byed nus// thig le dbab dang 'dzin pa dang // zlog
192a4: dang sbyor la dbang sgyur te/ / gal te mkha' la 'phros pa'i tshe// dngos grub lam dang bral ba yin// phyin chad mchod dang nus pa sbyin// rang gi skabs ni ma rtogs pa// gzhan du thig le mi ltung zhing // dbang sgyur lam la goms
192a5: par bya/ / nyi zla 'dres pa'i bde ba nyid// zag med snying por thim pa'i tshe// sems kyi bde bar rang snang zhing // sems kyi bde ba bar chad med// gsal byed stobs dang bral ba'i tshe// ma lus bde chen phyag rgya ste// lus sems mahe
192a6: du gnas pa nyid/ / tshad dang rgya dbyings ro langs 'das// dpag med bde ba'i rol mo ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgyes chen te// thig le sa bon zab pa bral// bde chen nyams myong rgyun mi chad// rang nyid thig ler nyams myong bas//
192a7: snying po'i thig le bral ba med// phra zhing rdul bral dri ma med// rdo rje thig la dril bu nyid// 'bad rtsol med par rang snang ba// bral thob med pa'i ngo bor gnas// gang du yon tan tshogs kyis rab rgyas pa// bde chen chu
192a8: rgyun lta bu'i rgyun las byung / / tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub// gzhan na med de rang nyid snang bar zad// rang bzhin gnas phyir gzhan nas 'ong ba med// zhen pa bzlog pas bdag

192b1: zhal bdag gis mthong / / rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las lam gyi khyad par ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ma lus
192b2: kun gyi bsgrub bya nyid/ / phyogs bcu ma lus rdul snyed kyi// che ba'i yon tan bshad par bya// mthar byin lnga yi rang bzhin ni// rtogs dang 'bras bur gnas mod kyi// mthong dang goms dang grub pa nyid// thun mong 'bras
192b3: bur yang dag bshad/ / yang dag thar phyin 'bras bu rin// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// dpag med yon tan lhun rdzogs pa// tshad dang dmigs pa las 'das pa// bsam g.yas lhun gyis
192b4: grub pa ste/ / nam mkha' mtha' ltar dpag med pa// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes ni// ma lus mchog gi gter gyur pa// zad 'phel med pa'i nor bu ste// ma lus kun la mnyam du gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni//
192b5: rgya dbyings tshad las 'das pa yi// dag dang ma dag ci snang yang // blang dor phyogs ris yongs kyi med// rang 'byung 'od gsal maN Da la dang // ma lus cig gi rang bzhin te// thugs rjes byin rlabs tshad med pas// ma lus
192b6: bsam pa skong bar mdzad/ / ra 'byung ye shes lhun grub ni// chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo pas// ma lus phyogs med rang snang yang // zhen dang ched du byas pa med// sa dang lam la sogs pa yi// theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu ni// rang
192b7: rang ltos pa'i mthar thug kyang / / che mchog lhun grub mnyam dang bral// skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dpag med yon tan rnams// rigs bdag rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// nyi zla'i
192b8: bde ba'i mngon thob ste/ / rdo rje 'chang gis sa la bkod// dpag med rgyal ba thams cad kyi// 'gro ba'i gdul bya mtha' yas pas// sku gsung thags kyang de bzhin te// bzhugs tshul dpag med rnam par snang // che ba'i yon tan

193a1: lhun rdzogs pa'i/ / sangs rgyas drug pa'i rang bzhin te// nam mkha' mthas gtugs mtshan ma yi// bde chen ye shes rgyas par gnas// bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa ltar// ma lus rdzogs pa'i ye shes nyid//
193a2: sa mtha'i nyes pa kun bral ba// kun gyi yon tan bdag nyid gnas// sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas pa'i// nam mkha'i mtha' thug bar du ni// gdul bya'i gdul snyed gnas kyi bar// skad cig 'dra bral med par gnas// cud
193a3: 'dus thig le chen po ni/ / bde ba'i zag med thig le ste// a dang bde bar 'brel ba yi// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs// thig le'i bye brag brgya bcu'i rtsa// bcud 'dus gsang ba'i thig le'i ro// ma skyes mnyam la gnas
193a4: 'gyur zhing / / ma lus gang ba'i tshul gyis ni// zhing khams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa// zag med thig ler ro cag pas// nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid// sku bzhi 'dus pa'i khams thig le// dngas ma lnga 'dus snying
193a5: po can/ / gsum 'dus mi 'gyur snying po ste// bdes gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po// thig le ro yis gang bye ba// dpag med sku gsung yon tan thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab rang snang ba// thig le phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// phyin/
193a6: dngas snyigs ma lus pa// rang 'byung dngas ma'i thig le nyid// gzhan med phyogs med rang snang ba// phyogs med bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// yon tan rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste// bde ba chen po'i snying po las//
193a7: dpag med yon tan dam par 'phrul// bde ba chen po'i thig le ni// 'dra 'phro brel bas zag pa med// phyogs ris 'das pas ma khyab med// thog mtha' med par mnyam pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin te// thig le ro/
193a8: la mnyam bzhugs pas// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs chos thams cad// bde ba chen por gsal bar myong // mtshan dang dpe byad chad 'das pa// rang la rdzogs pa'i thig le nyid// ji snyed bde ba'i rol pa kun// rang

193b1: la rdzogs pa nyid du gnas/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni// rang 'byung thig le chen po ste// A li ka li zhu ba las// nam mkha' khyab pa'i bde ba 'byung // gsang ba'i thig le kun kyin+da// nam mkha'i thig le gsang ba'i ngang //
193b2: khyab pa chen po phyogs cha med// lus gnas rang bzhin ma skyes pa// bde ba'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs// nam mkha' lta bur dpag tu med// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i thig le bzhugs sde
193b3: gnas/ / dpag med til 'bru rdul snyed kyi// rgyal ba kun dang lhan cig tu// ma lus bde ba chen po'i ro// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyis// ma gsungs rig pas nyams gtang bas// mi 'dzin longs spyod chen po'i
193b4: gnas/ / rang 'byung nyi zla rten gyi ro// ma spangs 'dus pas 'du bral med// gang ba'i thig le bcud 'dus pa// nam mkha' gang ba bde ba'i ro// gnyis med 'khril ba'i stobs las byung // mkha' dbyings byang chub 'byor/
193b5: pa'i sems// ma gtad ma spros thig le che// nam mkha'i rgyas pa'i mtha' bzhin du// bde ba'i tshad kyang dpag tu med// yab yum gnas pa'i grangs tshad kyang // nam mkha'i khams kyi rdul snyed de// re re'ang bde ba'i
193b6: dkyil 'khor ni/ / rdul snyed nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// yab yum gnyis med 'brel ba yi// thabs dang shes rab bcud 'dus pa// gang yang mi sgrib thig le'i ro// snang gsum mtshan ma las 'das pa// sangs rgyas
193b7: rin chen kun gyi bcud/ / bye ba rdul snyed grangs 'das pa'i// ma lus kun dang lhan cig tu// mo sa dang chags pa'i khyad par gyis// cha lugs mtha' yas snang ba ni// la lar chags par lta ba'i tshul// de bzhin 'jam par//
193b8: smra ba dang // la lar 'khyud cing lta ba ste// la lar sen thabs zhal skor zhing // la lar mnye dang sdebs dang 'bud// 'gyed dang 'dud dang 'gying ba yi// dkar 'dzin ston dang lte ba ston// 'o dang tshir dang rgod pa dag/ sna tshog

194a1: rol pa 'di dag gis/ / ma chags pa dag chags byed cing // chags byed myur du nyams par byed// tha skam myur du zengs byed cing // bde chen lo tog skyed par byed// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yi// lha dang lha mo 'khor bcas
194a2: pas/ / steg cing 'dzum pas lhan cig tu// rol cing klu ni len par byed// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bde ba che// lhan cig skyes pa mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba ste// rdo rje pad ma ma bcud bskyod pas ni/ brtags pa'i snang
194a3: banub/ / ma lus khyab pas mkha' ltar dga' bar byas kyang dbang po rlung gi brlabs// bde ba'i sa bon zag pa rnams ni slar yang ldang bar byed// chu ba rnam par chad pa'i kha sbyor bde chen ni// nam mkha'i rgya mnyam yun yang de srid
194a4: bar du gnas pa ste/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni lha mo khyod la tshang ba ste/ bdag ni khyod la sten cing dga' bas mig bteg ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing du lta// gang tshe 'gro ba tha mal ba der spyod yul la chags par zhugs pa na// dga' dang bde dang rtse cig yid 'ong 'dod par rab
194a5: bzhugs pas/ / dbang po gnyis ro la nyi zla phrad cing bde chen mchog skyes che// skye rga na 'chi ro dogs ngo tsha mtshagrags pa'i chos brgyad chod kyang byis pas mi shes so// gang zhig thabs dang shes rab bral bas gsad pa'i don
194a6: 'jug pa/ / rgya mtsho la ni sa bon btab bzhin 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ste// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' tha skabs te// rgyal ba nyid kyang thabs dang shes rab bral bas byang chub myu gu gtan nas skams to// 'di
194a7: ni glu ru blangs pa yis/ / rdul snyed bcas pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rang rang rgyan dang gos dor te// dpa' bo sgeg mo'i tshul 'dzin cing // dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du// glu dang gar ni sna tshogs kyis// tha mal yid rtog bca
194a8: nas ni/ / bde chen yid ni 'phrog par mdzad// de bzhin dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang // zhing thabs bde ba rmad 'thung ba// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa// dpag med mtha' yas cir snang yang // rang byung ye shes byang chub

194b1: sems/ thig le cig gi ngo bo las// mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis// 'dul ba'i dbang du ci yang spro// thabs la thabs kyis dbang rgyur bas// thabs chen thabs las byung ba'i// ngo mtshar ya mtshan sprang po che// sangs
194b2: rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ / thabs chen sgyu ma smad du byung// sgyu ma skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// kun nas 'khyil
194b3: ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ / kun gyi rang bzhin 'byung gnas nyid// bya ba byed la byas pa med// zad dang 'phel ba med pa yi// dngos grub gter chen bsam mi khyab// ye shes thig le rang snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas
194b4: mchog/ mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes ni// gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med// nam mkha' dang 'byung rtag pa ltar// 'pho 'gyur med pas de bzhin no// nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa bzhin// rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med/
194b5: ma byung ma skyes byang chub sems// ye shes nyi ma'i 'od ltar gsal// sangs rgyas sems can grol thar kun// ma lus rang rig 'od gsal bas// rang 'byung ye shes rang snang phyir// mkhyen dang bsgrib pa chung zad med// mkhyen pa'i
194b6: ye shes nyag cag la/ / rang gi cha shas chos bral bas// nam mkha'i mtha' thug chos rnams kun// skad cig ma 'dres tshul du mkhyen// rang rig byang chub sems nyid las// mthon man glang dor ma dmigs pas// 'khor ba'i ngo
194b7: bor rang snang yang / / ma chags kyon med pad ma 'dra// dpag med yon tan ngo bo rnams// rang 'byung rag pa rang snang bas// ma lus ngo mtshar rgya mtsho rnams// rang snang gzhan las thob bya med// byin rlabs cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos/ rang
194b8: 'byung nyid las rnam par spro/ / tshul ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// dag dang ma dag khyad par gyis// ngo bo cig las ma g.yos kyang // mos pas mthong tshul de bzhin no// gsung ni nam mkha'i khyab par ni// phyogs bcu khyab par sgra

195a1: mas pa khas pa bzhin du lha chags pa'i khas ma las 'dul gabs gas / drugs ni sram pan thA sa// bang+ka dang du ba sa rje ldan pa'i// yang nags ma khyen pa thal shes /
195a2: thugs la sgrub par med// yon tan chad kyad bral ba ste// nam mkha'i nar bu gter 'chang ba/ dpag med bsam pa bkang pa'i phyir// byen rlabs yid bzhin no bu'i tshul// phrin las byin rdzas rang snang ba// 'tha'ang med pa
195a3: don tshul gyis/ / dpag pasam bram dang rin chen gyi// bya byed med par don rnams rdzogs// ma lus spros pa rnam dag cing // rang 'byung rig pa mtha' dbus med// ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas te// bde ba chen pa chos kyi
195a4: su/ / 'ad pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// gnyis med dang la kun rdzogs pas// de nyid chad bral mnga' brnyes pas// longs spyod yangs su rdzogs pa'i sku// sra cig thig la'i da bo las// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad
195a5: ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du/ / rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa'i sku// ma byung ma skyes don rtogs pas// ma lus bye / rdo rje nyid// me 'jigs gnyen po kun bral ba// rdo rje sku zhes rnam par stan/ gang du mngon par byang
195a6: chub pa'i/ / 'od gsal nam mkha' mtha' dbus med// sku bzhi mtha' yas ma reg pa// dang po mngon par byang chub pa'o// ma lus dbye ba mtha' spangs shing // de ltar kun dang mnyam par gnas// don gyis ma lus byag/
195a7: 'byung ba// brjod med don gyi gsang nyid do// dang phyag rtsa gzigs tshul gyis// tid ni dgongs pas 'dul ba la// brjod me tshul gyis gang ston pa// brda yis gsung du rnam par snyan// kAng yang rung ba mthong ba
195a8: dpa' bos bltas pas g.yul sel ltar/ / dngos pos byang chub nam mkhar rtogs// rgyan brlab pa rtogs pa'i gsungs zhes bya// gang gdan du gang snang ba// gnyen po bar chad mi gnas shing/ gzhan dag pa ma ched

195b1: mi thab pa/ / zil gyis gnon pa'i gsung du brjod// tshigs cig brjod pas tshig mtha' yas// mos pa de snyed rnam grol cing // yon tan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs// 'di ni brjod pa tshig gi gsung // ji snyed mang por rnam
195b2: spos kyang / / chos kyi dbyings la khyad par med// rtog la rnam rtog mtshan ma yang // mi rtog ye shes grol ba'i thugs// gnyis med bde ba chen po yis// 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga la rol// ma lus bde bar snang ba'i tshe// 'dun
195b3: bde ba chen po'i thugs/ / bdag gzhan byi nang mi mnga' yang // rang 'byung gnyis kyi phyogs bral bas// gdul bya'i bsam pa kun mkhyen pas// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i thugs// ji snyed rig pa'i don snang zhing
195b4: ma lus kun gyi de bo la/ / ste 'jig gnyen po gdod nas stong // mi 'gyur rdo rje thugs zhes bya// dpag med nam mkha'i zhing khams dang // che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i gdan// zag pa med pa'i rgyan rnams dang // ye shes 'bar
195b5: ba gzhal yas khang / / mtha' dbus med pa khyab pa yi// 'od zer tshogs ni rnam par snang // gzhan yang yon tan chen po ni// mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' ltar// dpag cing gzhal bar mi nus te// zag med che ba'i yon tan
195b6: sdang / / gzhan yang mdzad pa'i phrin las ni// gdul bya'i yul ni ji snyed pa// mdzad pa'i sgra ni bsam yas te// mtha' thug med par rnam par snang // 'di dag 'dus pas bshad bya na// ni rgyas dbang drag la sogs pas// mtha'
195b7: yas bzhis ni rnam par bsdus/ / ldan gyis grub par kun kyang grub// mdor na 'bras bu'i rnam grangs ni// bsdus pas nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba ma long gi rgyud chen po las ldan
195b8: gyis grub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas gas bdag rdo rje 'dzin// dpag med rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/ gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi mdzod// gtang 'dzin rgyal ba stobs pa

196a1: tshe/ rang gi lag gi rdo rje nyid// dga' zhing mgu bas gsor byas te// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yis// rab tu bskor ba byas pa yis// 'jig rten drug tu bcas pa dag/ 'khrugs shing rnam par g.yo mdzad de// kun du
196a2: rab g.yo rnam par g.yo/ / stong gsum 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// 'od dang sgra yis gang mdzad de// rmad 'byung sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rnam par snang // ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad 'byung gi/ phyi nang
196a3: gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / / 'dod yon lnga yis khyab mdzad de// rgyal ba'i tshogs kun mnyes par byas// kun kyang dga' zhing mos pa yis// zhing khams rdul dang mnyam pa yi// 'khor tshogs rnams ni bstod pa 'di// sna
196a4: tshogs sgras ni glu ru blangs/ / oM aHhU~M a la la ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs ni ma skyes ye shes 'dod pa'i thugs// mi rtog gsal ba'i thugs ni kun la khyab par gnas// gang yang dbyer med 'dus byas ma yin 'dus
196a5: ma byas min skye 'jig med/ / dam pa'i thugs la byung tsher g.yo 'gog ci yang med pas bde to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sku ni sna tshogs 'od 'bar bde ba'i sku// sna tshogs mtha' yas ji ltar snang ba ngo bos dben// de nyid 'dra ba'i thab/
196a6: kyis de ltar yid 'phrog tshim pa'i sku// mtha' yas sna tshogs bye brag ji ltar gsal yang nam mkha'i dang du bye brag med to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo dpag tu
196a7: med rgyas par snang / / 'gro ba rnams ni yid 'phrog bltas pas chog shes med par mdzes// rgyal ba ma lus yon tan rdzogs par snang la de dag mtha' thug med to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsung ni zab cing brgya cher nam mkha' 'dra//
196a8: ma lus go zhing tshim mdzad rdo rje'i sgra 'byin snyan sgrogs pa// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas mos dang / 'thad pa de bzhin rnam par snang ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phrin las sna tshogs bya ba lhun gyis grub// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyad 'gro

196b1: ba ma lus kun 'dul ba/ / thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'di ni rnam par rol to// de nas rgyal mchog skyes bu yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa la// gsang ba 'di ni
196b2: gtad par mdzad/ / nga yi gsang ba'i snying po 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bstan pa kun gyi rang bzhin te// ma lus kun gyi thabs su snad// gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa ste// dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi rgyud//
196b3: chos rnams ma lus kun snang ba// gsang ba'i me long thabs kyi rgyud// rgyal ba rdul snyed kun 'dus nas// dam pa 'di la sngags par mdzad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po// zab mo'i lung gi des don 'di// rigs chad dman
196b4: pa'i gang zag gis/ / thams cad la ni me long ltar// bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang bas// ston pa gnyis la rgyab phyogs shing // brtags pa phyi rol chos la zhe na// slob dpon la ni brnyes byed dang // rdo rje spun la sdang sems
196b5: che/ / zab mo'i don la skur byed cing // gsang rgyud don la 'phya ba dang // ser sna rang phyogs chags pa che// dad dang dam tshig mi ldan zhing // rgyal srid rin chen me hong ba'i// phyi nang gnyis lta'i gang zag la// bskal pa zhing
196b6: gi rdul snyed du/ / yus sems bral bar byed gyur kyang // gsang pa'i glegs bam mi bstan na// dbang dang dngos grub rnams kyang min// rmongs pas gal te byin na ni// de nyid mnar med dmyal bar ltung // dad dang dam tshig
196b7: ldan pa yis/ / pun gsum tshogs pa kun gtong zhing // dam pa'i yo byad ldan gyur pas// lus dang srog la'ang mi lta na// dman pa'i longs spyod nams kyang min// theg pa chen la mos pa dang // btul zhugs snying
196b8: bcer gus par ldan/ / rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen bkur zhing // skyon dang spyod pa yongs su bzod// bskal par 'grogs kyang yid mi 'khrug/ nyes dang legs pa ci la yang // ngo mtshar skyo ba'i 'du shes med// rang bzhin

197a1: bzang dang tshul shis dang / / 'grogs pas dug nad mi ldang ba'i// dam pa 'di la gsang ba gtad// slob dpon man ngag mi ldan cing // gsang ba'i don la ma goms pas// rang rtags log pa'i tshad ma yis//
197a2: gsang ba'i sbas don gtan la 'bebs// blun po mun pas mchod pa rnams// log par zhen pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar smin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya gsang chen
197a3: snying po 'di/ / ma lus kun gyi gsang yin pas// rtogs nas gsal bar gang byed pa// dbang dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste// bdag dang gzhan don lhun gyis grub// rdul snyed zhing la bsnyen bskur zhing // tshegs kyi
197a4: bla ma bsten byas pa'i/ / 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// de bas rgyal sras cig gi yul// rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho ba yis// grags pa'i stobs ldan rnam par spangs// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//
197a5: sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long
197a6: gi rgyud chen po rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la tra dang / ban d+he dz+nyA na ku ma ra sa bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// slad nas bi ma la mi tra nyid la bre ze mo dge slong
197a7: ma yong dang yang dunan du zhus pa'i di gzhan la spel na dam tshig nyams s+ho/ bod skad dugasang pa'i snying po de khon nyid nges pa// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo//
197a8: 'di skad bshad pa'i dus cig na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

197b1: su gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams ca dang so so ma yin tha mi dang dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ / 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor mo
197b2: khyab par gsal ba la ye shes rin po'i sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ / rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa// yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa// lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i
197b3: blo bur gyis mdzes pa/ / rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin ngo bo nyid cig pa'i ye shes kun du 'khyil pa// ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po
197b4: che dbyibs dang kha tog la sogs ste/ / rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa'i tshad dpag tu med pa// ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang // chun 'phyang dang shar bu'i rgyan dang // gzugs sna tshogs dang /
197b5: sgra sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la// mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas klubs pa// rnam par thar pa bzhi
197b6: sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rtababs dang ldan pa'i byi dang nang med par kun du yang nang du gyur pa ni mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang // stobs kyi glang po'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rta'i khri dang / dbang gi rma
197b7: bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa'i nam mkha' lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa med pa pad ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du yang zhal
197b8: thal le bar gsal zhing / / mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun du snang ba/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sku gsung thugs chen po las thabs shes rab

198a1: kyi rnabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ / ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag 'bar ba can// sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan
198a2: pa 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tsher ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes
198a3: kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun kyang mthing ka dang / dkar po dang ser po dang / leb rgan dang / ljang ku'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa'i snang ba'i dbyings dang / sra
198a4: pa'i dbyings dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro ba'i dbyings dang / bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyis dbyings kun du mtha' yas par khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper
198a5: na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so/ / de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang / byang nub chen po rdo rje sdom pa dang / byang chu chen po rdo rje myong ba dang / tsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang / mnyan
198a6: par bya ba dang / bsdam par bya dang / myong bar bya ba'i tshogs dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang //
198a7: btsun mo 'das pa dang da ltar 'byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i tshogs dang / 'doms pa chen mo rig pa dang 'joms pa chen po reg byed dang / 'joms pa chen po dag she dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / bdag tu ma
198a8: yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta ba'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang / gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang / gnyis su med pa'i dkyil

198b1: 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang pa 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang thugs dang / yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // e e e ma'o// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang / dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs dang rang snang
198b2: ba nyid/ / ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu maM rnam dag gsal ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan 'phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che mi zad par ldan// brgyan gyi 'khor la rdo rje mchog gi gnas
198b3: nyid de zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ / gsang pa'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin
198b4: gyi tshul rdo rjes btsun mo chos bya ba mo kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / oM chos kyi chos nyid shes bya'i dbyings/ kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum/ ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/
198b5: bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul ba/ phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal/ nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu/ ma chags pad ma'i gdan bting ba// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i
198b6: sgo bzhi la/ / phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dbang dang skal min gsal ba'i phyir// nad dang phyi rim lcags dang ldan// rgyal ba yongs kyi sbas pa'i// sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de// kun tu bzang
198b7: po nyid kyis gzigs shes brjod pas btsun mo bya ba me chos kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to/ / zhugs nas btsun mo bye ba mchos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun du bzang po dang gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod
198b8: bde ba la mnya mnyam par gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod do/ / sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso// kun du bzang po rdo rje yid// ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// shar phyogs mngon pa dga'i bsams yas na// ni la lta

199a1: bu'i gter 'byin pa/ / gsad 'du 'bul gyi ldeg mig gis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo phyi nas// byang chub mchog gis nang gtan dgrol// mnyam sbyor pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'gro den byang chub sems bskyed nas
199a2: 'gro lnga skye zhing dbang du bsdus/ / sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to// zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gsal bar gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus
199a3: pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhi ga shegs pa ni de cizhi shegs pa zhid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang
199a4: po kun/ / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu sman dang mA ma kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing // thams cad ma lus chos so//
199a5: cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur to// de nas btsun mo
199a6: bya ba mo tshes kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun du bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye shes dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag
199a7: pa'i zhing / / snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan nas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi 'tshal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas
199a8: mi rnyed do zhes brjod pas thams cad yanas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng bslad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//

199b1: de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye shes sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// skye ba med lag thams
199b2: cad skyes/ / skyes pa nyid ni skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gags// 'gag pa nyid ni 'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyis
199b3: chos/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gnas pa med las thams cad nas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gas pa// dmigs pa med las
199b4: thams cad dmigs/ / dmyigs pa nyid ni dmigs pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gro 'od med las 'gro dang 'od// 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// ces brjod
199b5: pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad skyes pas khyab par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod de/
199b6: e ma'o yi nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs stong la rang bzhin gsang // ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang // gzhan du ni yang shin tu gsang // zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi nas sangs rgyas pa'i da
199b7: nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na/ / 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa la 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyi mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du
199b8: brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / e ma'o bad gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gis so sor 'dzin//

200a1: sus kyang mi 'ching bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yin// nan gyis mkha' la mdung ba 'dor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sa
200a2: rgyas chos/ / bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste/
200a3: gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to//
200a4: bton nas kyang las kyi dbang gis skal gzhi dang // yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re rer thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam
200a5: bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de ltam pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / dka' thub mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bsko ba dang / tshe 'phrul chen po ston pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa
200a6: la sogs pa ston pa'i thub pa/ dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud du kun tu mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyi kun tu gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu bsan pa dang / rdzu
200a7: 'phrul gyi tshogs kun du den spyod pa dang / theg pa med pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug dang / kun tu srubasam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du
200a8: zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab bgrangs med par yang phyogs bcur snang bar gyur lo// de ltar snang bar gyur nas ji snyed pa'i thub pa chen po snying rje'

200b1: 'phang chen po thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i
200b2: rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad rtsa bzhi gsungs so/ / gsung ngo // gsung bar gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi
