200b3: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'dzin pa 'phrul pa la dgos pa dang / las dang las kyis 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / gos pa da med pa'i ston pa'i mthar
200b4: thug go/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ 'khor ba'i skyon dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ma'o dkyil 'khor bsam
200b5: yas par/ snying po bla med ji snyed pa li/ gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs rang bzhin rgyal// mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ji snyed
200b6: 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos ma rig rtog pa'i bzung 'dzin gyis/ / stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// tog pa'i bag chags stug po yin// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur
200b7: de nyid ji bzhin dbyings nyid dang / / rang bzhin bdag med tshul cig ste// rang bzhin nyid la nyams pa med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings pas// rnam
200b8: dag dbyings nyid tshul cig go/ bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyodado// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun

201a1: nyid kyang / / gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi yis/
201a2: des 'byung la// theg pa cig gi 'bras bur gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yod mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad
201a3: gdul ba'i phyir/ / 'byung gnas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par// phyogs bcur kun
201a4: du rab grags pa/ / gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// ston pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// chos rnams ming
201a5: du brtags pa tsam/ / ston pas don dang 'thun phyogs su// ming nyid tshig tu btags nas bstan// ston med tshig la dngos po med ces brjod pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to//
201a6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid su gsung thugs dang / yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // a ho sr-id rtsa'i nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las
201a7: 'bros/ / rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal 'phrul 'khor las sogs pa// log tog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs// dmyigs
201a8: bya dmigs med med par dran dbang sgyur/ / ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing khams la// gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// thub pa drug gis sprul pa grangs med pa dang // de bzhin

201b1: gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
201b2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang // rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad// de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni thams
201b3: cad kun la yang yod do/ / nam mkhas kyang kun khyab par gnas so// de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang // nam mkhas kun la khyab kyang rnam par thar pa'i don ma togs na me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste/
201b4: gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so// zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang / rgya mtsho chen por chu klung 'bab pa ltar// bla med don
201b5: rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu/ / rnam pa'i theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// a ho// bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa// sa bcu rims kyis bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sar
201b6: 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam/ / bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur// phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yod tshul shes pa'i// dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug/ dge shes mi slo ba rang gi rig
201b7: pas rtogs byang chub sar 'gro yang bzhin bde ba'i mchog/ bden gan na rtogs rab tu spong ba lo// ye shes bcu drug chasbyangs rab zhi ba'i// rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par spangs nas ni// nyon mongs dgra rnams
201b8: rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro/ theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i// yang na kun la mthun nas 'byam par 'jug/ yang na ngos med 'di zhes brtag tu med/ 'di ni ma des rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// dge bcu stod cing mi dran

202a1: spong byed pa/ / 'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu// tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa// tshangs gnas lha sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab gyur kyang // rang rig rtogs pa'i
202a2: skal dang mi ldan na/ / ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin// 'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis// bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang // so so rang rig
202a3: blo la snang bar zad/ / ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang // 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la gyur pa med// mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog/ log rtog bdag
202a4: dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na/ / dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur// yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na// bde bshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong // theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni// ngan
202a5: song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas/ / nam mkha'i dbyings ni de nyid bsam yas par// nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyu dang // 'ja' tshen sprin ma des sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang // nam mkha'i dbyings la gyur
202a6: cing nyams pa med/ / mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par/ sku gsung yon tan phrin las rmad 'byung dang // 'jig rtog gtso mchog ma lus thams cad dang // 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam ma nga yang //
202a7: de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang / rigs rjud chad pa dang rigs brgyad so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i
202a8: le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pacig tu gyur nas/ mnyam pa chen po'i tshu la rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad

202b1: ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / / a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs kun gang bar gsal gyur nas//
202b2: bdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par brtan// de las ming tshegs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brten 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// a/ ka kha ga g+ha da/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha/
202b3: Ta tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ ba pa ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha ShA sa ta/ k+Sha/ i AM/ u A/ e AM o au// 'di dag zung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu
202b4: g.yos kun tu g.yos nas chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin//
202b5: thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas/ kun yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// e ma'o
202b6: mtshar ya mtshan gyi/ / 'phrul ren bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming // tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas// sna tshogs don kun smra zhing ston// dngos med yi ge rang bzhin sems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang dbyib
202b7: dang kha dog ming tshegs kyis/ / rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems pa'i sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// yi ge mgo nas kA la rdzogs/
202b8: sems ni rang bzhin yi ge ste// yi ge dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che// sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi// ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gug pa/ bying /

203a1: la dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor lam yin te// tshig ni shes rab min du smras// shang ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod// a ni skye med de bzhin nyid// tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid/ Ta ni snang
203a2: ba'i rdzu 'phrul nyid/ / Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid// d+ha ni sgyu 'phrul rnam dag nyid// Na ni kun du sgyu 'phrul nyid// tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid// ta ni dra bas brtan pa nyid// de ni dra bas lham me nyid// d+hi ni dra bas 'khyil ba nyid//
203a3: na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur// ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ga ni shings kyi thugs kyi mchog/ g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog/ ga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o// tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi
203a4: mchog/ tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog/ dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog/ dz+nyA ni ljags kyi skra yi mchog/ nya ni skra yang 'jig byed pa'o// ba ni sprin gyi gsung gi mchog/ pa ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste/ ba ni gdas kyi gsung mchog yini// b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gi
203a5: mchog/ ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed// ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/ waM ni gnas pa dag pa yin// ra ni 'jigs pa dag pa ste// lin stong pa dag pa'o// sha ni rtag med dag pa ste// Sha ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin// sa ni mtha'
203a6: bral bdag med pa/ / ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// kA ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// i ni rdul snyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su// u ni rdul snyed byol song rnams// e ni rdul snyed
203a7: yi dgas su/ / oM ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams// oM ni thams cad 'jig par byed// oM ni thams cad zhig pa yin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus// a ho/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
203a8: ba btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / / a ho/ thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshes

203b1: rgyu 'khor lo/ / 'bras bu rgyal ba'i smin grub ngo mtshar mid tshegs bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam// 'da' bar ma mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshegs pa'i mthu chen yin
203b2: a ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i snying ba khon nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
203b3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyi ba dang nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan la khams bco rgyad du bstan
203b4: gtsug lag thams cad la yang khams bco brgyad du bstan pa yin/ / lung gi spyi 'di ni shin tu zab pa'i phyir kha mo pa nyi shu rtsa cig tu bstan te/ lung gi spyi yang rgyad dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas
203b5: yin/ / gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang ba'i yul gnyi ga yang skye mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin gyi phyi shin tu gsang bar gsungs so// dkyil 'khor de dag shin du gsal bar snyan pa'i phyir nyid la
203b6: nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i mchos// thams cad kun la rang bzhin gnas// ngang gis dag mnyam ma rtogs pas// kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang // gzhan du min la shin du gsang // don
203b7: nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyu/ / mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsung // 'di ni byang chub snying po mchog/ a ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dbang po yul du snang ba'i rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// phung po lnga dang
203b8: 'byung ba lnga/ / rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor// skye mched khams rnams bco brgyad po// sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid// thams cad byang chub sems ma yi// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus// rdo rje dbang po

204a1: gsang ba'i thabs/ / dbang po yul nyid shes rab dbyings// dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang // thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid de// de yis ma bskyed gang yang med//
204a2: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung // kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te// bde ba byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas// de las bskyed cing de las spro// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas// dbang po rje rje
204a3: pad mor ldan/ / gnyis med byang chub sems 'gron// / mi dmigs pa de dang longs spyod 'gro// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang // mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan pazhi// 'jug
204a4: dang ldang dang gnas dang smon lam byang chub sems/ / g.yo dang ba skyong dang ldang dang gnas// 'gug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te// bsdus dang 'khril ba'i don bsgrub phyir// bsdams dang mi gtong dbang sbyar te// bdab sgra
204a5: spyan phyogs bcur bsgrogs/ / shin du sprugs pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen phreng bar 'bar// dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcu rig yo// kun du
204a6: tshim byed bro gsung thim/ / lha mdzes rin chen phung po 'gro// 'od gsal 'gro bas kun du 'bar// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings// a la la ho/ gsang ba'i dbang po pad mar ldan gyur nas// chags pa med
204a7: pa'i tshul gyis su/ / pha rol phyin pa cu rgyu 'bras rdzogs// sa bcu rims kyis bkod med rdzogs// kun du 'od gsal pad ma spyan yang rdzogs// yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bas gyis mi khyab pa// yang dag rdzogs chen
204a8: thabs dang ldan/ / thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par ro// a la la ho// de bzhin nyid kyi gsang cho ga las// khams ni nyi shu rtsa cig ste// bco brgyad po

204b1: ni rgyud gzhan bzhin/ / gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag/ bco brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// byang chub grub pa'i zhing yang yin// bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// dbang po rdo rje
204b2: gsang ba'i rgyal/ / yul ni pad ma bde mchog dbyings// sems ni byang chub 'byung ba'i gter// dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas// gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang // phun
204b3: sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams/ / gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par byed// 'di ni rtse cig yin par gsungs// gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// lta ba dman la bshad byas nas// dus min par ni srog zad nas// mgo
204b4: 'gas snying yang 'tshig par 'gyur/ / khab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// ngan song mi khom bskal par brgyud par 'gyur// de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya// shes rab rgya chen blo zab
204b5: yangs pa yis/ / blo brtan snying rje che dang dang ldan dang tshul bzang la brtan// gzhan du nams kyang sbyin mi bya zhes nyid la yA nyid brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khams nyi shu rtsa cig tu sdus nas
204b6: thams cad ma lus par dbyings su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spro ba 'di ched du brjod do// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun
204b7: gyi rtsa ba yin/ / sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ dkyil 'khor thams
204b8: cad grub par 'gyur/ / bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang / bzhi brgya rtsa bzhin sel cing // longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song spyod// ci yang gzhan du 'byung ba grub// nam mkha' rdo rjesra 'byung zhing // 'bar nas me yang 'tshag pa dang / chu 'gyur 'bab pa'ang /

205a1: de bzhin te// 'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang // thams cad stongs shing lhung bar 'gyur// 'gug dang gtang dang bcing dang grol// gso dang gsad dang pam dang rgyal// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par
205a2: 'gyur/ / de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i// ming tshigs gzugs tshogs yid bzhin gyis// mun la snang byung ji bzhin du// 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig
205a3: sngags dang phyag rgya rnams/ / ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan don med brlag/ dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod/
205a4: 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste// dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par// rtogs pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes
205a5: pa/ / de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes// de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa// 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min// kha dog
205a6: ma yin dbyibs ma yin/ / gnas su ma yin gang yang min// de bzhi ni nyad dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad min la tha dad pa'i// nang dang nang gi phyi rol pa//
205a7: dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol// 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/ gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan na// dngos grub yam tshwa
205a8: chen por 'gyur/ zhes brjod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // e ma'i snying por lam bcas pa/

205b1: 'jigs med dbyings nyid kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/ rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po// byang chub lhun grub bangal ba'i ngang // snying po nyid ni snying por kun bcas kun du gnas// de nyid rdzogs pa'i rang las
205b2: dngos grub kun shar kun du gnas/ / a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drab
205b3: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags 'chang rnams ltar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / e ma'o ye nas rnam dag pa'i// thabs dang shes rab
205b4: ldan par gnas/ / byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs// chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa'o// dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal/ cig dang spros pa thams cad med/ dkyil 'khor
205b5: spros med zlum po'i tshul/ / ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor// thugs rje byin rlabs 'phros pa yis// ye shes bzhi yi dkyil
205b6: 'khor spro/ / ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// byin rlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab// rang snang ba yi thabs las 'byung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i// thugs rje rgyal ba'i gzhal yas khang// dbus mtha'
205b7: med par rgyas par gnas/ / ston smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad// der 'grol ma stengs brgyad dang ldan// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir/ nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar// ye nas rnam par dag
205b8: pa'i phyir/ / ma chags pad mo 'bar ba'i gdan// zad med ye shes gter gyur pas// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan// ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir// la'i ljon zhing rang bzhin gnas// de ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir// dpag pas

206a1: shing gi rin chen 'bar/ / yid bzhin rin chen rgyan gyis bskor// thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir// 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor// gsang ba de nyid nges pa las// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis//
206a2: thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor// thams cad ma lus dkyilalalo mchog 'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang // gzugs snyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems dang tsheg
206a3: mchog brtan/ zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan sten pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
206a4: thams cad kyi rang bzhin cig dang du ma med pa dag nyid thams cad kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus rtag
206a5: te/ dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// kun 'bru ba dkyil 'khor chen po spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// grub chad bzhis brgyan par 'khyams dang // kun
206a6: du gu pa'i sgo khyud ldan/ / rol mo sde tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dad khyung// nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems
206a7: dpa'i tshul/ / 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang / g.yas nas mthong thos sdom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// grwa chad la ni mthong byed dang // thos byed sdom byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo dag
206a8: dang bcas par gnas/ / bar 'khyams la ni thub drug dang // bdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor

206b1: lo rin po che/ / pad ma ral gri dril bu 'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ka kar po sor leb rgan// ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyen lhag
206b2: 'thil ldem gzhon tshul can/ / gsal 'tsher lhun lug gzi byin can// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar bas 'phreng bas 'khyil pa ste// dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam
206b3: yas lhun gyis grub/ / sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang // 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// 'thun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston// ston nyid/
206b4: ma mig yor tshul// tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med// mi g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// de'i tshe ma mthun sna chags la// / so so 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang // las 'phro dbang
206b5: gis so sor snang / / dper na me long chu zla bzhin// de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la// sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan// dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul// gzhan yang
206b6: theg mchog rim pa bzhin/ / 'og mon bla med gnas mchog tu// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// sku yis chos rnams mjal lnga
206b7: ston/ me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel// 'khor gyis de bzhin sku ltas na// byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du ska la snang // de nas sa bcu rims kyis 'byang
206b8: bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob/ / chos sku dpag med brjod du med// longs spyod zad med rin chen gter// sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod yul kun tu maN Ta la// tshogs chen gnyis kyang

207a1: rdzogs par rol/ / thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam yas mchog/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sa// nyon mongs kun gyis zhing du gnas// zad mi shes kyi gter du gyur// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku
207a2: thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs/ ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang bzhing gi rdul snyed
207a3: du gsal bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ho/ dmigs
207a4: bya dmigs med mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab/ / ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang // mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnams spyi spros pa med// ye nas
207a5: kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed du/ / ye nas rnam spros snying po kun gnas gnas pa med// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// a ho zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor
207a6: spros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing / kun du bzang po dgyes te phyogs bcu dus
207a7: bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas thams cad gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa rgyas pa/ mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs
207a8: nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag tshad med// kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad ba'i// srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te// mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung // dbang sgyur

207b1: shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang // 'jig rten 'khor gyi bcos bkur dbang phyug dang // gzhan dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu
207b2: khams gnas pa/ / bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen 'grub// dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i// 'das dang ma byon de bzhin nyid du sbyor// shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don byung ba// rig pa'i thabs chen
207b3: dbang bsgyur nyid du bsgo ba/ / stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// zad med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur// b+hU rang byung nyi zla pad ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs// rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa yi//
207b4: mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol pa mdzad// bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa// dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ub// thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
207b5: 'chang wa 'byung / / spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon// thugs rje dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs// nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa// mnyam pa'i
207b6: don grub rdo rje can gyis bya/ / rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku// shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs bsdus pa// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid dang du byon// thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par spangs pa yi// dmigs
207b7: med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa/ / thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog/ phyogs bcu ngas pazhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa// shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i nga 'chang ba// thugs rjes
207b8: byin brlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba yi/ / bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan 'phro// rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur zhes nyid la nyid du ched du brjod de rdo rjegasang pa'i

208a1: tshig tu'o/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gzhal yas khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku
208a2: rang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / / b+hA bi shrA bi shud d+he/ hA badz+ra d+hika/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ swa ra na d+hika/ oM A ro li ka/ hA pradz+nyA d+h+rika/ mud+hA drA shwa ri/ la dwe shar ti/ ma mo ha ra ti/ pa rAgar ti/ ta badz+ra ra ti/ kI hi rA dzA
208a3: tra A ka garba ya/ hri da hAM bAd+ha ma/ d+h+ri ku ru pa na k+She/ hUM lA s+ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA le sa ma ya hoHpri gI hri ti go haM/ a nri t+yai rag ya me/ mai d+he ra na sA hA/ b+h+r-i ni swa ra ma pa ya sAhA/ hUM swa rA dzA ya swa mu shwa a rAg+na swadz+nyA d+hU ba pre ba sha/
208a4: dI pA shwa a ba sha/ bi d+hi ba su ki ni/ ho gan d+he tsita ta/ dU ya mAn ta krita phaT/ pra dz+nyAn ta krita/ hUM bi g+h+nAn ta kri ta phaT/ hUM pad mAn ta kri ta phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+har ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ne phaT/ oM ma hA radan d+ha ram+b+ha kro d+hi shre ri dz+wa la nai phaT/ oM
208a5: hA pad ma d+har ma dkro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM ma hA ka ra ma ha gro d+he sha ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ hU~M rU hU~M badz+ra tsita ta hUM/ a a a badz+ra b+ha da sa man ta a/ oM mu ne kre swa hA/ oM mune drA ma swa hA/ oM mu ne su swa hA/ oM mun b+hi swa hA/ oM
208a6: mu k+ShaM swA na/ oM mu ne ye mAhA/ e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA ka ru tsika/ tri sha ho/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ dzaHhA ba ho// oM aHhUM swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzAdz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra/ sas sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ye/ oM AHAsrA t+ma/ a
208a7: shaMs ti la po sku gsung thugs/ / yon tan phrin las rmang po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'o// phyag rgya chen por bdag gyur cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas// gsung gi kyi/
208a8: 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par grags so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang /

208b1: bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do// de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de gzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs
208b2: rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las pAng ngo / / oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA Ata ma ko ha/ oM ma hA a d+ha ri shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba Ata ma ko ha/ oM ma hA pra te na bak+She na shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba A ta ma ko ha/ oM ma hA sa man ta shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra
208b3: swa b+hA ba a ta ma ko haM/ oM ma hA krita ta a nu sh+tsa na shUn+ya dA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba A ta ma ko ha/ oM sarba ta thA ge ta ma hA ka ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata ra ko ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta me hA bA ga badz+ra pra b+hA ba A ta ma ko ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsita ta
208b4: badz+ra swa b+hA ba A ta ma ko he/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga na badz+ra swa b+hA ba A ta ma ko hi/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba A ta ma ko he/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to// gsal bar gyur to// 'bar bar gyur to// e ma'ong
208b5: mtshar rmad kyi chos/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung // gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab//
208b6: sgra dang ming tshigaso sor grags// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/ rgyud mchog rgyud chen dra ba las// bad ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba'ang // thams cad pad ma'i rang gyur na// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji skad
208b7: brjod kyang gsung mchog ste/ / theg pa mapo dman thams ca dang // log 'grom lus thams cad skang // byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus// bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags// sgra nyid ma chags dang dugasungs/
208b8: gsungs pa nyid ni brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so so mjal// dper na de bzhin spring bsangs bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go/ 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin// theg pa

209a1: mtho dman bas ma yas kyang / / de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang // de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung/
209a2: ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang // thugs rjegasung gi phyir brlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin gsung gis 'gro na rnams// de bzhin dang las ma g.yos kyang //
209a3: dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhin no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag
209a4: rgya ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / oM hUM badz+ra satwa hUM/ badz+ra pra b+hA na hA/ muM badz+ra gan d+ha hUM/ oM tsakra maN Da la aM/ laM badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha le/ swa rad na pra b+ha ni sraM/ oM badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha a/ oM pad ma tha
209a5: b+hA na a/ paM badz+ra gan d+ha pra b+hA na paM/ haM/ bad ga tik+Sha pra b+ha ha/ taM badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hA na taM/ shI rad na pra b+hA na shI hUM/ badz+ra gan d+ha pra b+hA na g+ho Sha hUM/ traM khang ga pra b+ha na traM/ traM badz+ra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+ha na traM/ hriHpad ma pra b+han hri/ badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha
209a6: Sha dra b+ha na hriHhA badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hAn haM/ a badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+ha na a/ me kA la pra b+hA na me/ hUM badz+ra gan d+ha pra b+hA na b+ha sha hA/ b+hU pra b+hA na maN Da la thaM/ sAM badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha ha pa b+ha na sI/ hA ra na swa s+yA/ d+ha b+ha dra pra b+ha na sA trIHbadz+ra gnaH
209a7: b+ha Sha pra b+ha na hri/ mu ud pa la nI la pra b+hA na ma?/ a badz+ra gan d+ha b+hA na Sha pra b+ha na a/ phaT badz+ra a maHmud g+ha ra pra b+ha naM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hA na oM o/ phaT ma hA badz+ra pra b+hi na phaT phaT/ hU ma hA rang nan badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha y+ra
209a8: b+han hU~M n+te/ phaT hrIHpad ma mud g+ha ra pra b+hi na hrIHhrIHoM ma hA badz+re pad ma badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hAn hrIHhrIHa karma mud g+ha ra badz+ra pra b+hAn phaT phaT/ a karma badz+ra gan d+ha b+hi Sha pra b+hA na nA~M/ ya a a zhes brjod pas phyag rgya gsung gi

209b1: dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to/ / 'bar bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pani
209b2: pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// yang dag don gyigs
209b3: mchog ni/ / bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// nges pa'i don chen bzhi bcu gnyis// yid bzhin rin chen gsal 'bar thim// thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings// sku lnga'i 'od zer mang po kun// thams cad yum
209b4: 'gyur dbyings su thim/ / gsal 'bar sprin gyi bdag por gyur// byang chub sems kyi thigs pa ni// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin// yon tan mchog gi snying po ni// rtog ge spyong
209b5: yul yod ma yin/ / zab cing rgya chen rab sbyangs pa'i// gsal ldan bstan pa'i spyod yul te// gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu med// thams cad nam mkha' mtshan nyid de// sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang // rgyal
209b6: ba mngon pang thams cad kun/ / nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na med// dus gsum bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'// sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams
209b7: cad thim/ / thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de// dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor// shes rab dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis// byang chub rdo rje thig le yin// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas lhun grub dang // chu dang bral ba'i
209b8: bsam yas kyis/ / kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// yon tan mchog gi gnas yin te// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma zin gang yang med// rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa// yang dag gshegs dang log

210a1: tog dang / gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun// de las bsad cing bzung du med// kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin// skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas// /
210a2: de la rtag 'grus gsal bar bgyis// de'i 'bras bu mthar phyen ni// rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus gcig ste// thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du// yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par gyur// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus// tshe/
210a3: chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la zhugs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun// rgyal ba yum gyi dbyings su thim// thams cad ma lus chos
210a4: kur 'dus/ / ho/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thams cad yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams/
210a5: cad kyis yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pas// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi//
210a6: snying po phyag rgya 'da' bar bka'// mi skyod nyi ma'i dkyil yige/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// oM dang muM gnyis ce sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas
210a7: rer sprad pa/ / rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// hUM sgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla ba tul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan//
210a8: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mun gyi rtse mor dral bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar//

210b1: zla brdal 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sras nas thugs kar bkan// lam kyi rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btang nge 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta//
210b2: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// sri rtser 'bar ba rin po che// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshal gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// maM gyi rtse mong dril bsil 'bar/
210b3: nyis 'bru lnga las sa 'brel// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru ba zhesbas nas thugs kar bka na// am gyi rtse mor pad ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru slas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la
210b4: brtan/ / 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// b+h+rUM bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// bdud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// haM gi rtse mor ral gri
210b5: 'bab/ / zla brtul 'brusbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// ti bsgred rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzus pa'i mangs
210b6: kyi blta/ / ut+pal las sogs klu shing mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen te// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // bi ba gar mkhan mchog nyid
210b7: me tog phreng ba spos mchod sa/ / sar me byug la sogs pa yis// las la 'khril cing chos la brtan// dbu rnams byon nas 'dud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi nga du thim/
210b8: sgo bzhi phyag rgya chen po ni// ni mgo gdengs dang rdo rjes gnon// thod phreng chen pos gnon pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho tra ho// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang // 'dud tshul 'khril ba

211a1: gong ma bzhin/ / thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no// seg par dang ni pi bang dang // go tshe sro ti ri ni chen sgom// me dang chung darab du bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// kun yang mnyam bzhag
211a2: ye shes 'phro/ / yum gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid do// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan
211a3: 'byor na/ / ma bskyod ma bskul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros dag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sum 'phror 'bar// de bzhin ldan pa'i gtso
211a4: mchog gis/ / rgyal ba rgya mchog de bzhin du// bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston// theg pa mthon dman thams cad
211a5: dang / / phyin ci log rnams bsam yas dang // zhi khri tshogs chen thams cad la// so sor 'thun byas kun du snang // dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba// lus las ma dgod sna tshogs ston// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// 'di zhes
211a6: gcig ces brjod du med/ / gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro// bskyod dang spro ba de bzhin nyid// mdor na bskyod 'gul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// gnas nyid ma gnas nas pa'ang min// de skad dag mchog
211a7: nyid kyis bshad/ / mthe bo 'dzub mo rdo rje 'dzin// mthe bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin// srin lag mthe bo chags pa che// mthe chung mthe bo legs pa mchog/ hUM ho// 'dzub mo gnyis sbyar rin chen mchog/ gung mo gnyis sbyar gzi brjin
211a8: don/ / srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal ba'i tog/ bzhad pa'i sgras ni mthe' chung sprad// tri te ru ta/ 'dzub me steng 'og chos kyi mchog/ gung mo steng 'og 'jam dpal mchog/ srin lag steng 'og 'khor lo mchog/ mthe'u chung steng 'og

211b1: smra gsung yin/ / hri b+hoT+Ta ho/ 'dzub mo rgya gram las kyi mchog/ gung mo rgya gram bsrung bar byos// srin lag rgya gram gnod sbyin mchog/ mthe'u chung rgya gram gnas par bshad// ha hU~M a b+h+rUM/ phyag rgya brda' tshig chen po 'dis//
211b2: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mdzes par snang // rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs// glu gnyis phyag rgya ldan pa yis// sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs// phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni// bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam
211b3: gnyis pa/ / dag par gsal bas phyag rgya yin// yi ge sa sor gsal ba yis// gang du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das// 'dza' dang ho la sogs pa yis// gar du bsgyur bas rdo rjer 'ching// gsang ba'i snying po depon ni nges pa las
211b4: phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos mtshon cha dam tshig ces bya ba'i gru 'di blangs so// hUM/ lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku
211b5: gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas// ye shes rdo rje gsor zhing spro// e ma'i rdo rje che mchog ni// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol pa ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pa/
211b6: bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rdo rje 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rdo rje 'chang zhes bya// hUM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang
211b7: gi rgyas/ / rgyal po gtsigs la btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi
211b8: gnas/ / bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// hUM/ phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// rdo rje rdo rje grag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig

212a1: dang bcom la sogs/ / dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// brtson zhing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// brtson zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'dra 'dis// thams cad rdo rje nyid pas na// dam mkha'i khams kur bkang ba yin//
212a2: de las rdo rje gsung 'byung ba'o// oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na lArka hUM phaT/ oM lus ngag yid gsum 'khor lo ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// snang mdzad 'khor po dpa' bo yin/ mdzad 'khor lo rangaganas pas// ye shes 'khor lo gsor zhing spro/
212a3: e ma'o 'khor lo che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol pab ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed pas// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// rgyal
212a4: ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las/ / 'khor lo 'chad rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su brtan pa'i phyir// mi phyed 'khor lo 'chang zhes bya// hUM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gis rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltang/ khede chen snying la gnas pa dang //
212a5: dang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas pa// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin
212a6: nyid kyis lus ni brtan phyir ro/ / oM 'khor lo 'khor lo drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing gzhig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/
212a7: hUM// brtsor zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'dra 'das// thams cad 'khor lo nyid bsan// ram mkha'i khams kun banang ba yin// de las 'khor lo gsung 'byung ba// oM tsakradza lAn lAn hUM paT/ oM/ lus ngag yid gsum pad ma ni// sku
212a8: gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/ / sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// pad ma sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// pad ma sems dpa' rang gnas pra// pad ma dgra sta gsod zhing spro// e ma'o pad mche mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol

212b1: ba ni/ cis kyang mi shigs mi byed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// pad ma 'chang rgyal thams cad
212b2: kyis/ / rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi byed pad ma 'chang zhes bya// oM ji ltar rgyal po rang gis rgyas// rgyal pos gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snyid la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// tham
212b3: cad kur la de ltar 'bebs/ / 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pa// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// hUM bdag nyid chen po mtshad ma gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// pad ma
212b4: dgra sta drag chen dang / / rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad pad ma
212b5: nyid pas ni/ / nam mkha'i khams kun bkang pa yin// de las pad ma'i gsung phyung pa// oM pad ma dza la lArka hUM phaT/ sraM/ lus ngag yid gsum rin chen ni// sku ga sung thugs kyi 'ashes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ 'on na chen no 'a'o//
212b6: yin// rin chen sems dpar nga gnas pas// ye shes dbyug pa gsor zhing spro// e ma'i rdo rje rin chen che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol pa ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// ces kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/
212b7: bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// sraM/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rin chen 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rin chen 'chang zhes bya// waM/ dza
212b8: ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/ / rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal

213a1: po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ / bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// rin chen dbyug pa drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang /
213a2: 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing gshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad rin chen nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun
213a3: bkar ba yin/ / de las rin chen gsung 'byung ba// swa rang na dz+wa la lA rka swaM phaT/ haM lus ngag yid gsum phrin las ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// las kyi sems dpa'
213a4: dpa' bo yin/ / las kyi sems dpar nga gnas pas// ye shes ral gri 'debs shing spro// e ma'o las kyi che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma
213a5: 'dres pas/ / bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab// hUM/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// ral gri 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed ral gri 'char
213a6: zhes bya/ / hUM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyal// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa bzhin// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi
213a7: shigs pas/ / / rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// hi ral gri ral gri drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i
213a8: bdag nyid dang / / 'dul ba thabs kyis rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// bkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro 'dis// thams cad ral gri nyid pas na// nam

213b1: mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin/ / de las phrin las gsung byung ba'o// hA karma dz+wa lAn la rka hU~M phaT/ muM lus ngag yid gsum dril bu las// sku gsung thugs nyid gtum por 'gyur// bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul
213b2: du/ rdo rje lan gsum gsor ba yis// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// dam can rnal 'byor dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i// thams cad gcig tu 'dus par ni// yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur// mi bskyod
213b3: thabs ldan pas/ / oM dang haM ni ma thal bar// lan gsum gsor chen gur dkar bsgom// lha ne'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// oM dang haM ni thil tsam du// kun tu gru bzhi bdag gnas te// lan gsum gsor la gang
213b4: brtson pa/ / tshe dang skal pa 'phel bar 'gyur// longs spyod ci'i dod grub par 'gyur// de nas zla gam mdog dmar sham// 'brel ba mnyam par lan gsum gyi// khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas// yid la dmigs
213b5: da las thams cad/ / dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// de las gtum pa'i mdog gnas te// drag tu phaT ces brjod pas ni// kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing // bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas pa// khros te
213b6: dgug pa nyid dag tu/ / rgyad ni ring du 'phangs pa na// ci 'dod las rnams grub par nges// oM badz+ra da ha dza la badz+ra la ha na badz+ra pa tsa dz+wa la badz+ra hU~M phaT// chos la brtan pa phyag bsnams pa// sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te// shes rab
213b7: yum gyi tshogs su rtags/ / skad ni gsung snyan bde ba mo// lce ni gar mkhan mya ngan 'das// chos sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las// rab du gsor la gang brtson pas// mu la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom// rdo rje 'khor lo pad ma
213b8: 'bar/ / muM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// kun du dbang bsgyur yid 'ong pa'i// 'dod pa bzhin du 'thun pas grub// oM badz+ra g+han Da sha d+harma d+ha ra// hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes/

214a1: par gyur // ga yang 'a ngas pa la m+b+han+d+ha 'phrul pom pa dang shes brgya gapa kyi sgyug shA // / de ska na / sa sa na
214a2: rdo rdzorjegs pa'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par 'gas nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod de/ / shin tu phra ba dam tshig me chog/ phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// sor ni bzhi yi tshad
214a3: drabya/ / 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis rab bsnams la// rig pas krig na gdab par bya// lte brtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtse bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// gru chang bzhid
214a4: gru bzhi yi/ / bar khyims sgo khyung ldan par bya// san zla ba tsam gyi nyi zla la// cane 'bru tsam pad mogadan// yungs bcu tsam gyi yige las// b+hag d+ha til 'bru tsam du bri// bcos bu'i ras ni snga tshogs dang // rgyan phreng
214a5: dang bro bas bskor/ / grwa tshig bre gar rol mo yi// sprin phung tshogs kyis rab du mchod// yum dang 'jom sa mas ma dang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i// zhal du gyur ba'i mi
214a6: bos la/ / bza' ba tung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// las bzhi mchod par rab du smin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// shin tu phra la sbyangs pa yis// bsam yas dag la de bzhin bya// rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mchod
214a7: pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ / sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyen bajam reg na ba ba yi// sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi// mdzes par bris shing sbas pa dang // kun 'thung rin can
214a8: phung po 'bang / / dbyibs legs rdzing du bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang dpag pas ma ldon pa'i tshal// gru dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sra// zlar rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// ngo shal dpung rgyan ma

214b1: do/ / bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // rang la mdzes pas brgyan pa yi// lha dang lho mo rdul rnyed kyi// bro ga la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bdun ma mkha' khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas pa
214b2: dbul/ / skal lda rwa gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rims kyis yang na cig char du// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing // mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po sgom// gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'bru 'jug tshul
214b3: 8/ / dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// sreng gsum 'gro ba ma lus la// dga' ba chen pos
214b4: khyab par gyur/ / rdzu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du grung // lus dag sems dang chos thams cad// gang
214b5: na mi gnas mi dmigs pa/ / rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgo ma// goms pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas
214b6: slob ma gzhug par bya/ / de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab du gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mdzod
214b7: pa yin/ / nyaba'i dkyil 'khor spos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang // rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// snying rjes chung ma zos par
214b8: bzung / / yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas// phyag chen po yi phang du ni// dkyil 'khor 'dzub gang chad du bya// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya// yang nas gzhi bsnyams pa la// dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang

215a1: tshad du ste/ / yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad// pur bu sa bu tshe ni phye dang // gos brgyan mdzes ma yid 'ong grogs// thig gad ba cho ga phun sum tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgoms te bya// yang na khu ni bcu
215a2: drug dang / / nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam// nam mkha'i' dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas
215a3: dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom/ / ma mthong rmongs pa ston phyir tshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// 'dul ba'i chog bzhin du dgye// ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge 'am gdan nam
215a4: snying po 'am/ / phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// 'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam// sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim par thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes/
215a5: kyis byas pa// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i
215a6: mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba/ / phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// kun tu bzang mo mi snyengs yin// kun tu bzang mo rang gnas pas// ye shes dril bu bsil
215a7: zhing spro/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas yum chen gyi// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// ces kyang mi shigs mi byed la// cis kyang mi g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen yum du gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya yum lnga btab// mu kun du
215a8: bzang mo'i thugs nyid las/ / rdo rje yum chen thams cad kyi// rang gi rtag su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed dril bu 'chang zhes bya// muM ji ltar rgyal po'i gnas bshams te// rgyal pos gcig ma chen 'gyed pa ltar// bde chen

215b1: yum du gnas pa dang / / dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kunu la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog ga gnas// bdag nyid yum chad mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag
215b2: rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yan/ / nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// mu dril bu dril bu grags snyan dang // yum nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal mo yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs
215b3: shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ / btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad dril bu nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin// de las chos sku gsur 'byung ba// maM g+ha dz+wa la na la rka mri zhes brjod pas
215b4: phyag rgya tshogs su snang bar gyur to/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mtshon cha dam tshig phyag rgya glu'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos thabs dang shes rab 'byung
215b5: ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / de nas yid dang chos 'thun par// thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang // shes rab dril bu chos la brtan// hUM rang muM gi snying po 'bar// de las rdo rje rtse bcur 'bar// oM dang mr-i gi mchog
215b6: tra brtag/ shes rab nyi zer zla rgyas thabs// 'bar ba'i phung pos chos la brtan// de las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni// 'bru lnga phyag rgya nyid du ste// de las rdo rje phyag bsnams gsor// de las 'khor lo phyag bsdam
215b7: gsor/ / de las nor ba phyag bsnams pa// de las pad ma phyag bsdams 'dzin// de las ral gri phyag bsdams gcod// de nyid rdo rje phyag bsnams pa// thabs chen drug tu yang dag gsor// de nas rdo rje bzung thabs gnyis
215b8: oM dang mu gyi mtshon bzhin du/ / rdo rje rtse bcu thabs chen po// thugs kar brtan pa'i tshul du 'bar// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag na mi 'jigs thugs kar 'dzin// muM las phyag rgya chen po ni// dril bsil

216a1: 'bar pas sangs rgyas yum/ / mchod gnas chos la brtan par 'dzin// thams cad kun du phyag rgya yi// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje 'chang // sku gsung thugs ni thams cad pa// yon tan phrin las kun du rdzogs/
216a2: sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang du dmigs// de las rdo rje mchog bsnams pa// de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan las// oM hUM sraM gyi rtser 'dzin pa// nyid las yang dag bskyed
216a3: tshul du/ / shes rab yum du shin tu brtags// rdo rje 'bar bas rab brten pa// thabs chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab// gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med// de las 'gro don phrin las 'char// yid dang chos su rab brtags pa'i// rdo rje
216a4: 'chang rgyal tshul chen las/ / rdo rje drag por lan gsum gsor// gtum po'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab du rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin
216a5: chen dbyig dang 'byung ba kun/ / de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// thabs la rten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du 'bya//
216a6: shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon byung bskyob pa dang // byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed nus
216a7: mthu'i gzi byin gyis/ / sgyu ma rdo rje can po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson pa// zhag ni sum bcu phrag drug gam/
216a8: bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' ya

216b1: mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang // rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong
216b2: nas nye bar mnyes pa dang / / rgya chen gsung las don byung ba// 'thun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo // gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes gnas mang
216b3: sdang / log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na// 'gro drug dus nas ma lus snang // bde ba chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// stangs dbul gnyis sam yang na lA/
216b4: byas te dang ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur// skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi// ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dad med nyams na phung par 'gyur zhes ched du brjod do// rdo rje
216b5: bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// yen pa
216b6: mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la/ / thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// thams cad ma lus maN Da la// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la// rig pa rang byung gyur pa yis// mnyam par mnyam la mi gnas
216b7: pa'i/ / chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por sgom// 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyi// bzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis// rang rig bsgribs shing rtag tu bcings// kun gyi yang dag rtogs
216b8: bya'i phyir/ / de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan// rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang // yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don// rin chen sna tshogs la sogs dang // 'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun// thams cad byang chub mchog gi

217a1: rmA/ / gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag/ ye shes chen po rab 'byam gyis// don du mi 'gyur yod ma gsungs// de bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni// nyid kyi thugs
217a2: la bstim byas te/ / thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pas// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis// thams cad chos sku phyag rgya che// yang dag rtogs
217a3: pa'i khyad par gyis/ / ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms te// ma mA ki'i rgyun chags la// yang dag chos sku phyag rgya che// de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal sgoms nas// don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir// mkha' la 'phro ba'i
217a4: dkyil 'khor du/ / dri med chos sku phyag rgya gsal// dbyangs dang de bzhin nyid med par// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas// kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur// sna tshogs phrin las rnam par rol// don gyi snying po
217a5: mchog rnams kyang / / byang chub phyogs rnams rab du rdzogs// 'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor// a ho// chos sku phyag rgya de dag las// las lnga'i dkyil 'khor rab du sgrub// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/
217a6: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// drag po gtum po 'dul ba'i phyir// bdag nyid drag po bsgoms nas ni// chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis// bgegs kyi ling ga mnan par bya// gtum po rngam po'ang rlag par 'gyur//
217a7: mthun phyogs kyang rdul du drog/ 'od dag 'gro ba thams cad du// shin tu stobs drag che ldan 'gyur// thams cad gnyis med dbyings baspu'i phyir// bdag nyid ha ya grI bar sgom// dmar po'i chos sku gsal bsgoms te// mi
217a8: mthun phyogs rnams gdan du gding / / ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na// thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu// mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brang // ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i/

217b1: phyir// bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste// gser gyi mdog 'dra phyag rgyar sgom// gang 'phel chos sku gdan du bzhag/ de ltar dag pas byin brlabs na// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel
217b2: ba dang / ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// gtum khro ma lus 'bya'i phyir// dka' zhing 'tsher ba'i chos su sgom// gang zhig gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan// de bzhin tid 'dzin byin brlabs na//
217b3: gtum po rngam po'ang ni bar 'gyur// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// zhi zhing dral ba nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// rnam bzhid dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus// bya byed med par dkyil
217b4: 'khor spyad/ / ldan grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs// ma ho// chos su phyag rgya chen po ni// dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges// nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa// phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug ni// gang bskams the tshom mad
217b5: par 'grub/ / de ni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam// the tshom med de des 'grub 'gyur// 'jig rten pa'i lha bsgrubs na// lha yi snying po gang yang rung // bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na// lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// chos
217b6: nyid rten cing 'brel bris na/ / chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te// rang dang spyi yi don rtogs nas// skye rgan 'chi med par rtogs// phyag rgya chen po de dag la// nyon mongs las rnams spyod byed pa'i// snying po ma nor don bris na//
217b7: ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bas ma yas dang // dpag tshad med pa'i phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad// zhing khams bye ba rdul dang mnyam// a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu
217b8: sgra 'phral dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis dngos grub len pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po rgyal po dbang sbyin pa zhes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

218a1: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa'i'adi brjod de/ / shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun// rdo rje lam las pad mor dkyil// rtse nas bstim zhing dkyil
218a2: 'khor sbyar/ / nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas sa// gsal ba'i thog la bo nyid// tra gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// den chen dkyil 'kho gas la spro bstem// gas pa'i gsang chen gsang mchog dang /
218a3: gsarab kun la mnyam par bya// gsang ba'i don nyid rtogs pa las// gzhan du smra bar bya ba min// gsal ba'i 'khor log zhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi
218a4: dkyil 'khor gas la spro thim/ / oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bzung // rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su/
218a5: gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin pas// las rnams ma lus kun byos shig/ pho nya 'du 'phro mar po kun// khyod kyi dgro/
218a6: pa byed pa yin// smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gas ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// hrIHyi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las// chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim// oM chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par
218a7: byos/ / rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// 'thun par gsang bsgrags gzhan du min// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM IM sraM aM hAM rnams las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng
218a8: bsgom/ / phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes pad ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas

218b1: bar/ / nyan pa la sogs brtsom pa'i rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang // go Na rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btud dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na//
218b2: dus 'di pan chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan sor thams cad med pa dang // gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bu// tshe ri dbade ba phun sum tshogs// kun tu bzang po la sogs mtshan// mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por gyur// lus dang
218b3: phung por bcas palas/ / rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i sa// rig 'dzinas la gnas palas// bla mad kun tu bzang por 'gyur// yum dang sgeg mo la sogs la// de nyid byin gyis rlob par gyur// pho nya 'du 'gro mang po
218b4: rnams/ / sangs rgyas bka' las mi 'da' zhing // de'i dgos pa byed pa dang // sgro dang skur ba la sogs pa// de ni myur du rlag par 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ zhes ched du
218b5: brjod do/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa degyes pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dngos grub
218b6: dUr bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so/ / de bzhin nyid dang mnyam sbyor phyir// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// byang chub phyogs la gzung bar gnas// mchog du bde ba'i zhing gnas pas// mnyam rdzogs chen po'i lhun sgom
218b7: zhing / / byang chub sems su brtan par bzung // bya ba med las bya byed bya// mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a// shin tu 'tshong zhing gsal bsgoms nas// 'od 'phro 'bar bas thams
218b8: cad khyab/ / dus gsum ngan so dag nas bsregs nas// b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim// thim 'gyur dbyings nas 'od 'phro 'bar// a ma las ni zla nyi 'bar// phyogs bcur 'thoms pa'i mun sel zhing // nyon mongs

219a1: sdug bsngal bsil ba'i stan/ / zugs rjo byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// rol pa'i phyag rgyabasam mi khyab// mkha' la 'a 'tshen spun mang yang // nam mkha' dbyings su thams cad bsdus// thams cad
219a2: mkhyen pa'i bsam yas kyang / / chos kyi dbyings su thams cad 'dus// thams cad yi ge hUM du gyur// hUM nyi gsang ba'i thugs rje'i dkyil// 'od zer 'phros pas 'bru gsum ste// yang na 'od zer 'bru lnga yi// lnga pa'i don spros
219a3: bzhi bcu lnga'i/ / gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bas ma yas mchog/ ma bcos rang gis gnas pa la// ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor sgom// sen zlum zla ba gang pa yi// thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil
219a4: 'khor gang ba yi/ / gzhal yas 'od zer 'bar ba'i gang // pad ma'i gdan dang rin po che// de dkyil yi ge hUM gnas pa// shin tu phra zhing yungs 'bru 'bar// gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum dang // gnas lnga dag tu rab du mA~M/
219a5: shes rab can la 'dris pa dang // ni'i mig gis bltar yod par// shin tu phra zhing gsal bar bsgom// shin tu blogs la 'dris gyur nas// phyogs bcu'i stong khams rdul snyed du// thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam ya
219a6: spro/ / spos kyang hUM las nyams pa med// bsdus kyang phyogs bcu bri ba med// spro med bsdu med de bzhin las// yi ge muM du thim par gyur// thim 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing 'dris pa dang // phyag
219a7: rgya'i sku nyid gsal bar bsgom/ / sU de tshan gang 'od 'bar nas// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i u0f7f// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed bsgoms// yang na phyug rgya chen po ste// bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam// zhal
219a8: gsum phyag drug rtag du bsgom/ / gzhal yas khang dang gdan khri rnams// phra ba'i tshul te snga ma bzhin// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan// dbu rgyan yi ge lnga dang ldan// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// rin chen pad ma dril bu

219b1: 'bar/ / phyag rgya chen po de dag las// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang // nyi zla gza' skar dkyil 'khor gdan dang rgyan// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom// thugs rje byin brlabs 'gro don mdzad// zhi
219b2: ba phyogs gcig shes bya spro/ / sa bcu mnyam par sbyor byed cing // bde gshegs 'khor yang dag par byed// de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog de// 'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang // sdug bsngal thams cad yod mi 'gyur//
219b3: mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub// theg pa dman par yod mi skye// bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur// byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying
219b4: po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sbyar ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa
219b5: 'di brjod do/ / rgyu gcig dang ni yig 'bru tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab du rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin oM du tra
219b6: par bya/ / rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs sgra dri re rig la sogs// rnam smin muM du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i dkyil
219b7: 'khor bsgom/ / gos rgyan bza' ba tung glu dang tshig/ bro ga tshogs kyi sprin phung la// pUdu shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar mang du byung ba yi// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// dbyes
219b8: 'am yang na mi dbye bar/ / snyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'i// bsgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// yum gyi pad ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchon

220a1: gi sbyin pas bstim/ / grub pa'i nyi zla snying po de// 'gro drug dus gnas de dag nyid// mchod pa chen por mnyes sbyar zhing // dkyil 'khor rdo rje rtse yis blang // mkha' 'gro gas la 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin
220a2: sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/ / zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas bzhag/ nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed bsgom// hUM du gyur pas rnam par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bab
220a3: sur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid/ / gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// e nas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu ma snang ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul bya tsam yang
220a4: byas pa med/ / snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing // mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor kun du bzang po'i zhing // byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga
220a5: rdzogs par shes pa yi/ / rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga zhing lnga dang sbyor ba yi// tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du
220a6: rnam par bsgom/ / de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje rigs// pad mo'i rigs dang sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// chom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi
220a7: thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig gi lha rnams bsgom// khro bo khro mo tshogs chen dang // pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bgyis la sogs pa rnams kyis// dngos grub
220a8: las rnams rdzogs par byed/ / rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas shing // spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa'i// thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'i// rdo rje'i rigs su thams cad

220b1: dkyil/ / 'od 'phro 'bar ba rab du sgom// chags med tshul gyis bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na su gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer//
220b2: 'phro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rigs 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa'i gnas// sngags 'chang dngos
220b3: grub yang dag ni/ / thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng sgom// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'od zer rnam pa mang po spro// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'brug
220b4: rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyi/ / de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so sngags dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang // mnyams
220b5: blo ni rab ldan pas/ / dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya// le lo sgyir snyom med pa yi// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa thob// grub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs
220b6: ni/ / rgud las smos pa bzhin du bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
220b7: gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas
220b8: mngon rdzogs pa'i/ / dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya

221a1: 'bar ba'i rgyal po thogs med 'grub/ / bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub// A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan pas// thams cad thams cad
221a2: 'grub par 'gyur/ / shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzugs// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rigs 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam ngag 'dzin mod kyi//
221a3: khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun du rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pI// sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum// rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs// mkha' dbyings dang ba'i dbyings nyi zla//
221a4: ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal sgom// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus par ni bsgoms par 'gyur// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i
221a5: sangs rgyas te/ / sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur// chog lhag gam ma tshang na// skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med// ces ched du brjod pas
221a6: rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to/ / rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // a ho// ma mthong rmongs la chags pa yis// chos
221a7: rnams ming du btags pa tsam/ / 'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs khyad par rab snang ba'i// zab chen spyod yul log par rtogs brtags ming tsam pa// a li kA li la sogs 'dod pa'i snying po nyid// phyag rgya glu cig sgra
221a8: gsung zugs/ / thugs kyi thugs chen yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs sur 'dugs la// mnyam nyid khyab pa'i stabs dbya yon na mchog ste sngags kyi phrin las rdzogs// rdo rjegasang pa'i tshig

221b1: tu'o/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs grub pa'i le'u sa nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dkyis
221b2: pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / ma rtogs pa dang log par
221b3: rtogs/ / phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgra brtags ming tshogs la// bden pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin
221b4: pa/ / ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gas
221b5: ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings/ / sku gsung thugs rig kun mnga' ba'i// bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin no// byang chub sems ni rdo rje tshig
221b6: dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams/ / kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes lngas lta zhing // snying po'i thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis//
221b7: ye shes dgyes la mnyes par dbul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi
221b8: dngos/ / phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang bskur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid//

222a1: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // phyogs dus
222a2: dkyil 'khor 'dul bI mgod/ / sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang 'byung kunas
222a3: lhun gyis grub/ / 'di na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad
222a4: du/ / dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing // dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yin// 'bras bu gsang chen
222a5: 'di yin te/ / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcun// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas// brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhan
222a6: gyis grub par 'gyur/ / 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di yis gsang ba'i des don med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// kun gyi phyag rgya chen
222a7: pa'i mchog/ thas pasams bsgoms la rabasnangs pa'i// shes rab mog ldan rnams kyis bzung // snod ldan dang tshul bzang la ga na// lum dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan nam yang sbyin pa bya/ dzaH
222a8: la 'byung bas gal te sbyin/ / dus min par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang sgribs par yun ring gnas/ shes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do// kyila'i khong ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khong yini/

222b1: dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang pa man ngag gi snying po'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//
222b2: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o// thams cad ma lus dus gsum bder gshegs mchog/ gdod
222b3: nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems/ / rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi byed cing // ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin// 'gro 'ong med par dus gsum gcig car rdzogs// dbye bsal med phyir bzang ngan
222b4: blang dor med/ / rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te// rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod du med// bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon sbyangs pa// khri la 'ga' tsam gal te 'byung 'gyur zhing // sngar bas phyis 'byung dag dang
