222b5: dbyer med pa'i/ / mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de dag la// bskal pa 'ga' nas shes rab blo sbyangs pa// dang ldan 'ga' yis 'tsham par ci theg gi/ bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyu ma 'byongs pa// gzhan du tshol
222b6: zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis/ / bstan kyang ma thos mchos kyang ma mthong ba// bdag cag gzhan du tshol bas sangs mi rgyas// de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing // bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te// shes rgyud
222b7: ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing / / bya byed las 'phags gyin 'da' 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la dpyod pa'i byang chub thob// ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yod med pas// dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi byed de// ma snyigs
222b8: mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la/ / blo yi rig pas dpyod cing nan tan dang // mchod cing bsten pas byang chub thob mngon te// nam mkha' bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur// nam mkha' med par gang gis

223a1: shes pa na/ / sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par ma srid do// rnam par rtog pa'i g.yung drung sangs rgyas la// thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cing // mi rtogs lar gnas la rtog
223a2: mdzad/ / steng du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin// bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter// ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i// thams cad sems kyi dang ste sems zhes gdags su
223a3: med/ / ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing // thob rgyu med pas ye nas bder gshegs yin// zhes brjod pas chos dang ye shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas par de bzhin
223a4: gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ / mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo //
223a5: e ma 'o ma sbubs grub chen po// grub pa chen po ye shes che// blang dor med pa'i sa chen po// mig yor 'du bral med pa'i gzungs// rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter// thams cad pa yang me long/
223a6: bzhin// bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo // gang na gsang chen 'di yod par// me ma mur gyi dod 'bogs la// spu gri so ni btams pa la// 'dzegs na bu dag 'gro bar byos// khong na gnas pa'i
223a7: yang khong du/ / lugs kyi sgrom bu kha ba sdam mo// dbyings nyid la ni nyid spyod phyir// dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la spyod// de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das// rdo rje gas ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de'o
223a8: na nyid nges pa las gsang ba chen po man ngag gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas nyid kyi sku la

223b1: thams cad ma lus par ston te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / 'das dang de ltar ma 'ongs dang // 'byung bar ma nges dus 'di dag/ snga phyi med par mnyam yin par// nges pa med par yang dag gsungs// 'jig rten 'das dang
223b2: 'jig rten pa'i/ / rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang // ji snyed brtan g.yo la sogs pa// sgyu ma mi g.yor tshul yin te// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing // sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa// de dag
223b3: gnyis med dbyings su sbyor/ / thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba yi// de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog/ ji snyed brjod pa'i kha rgyud kyang // yang dgadon
223b4: gyi snying po ni/ / gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin// de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni// bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te// da ni ma nor lam yin par// a yis po de rab du bsdus// de bzhin nyid kyi
223b5: dbyings nyid ni/ / gcig gam 'di zhes brjod du med// gsum du sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro// byin brlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog/ don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis// de las lhag pa'i don smra ba// de ni rnam
223b6: dag la ma min te/ / rang blos bsams pa'i 'khrul pa yin// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad// tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te// dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing // 'bru lngar bsdus
223b7: pa thabs chen te/ / 'gro ba kun la rang rig gnas// bya ba med la byas pa med// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter// bum pa bzung dang yid bzhin mdzod// za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal// gzhan nas yid 'ong ma yin te//
223b8: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsnyen pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor/

224a1: du mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kha dag tu rmongs pa'i rtogs pas brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa dang yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gas
224a2: babal mngon par 'tshel nas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas/ srid pa'i sa bon nub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang 'dod pas gdungs nas
224a3: ' di bas shin tu grang yang cim rung snyam pa'i mod la rab du sbrebs pa pad ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab du nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab du tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang shin tu gra pal sogs pa brgyad
224a4: po dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo / / de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dgas ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyan pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du
224a5: mi 'ong ba dang / sdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur ba dang / yod med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing skams pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang / dbang po ma 'tsham par gyur pa dang / bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes/
224a6: de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyis srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dgas srin po chen po rab du gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo brgya pa dang / mgo sna tshogs pa dang
224a7: lus brgya mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag sna tshogs pa dang / gdug pI lag cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa 'khor rab tu mang po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs
224a8: pa'i daro sna tshogs sgrogs pa gzugs dang / nga ro dang / dri dang / kha blangs kyis thams cad skyi bud zhes byed pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung grang ba dang tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs kun tu khams 'khrugs par byed pa/

224b1: nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i rigs dang / lha ma yin gyi rigs dang / lha'i rigs dang / tshangs pa'i rigs dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che man cad dbang du
224b2: bsdus so/ / de sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur te/ thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa'i glu 'di blangs so// e ma'o// 'gro ba yongs ni bder gshegs lam
224b3: yin te/ / sdug bsngal bsreg mdzad sgyu ma'i sprul par snang // yon tan rmad 'byung che ba'i rang bzhin 'di// sdug bsngal kun la gshegs gnyen mgon po yin// rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang 'joms// kun 'byung
224b4: bde ba rdo rje sku mchog ste/ / rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam yas pas// thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms// sku mdog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bas ma yas la// rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i
224b5: don mdzad cing / / byang chub sems kyis lam la gnas par mdzad// 'gro ba kun las bde ba gcig pu ba// a ho dgyes pa'i mnyes pa nyid la gnas par mdzad// byin brlabs kun gyis bde ba nyid la snad zhes brjod pas//
224b6: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la kun las rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i rdo rje bkod pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum
224b7: g yi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chen po rnam
224b8: par 'phro ba'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas khro mo'i dbang phyug chen mo mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad ma rgyas par mdzad nas

225a1: gnyis su med par khyil pa'i dgyes pas thim nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hUM hUM hUM/ bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la na maN Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la hUM zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
225a2: bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab du
225a3: g.yos kun du rab dug yos/ 'ur 'ur rab du'ang 'ur/ kun tu rab du 'ur bur/ chem che ma/ rab du che mchem/ kun tu rab du chem chem mo// shig shig/ rab du shig shig/ kun tu rab du shig shig go// gtor gtor/ rab du
225a4: gtor gtor/ kun tu gtor gtor ro// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad rgyal rab du rgyal bar gyur to/ de nas bcom ldan
225a5: ' das dgyes pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa'i skyi bung zhes byed pa'i 'bar ba chen po khrag 'thung sku smag nag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs
225a6: 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag khrig gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rus chen po ri rib kyi steng gi 'bar ba chen po'i klong gi 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang
225a7: dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa chen po khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so/ / khro bo'i 'khor gyi sprin phung de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen por gyur te/ shar phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag
225a8: 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te lce phyogs su bzhugs so/ / la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad mar gyur te nub phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun du las su gyur te byang phyogs su bzhug so//

225b1: de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang / rngam pa di ro dang / 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs pazhis dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / gshin rje la sogs pa khyo shug gis gdan du byas pa la bzhug so//
225b2: btsum mo khrag 'thung chen po rnams kyang so so'i sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// rigs lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu bstim te bsdus nas gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan nas dregs pa chen po
225b3: la sogs pa gtum pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan nas mgrin gcig du 'dug pa'i nga ros brlang po'i gtum tshig smras pa/ thod thod snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer cing shin
225b4: du gtum sems kyis rngam nas khros so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos thams cad kyi bdag nyid des dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas rngam pa'i skad kyis thugs rjes 'dul ba'i
225b5: thabs kyis shin tu khros nas hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi zhes brjod nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa sa chen po'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nad grol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcad gtub/
225b6: nas khrag kun 'thungs/ rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas hUM hUM hUM/ e a ra li dza dza zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas par grangs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po
225b7: ma lus pa'i rgyal po'ang rgyal po chags pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma/ 'byung po thams cad kyi chung ma/ 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo// srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang // tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang po dang /
225b8: 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhib mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / zab mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos byed dang / gcig skyong mo dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / gru mo dang / rlung

226a1: mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna tshad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo/
226a2: la sogs pa/ bran dang yang bran g.yog dang / yang g.yog 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed kyang bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs
226a3: byed snang bar byas nas de dag kun dgyes pha rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsu dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / / oM hu~M aM badz+ra pra be sha a la la ho3
226a4: brjod pas 'byung po'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas/ pad ma'i dkyil 'khor bsdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/ dper na khab len la lcags 'dra ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal
226a5: khrag 'thung rdo rje'i sku la srin mo chen mo mi srin mo dang / dmar mo dang / dga' mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / dmar ser chen mo dang / sngon gnag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'dra
226a6: dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sku la tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang / zhib mo dang / be con mo dang
226a7: zab mo dang / srin mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung pad mo chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos pa dang / gcig pu spyod pa dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo rnams 'khril to/ bcom ldan 'das
226a8: dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i kun du las kyi sku la me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna tshad mo dang / chu lha mo rnams 'khril to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis hUM

226b1: hUM zhes brjod pas pad mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu btsum par gyur to/ / de nas dgyes te ha zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin las kar mo'i tshogs dang / rkun mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs
226b2: mo'i tshogs dang / thal byed ma'i tshogs dang / sbos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo'i tshogs dang / sme sha can gyi tshogs dang / mtshogs mo'i rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar dang chas nas 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar
226b3: ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang rang gi lag chas chas nas 'khod do/ / de nas shin tu dgyes nas he zhes brjod pas sed gdod chen mo'i tshogs dang / stag gdong/
226b4: chen mo'i tshogs dang / wa gdod chen mo'i tshogs dang / khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / gzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / kang ka gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / dur bya gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / 'ug gdong chen mo'i tshigs
226b5: rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to/ / 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs kyi phyi rol nas 'khor ba'i rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes
226b6: pa phyogs bcu'i zhing du ma lus par khyab nas phaT ces brjod pas rdo rje bsrings 'gro mi 'tshogs dang / rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha
226b7: dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to/ / 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags
226b8: pas thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga la bar yud tsam gyis bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po'i bdud rtsi

227a1: 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / / oM badz+ra ma hA a mri ta ma hA kro d+ha aM aM aM zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po
227a2: la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi sna nas 'thon to/ / mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor btsud pa las gnam nas uts+tsha sma kro d+ha phyung bas 'dam kun 'thungs te/ dran pa slar
227a3: rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbye dgu brgya/ phyag stong brgyad brgya zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo // de'i dusu 'jig rten drug gi phyog
227a4: bcu'i srid pa kun du dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul to/ / de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing bred pas rab du zhum
227a5: pa'i nga ros/ 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/ mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing // snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang //
227a6: dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar mna' bor nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la gzhag go/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyis mchis brang
227a7: dang / ma dang sr-i ri mo bu mo rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo lha rje bzhes su gsol// bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// ming tsam/
227a8: 'dzin par byed pa yang // gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar// g.yo rgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i// sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo'i// gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus

227b1: rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub/ / gal te dpa' bo'i spyan sngar 'dir// spras pa bzhin du ma bsgrubs na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // gas gtubs dum thur rul bar mchi zhes smra so// de nas de'i chung ma'i tshegs
227b2: dang srang mo dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun// dpa' ba chen po'i langs sumatsho// dpa' ba chen pos bdag
227b3: cag rnams/ / las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gi dbang bskur te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bkod do// gsang ba'i snying po de la
227b4: na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis
227b5: grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo khrag 'thung chen po btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo // oM ta thA ga ta ma hA shI/
227b6: he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da d+ha/ sarba duSh+Ta~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da d+ha sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ra da na ma hA shI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da d+ha sarba duSh+Ta~M ta ka ta na data pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma
227b7: ma hA shIshrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da d+ha sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa tsu hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma ma hA shI hUM ru ka ma he tsaN Da d+ha sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la na~M sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma
227b8: hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la naM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sUr+ya rad na ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri bi d+hi ma hU~M phaT/ oM hriHd+ha ba d+ha ba mu kha ma hA kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hUM phaT/ oM sarba a ma~M g+ha ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa hUM phaT/ badz+ra kor hi/ badz+ra tsi ra hi/ badz+ra pra mo hA/ badz+ra be ta li

228a1: !/ badz+ra tsaN Da la~M ha/ badz+ra Tak+ka si ha/ badz+ra b+ha s+phA ri ta/ badz+rA s+pha sha ni ha/ badz+ra si ha mu kha ka ha/ badz+ra b+ha gri mA kha ka te/ badz+ra sra ga mu kha ka te/ badz+ra kri ta mu kha ka ta/ badz+ra ka kha mu kha ka he/ badz+ra kha kha mu kha te/
228a2: la sa la/ te/ dza / brdza sa sa/ pa jalag gi ba tsAb la ya ba t+ta k+Shab+h+ya/ !/ b+h+yots+tsha/ g+ho g+ha / Sh+T+r-iSh+T+r-i sun kyi 'dus gas
228a3: ma gyo sa ma ya phaT/ oM khrol khros pas ni mdzad pa// thugs rjes khros dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag laM stsol// oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha sa ma ya ste/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa~M ma ya ho/ a la su
228a4: li/ ta la ta pa ti/ d+ha sa/ gau na ro/ tri kha raM yo gi ni khA hi ho/ hUM ha he phaT ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig/ rab du tshig kun tu tshig go/ 'bar rab du 'bar/ kun du 'bar ro// thams cad du 'bar ba'i
228a5: dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang rab du gang / kun du rab du gang bar gyur ro// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
228a6: gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i bya ni brlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / dbang po'i yul dus rig pa'i rnams// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing // mnyam
228a7: pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na/ / thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// khro bo khro mo thams cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na// bskul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yig// zla mad
228a8: chen pos de skad gsungs/ / yan lag snying po rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu// las rnams so sor rab du bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen re re bskyod na ni// pad ma chagra

228b1: med re re 'byung / / rdo rje pad ma de 'byor na// sems can thams cad bla na med// byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te// dbu yi dkyil 'khor bskul//
228b2: bskyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas nas// rig 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabs chen mnan mchongs na// sdug bsngal mi bzad thams cad dang //
228b3: bdud dang log 'dren thams cad mnon// yan lag thams cad bskul bsigs na// / ba spu bu ga re re nas// khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phro// de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis// phyogs bcu khams mang rdul snyed du// khro
228b4: bo'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ / thugs rjes gdul zhing dbyings su bstim// thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang // khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab du 'dus// thams cad rdo rje'i brag stengs dang // me ri'i dkyil 'khor rab du
228b5: 'bar/ / 'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin// steng gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor lo nr-i mgo gdengs// 'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i// rdo rje thor gshol ni s+phar dang // rdo rje gtum chen dril bu'o// shar gyi
228b6: bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ / rdo rje ba du 'bang ba dang // stir chen po'i dbyug pa'o// lho'i gegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ rin chen mi mgo'i dbyug pa dang // gshin rje chen po'i nar bzung ba'o// nub kyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ sbrul
228b7: dang sti ra'i dbyug pa dang / / khrung chen gshog gis rab du brdebs// rgya mtsho che rnams rked par gtub// byang gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin po che'i dbyug to dang // nI mgo gsum pa'i dathug to can// gnod sbyin gdon
228b8: rnams tshar gcod pa'o/ / mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// phyogs bzhi dag gis gdul bar 'gyur// gal te de yis ma dul na// byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje rtse gsum ni mgo gdengs

229a1: i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/ / 'byung po de kun rab du btul// shar lho mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje ye shes me lce 'bar// me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed// drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar
229a2: bsnyams/ / me lha gdon 'khor dbang du bsdus// lho nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje dang ni srin po'i mgo/ rab du rno ba'i ral gri 'bar// bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du
229a3: bsdus/ / nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rlung gi ba dan ni mgo gdengs// shin tu drag po glang po'i brjid// tshig srung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// g.yeng ba thams cad dbang du bsdus// 'og tu 'jig rten bgen
229a4: 'dul phyir/ / phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste// phag chen po ni phyag na bsnams// yang ba thams cad dbang du bsdus// 'og gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'o// gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis// tshe dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal
229a5: sel/ / me yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus sreg par byed// chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus gtor bar dbye/
229a6: gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lo bcas// mda' gzhu tho chen gri chen dang // rdo rje mdung chen dgra star bcas// mche gtsigs spu gri so dang ni// mda' dang mdung dang sta ri dang // gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so// dbus kyi ha
229a7: ru'i phyag rgya ni/ / ster dbyug to chen po dang // 'khor lo chen po rab du 'bar// gdung chen dmar gyis gang ba la// rdo rjes dkrug cing rab du gsol// shar gyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// stir chen po'i dbyug pa dang // rdo rje chen po rab tu
229a8: 'bar/ / dri mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol// lho'i phyag rgya chen po ni// stir chen po'i dbyug pa dang // yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhal yas su// dmar gyi arga rab du gsol// nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// stir chen po'i

229b1: dbyug pa dang / / pad ma chags med rab du 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// stir chen po'i dbyug pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram rab du 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol
229b2: khro mo rnams kyang khro dang 'thun/ / gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// rgyud gzhan dag dang 'thun par bshad// ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// 'jig rten 'das mdo chen las bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
229b3: bal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i dkyil
229b4: 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa/ / gru chang bzhi yis rnam par rgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thong sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog
229b5: ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum po'i dom gyis sbar bas ni// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung // smag gnag sngo gnag ser nag dang // dmar gnag ljang gnag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi
229b6: bgrang / / ke rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlar bcas// steng gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs//
229b7: rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing // slas dang byi mo tshogs kyi gtso// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes//
229b8: rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das

230a1: nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / / a ho bskal bar bcas shing drug tshogs 'bar ba yi// nyon mongs kun g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor
230a2: lo brjod dka' ba'i/ / ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan gyis rdul snyed bsam yas pa// ro tshogs khrag la brkam pa dpung gnyen kun bkye nas// zhen pa'i gdug mo shin tu gsal ba dka yi// mi mngon dbyings
230a3: nas gzugs kyi cho 'phrul bas ma yas kyis/ / sdigs mar bcas shing mtshams sbyor kun dam zil gyis gnon// rab tu gnon pa'i 'jigs byed bsam mi khyab// de bzhin de nyid gnyen por kun byung kun du
230a4: gsal/ / ho chos rnams ji snyed 'gro drug smin byed brjod mi lang // dus mtha' rmongs la gnas pa brjod mi lang// 'dod pa zhen pa'i las kyang ji snyed ji srid par// drag po brdo ba'i drung chen bsam mi khyab// bde bar
230a5: a pa gzhan du med par brjod mi lang / bskal par bsags pa'i dug chen rab rtog kun du rtog/ de rnams zil gnon khrag 'thung sku gsung 'jigs byed par// rkyen du bcas nas spu bus 'bras bu smin par
230a6: sprin ltar/ / dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ni mang po'i tshogs// dpag med bsam yas lhun grub pas// rab du 'dul bar shin tu gsal// ho// khro bo'i ding bzhin gdug par 'jigs pa ma yin zhing // ni ba
230a7: mangs bkun gyi yid dang 'thad par gnas rgyud yod ma yin/ / de nyid gnyis su min pa'i tshe 'phrul bsam yas thams cad kun tu khyab// rigs la khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i rol pa rdul snyed rabaston pa'i// rnam sa/
230a8: byang chub mchog gi dbyings te gsang ba'i snying po rab bstan nges pa nyid de shin tu gnas par gsal// to// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo dkyil 'khor bstan pa

230b1: le'u ste sum bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos nyid kyis byin brlabs dang yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// oM sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen ma no//
230b2: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snying po'i mchog nyid de// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid// 'di yin gzhan na med pa ste// rol pa kun la mnga' brnyes shing // srid pa 'jig rten thams cad kun//
230b3: sangs rgyas nyid de dus gsum du// ma g.yos lhun gnas snying po ste// rang bzhin che ba'i yon tan las// ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la// sgyu 'phrul drabs mngon rdzogs pa// snying rje chags pa'adam tshig gis//
230b4: nga rgyal nyid kyi sku chen bstan// gdug cing gtum pa'i khams gsum na// 'dul ba'i zhing du rab sbyor zhing // phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad// ye shes ngo mtshar tsham dam gyis// chos bzhi rnam dag che ba'i
230b5: lha/ / ye shes sku ste khyad par che// chags pa'i tshogs kyis mtshan ma ni// 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sku// gtum rnam gdug pas mtshan pas na// zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi sku// gdul bya zhing du rab sbyor zhing // chos
230b6: nyid mnyam las bzhengs pas na/ / gti mug chen po nyid kyi sku// snod bcung dag pa'i spyod yul ba// thugs su gsung las 'bros pa dang // rgyal ba nga yis mtshan pas na// nga rgyal chen po nyid kyi sku// gas
230b7: ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis/ / thig le thugs su bsdus pa nyid// gzhan du mi gtong mtshan pas na// de nyid phrag dog nyid du rdzogs// stong gsum stong gi stong chen po// 'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa// rdul
230b8: snyed byed pa la sogs pI/ / bgrang ba las ni rab 'das mtshan// de nyid sdang zhing srid pa nyid// 'jigs byed su gsung thugs kyi dbyings// chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thig le mchog/ snying po

231a1: thig le bas ma yas nyid/ / 'jigs byed dbu dgu bcwa brgyad phyag/ sgyu mas mtshan pa'i dra ba yin// de nyid tshogs dang dkyil 'khor sngags// gcig la gsum du mchog tu bsngags// yul dang
231a2: 'byung ba de nyid do/ / bdag rig gzhan don snying po nyid// thabs dang shes rab phyag mtshan pa// gnyis med rig pa'i ye shes tshe// ming dang gzugs dang dbur gyur pa// phyag dang zhabs su rnam par brtags// brtags
231a3: pa las ni 'phros pa'i sku/ / ci yang med las cir yang snang // bskal bzangs mchog gi sgyu 'phrul pa// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor rab du rdzogs// brtags pa zil gnon chos nyid spyan// spyan ni chos nyid mnyam pa nyid//
231a4: ji bzhin dbyings kyi yul la sbyor// rol pa'i rtsed mor sdang mig pa// gzhan du mi gzigs yul la gzigs// pad ma 'khyil pa nyid sku gsung // mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig/ ye shes chen po'i spyan bgrang
231a5: las/ / khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur ba yi// me'i tshogs kyi gzhan dug klog bdud rtsi ma ning cu skyong bas na/ bdud rtsi mchog gi khro bo yin// sku nyid mnyam pa rdzogs pa las// sna tshogs 'char bar rab ston pa// ye shes sgyu 'phrul stobs chen po/
231a6: mi g.yo mchog gi 'du 'phro las// gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa ni// shes rab tshogs la 'phrul pa dang // thugs rje dra ba'i byin brlabs kyis// 'khor yug ji snyed mthas klas pa// dbyings nyid bde la skyong ba ste// 'phro
231a7: nas dbang du byed pa'i don/ / rta yi gar thabs rdzu 'phrul gyis// gcig kyang yal pa ma yin pa'o// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mthas klas par// rtsed mo mchog gi phyag rgya
231a8: ni/ / brkyang dang bskum pa zhabs tshul te// 'phros nas dbang du byed pa'i don// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don// rang dbang thabs chen rgyal po yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung ba// thig le mchog gi gnas

231b1: la rdzogs/ / dbang phyug lha chen la sogs la// zil gnon khros pa'i phyag mtshan pa// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mang po bsnams// nga rgyal gdug pa'i zhe sdang gcod// gti mug chos sku sgyu 'phrul pa// dra ba'i thugs rje mahA
231b2: dag ni/ / khros pa'i dam tshig snying rje yis// mnyam pa'i thig ler dgod pa ni// gshin rje gshed por gdug pa'i rgyal// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams mchog sgrol bden// 'gro la mgon du gyur pas na// dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med
231b3: pa'i/ / chos sku gdug pas brgyan pa'i sprul// dbang rtags ye shes rgyan du bzhag/ dur khrod rdzas dang khrag 'thung ba'i// g.yang gzhi stag gi lpags chen bgos// 'jigs byed snying rje'i dam tshig ni// skye shi rtsa ba gcod
231b4: mdzad pa/ / mi g.yo mgon zhes mchog tu bsgrags// nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed pa// nga rgyal 'phrog pa'i dam tshig ste// kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la// sngags kyi snying po de nyid pa// hUM hUM hUM gis sdud za zhing 'byung rdo rje
231b5: thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis/ / hU~M mdzad ches ni rnam par bsgrags// mi mched gti mug chen po ni// nyon mongs rgya mtsho rngub pa'i phyir// ban d+hi klong chen 'phung bar snang // 'jig rten 'bar ba'i sprin chen po// bskal pa/
231b6: las kyi zil gnon pa// rdo rje me yis 'bar ba 'byung // nyon mongs rgya mtsho skems par byed// 'jigs byed thabs kyi dam tshig gis// bsam yas 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// rang gi sku yi gzhal med
231b7: bsdus/ / sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes ni// zil gyis gnon pa dur khrod gling // tshom bu gnyis kyi lha chen po// rdo rje sku yi byin brlabs kyis// thig le mi g.yo bde ba las// rang bzhin rol pa chen pos ni// rdo rje phra men po
231b8: nyi'i tshegs/ / khams gsum 'dul bar yang dag mdzad// ha ni thig le zhi ba nyid// ha ni thig le zhi khre snyems// ha ni thig le dbang chen yin// ha ni thig le drag po nyid// ha ni thig le rol pa nyid// ha ni thig les phrin

232a1: las nyid/ / ha ni thig les chags dbang 'dul// he ni thig le las kun rdzogs// he ni thig le ye shes thugs// he ni thig les gsung snyan pa// he ni thig les mtsham dam lce// he ni thig le
232a2: rol pa nyid/ / he ni thig le dbang rtags yin// he ni thig les drag shul ba// he ni thig les thugs chen rdzogs// he ni thig les dkyil 'khor ba// 'jig byed mchog gi sgyu 'phrul te// dra ba zil gnon lam 'gog sa
232a3: hUM ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs/ hUM ni ye shes thugs su nyid// hUM ni ye shes thugs sku gsung // hUM ni ye shes yid bzhin las// hUM ni thig le ye shes so// phaT ni sku yi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni gsung gi
232a4: gsung gi thugs/ / paT ni thugs kyi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i gsung gi thugs// phaT ni chos thugs thugs kyi thugs// sgyu 'phrul dra bas dgyes pa to// dbang phyug
232a5: chags pas dgyes pa ho/ / gar thabs rol pas dgyes pa ho// sku gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho// yon tan las kyis dgyes pa ho// pho nya 'du 'phro dgyes pa ho// kun la snang bas dgyes pa ho// byin gyis brlabs
232a6: kyis dgyes pa ho/ / chos kyi sku la dgyes pa ho// ye shes rol pa dgyes pa ho// ci yang min pas dgyes pa ho// gnod pa bsdud pas dgyes pa ho// chos kyi dbyings nyid dgyes pa ho// nges dgyes pa chen po nyid la nyid shin
232a7: tu dgyes par gyur te/ chos thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya pa las dgyes pa chen po'i byin brlabs dang yon tan mchog ston pa'i le'u ste sum bcu
232a8: gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'jigs byed kyis bsod nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'khor lo 'bar khyas/

232b1: sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed 'khor lo'i rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul tu// sku gsung
232b2: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ / 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshigs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang
232b3: dang rgyas/ / 'jigs pI tshegs chen de dbus su// lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// yang na rigs dbang dkyil 'khor ro// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/
232b4: 'jigs pa'i 'phrin las rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshigs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus dang ngag yid byin rlabs
232b5: nas/ / bdag nyid drag por rab gnas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// yang na rigs dbang dkyil 'khor ro// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs pa'i phrin las rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin
232b6: pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ / khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// las bzhi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas//
232b7: bdag nyid drag por rab gnas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jig byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs par bsgom// rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs
232b8: pa/ / 'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par// tsham dam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom// glu dang gar dang phyag rgya dang // shes rab thabs su shes pa dang // byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dang // brda las sogs pa'i yon tan dang //

233a1: bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyis// mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po'i gsod nama?/
233a2: sbyin pa dal tshig le'u ste/ sum bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos tsher ga dang / dkyil 'khor yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di ba // de bzhin ga
233a3: pa'i sku gsung thugs/ / chos dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro// gsang sngags spyi yi dkyil 'khor las// shes 'jug yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// rgyang grags dpag tshad la mo g+ha dang / lus gang lus
233a4: ro gsum gyi tshad/ / rang gi rig pas ci nus par// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gnod bskrangs gnon byin gyis brlab// ljon pa lcag phran sdong gcig dang / ma reg mtshon gyis ji bzhin du/ goms
233a5: par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dbab/ / 'jigs byed sku gsung dkyil 'khor bzlas// gnas dang bzla dad rdzas rnams ni// tshogs kyi mchog tu dmigs pas gzhag/ dang por mchog sbyin dam pas mchod// gzugs dang lugs/
233a6: chen dung mchog ni// ci 'dod snang bar bdag gi dgod// 'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas// khro mo ji snyed 'khor du bya// bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis zlog/ gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te// 'das pa ba dag tu
233a7: mnyam sbyar zhing / thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas// bdag gis lus la zhugs tshul du// de yi gzugs gzung mchog tu bstim// zhes lan gsum brjod pas na// de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing // ye shes
233a8: lnga'i dngos grub sbyin/ / pho nya 'dra 'phro mang po rnams// de yi dgos pa byed par 'gyur// yang nas bzhi rab mnyam la// phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams// lnga yi mtshon gyis bres par bya// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen//

233b1: rdo rje rung chen dmar rtsas dgar// dud dang srog shing gsar rnying dang // zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran dang // ji snyed pa yi rdzas rnams kun// 'jigs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin dang // nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad//
233b2: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rder dang bcas pa'i bsam pa yis// re ba med par rab du bsgrub// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa// sgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen pos// zhag ni tshang zhing rtags byung na// dkyil 'khor 'thun
233b3: pa nyid du myur/ / zhag ni sum bcu phrag drug gam// drug bcu dgu bcu rtsa drug tu// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed tshogs la bdag lus dbul// de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid du brtag/ 'da' bar
233b4: mi mdzad dam tshig las/ / nams kyang 'da' bar mi mdzad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dgyes pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gi le'u ste sum bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
233b5: dgyes pa chen pos sngags kyi snying po 'di ched du brjod do/ / a ki du na dz+wa la maN Da la phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shI he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha shwe ri hUM phaT/ ru la ma hA sa ma ya hUM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ oM ma hA badz+ra shrI te
233b6: badz+ra kro d+ha sho ri sarba duSh+TA na hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ oM rang na ma hA shrI he ru ka rad na ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri bi d+ha mu kha hU~M phaT/ ru lu ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM b+h+yo hU~M phaT/ oM triHpad ma ma hA shI he ru ka pad ma ma
233b7: hA kro d+ha shwa ri khA hi hUM phaT/ ru lu la hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ oM karma ma hA shI he ru ka sarba a ga ma hA krod+ha b+ha ri bi shwa ra bishwa rU pa hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ oM ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra dad na/
233b8: ba da pa a mo g+ha ma hA badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ma hA sa ma ya ha ha hUM phaT/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pad ma shI te ru ka man tra dz+wa la ma hA maN Da la kA ya bAka tsi ta ta/ oM au oM/ hUM hUM trUM/ swa swaM sraM/ AM AM AM/

234a1: dz+nyAnAd+ha/ brdam d+haganal khang ga na jal ba pa/ mad shIti d+ya ka a ma dram pa de thugs tangan/ dz+dza hrI/ ma da yog yang dam hAs ma pa/ ru lu kyu ma la la ho/ tas pa ba nyid ga yeng bganas pa'i/
234a2: 'khor ba'i bcu gnyis nyid rdzogs// sangs rgyas rdo rje te ru ka/ tshom bu dkyil 'khor bas ma ya sa kye// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+re kro d+hi sa ma ya ho// oM badz+ra kr-i d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM a~M hU~M su ra s+t+wa~M/ ka ma la ma hA su pa
234a3: mA le ma nus man dz+wa la ni d+ha na a pa yo ga khA ti a la la to/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po sngags kyis bzlas pa snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// /
234a4: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dam tshig chen pos phung po dang / khams dang skye mched sbyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
234a5: byung ngo / / oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad ma sa ma yo ge ni dza zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po kun tu pad mar gyur te/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa
234a6: las dbu dang / phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed du srid pa'i rtse mor thug par gnas par gyur to// de nas yang dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ri rab chen po
234a7: brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis 'dril zhing oM a b+hi tsa ra pa shA ne zhes brjod pas lha'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang / srin po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad rang dbang meng bar zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og
234a8: tu gnas par gyur to/ / de nas yang ha ha a bi ra tsa ti Sha zhes brjod pas la la ni lus shin tu brjes te ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// la la ni mngon sumag can mar ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par

234b1: gyur to/ / de nas yangs 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang che ba dang pa med cing rdo rje theg pa spong ba zhig yongs kyi 'jig rten na gnas par mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ oM pad mas
234b2: ma yo ga ni ru lu rul ru lu hUM zhes brjod pas kun tus chags pa'i bdag nyid dang / kun tu gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang / kun tu thugs chags par gyur pa dang / kun tu rin po che chags pa chen po dang / kunad+ha phrin las/
234b3: chags pa chen por gyur te/ shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / dbus chen por khrag gi dpa' klong keng dus chen po'i ri rab chen po na dus kun dang de nyid snang bar gyur to// de yang kun tu sku lnga 'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam
234b4: gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung lnga'i nga ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jigs byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu thugs lnga'i rol pa dang / zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jigs pa dang / rigs sngags tshom bu
234b5: chen po'i steng du gnas par gyur to/ / de las mchog gi snying po chen po ma hA rang na ti la kha'i dbur gyur las rab tu sku gsung thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na 'jigs byed chen po'i thig le snying po nyid dbu gsum phyag drug tu
234b6: gnas te/ gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de nyid du sku dang / dbu dang / phyag dang / zhabs dang / 'khor steng khams kyi rdul snyed du 'jigs byed chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par khebs par mthong ngo // de nas yang bdud
234b7: chen pos 'dzin gyi rgyal pos skyes bu chen pos 'dzin gyi bdag po thang thong ji de lta bu byed dam zhes pa las de nas yang dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis/ oM a b+hi tsa rab shI na tAM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas dam pa'i bstan
234b8: pa rdo rje theg pa smod cing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor pa la gnod pa'i tshogs 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog tu bcas pa'i bdud chen po de dag nyid kyi yid kyis gdungs te rab du brgyal nas ma mthong bar

235a1: rmongs pa'i gnas nas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par keng rus kyi ri rab chen po'i 'og zhabs kyi gnas su phyin par gyur to/ / de nas 'jigs byed chen pos tiSh+Tha badz+ra oM aM zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i blo dang /
235a2: phral/ mi mthun pa'i lus brjes de lha chen po'i tshogs 'dul ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por gnas par gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen po dpal 'jigs byed chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul
235a3: chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thig le chen po zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi rdo rje thig le
235a4: chen po'i dam tshig sna 'phrul dra ba las byung ngo / / oM khrag mdangs dpa' klong 'khyil pa yi// keng rus tshogs kyi ri rab 'bum// 'dus pa'i chom bu lnga yi ri// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar ba'i khang // gru chang bzhis brgyan rab
235a5: brjid pa'i/ / gru bzhi sgo khyung bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid// stan mang po lha chen ston// dgyes pa chen po kun tu bzang // phyag dang zhabs ni brgyad pa yin/ thod
235a6: sbrul sna tshogs nyis zlas brjid/ / 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung ba'i// rdo rje snying po thig le thugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang // khro mo bzhis mchod ngos bzhir ni// dgyes pa chen po'i tshul 'chang ba//
235a7: phyogs bzhi ga dang bcas par ni// sprul pa'i rnal 'byor 'phra men rnams// ri rab zhing chen steng na gnas// 'bar bas phyag bsdams chen po ni// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // pad ma'i gzhal med rde'i chung brdung // zhing gi
235a8: zhags pas 'ching ba dang / / kha T+wAM 'phen cing 'khril ba ste// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// gnam dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes par// bran mo'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// 'jigs pa'i

235b1: gzugs kyis gnas par byed/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam cig gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ba'us sum bcu drug pa'o// de nas debadan /
235b2: gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// byed pa rdo rje mchog nyid kyi// sgyu 'phrul lam gyi dkyil 'khor las// dra ba'i kyil
235b3: 'khor mngon rdzogs par/ / 'jug pa'i yid kyi dgongs pa yin// shin tu pra la sbyangs pa ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mdzes// chom bu gnyis kyi bye brag tu// spro zhing bsdu ba 'ang de bzhin no// yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhi
235b4: ni/ / rkang mthil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri// oM dang muM gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de las pra bo rdo rjes dgrang // phra bar sa bsdus mthil du gzung // yum gyi tshogs su shes pas brtags// gang gi yul yang dbang
235b5: du 'gyur/ / mi mthun gzugs su brtags pa ni// dra ba'i 'du 'phros de lus bzhin// lugs ka bzhin dra haM du btags// de las 'od gzhi mthil tu bzung // gsang nas ngag la ma he du bya// rlung zla'i steng du mkhas
235b6: pas bzhag/ drag po lce'i sbyor ba yis// gling khams gzhan du shin tu btang // bdag nyid hUM gi tshogs bcas pa// ma skyes pa yi yi ge bsgom// bya ba chos khams ngos tshogs// mr-i du byin brlabs yi ger bstim// rten
235b7: pa a yi 'phro 'dra yis/ / nam mkha' bzhin du shin tu bsgom// btan 'gyur a yi snying po bzlas// nyams sa lon par ma gyur tshe// 'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor// dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang // rnam pa mang por
235b8: mnyam du'o/ / de las mi snang gzugs zhi ba// rab du blo yi thig gnas ni// gzhan du rnams kyang mi bstan cing // gzhon dang spyad dang 'tshong la sogs// longs spyod rnam par sbyor ba dang // rdzas kyi nor phyir ma yin no// rmongs la 'bar

236a1: dang brtson 'grus gzhan/ / nams kyang sbyin par ma gsungs te// smad pa bam gyi gter bzhin du// sus kyang phyin par ma gsungs la// srog chags kha yi gtam bzhin du// nams kyang smra bar mi bya'o// byed pa rdo rje
236a2: gsha yi tshogs/ / bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i gling bzhi lam// kun tu bzang po thabs tshul ba// chom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// chos khams bya ba a yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gleng slong pa// kun tu bzang mo shes rab tshul//
236a3: gsha' la ye shes thugs kyi thugs// chom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// de nas chos khams a la bstim// chos kyis chos bya ba yi dbyings// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum// de yi dang du tshogs kun brtag/ sa chu me yi/
236a4: 'byung ba rnams// de yi dbyings nas 'byung bar ni// 'dod pa'i bdag la shin tu brtag/ mi gnas nam mkha'i mthas klas par// goms par 'dod pa thod pa dang // chu las sa zhing 'gro ba dang // bsreg bya 'bar ba'i dbus gan
236a5: dang / tsha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun tu phyin par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje snying po las thams cad kyi le'u ste sum bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa
236a6: chen pos gsang ba'i snying po de brtan par 'dzin pa'i don ched du ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / de nyid chos dbyings mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// k+Sha la ma a yis tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i//
236a7: dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid yid lam mchog grub pa'o// de nyid gsal bar mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// oM lam a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul
236a8: dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ / lugs su thugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid gzugs lam mchog grub pa'o// de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// sraM la ma a yi tshon bzhin du/

236b1: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkal 'khor bsgos// lugs su byug pa bzhin du ni// de nyid khyad par lam mchog go/ chos dbyings rtogs pas mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byi gyis brlab// oM lam a yi con bzhin du
236b2: 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ / lugs su thugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid gsum lam mchog grub pa'o// chos dbyings bya ba mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// haM lam a yi tshogs
236b3: bzhin du/ / sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su thugs pa bzhin du ni// de ni phrin las ye shes so// de las ting 'dzin sgyu 'phrul bsgom// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid ni// rje bcu rigs kyi phyag rgya
236b4: bsgom/ / de nyid ha dad k+Sha nyid de// muM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas sku 'phrul mchog nyid las// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa// de nyid hUM lam phyag bsnams pa// rtse bcu rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// yang
236b5: na rtse lnga thugs kyi thugs/ / dbus nas hUM gi lo tsa na// lcags kyu 'dzin par rgya bcings shing // hUM hUM hUM gis lan gsum du// rang lus ngag yid byin gyis brlab// muM gyi tshogs kyis lha rnams bskul// 'bru lnga rgya bcings
236b6: byin gyis brlabs/ / bskyed pa rdzogs par gsor ba yis// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri// zhi ba rgyas pa lan gsum gyis// de 'dod las rnams grub par 'gyur// bcu pa drag po mthing gnag dbu// 'gying ba'i gar
236b7: gyis song ba yis/ / gsung skan m+b+ha yi bra rdebs pa'i// phyag chubargyud du skyong bas na// phaT phaT tu gis gsor ba yis// snying po thugs rtags phyag bsdams pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal ba las// bsod nams lus
236b8: 'jig dbang du gyur/ / ci 'dod re ba thob par mdzad// brgyan pa sgegs pa pho nya dang // tshangs pa dbang po 'dod dbang dang // mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag/ drag shul mthu yis dregs pa can// sngags shing brgyal te po stong nas//

237a1: bum pa bzang po 'bul bar 'gyur// lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang // rta dang glang po gzhon pa dang // gnas dang rten dang bgo ba dang // gtsug na nor bu yod pa dang // ci 'dod yid la bsam pa dbul// de la bran bzhin byed pa
237a2: 'gyur/ / de yi dgos pa thams cad ni// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po rten par bzung ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
237a3: gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas dag chos la// log rtog rnam pa gnyis su 'grub// thams cad
237a4: 'byung ba lnga las skyes/ / thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las// rnam rtog mi mthun so sor gyur// la la'i sman la la la'i dug/ sman du ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad ma lus rgya gcig las// mi mthun khyad par so sor
237a5: snga / / sus kyang ma byas su byed yod// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcings// sdug bsngal ma lus 'khrul 'khor dang // khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang // dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang // nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams
237a6: cad myoskyor/ / rnam par thar pa blta rdzogs byed// sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs// sde phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya// kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas// sde phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog 'or// thams
237a7: cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod/ / rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod// snying rje chung ma zos par gyis// bdud rtsi mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings// bdud rtsi don ni skye shi med// bdud rtsig nas ni byang chub sems
237a8: bdud rtsi las ni rnam rtog sbyong / / bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don mdzad// sman gyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// ngan song sbyong zhing mtho ris grub// gser 'gyur sman dang mu ne sel zhing // gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub//

237b1: rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang // rtsa ba'i dug dang myur ba'i dug/ klu rug sbod gtong dug la sogs// thugs rje chen po'i byini brlabs kyis// dug rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang bar bsgom// gar+tha
237b2: lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bsti ma/ / oM hUM traM hriHA/ yang ni yi ge A gyis bya// yang na yi ge hri las btang // dug rnams bdud rtsir bsgyur bar bya// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// hUM bdag nyid zhe sdang
237b3: rdo rje ste/ / thugs rjes rtog rtag 'dul bar byed// de dang bdag med dbyings sbyor zhing // byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// oM bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste// ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i dang // thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo
237b4: yi/ / tsa bdag nyid nga rgyal yon tan te// snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed// zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o// hri bdag nyid 'dod chags gsung mchog te// nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed//
237b5: nyon mongs sdug bsngal rnam par dag/ chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o// a bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste// don rnams ma lus grub par byed// log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi 'phro ba'o//
237b6: mu bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te// le log yeng ba sel bar byed// thugs rje myur ba las byung ba// rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o// nyon mongs las nams dag byed cing // dbugs chen dag kyang 'byin par byed// dug rnams
237b7: myong ba sku gsum ste/ / lam lnga stong pa ye shes lnga// 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon// hUM du bsdus shing ho yis g.yed// raM gyis bsregs shing phaT kyis 'phar// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// thig le'i dbyings
237b8: su thim par bya/ / de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas// ye shes sems dpa' sku ru bsgom// 'bru gcig 'bru gsum 'bru lnga bsgom// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// de med bdag

238a1: med phyag rgyar gsol/ / de nas longs spyod lnga ku na dang // ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang // lha mo lnga dang sman lngar bsgom// oM hU~M trA~M hrIHa A~M badz+ra a mri ta kun Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ oM bi shud d+he a mri te hUM phaT/
238a2: oM d+harma a mri te hUM pa Ta/ oM AHhUM ces brjod pas thams cad dag par gyur/ bdud rtsir gyur/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams// rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir// gcig la lnga lngar dbye bya zhing // mr-i ga byings su bstim/
238a3: bar bya/ 'byung ba che rnams de dag la// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya// rigs pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing // 'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de// yum lda dag tu bsgom par bya// de rigs ye shwa
238a4: lnga nyid do/ / rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid de// de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// a ho/ e ma'o lhag pa'i byin brlabs
238a5: kyis/ / bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom// de nas lha dang gnyis med nas// bdag nyid yi ge oM dang mAM// gnyis dang bdag dang dbyings su thim// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsgom// sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// zla
238a6: ba pad ma gdan khri la/ / nyi ma stong gi gdan khri ldan// lha dang lha mo tshogs kyis bskor// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes// slas dang byi mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// a ho 'khor lo rtsibs
238a7: bzhi mu khyud bcas/ / dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// shar gyi rtse la rdo rje'o// lho'i rtsel rin po che// nub kyi rtsel snang mtha' yas// byang gi rtse la don yod grub// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom// phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar /
238a8: snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar bzlas// de la bdud rtsi phyag rgya ni// bum pa gad ba yid bzhin 'bar// re ba yid bzhin bskor bar byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// 'dod lnga yon tan ldan par byed// dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o//

238b1: bdud rtsi char bzhin 'babs par byed// sgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan pa dang // a mri ta yi rgyu nyid ni// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang // dri chung chen mar sar bcas// pad ma rag ta la sogs dang // gzhan yang don yod sna tshogs rnams// dbye'am/
238b2: yang na ma dbye bar// bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlab// rtog pa'i bag chags spyad pa'i phyir// gtsang sbra med par dag par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang sel zhing // dug/
238b3: gsum sdug bsngal mad ba dang // bskal bar yun ring gnas pa dang // dngos grub chen po thob 'gyur te// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsungs// bdag nyid yig cu gyur nas// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// au mAn+tu
238b4: du gyur par bsgom/ / 'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur spro// slar 'dus 'od 'phro bdud rtsir 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig bsgom// gzhan yang yi ge'i tshogs pas gdab// 'thungs na ngan song sgrib pa byang // tra ta rtag bsten dngos/
238b5: grub mchog kyang 'grub// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing // lha la rtag tu mchod byas na// bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na// drag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad kyi//
238b6: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sangs rgyas go 'phang thob gyur na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// the tshom med par 'grub par gyis// rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rgyud kyi rgyal
238b7: po sgra 'phrul dra ba las sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum bcu dgra pa'o/ / // de nas dgyes pa chen pos de dag gis byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni// 'brul chen bzhi bcu rtsa
238b8: lnga nyid/ / khams dang 'byung ba nyid la gnas// de nyid sgra 'phrul thabs mkhas pa// dra bas mngon rdzogs sku gsung thugs// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi brten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar sgom/

239a1: de nyid dag las kun khengs par// hU~M gi tshogs su rnam par bsgom// lus nyid ha'i tshogs la snyim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung bas// kha dog nag po'i tshon phye yis// de'i snying nang bdag zhugs la// dza zhes bya
239a2: ba'i sngags bzlas nas/ / mgyogs su 'gro bar lcags kyis spang// dri rno snga bas mgyogs pa dang // gang du bya ba byin par byed// de'i lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhibs bdag gis gzugs bzung la// dal bus hUM zhes bsdus pa
239a3: yis/ / bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom// nga nyid dag las lus khengs par// oM gyi tshogs su shi ra tu bsgom//
239a4: nyid a yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dkar po'i tshon phye yis// de yis snying nad bdag zhugs la// hU~M zhes bya ba'i bsngags bzlas nas// mang pos bkur ba rgyal chen po// blo rno yid 'dzangs
239a5: bzhin bzangs dang / / snga bas longs spyod 'du ba dang // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhi bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la// ngal bus oM zhes bsdus pa yis// bdag gi lus la bzung bar
239a6: 'gyur/ / thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi brtam gyur pa// phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid dag lam kun khengs par// saM gyi tshogs su rab du bsgom// lus nyid sraM gyi tshogs la bstim// gang
239a7: la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/ / kha dog ser po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying rang ba dag zhugs la// sraM zhes bya ba'i sngags zlas nas// mang pos bkur brgyan chen po// blo na yid 'dzabs bzhin bzangs dang // spabs longs spyod 'dra ba dang /
239a8: gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// da yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// rgyas pas bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus sraM zhes brjod pa yas// bdag gi lus la chud par gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku

239b1: mchog gi brtan gyur pa/ / phyogs bcu gang bas gsal 'bang bsgom// de nyid dag la lus khengs par// AM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid AM/ gyi tshogs la stim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dmar
239b2: po'i tshen phye yis/ / de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// aM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// rgyal mo zhang lon dbang chen dang // ci 'dod yid bzhin dbang du 'gyur// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing // gnas par dga' ba
239b3: bzhin du gyur/ / de yi gzugs las 'byung 'dod na// dbang gi bdag gi gzugs zung la// dal bus aM zhes brjod pa yin// bdag gi lus la chung bar gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi
239b4: brten gyur pa/ / phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid dag lam lus khengs par// ha gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid ha'i tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog ljang
239b5: khu'i tshen phye yis/ / de yis snying nad bdag zhugs la// haM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// las kyi rigs chen gang 'dod gzugs// dmag mang mthu dpung go mtshon bzang // zhe sdang can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// 'dor
239b6: chags can rnams 'du ba dang / / nga rgyal chen po 'dud par gyur// de'i bstan pa 'dzin par byed// de'i 'khor la longs spyod cing // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// snyoms pas khro yi
239b7: gzugs bzung la/ / dal bus haM zhes brjod pa yi se// mi snang ba yi gzugs su 'char// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// gling dam dur khrod gnas rnams su// nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang gis// sgyu 'phrul dkyil
239b8: 'khor mchog 'dzin la/ / dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom

240a1: ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum
240a2: dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la/ / spyi gtsug kha dang snying kha mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs mu du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// mu gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs
240a3: las/ / de zla'i ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// lam du zhugs la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// de bzhin rigs rnams oM du bsgom// snod gnas
240a4: bde ldan khengs gyur par/ / yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun par rnam par bsam// brtan pa a yi 'phro 'dra ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// /
240a5: gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya shin tu gsal ba na// nye ba'i snyan pa yin par bsgrags// 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun pa'i grangs// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon
240a6: su ma na/ / lcags kyu mchog gi phyag rgya ba cing // des ni 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// rang bzhin sku gsum 'dus ma byas// gzhan dbang ma yin rdo rje rigs// dpal ldan rdo rje sgyu 'phrul yum// shin tu chos kyis bsgrags
240a7: ba la/ / gsal bar 'dod pa spa bya ba// spyi gtsug kha dang snying kha mtshan// 'bru lngar byin brlabs lam du brtags// de nyi dgoms las gsang mtshan pa// lam gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms// sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba
240a8: las/ / rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlob// de nyid 'tha' bral mi dmigs las// rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rje dbyin

240b1: brlabs te/ / pad ma gsang gnas 'dzum thabs yin// sprugs nas zhugs la de lus gang // de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje rigs rnams hUM du bsgom// snod nas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs
240b2: kyang gsal bar gnas/ / phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa ha yi 'phro 'dra ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid
240b3: bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom/ / phyag rgya gsal pa nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'dra rigs dang 'thun pa'i grags// bsgoms dang bzlas dang mngon sum na// lcags kyu stangs kyi bskul bar gsungs// rjes su chags pa'i phyag/
240b4: rgya yis// rigs dang 'thun pa'i 'phro 'dra bsgom// yon tan sku gsung yid bzhin gter// dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul mchog chen mo// chas shing bsgrags pa'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa balkug phran la sogs la// dbab pa cho
240b5: gi las bya ba/ / spyi gtsug kha dang snying kha mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs oM du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// oM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas me yi sbyor ba las// rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis
240b6: rlobs/ / de nyid mtha' bral mi dgyes las// yon tan gter gyi gzugs bcas na// sangs rgyas rin chen tsan ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad ma gsung nas 'dzum thabs yin//
240b7: sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // de go bas blo bde gsal spro thi ma// rin chen rigs rnams sr-i du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sog
240b8: rigs dang 'thun par shin tu bsam/ / brten pa sr-i gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtse med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa//

241a1: 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun pa ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// dam tshig zhags pa mchog gis bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi// rigs dang 'du 'phro 'thun par sgom// gso dang bas dang
241a2: pam+ba dang rgyal/ / gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa dang // ci 'dod 'od dang sma yang rung // mtshon dang 'jigs pa mang ba dang // bcings pa'i las dang mtshon las thar// dpal ldan pad ma mchog gi yum// bde chen gar dbang gzugs
241a3: 'dzin pa/ / dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa'i lhag phran la sogs la// dang por gnas lnga byin gyis brlabs// de nas gnas lnga shes rab bsgom// spyi gtsug kha dang snying kha mtshan// las bzhi 'brubazhi
241a4: bam du brtags/ / de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// paM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas chu yi sbyor ba las// rdo rje gsung rnams byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rdo rje gsung gi gzugs
241a5: bcas nas/ / sangs rgyas gsung chen tsan ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par sgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde gsal spro/
241a6: thim// ming dang snying po bcas pas dgug/ rdo rje gsung rnams oM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun par
241a7: shin tu bas ma/ / brtan pa oM gyi 'phro 'dra ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// chos dbang yi ge smin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal bar nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs
241a8: dang 'thud par ni/ / bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// chags pa'i sngags sgrog mchog gi bcing // chags pa chen po'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom// ripi dbang dang drag po rgyas// ci 'dos

241b1: nirirab du sngags/ / dpal ldan 'grub pa sgyu 'phrul pa// dpab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa mchog dang 'bring rnams la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying kha mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs btang du brtags// de ni e yi/
241b2: tshogs yin te// de nyid bsgoms las gsang mtshan pa// mi yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms// de nyid steng gi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// don yod ngang tshul de bzung nas// don yod mchog
241b3: gi tsan/ / shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rgya gram byin rlabs te// pad ma gsung nas 'dul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // rgya gra mtshon gyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming
241b4: dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje la la rnams haM bsgoms// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid
241b5: du bsgom/ / brtan pa haM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ 'phro 'du rigs dang /
241b6: 'thun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni// dgyes pa gar gyi gsung snyan cing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom// phyogs su bgro dang dbrog pa dang // tshe bskud pa dang las
241b7: rnams dang / / mngon sum ci 'dod sla ba'i mchog/ rigs kyi yum dang rtsen par 'gyur// srid pa las 'phags mya ngan 'das// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur zhes brjod pas rnam par smin pa'i tshogs de bzhin
241b8: gshegs pa'i tshe bI yon tan nyid du mkhyen to/ / mkhyen nas de bzhin nyid kyis dbyings sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // a ho bsam bya bsam par zin pa yi// bsam pas mi zin

242a1: bsam mi khyab/ / bsam yas lhun gnas mi g.yo dpag med bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang 'brel pa'i rkyen du shes pa'i dbyings nyid zad mi shes// ngo mtshar srid lam mtha' bral dmigs med pa// de nyid
242a2: yon tan mchog gi 'khor lo lam mchog yin/ / a ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o//
242a3: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba cho ga dang bcas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dbab
242a4: pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams/ / kha dog grangs bcas ma brlams pas// shes pa blo tshe khong yangs la// zab par spyod la mi skye bar// zas srung gos rjes dam zas sbyin// dung chen snod du chu yis bsid// rten
242a5: du rung bar ting 'dzin dang / / dbang dang sgrub pa mchog kyang bstan// mi smra gsang ba'i dam tshig dpog/ oM dang muM gyi blo bstan nas// gsang bas mtshan ma lnga nas sbyang // sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// phung po kham
242a6: dang skye mched sbyang / / longs spyod lnga ldan mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje ngag lam gsung chen bzlas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dzi na oM/ oM badz+ra ku la hUM badz+ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sri rang nas oM pad ma ta thA hri da ya a ro log/ ha pra dz+nyA ha~M/ tang de
242a7: shwa ri ma?/ / dre sha ra ti lam/ mo ha ra ti a/ rA ga ra ti pi/ badz+ra ra ti ta/ mr-i mu muM/ laM laM laM/ aM aM aM/ paM baM baM/ taM taM taM/ e baM ma ya/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dz+ra dz+ra dza dz+ra dz+ra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ staM ho zhes
242a8: brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen mo dang / spyan chen mo dag ma hA

242b1: kI chen mo dang / gos dkar mo chen mo dang / dam tshig 'phags ma sgrol ma chen mo'i rang bzhin nyid du kun du snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab
242b2: pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos sgyu 'phrul chen po'i byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig la snyoms par zhugs nas de
242b3: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / / sgeg mo mchod pa sbyin bsdu ba// gzugs skyon dbab par bye ba ni// rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// skyigatsug
242b4: kha dang snying ba mtshan/ / 'bru lngas byin brlabs ya nyid sbyin// de nyid pad ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa// ya yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid hUM gi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha'
242b5: bral mi dmigs las/ / rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsan ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rje byin brlabs te// padam gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgapa
242b6: rdo rje tshon gyis khengs pa dang / / so so'i snying po ming yang bod// de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// ming yang snying po bcas pa dgug/ rdo rje lha rnams hUM du bsgom// snod nas sgeg po khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal
242b7: bar gnas/ / phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsam// brtan pa ha yi 'pho 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sprin
242b8: tshogs bsgom/ / phyag rgyagasal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni// sgom bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du sgom

243a1: na ze ba byin sdug/ / gzugs ston ra byu / gas dang gan pa'i gzugs pa nas// phyigatsug pa myig ga na/ bral sa cin 'grus sa nyid ste/ tsang ba nga
243a2: 'khor yin/ / de nyid goms nas gsang mtshan pa// oM ma tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid sa gyi lha rnams te// bdag mod mtha' bral mo dmigs las// rang gi nga tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas rin chen can/
243a3: shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rje byin brlabs te// pad ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus gang // rin chen tshon gyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos mi yang dgug/ de
243a4: goms tho bde gsal spro thi ma/ / rin chen lha rnams suM du bsgom// sdod gnas phreng ba khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag tu snying po gzugs la sogs// ris dang 'thun par nyid du
243a5: bsam/ / brtan pasaM gyi 'phro 'dra ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhin med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas rin chen sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs
243a6: dang 'thun par ni/ / bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgom bzhi yi phyag chub cing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom// pad ma'i dbyings kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston
243a7: dbab par bya ba ni/ / rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs bam du brtags// de nyid pad ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid goms le gsang mtshan pa//
243a8: baM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid aM gyi lha rnams te// bdag mad mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi dang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas pad ma can// shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdor/

243b1: byi brlabs te// pad ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // pad ma'i tshogs kyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// da
243b2: ma'i lha rnams oM du bsgom/ / snod gnas dbyangs ma khengs 'gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa ha~M gyi 'gro badra//
243b3: ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas pad ma'i sprin tshegs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas
243b4: dang mngon sum na/ / sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom// mgar mkhan las kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzus
243b5: brnyan la/ / spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs mnyam nyid sbyin// de nyid pad ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// ma yi tshogs kyi lha rnams sgom// de nyid haM gyi lha rnaMs
243b6: te/ / bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas las rnams tsan ka/ shes rab yuM dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs
243b7: yin/ / sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // las kyi tshogs kyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// las kyi lha rnams haM du bsgom// sdod gnas gar mkhan 'a
243b8: 'gyur ba/ yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa haM gyi 'phro 'dra ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhin med pa'i/

244a1: sems nyid las// sangs rgyas las kyi sprin tshegs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing //
244a2: rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// lha rnams mngon du snang ba dang // skyo bsgom mang po dang // dus bzhi'i lha mo mchog dbab dang //
244a3: dang klu yi tshogs bcas las// mngon du smra bar bya bar 'thun// rgyal srid dang ni 'khor 'phrog dang // bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang // bsang dang skud pa'i tshogs bcas dang // bdag 'gro myur du phyin pa dang // nor 'dod
244a4: pa dang ci bya ba/ / ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dus med par ni mchod dang brang // ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad byin bsdu ba'i mchod pa chen por gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de
244a5: kho na nyid nges pa las byin bsdu ba dang dam tshig dbab pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum mo/ / // de nas dgyes pa chen pos longs spyod chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya
244a6: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dam tshig mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las byung ngo / / rab 'bring tha ma'i
244a7: slo rnams kyis/ / nges par bsgom par bya ba ni// rgyal po sa 'dzin mchog 'dod pas// gzugs su bri'am rten bcas la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying kha mtshan// goms par dza nyid mdog dmar bsgom// de sgoms
244a8: da sang nas khong bsdus te/ / rang lus mdog dmar dang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying kha mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs pa du brtags// de go mas gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dza zhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing /

244b1: goms par gsang nas zhugs tshul tu// lam nas dag gi dbang por bsdu// oM las sangs rgyas tsan ka/ snod nas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang snying po goms pas dgug/ mngon sum gsal bar
244b2: gyur pa na/ / lugs kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod pas bsham// yid las goms pa gsal ba na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// blon po'i sa 'dzin mchod pa bsham// yid las sgoms pa//
244b3: gsal ba na// gang la bya ba kha dang snying kha mtshan// goms par dza nyid mdog dmar bsgom// degoms gsang nas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying kha mtshan// 'bru lngas
244b4: byin brlabs bai du brtags/ / de go mos gar gyi dkyil 'khor bgom// dza zhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing // goms par gsang gnas zhugs tshul du// lam nas dag gi mchog tu bsdu// aM nas sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ snod
244b5: gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom/ / ming dang snying po goms pas dgug/ mngon sumo gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod par bsham// de la las
244b6: stsal ba na/ / gang la bya ba dbang du gyur// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// yud tsam rtag par 'dod sgrub rnams// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par gyur// dbang phyug lha chen lha dbang po// rgyal chen phyogs skyong mang po la// chung
244b7: mabu mo la sogs mtshan/ / 'dod spyod dbang bar blo 'chang rnams// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de yi dgos pa thams cad pa// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur/ ces brjod pas 'jig rten
244b8: drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad rab drug yos kun du gsal bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod chen po kun du snang bar gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru gsu dang thugs rdo rje
