245a1: bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po dam tshig gi mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'dra/
245a2: kyis klu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid du snang bar gyur to// gdug pa'i las klu'i tshogs 'dul bar gyur chos sgrub pa chen po la mos pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di
245a3: brjod do/ / klu'i tshogs rigs gnyis pa dang // rigs gsum pa dang / rigs tha dad pa dang / phyogs gnyis pa las 'khor du byas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs pa'i gnas su nyid kyi bsnyen pa che chung lam
245a4: gtogs pa yid la dga' ba ci byas kyang mi 'grub cing bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir gegs gsal ba lnga pa zhes bya ba 'di 'thon par gyur pa 'di ched du gsungs so/ / sgrub la 'dug pa mi gnas dang // sa ge zhi bdag
245a5: tu dbang ba dang / / bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ci yod pa// gdug pa'i sbrul rnams bsal ba dang // 'khor du gtogs pa mang nyung la// gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing // ljon pa lkug phran la sogs la// gdug pas gnas par
245a6: mi 'gyur phyir/ / lnga pa zhes ni rab du bsngags// bdag gis gdag par mchod pa'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra bi'i ting 'dzin las// bdag nyid gdug pa'i mthing gnag mdog/ lag na zhags pa ut+pal 'dzin// mgo la gdeng
245a7: ka sbrul chen bcu/ / nyi shu brgya'am stong dang khri// bas ma yas dag gi sbrul chen po// kha dog nag po lce gsum par// gdug pa klu yi tshogs mangs pas// 'khor mang 'jigs brjod spyi bung bas// mchog tu phyag rgya 'di bca'
245a8: bya/ / mi bskyod rin chen yig 'bru rnams// phral te goran byas pa na// gdug pa sbrul gyi 'og tu gding // nA ga bu ka la nA ga phaT ces brjod/ 'di la goms par gang brtson pas// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung na// me lce'i tshogs la

245b1: phung po bzhin/ / rgyal po chen po'i rgyal chen por// kun la snang bar gsal gyur nas// rang dbang med par 'bros pa dang // de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// sa la bdag tu bya ba ni// thog mang sa gzhing ba mnyam te// oM dang muM gyis
245b2: tshogs kyis dgang / / rin chen po brang dkyil 'khor las// 'jug pa'i lha tshogs dkyil 'khor sgom// de la gshog pa rab brkyang ste// rdo rje thal mo drag tu brdab// oM badz+ra kro d+ha du na mun du na ga ts+tsha/ de nas yig 'bru shin
245b3: tug shig/ de nas yig 'bru tha ma bskyed// de nas yig 'bru 'phral skyes pa// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung ste// sa gzhi mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la shin tu sngags 'gyur te// phyogs bcu kun tu bros par 'gyur/
245b4: de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// 'khor du gtogs pa nga yi 'khor// 'khor mang ji snyed mchog byed pa// gdug pa mang pos gnod bsgrub phyir// rdzas la mes ni rab sbar nas// nga yi snying pos brjod nas 'byung // de la yig 'bru
245b5: drug brjod na/ / de la gnod par mi nus shing // gdug pas mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur// de yi nad rnams sos par 'gyur// mngon sum snang ba'i thugs brnyan dang // mchog dang tha ma 'bring rnams la// gdug pa'i tshogs kyis zhen/
245b6: pa ni// snying 'a a gyi 'bru rnams te// kha dog dmang po 'bangar ba'i nang // gzugs su snang ba kun bzhun te// thub pa'i ngang tshul de bsgoms nas// rin chen yig 'bru yi ge bsam// de las rab du 'jigs par brgyad/ min/
245b7: dang po pa ma mig/ ma gyi tshigs su dbang ba gzhan// mi bskyod nyid mas pa can 'chang // thong ba'i dbyig par chas nas ni// lde lnga sngags 'di dran pa yis// rgyal bkun gyis dbang bskur zhing // gdug pa'i tharnams
245b8: 'dul 'gyur te/ / phyogs bcu kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// de la mchod dang bran du gyung// oM mune pad mas ma yo ge hUM hUM dza dza// 'di la goms par gang brtson pas// nga ya~M cha lugs 'di bzung nas// bkur gnas mchod pa

246a1: byed pa dang / / sgrub pa thams cad mAr bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs kyi gdug pa'i las 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o//
246a2: denas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos 'byung po'i tshogs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid sdug
246a3: pa'i gnas pashasas te/ / lo dang thub gsum dang ldar// rdo rje drung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsdams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog 'gyur bzhin// rtags
246a4: mngon dgyur bar ro/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// rang gi rang bzhin de bskur nas// spyan bgrang mche gtsigs sdang mig 'bar// brkyang bsum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom// shig
246a5: shig drag tu gyur pa na/ / de yi snying po bzlas nas ni// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar 'grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// gang la dmigs pa'i mdun dag tu// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// lce la grag tu
246a6: ces brjod/ / brgyal 'gyur e nas dmar rtsi dbab// de las hUM zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su 'dus pa na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams sgo/
246a7: de nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te// lo dang thab gsum lnga bdun// de yi dung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la chen gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin/
246a8: rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro/ sa rgyas rdor phyag bsdams nas// khro bo chen po gshin rje rgyal// gshin rje khros pa'i rgyal mor sbyor// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrang mche gtsigs sdang mig pa/

246b1: sku ma rngam pas zhing stengs sgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa na// de'i snying po bzlas nas kyang // oM zhes pas ni rked par bcad// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa la gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa/
246b2: nyid du ni// ji bzhin ji bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'dod pa bzhin du nges// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu gsigs sngar
246b3: mig drag pos blta/ / oM gyi rtse mor phaT ces brjod// brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// dag las aM zhes bya bas ni// bzlas brjod bcas de bdag nyid bstim// de nas 'dod pa bzhin du nges// de bsnyen
246b4: nyams su lon pa yin/ / de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum la// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// oM las drag tu phaT ces pas// brgyal 'gyur ai las dam
246b5: dbab/ / de las hUM zhes bya ba yin// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// 'tsho bar 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa// byang chub mchog gi kun ngo bo// phyag rgya bzhugs yun la sogs
246b6: pa/ / gcig pu cha yi ting nge 'dzin// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bstan// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur pa'o//
246b7: sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsdams nas// khre bo chen po rta mchog dpal// rang gi ring bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrang mche gtsigs sdang mig bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing steng bsgom// shig shig drag tu
246b8: gyur pa na/ / de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang // aM zhes bya bas rked par bcad// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa las gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa ji lta ba// ji bzhin ji bzhin grub par des// de la

247a1: 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/ / de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de yi grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu bsigs sdang mig drag pos blta// oM las drag tu phaT ces pas//
247a2: brgyal 'gyur o las dpar rtsi dbab// de las hU zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur/ sgyu 'phrul chen po de nyid las// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams pa// khro bo
247a3: chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil/ / bdag nyid rang bzhin der bskur nas// spyan bgrang mche gtsigs sdang mig par// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing steng bsgom// shig shig drag tu 'gyur ba las// mgyogs par phyogs su song ba/
247a4: de yi snying po mchog bzlas nas// hUM zhes pas ni bskul ba yis// dang po'i gnas su phyin par byed// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// de las sna tshogs ci 'dod par// thams cad thams cad grub par 'gyur// de bsnyen
247a5: nyams su lon pa yin/ / oM la drag tu phaT ces pas// gang la bya ba mngon bsams nas// se go la snol mar gtogs pa yis// brgyal 'gyur o las dmar rtsi dbab// yid la bsgoms pas langs par 'gyur//
247a6: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po rab du brgyal bar byed pa dam tshig mchog bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i spyan sngar dreg
247a7: pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyod par gyur pa sde dpon dang chung mar bcas/ bran dang g.yog dang yang g.yog gi rab du 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems nyi dgus par dam bcas
247a8: shing / rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po zhes bya ba 'di mgrin gcig tu yang smras so// dregs pa 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor dang // lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba drug bcu rnams// keng rus

247b1: gsar rnying gnas su gyur/ / rlon pa sha khrag tshogs la spyod// thong bar 'thung za med pa'i nang // mdung thung ral gri dgra sta dang // zhags pa dbyug pa zor ba dang // rnga dang lnga ldi khrag 'thor zhing // gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun
247b2: gyis bskor/ / dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bsgoms te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de bran bzhin du bdag cag bgyid// de'i dgos pa ci yang rung //
247b3: ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// 'dug nas snying po 'di bzhin dbul// oM khaM d+hu ha swA hA/ dbang phyug lha chen dkyil 'khor dang // lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba brgyad bcu stong // me tog sil ma
247b4: bkram pa dang / / ras stan 'phar ma mang po dang // rin chen bcal dang brdung ba dang // rol mo gru gar rab du snyan// rin chen khang pa'i gnas su ni// lha mo mang por bdag spyod cing // rin chen snod du bdag cag 'thung // gdug
247b5: kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs/ / gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog la sogs dang // lha'i me tog phyogs su mthor// lha'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dra
247b6: rnams la/ / ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi 'thil du 'di bris te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // pa lus rdzog
247b7: par bdag cag bsgrub/ / de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid// oM sarba de bA ma hA u pa ha/ rgyal po rnam thos yul 'khor bsrung // 'khor tshogs stong phrag mang po yi// lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog stong
247b8: phrag bye ba brgya/ / mi tog sil mar bkram pa dang // rgyan mang byug pa btsal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams// ci legs par ni rab du smra// rim pa che zhing sre zhu gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i// bdag

248a1: gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags/ / rin chen btsal dang 'thung ba dang // rol mo glu gar snyan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing // bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod du chad
248a2: 'thung ba/ / gdugs kyis brgyan par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thod// rgyal po'i tshogs ma kun gyis bskor// dri za med pa'i bdag po dang // dbang
248a3: ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams/ / 'di bzhin gus par bdag cag bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang // rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// del
248a4: bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/ / gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM sid d+ha d+hid+hing+gi ho swA hA// rgyal po mig
248a5: mi bzang dang 'phags skyes go/ / 'khor tshogs khri phrag mang po yis// lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor tshogs khri brag bye ba brgya// me tog sil ma bkram pa dang // brgyan mang byug pa btsal bkram pa// sde dpon
248a6: nyi shu bye ba rnams/ / ci legs par ni rab du sla// rin pa che zhing sri zhu gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis par// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags// rin chen bcal dang btung ba dang // rol mo glu gar snyan pas
248a7: brgyan/ / rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing // bzhon pa dmig mar 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod du chad 'thung pa// gdugs kyis rgyas par sted nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pa ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog
248a8: phyogs su 'thor/ / rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// gnod sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams dang // chu bdag gshin rje'i 'khor mar rnams// de bzhin gus pas bdag cag bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor chen

248b1: bo 'di/ / ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang // rang gi snying po 'di brjod do// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzog
248b2: bar bdag cag bgyid/ / de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM d+ha ka b+hi ru b+ha bi shu pa she oM hUM/ zhes mgrin gcig tu smras pas srid pa ji srid pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dis 'dul bar 'gyur nas
248b3: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos su dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / / a ho// de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas snying po bsam yas par// 'bru gtor bsdu
248b4: ba las ni 'das bzhin bsnyags dka' ba'i/ / mnor las chen gcig gis rab du 'dul 'gyur zhing // de yi sngags pa'i bka' las 'da' bar ngas mi nus// thugs kyi thugs rjes ji srid ma nor lam nyid la// gsang ba'i
248b5: snying po nges pa sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid pa/ / de nyid 'dud 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de nyid thugs las sprul pa'i thugs nyid do// ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu 'dul
248b6: bar gyur pa gnas dang snying po dbul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po la
248b7: sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen por gyur te/ ched du bstod pa'i gru 'di mgrin gcig tu smras so// e ma'o ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi// sangs rgyas
248b8: rdo rje'i rang bzhin dpal/ / dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med par// dag pa'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor thugs// kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i sku// ye shes lnga yi khro rgyal gtso// khrag 'thud 'jigs byed he ru ka/ sangs rgyas mtha' yas 'gro brgya

249a1: mtsho 'dul/ / thugs rje bas ma ya sa khro rgyal kun gyi gtso// khrag 'thung kun las chos 'phags yid bzhin mdzod// ser gnag mthing gnag ljang gnag dmar gnag dang // sngog nag ri rab lta bur brjid
249a2: pa'i sku/ / skal par bcas pa'i me ri'i dbus gnas pa'i// ro tshigs mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rngam pa'i// bsod nams lus bsdus rdo rje mi zad pa'i// skar tshogs mngal nyi zla'i 'od bzhin du// che btsan dregs pas 'dzi
249a3: pa'i tshogs kun 'joms/ / mtshungs med tshe 'phrul khyad par rab ston cing // 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gar gyi tshul tu bzhugs// za byed brkam pas thugs sku gsung gi zhal// khrag mtsho mtha' med skems shing skal tsam
249a4: 'joms/ / khro gnyer snying 'dren 'jigs byed glog ltar 'gyur// dur khrod 'bum gyi dbu smug 'jigs par brjid// 'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jigs mdzad thod rlon phred pas bsgegs// rol phyir rtse mor snang bas a a ha las
249a5: bshad/ / rang nyid che bas dbang rdzogs rgyal bas dbu la brgyan// sprin ris khro gnyer glog bzhin rab 'gyur bas// phyogs dang 'thun pi'i khrag 'thung 'gyed cing bsdud// sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa// 'jigs
249a6: pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang / / sdang mig spyan ni nyi zla rgyas 'bar bas// 'jigs pa'i tshegs phung sdug bsngal gtan nas spyod// khros pas zhal gdangs sngo chen gtsigs 'bar bas// srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal
249a7: khams bsnyengs pa ltar/ / 'jig rten dus cig ming mdzad lam drug gtan nas gcod// ye shes phyag bsnams phyag mtshan 'bar ba yis// srid gsum ma lus rdul phran stongs par mdzad// rkan blas rol pas 'gro
249a8: la pheg brdabs bzhin/ / khams gsum kun la chos ston rgyas par mdzad// zas su khrag 'thung rdo rje che mchog gsol// 'jigs tshogs sad pa'i ke rlon g.yang gzhi bsnams// klu 'dul yon tan sbrul gnag stong

249b1: gis klubs/ / 'jigs bcas klu yi tshogs kyang zhabs 'og mnan// 'dod chags 'dul ba 'dod chags kun gyi gtso// 'dod chags chen po 'dod chags nyid kyi sku// mang po 'khor bcas 'jigs pa'i 'khor du
249b2: byas/ / zhe sdang 'dul ba zhe sdang kun gyi gtso// zhe sdang gdug pa zhe sdang kun gyi sa// 'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams zer gyis kun bzhu ba'i// rab du brjid pa 'jigs pas 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gti mug 'dul ba gnyis
249b3: kun gyi gtso/ / gti mug blo sel gti mug chen po'i sku// mi 'byed khrag 'thung sran chen ri rib brtan// nga rgyal 'dul bar rgyal kun gyi gtso// 'jigs tshogs sad nas ro tshogs mang gi gnas// zhabs bgrad mche gtsigs
249b4: cog pa'i dus mtha' med/ / 'jigs pas phebs par dga' zhing shin du sdang // phrag dog 'dul ba phrag dog kun gyi gtso// phrag dog che mchog phrag dog chen po'i sku// bud med kun bsdus dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing /
249b5: la ma nor gdug par bcas pa phaT kyis gsod// zhing gi sham thabs gdug pa 'dul bar bsnams// sku 'dra 'jigs tshogs gzugs kyis sku la brgyan// zhabs dang phyag tu gyur pa bsam thag chad// zhabs chen g.yos
249b6: mang brkyang bas lha gnon bdud la khyab/ / zhabs g.yas thabs chen mang po sa dbang bsdud 'dor zhing bskum// rdo rje se gol byar brdabs gnyid cher rab sel mdzad// 'od chen dbus nas glog chen rab 'gyur ba'i// 'aT
249b7: par gong na med pa'i dba' bo khyod/ / zas ngan bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sman chen bdag/ 'jigs byed khyod lta bu ni rab du dkon// bskal par bkrus kyang slar skye drim la// ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi byin brlabs dang // thugs rje dag pa'i char
249b8: kyi cho 'phrul gyis/ / brda' tsam yud la rmongs 'khrugs las sbyong zhing // shi ba'i lam 'gog shes rab dkyil 'khor du// skye ba gtan nas sbyong ba'i thugs rje 'char// byams sdang mi mnga' bka' drin chen po'i gter// tha

250a1: 'brang sgra gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / gsang ba'i snying po de khon nyid nges pa las bka' drini dran pa'i bu zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste pazhi bcurtsa brgyad pa'o// / da nas bcom ldan 'dra
250a2: dgyes pa chen pos gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba'i ched du 'byung po rnams kyi jo mo'i yang jo mo/ mi srin mo chen mo// mi srin mo dang / tshangs ma
250a3: dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhib mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / zab mo dang / dgag mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos dang / gcig pu spyod dang /
250a4: yid 'phrog ma dang / grub pa mo dang / klu mo dang / gsor byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag po dang / rgan byang mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo gnag chen mo dang / gsum
250a5: 'dzin ser gnag chen mo dang / rgyal mo dang / blon mo dang / sde dpon mo dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog dang / bran dang yang bran la sogs pa/ slas dang byi mo dang / bran mo rnams la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i snying
250a6: po nges pa 'di/ / gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po yin// thabs chen mtshon pa'i shes rab ni// sgra 'phrul dra ba'i snying po dang // gsang ba rgyud ni mang po rnams// nga yi thugs las sprul pa yin// tshangs pa dang ni rgya byin dang //
250a7: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa// sde dpon 'phrog ma'i yul rnams dang // lus 'phags pa lang spyod pa dang // sgra mi snyam dang 'dzam bu gling // nga yi thugs kyi snying po 'di// phyogs bcu kun tu spel ba dang // de'i gzugs
250a8: la gtad pa ni/ / yid bzhin mdzod 'byor bka yi gnas// phyi nang theg pa bstan bcos dang // stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rnams// spyod dang sgom dang bzlas pa dang // sdom pa kun la mkhas pa yis// sgob pa sran dang chos

250b1: phyogs dang / / bstan pa 'dzin par nus pa yi// gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gtad// gzhan la bsnyung bar ma yin no// mi 'khrug blo zab rten thub cing // yid bzhin spyod par mos pa las// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bsten/
250b2: zla dang bcas pas dam tshig che// sbyor ba gnyis ga mkhas pa dang // lung dang tshad du ldan thub dang // gzhan la bstang bar ma byed cing // bstan pa mchod par byed pa'o// nye baM bsnyen pa dam tshig la// bsgrub pa bsnyen pa nye bsnyen
250b3: pa/ ci nus par ni shin tu brtson// sems can dang tshul kun por nas// gang gi yid kyang mi 'khrugs shing // mchod pa tshogs la stobs la rub// bud med 'gugs pas gcol dbul// zung thub gsang la mkhas pa
250b4: yis/ / nges pa can la shin tu gtad// gzhan du bstan par mi bya'o// thogs med phyal bar 'dod pa spyod// bud med yon tan kun yod cing // 'dod chags kun dang 'thun spyod la// rtsa ba dang du blang ba dang // mtsham par lha yi
250b5: sku bstan te/ / nye gnyen gsang ba'i man ngag rnams// nams kyang sbyin par mi bya'o// de la sbyor rtags de bstan nas// gzhan ni bstan par ma gsungs so// dang ldan pa srun cing blo rnog// dang ba che zhing chos la gus// chags
250b6: bar ngan pa bka' nyan cing / / gnas la dga' zhing lung nyan pa// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bsgrub// mchod pa'i gnas shom sdom pa bsrung // bsnyen pa la ni byin pab nas// gsang sngags tshogs kyi mchod gnas su// da yi
250b7: gsang ba byin pa pa ste/ / thogs pa med par mngon sum la// sbyor ba'i thabs ldan mnyam sbyor ba// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// bdag nyid mnyes pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing // mnyam pa'i grub pas tshogs la mchod//
250b8: dam tshig mi ldan spyod rtsing dang // gting nas bstan pa mi 'dzin la// 'dod chags spel bar mi byed cing // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na// nges pa'i don ni mi ston la// nga yi dbang dang bslab pa rnams// rin pa bzhin du rab du smin//

251a1: rigs ngan po mo 'dod spyod ni// spro thung 'dod chags rab du che// blo zhen phrag dog sgo bkur can// gnyid che chang dang brtson 'grus chung // slob la mi gus nan tan med// slob dpon ma dran sman sems chung //
251a2: gal te dmal gnas na yang // da yi gsang ba 'dzin pa la// mngon du dga' bar mi nus te// lha zhan bka' las 'das pa dang // grol ba dka' zhing nus mthu zhan// mAn dang lkog dang skye bo la// gang dben phrad par 'dod spyod cing
251a3: 'dod chags 'ga' lam de dag la/ / tshig rnams gsang ba spu byed pa// dngos kyi don dang 'thun pa las// gsang ba'i snying po sbyin mi byed// bskal pa'i 'jig rten par du yong // thugs kyi bde ba mi spro zhing // rnams
251a4: kyang bstan par mi bya'o/ / 'jig rten 'dod pa dga' rnams phyir// gal te rmongs pas byin pa ni// rims dang nad kyis srog bcad de// rtsa ba yan lag spangs pa yin// bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas// zhes brjod
251a5: pas srid pa mtha' dag gi bud med kyi tshogs rnams dam tshig 'dis 'dul bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo //
251a6: e e ma e ma'o chos rnams sgyu ma yi// rang nyid bud med gsang ba sngags pa yi// lnga drug dus btab snang srid 'byung ba'i gter// yang dag la ma rnyed mngon par kun gnas kun tu gnas// chos mang chos nyid mnyam
251a7: pa'i phyag rgya ji snyed las/ / las ngan dge ba'i cho 'phrul lam chen 'di// kun gyi khyad par nyid ni bud med bde ba gcig pu yin// chos kun de nyid yin phyir dman pas mi smad mtsham par bstan// sgyu ma 'byor pa nyid ni
251a8: bder gshegs nyid yin rab du gsal/ / rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig chen pos bud med brtul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa

251b1: chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / de la mchod sbyin chen po ni// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis su med par sbal/
251b2: bar bya// 'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo// long
251b3: spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ / dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs bcu dus pa zhi gshegs pa yi// bder gshegs yon tan rmang po che// gzhan na yod pa ma yin no// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgas
251b4: rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ / phyag rgya chen po rdzogs gyur cing // gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa ni// dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen pos yi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
251b5: bcu thams cad khyab par 'gyur to/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po
251b6: ched du brjod do/ / bla med theg par nges gyur pas// nyon mongs las rnams kun spyod kyang // byas la mi stsogs tshogs 'gyur te// tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs// bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu// 'dul
251b7: pa'i dbang du tshul khrims dang / / ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing // sna ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// srog med srog bcad bcad du med// srog
251b8: dang skyes bu log rtogs tsam/ / bden pa gnyis gar dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga' tshul te tha dad min// gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir// blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang // ming dang

252a1: tshig tu btags pardzun/ / brdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod pa// brdzun zhes btags tsam yod ma yin// ma chags pa la chags pa dang // chags pa nyid na chags med pa// de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste// shin//
252a2: tu chags pa chen po yin// bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// 'di ni rtsi ba lnga rnams te// bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam
252a3: tshig mchog/ gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// dag pa'i snod du mi dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig mchog/ ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// bsrung
252a4: zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga/ / rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spad mi dor lnga gnyis ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzog
252a5: chen po thob par 'gyur/ / bdas na sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dag/ gso la nye bar mi brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed// nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nya
252a6: 'gyur na/ / bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung // dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje
252a7: che/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni// gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su dbye// dam tshig 'di ni rmang po
252a8: tsha/ / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa'i// rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro// gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// bsgrub med dam pa ma lus 'grub//

252b1: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa ste// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur// dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis// sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis brlob// bder gshegs
252b2: nyid kyi yul la bzhugs/ / 'jigs med kun du bzang por sbyor// ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis 'grub// nyams na skangs pas rdzogs pa dang //
252b3: de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog/ ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa
252b4: gcig pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chad rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig sum brgya pa'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas sngags 'chang rnams kyi
252b5: don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// log rtogs mi bzang rdul phran snyed// rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab// 'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang // rdo rje theg mchog mang
252b6: po kun/ / nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang // rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtogs pa yis// lta ba mthon dman bsam mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan// yang dag nyid dang log rtogs gnyis// ngo bo nyid
252b7: kyis gnas gyur nas/ / de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// ye nas ngo bo nyid med na// nyon mongs spangs shing don bsgrub med// thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur// kun rdzob chu zla lta yin pas// cir yang 'gyur
252b8: zhing cir yang 'grub/ / rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig sum brgya drug bcu pa'i rtsa ba bcwal

253a1: pa mdod bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rdo rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//
253a2: nam mkha'i mkha' dkyil dang ba yi// yid bzhin sprin tshogs rnam pa 'byung // sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'od 'phro 'bar// raM srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te// yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar// haM dbang po dang pa'i dkyil 'khor
253a3: du/ / spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni// lha ni lha der 'od du zhi// a zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// thugs rje byin brlabs rmad po che// hUM 'gro ba sna tshogs don byed pa// 'di ni byang chub mchog tu gsungs// to bzhi po
253a4: 'joms shing ngan song spyod/ / traM ta sman bcud len gyis dug sbyong zhing // phyi dang nang gi dri ma dag/ bdag med gnyis kyis dag par byed// drigasal zhing bzhag par bya ba med// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od bzhin du// snang dang mi snang gnyis/
253a5: med// de bzhis mnyam gnyis ye shes kyis// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor// oM rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// phyogs bcu khams rnams dbang bsdus nas// thams cad mi dmigs dbyings su thim// thams cad
253a6: khro bo'i tshogs su 'gyur/ / rtog pa rnam bzhi mi dmigs dbyings gyur pa// shes rab yum gyi mtshan nyid dbyings su thim// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dbyings gyur pas// chos rnams thams cad dbyings kyi khro bo khri
253a7: mor 'gyur/ / a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad khro bo dang khro mo'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi mes sbyor ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// /
253a8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyal po'i 'bar ba'i thugs rjes gtum 'khrugs ging tshogs chen por bsgyur nas/ thams cad 'od dpung 'phro zhing 'bar bar bstan pa ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul

253b1: dra ba bstan pa yis/ / phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus pad// bruM dang tsakra'i 'khor lor sprul// 'od 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen hUM// gtum chen dus mtha' me ltang 'bar// nga nyi ma'i thod sbrul mang po'i gzi// khro gnyer klog stong
253b2: 'gyur ba bzhin/ / rngam pa'i ngo ro 'brug slong ldir// phaT/ khros pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar// khros pa'i me dpung rdo rjer 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo brtsegs par 'bar// tsaMrba khro bo khra ma'i tshogs kyis bskor// gnas dang yul gyi
253b3: phyag rgya mdzem/ / ha he sbas dang bran mo'i phyi mo'i tshogs// rang gi stan dang mal cha dang // cibagyi zhes te chas te gnas// sti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang // ni yi tsi ta za zhing rgyug/ shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs su gnas// ral pa mun dza ca
253b4: pan 'bar/ / phyogs bcur khengs pa'i gshog pa gdengs// rdo rje gtams pi'i brag ri 'bar// raM so so'i rigs sngags skad gdangs dang // skad dang nga ro drag tu 'don// hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo ru lu// khro bo chen tshogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen/
253b5: po'i zhal 'bar ba// bdag nyid gnyis su med par bsgom// so so'i ri'i sngags bzlas nas su// rgyud drug sems can thams cad las// ma rungs gdug pa thams cad du// dzaHhUM baM hos bkug nas ni// lan gsum
253b6: lan bdun zhal du bstim/ / lha yang rung ste rlag par 'gyur// ho gzhan yang mchod pa'i zhal zas ni// 'byor pa rnam pa kun gyis mchod// ni yi tshil dang tsha ba'i mar// dmar gyi arga rgyun du dbul// a ho yang na lan
253b7: gsum brgya rtsa brgyad/ / stong ngam 'bum du dbul bar bgyi// nag po 'tsher ma dug shing ngam// gzhan yang bsreg rdzas gdug gsum dang // mnon pa'i cho ga kun gyis bya// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs rje rol pa'i kyis
253b8: 'khor spyir bstan pa'i to/ / oM hU tra hri a/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las ho thams cad ma lus par 'dir 'das pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khros

254a1: pa'i rgyal pos zla 'phrul drab bstan pa las tho brnam pa'i chags su bsgoms nas ca ba pa 'dab dang/ / byang chub sa nagasang pon// pa rnams bcus bam sanAH// dag pa rnam gsu nga
254a2: no zhing / / rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur// drag po gtum po bsgrub pa ni// b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag/ mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// khro bo'i zhal ni gang yang rung // lan gsum
254a3: lan bdun rtags bsgoms shing / / mngon du 'byung ba'i zhal 'bar te// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ltar gyur nas// ling ga yang nas yang bsdus te// dbyings kyi dkyil du bstim par bya// hUM gis bsdu zhing phaT gyis
254a4: 'phang / / zhal gyi rang sngags khri 'bum du// rnam gsum tshul gyis bzlas nas su// yang nas yang du gsol bar bya// 'gro lnga sems can thams cad kun// dbang med zhal du thim par 'gyur// ya ma ya yang lhag
254a5: bar mangs/ / su mdog dud ka la sogs dang // mcha ga tsigs khrog nyer gtsigs pa dang // zhal bkrud phyag rgya 'bar ba dang // gang la sogs pa bsgom par bya// bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i byug tu ste// mtshan sa bzung nas
254a6: rang sngags don/ / mngon par dbang pos bltar yod par// ril bu bsdus nas dbyings su mchod// the tshom med par 'grub par nges// dam pa'i chos 'jig ma rungs pa// dpa' bos dgos pa yod pa'i phyir// kun la
254a7: phan pa de gyis shig/ to ny+dza dzA drang paT dang spol sogs// 'dren po'i mchog te de gsungs so// mtshan ma ming du bsdus pa yang // ji ltar mngon gyi de bzhin du// smon pa byang chub lam du zhugs// mtshan ma'i ba/
254a8: chags med par bya// dbyings nas spro zhing sal bstim// a ho thags nyid la ni thugs brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba la shin tu gsang pa'i khro bo nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas de bzhi/

254b1: gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po las thams cad rdo rje bsdus nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgoms shing // sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan par gnas// thams cad hUM du bsdus nas ni// dkyil 'khor
254b2: gru gsum 'bar bar bsgom/ / me dpung 'bar ba'i tshogs chen du// me lha a ga ni dzas bkug nas// raM zhes bya ba'i me sbar te// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgom par bya// hUM gtum po'i tshogs chen
254b3: rab ngu 'bab/ / dud ka nag po'i mdog 'dra la// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'khrugs// nyi ma'i thod sbrul mang pos brgyan// seng ge gleng chen stag rngam dang // phyag rgya sna tshogs 'bar ba bsnams// phaT dang hUM dang ha la s+tha// skad
254b4: drag phyogs bcur nam mkha' 'khrug/ phaT khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// yul dang gnas kyi phyag rgyas mdzes// ha he slas dang bya mo bran mo dang // b+h+yo tsi bgyi la sogs tshogs kyis bskor// so so'i stan dang lag
254b5: dang / / rngam pa'i nga ro rang sngags sgrogs// mi sdug gtum pa'i gzugs can dang // shin tu khro bar bsgom par bya// bdag nyid phaT kyi dang nyid du// gsal 'dris blo goms rtag tu bsgom// dza hUM baM hos bsdus nas su// rgyud
254b6: drug sems can kun bsdus nas/ / khro bo'i tshogs la dbul bar bya// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// yo byad gzhan ni spyi dang 'thun// gzir ba'i thabs kyang gong ma bzhin// mchod pa'i grangs kyang spyi dang 'thun// a
254b7: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi/ / hUM zhal gdangs spyan bgrad khro zhal bsgom// rdo rje gtan pa gdengs pa dang // thod pa lcags kyu rnams kyis bskor// hUM sgra drag po yi tshogs kyis 'bar// 'dzin pa'i
254b8: phyag rgyas bkug nas su/ / zhal du bstims na lhag par 'grub// rdul bya tsam yang med par byed// 'khor gyi tshogs kyang snga ma bzhin// bskor ba'i tshul du srod gtong bya// hUM gtum po dmar po mchu rings po// 'bar ba rdo rje

255a1: yA/ / phreng bas bskor// 'od chen 'bar ba 'gro ba yis// 'jig rten khams rnams dus gcig brngubs// b+hUM khro ba'i tshigs kyi sngags rnams dang // gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyu dang // sgras dang byis bran mo'i tshogs
255a2: sa so'i rang sngags rdzogs par 'don/ / ha he g+ho/ gzhan yang bstod tshig 'di dag gis// hU~M rdo rje ga byin pa gyis kyis/ 'jig rten khams na kun bkang ste// gtum 'khrugs ma lus thams cad kun// rdo rje mthu yis brtu
255a3: bar 'gyur/ / hUM rdo rje zhe sdang 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// skad cig yud la brlag mdzad de// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las drag po hau gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o//
255a4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po pad ma bsdud pa zhes bya bas 'gro ba mang po'i don gyi phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis// thams cad ma lus dbyings su bsdus//
255a5: dbyings nas ye shes 'od 'phro 'bar// thams cad ma lus dbyings su sbyor// hri dkyil 'khor zla gam gdengs pa las// 'od zer mang po rab 'bar dang // rdo rje lcags sgrog bsdams pas bskor// gzhan yang
255a6: rgyan gyi dam pa mchog/ kun gyis de la brgyan cing bskor// me lha spyan drangs snga ma bzhin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// pad ma rigs kyi khro bor bsgom// dmar smug drag po'i mdog dang ni// gzhan yang
255a7: sprul pa mang po yis/ / phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bskor// rngam pa rang sngags drag tu sgrogs// hri bdag nyid ma chags rdo rje te// dkyil 'khor gong ma gas la bsgoms na// phyogs bcur 'gro ba thams cad dang
255a8: gdug pa yid can ma lus kun/ / dza hUM baM ho s+pho tas bkug nas su// dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya// dgongs pa grub cing ngan song skyong// hri gzhal yas dkyil 'khor mang po'i tshogs/ dkyil 'khor pad ma'i zhal 'dral//

255b1: tha ma pad ma ljon shing dang // pad ma rdo rje 'od 'bar bsgom// gzhan yang rgyan mchog mdzes pa yis// dkyil 'khor kun la mdzes par brgyan// bdag nyid pad ma'i lhar gyur pas// mchod pa lha rdzas sna tshogs dang // zhal zas ba
255b2: btung mchog rnams dang / / dmar po shong dang dri zhim pa// lan grangs gong du smos pa bzhin// rtag tu mchod pa byas nas ni// 'jig rten 'di dang 'das pa yis// ci 'dod las de grub par 'gyur// sngags ni yi ge raM dang hrI// mdog ni
255b3: dmar smug 'od po che/ / phyogs bcu khyab cing hri la bsdu// dgyes pa'i glu dang gar gyis mchod// hrI rdo rje pad ma 'bar ba yis// phyogs bcu mtha' klas rab 'byam kan// dpal dang gzi byin tsho la sogs// pad ma 'bar ba de bsdus
255b4: nas/ / sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang // gzhan yang longs spyod mchog la sogs// ci 'dod las rnams dbang du 'gyur// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// shrI 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab
255b5: 'byam kun/ / skad cig yud la dbang du bsdus// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// hrI sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te/ dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs
255b6: pa khro bo'i rgyal po rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag nyid kyi dbyings nas phyung nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ bsod nams zhing 'gyur mchog
255b7: tu 'bar/ / phyogs bcu nam mkha' gang bar bsgom// rdo rje rin po che yis bskor// rgyal ba'i yon tan mkha' dang mnyam// traM ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus 'od 'bar// dkyil 'khor zhags pa rin chen bskor// gzhan yang phyag rgya
255b8: sna tshogs dang / / khro bo kun kyang dga' 'phro ste// 'od chen dkar po 'bar ba dang // phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur// lha dang lha mo rnams kyis bskor// mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs dang // dkar la dri zhim shing rnams dang // gzhan

256a1: yang mchod yon thams cad kyis/ / dkyil 'khor la ni rgyas par dbul// bdag nyid rin chen rab 'byar nas// traM dkar la yi ge 'od du 'bar// khro bo kun kyang de bzhin te// mngon du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du/
256a2: pa sha ho dang dzaHhUM gis// phyogs bcu'i lam lnga kun bkug ste// dbyings su thim par 'od 'phro bsgom// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam// gzhan nas yod pa'ang ma yin te// sgyu ma'i ye shes brtan pa yin//
256a3: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas ni// rin chen dbyings la rdo rje 'bar// dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis 'khor bar bskor// gzhan yang lha dang lha mo yis// phyogs bcu khyab par mchod cing dbul// yon tan rgyal
256a4: ba'i zhing dang mnyam/ / tAM glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya// sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus kun// mchod yon rin chen dpal 'phel gyis// phyogs bcu gang bar rgyas phul nas// rdo rje dbyings kyis rgyas par rol/
256a5: ho tre/ nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams 'di rab 'byam kun// skad cig yud la rgyas mdzad de// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rgyal po rgyas mdzad kyi rgyas pa hom gyi le'u
256a6: ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad khro bo chen pos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen por bsgyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus
256a7: mtha' med/ / bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// bde gshegs nyid la ma zhan shar// oM dkyil 'khor zlum por 'bar ba las// 'khor lo 'bar bas rab bskor zhing
256a8: 'od ni ser por rab du 'bar/ / rmad du byung ba'i sku la sogs// bdag nyid chen pos bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sa bon yi ge oM sar te// me lha spyan drang snga ma bzhin// khro bo'i

256b1: dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams/ / kun kyang gti mug rdo rje ste// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba dang // 'khor lo phyag rgya 'bar ba dang // lha dang lha ma tshogs kyis rgyud// gdan dang gnas dang dbyings nyid de// rgyal ba
256b2: dkyil 'khor de dag tu/ / phyogs bcu gnas pa de dag tu// tsakra lcags kyus bkug nas su// dkyil 'khor dbyings su bstim byas nas// gtum 'khrug gdug pa ma rungs pa// lhan ne lha de zhi bar 'gyur/
256b3: oM gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'bar ba yi// oM dang seng ge mgos bskor te// brgyan pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya kun// rdzogs ldan zhibs bskor bar bya// rgyal po lus mdzes
256b4: 'khor lo 'bar/ / rgyan rnams zhi la dkar ba dang // byang chub mchog 'bar lha ner bsgom// mkha' la rgyu dang bar snang 'phyo// gzhan yang 'gro drug ma lus kun// zhir 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gar dang glu yis mchod
256b5: byas te/ / phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa// gdug pa'i yid ni rnam bor nas// lha dkar po yi 'od du 'gyur// bde ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'bar// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'bya
256b6: kun/ skad cig yud la zhi mdzad de// zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad ma lus par zhi bar gyur nas zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs
256b7: pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / a yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog
256b8: 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la/ / khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje phur pas btab//

257a1: rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du basbrel bsdams nas// bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcu ga so// rgyas nas gal te tshig par 'gyur/
257a2: gyi tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gzi brjid lhun chen la// chags pa yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// rdo rje chags
257a3: ba'i bung rabs gdag/ / chags pa'i tshigs la thim par dbul// ba kyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// mu gr-i d+hu du snrel nas bsdams// 'grags 'gyur ci meng byi bzhin 'brang // ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'byung // ma
257a4: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba 'du 'phro gzi chen la// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// yon tan yid bzhin gter tu rtag
257a5: nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phyir pas gdab/ / rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar dbul// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams nas// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro// yid bzhin nam mkha'
257a6: gang bar 'gyur/ / ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang bi'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gtum chen rngam po'ang lhani ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// gtum nga
257a7: 'khrugs pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lha ni gsal ba'i bu rabs gdab// 'bar ba lha na'i tshogs la dbul// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams// 'bar bar lhan ner byin gyis brlag/
257a8: thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur// sras dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag pa'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin// gang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags nas// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgom// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/

257b1: shin tu gadrug cing gtum bag can// thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin brlabs rmad po che// lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas// 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas// so so'i las
257b2: rnams bskos pa de/ / ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i// ma thogs myur du mngon par byung // dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na// ji ltar rang gis mna' bor bi'i// sdom bcas de las 'da' ma byed// dam tshig de
257b3: las 'das gyur na/ / mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun// yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par 'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis// ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos// las de mngon du ma byas na// rang gi mna'
257b4: bor khas blangs bzhin/ / rus myags tshig ras dmyal bar 'gro// rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i// las rnams yongs su bya ba dang / 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs// phra men ma yang dngos grub
257b5: 'thob/ / bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos// zhes bsgo'o// khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo ni 'di yin no// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar gru tshig chen pos ni// thams cad thams cad
257b6: byed pa yin/ / mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar gru tshig chen mos ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'dra bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// spos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar gru tshig chen mos ni/
257b7: lha ner 'dod na thim par byed// rmugs par 'dod na myos par byed// seng gdod chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar gru tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun du za bar byed// rdul bya tsam yang med par byed// gzhang gdod chen
257b8: mo la sogs pa'i/ / bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// kun la rab du nyams par byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo yi// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// sprod cing gtong bar byed pa ste// thams

258a1: cad thams cad byed pa yin/ / ljon pa dang ni lug phran tshal// sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu// dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang // khros pas ka li rab du bya// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de
258a2: bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong bar gyur to/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi/
258a3: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las chos thams cad yid dang chos su 'dus par bstan pa dang / shes rab thams cad ni yum bzhir 'dus/ yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus so// thabs thams cad ni rigs bzhir 'das/ rigs
258a4: bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus te/ / thams cad dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes su 'dus par bstan nas tshig mgo 'jug gi don bsdus nas yang 'di skad brjod de/ don gyi rtsa ba'i mchog yin no// thams cad ma lus mi lus shing
258a5: mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid de/ / de bzhin dbyings nyid mang po sna tshogs thabs su snang // thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yod chu zla gzugs brnyan yin// de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang // thabs dang shas
258a6: rab ldan pas mchog gi gnas gyur pas/ / ji ltar spyad kyang zad med gnyis med sgrib mi 'gyur// shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rel pa yin// de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste// rgyu 'bras
258a7: ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas/ / 'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus cig mnyam par sbyor// 'di ni yid bzhin rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad 'du ba'i gter dang yid bzhin mdzod// gnyis
258a8: bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings/ / nga dang bdag med mtshan ma sna tshogs dbyer med pa// stong dang mi stong mi gnas de bzhin nyid du 'dus// rang byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zad med dkyil 'khor sgo//

258b1: 'das dang sa 'das dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang // ma zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo drug rdzogs pa// skye med dbyings kyi rang byung 'odagasal phreng ldan mchog/ ye nas ma bcos ma byas rang rig rang gis gsapa
258b2: thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen dang du bsdus/ / phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun 'dus dang // zhing khams gzhal yas rin chen mchog chen kun// skye ma dang byings dang rang gi gnyis bu ya ga rtsa// mos
258b3: spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa/ / ye nas 'od gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog gnas// ming tsam mchog rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs// lam stegs nyid du pha
258b4: rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu 'bras spyod/ / mnyam nyid pa yi rdo rje thabs chen yang dag ldan// 'gro med 'od med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad// a ho/ rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las pha rol tu
258b5: byin pa dang sa bcu gnyis dang / thab kyis mchog dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par yid dang chos su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil
258b6: 'khor la mnyam par bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang // 'bru lnga gnas pa'i byang chub ste// oM dang muM ru 'brel ba yi// byang chub rdo rje nyid las byung // spyir na brjod pa thams
258b7: cad kyang / / kun kyang ming tsam yi ge a// skye 'jig nyid kyang yi ge lnga// de ni byang chub sems yin te// dmigs med byang chub mchog 'byung ba// gsum shar lnga 'bar bcu 'byor pa// zad med rin chen gter yin te//
258b8: mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzang spangs// e las 'phro zhing ar 'dus pa// gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// nam mkha'i dbyings nas sprin byung ba// kun la khyab cing sna tshogs sprin// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i khong nas

259a1: bsam mi khyab/ / byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// yon tan mi zad gter du gyur// ho ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings// dbyings las mi zhan ye nas thig le'i dang // ye shes
259a2: dbyings nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul/ / snang byed nyid na bya byed med par gnas// ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don// dkyil 'khor bsam yas ldan grub dam pa ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mnya
259a3: par gnas/ / ngag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgom byas shing // mnyam pa rnam bzhi don rtogs mchog gi gnas// rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum tshogs bzhir 'dus// ye shes lnga rdzogs sku gsung thug
259a4: kyis bsdus/ / chags med zhi ba'i lam nas thig ler 'jug/ ye shes lnga rdzogs spyod yul mi 'da' la// ma chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan// thams cad ma lus rang rig rgyal po yis/
259a5: dkyil 'khor dag mnyam khro bo khro mor sbyor// chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // nad dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang // dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma// de nyid rnam par dag pa'i
259a6: lam/ / phyin ci log nyid yang dag ste// ma rig pa ni ye shes gsal// nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/ thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas// a ho// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus
259a7: kun/ / nges pa'i don dgrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus// bsdus pa'i don nyid yi ge 'bru lngar bsdus// lnga po'i don nyid 'bru gsum nang du 'dus// gsum po de nyid yi ge ar 'dus te// a nyid ma skyes mnyam rdzos
259a8: dbyings su thim/ / a ho// mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyang brjod mi lang // mi dmigs de bzhin gshegs kyang bsam mi khyab// ma skyes mchog gi dbyings kyang bsam mi khyab// ma 'gags byang chub sems ni

259b1: skye 'jig med/ / 'gro med 'od med mi gnas pa'i// thugs rje byin brlabs rnam par 'phro// zhes nyid la nyid gsung ngo // dbyings las dbyings byung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi
259b2: phyag rgya gsal/ / dbyings su dbyings kyis ye shes 'byor pas na// byang chub sems tshogs dkyil 'khor brjod mi lang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don ma lus par mtshan nyid med ni
259b3: phyag rgyar thim pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po che mtha' yas su sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan bsdus te// bruM dang bi shrir
259b4: dkyil 'khor du/ / ma dang a yi dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje 'khor lo rab bsgoms nas// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te// de yis phyogs bcur gang bar bsgoms// bruM dang dzaHhU~M ba~M hos dgug/ sku gsung thugs
259b5: kyi snying po mchog/ lus dag sems la thim par bya// ni nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod// bum pa mchog ni bzang po yi// che bzhag gnas ni 'di yin te// yang nas yang du dgug bya ste// mngon sum smin par
259b6: gyur pa dang / / dbyings su yang ni sra bar bya// rdo rje go cha bsrung ba yis// brtan zhing 'khor los dgag par bya// snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim// sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus kun// rgyal po tshe dpag med pasgom//
259b7: sku mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang // yid bzhin rin chen za ma tog/ rin chen rgyan dang bum pa bzang // gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don byag/
259b8: bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs kyis ni rnams mi steng na// tshe dpag med dang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// sgra skad dag po ston nas ni// thams cad ma lus

260a1: thul bar bya/ / dbang du tshe dpag med pa bskur// tshe snyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang // tshe bsgrub dang ni bsgrub chen dang // thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis// ci 'dod las rnams grub par byed// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud
260a2: 'phel ma/ / dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro 'bar// phyag ni rin chen gang ba yin// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs btsun// gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la// phan pa'i che dang 'di sbyinan/
260a3: de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med// yi ge bzlas pa 'phrul chen 'di// rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul par// sngags bzlas cho ga bar ma gcod// 'dris gsal brtan pa mchog gis bya// oM oM o o o//
260a4: hU hUM hUM hUM d+h+waM/ swA sAM swA sAM sAM/ AM AM AM AM AM/ hAM hAM hAM hA hA/ bruM br-I b+h+raM b+h+rUMb+hU/ bA bA bA bA bA/ dz+wa dzA dz+ra dz+wa dz+ra/ a a a a a/ yu yu yu yu yu/ k+She sh+le b+he Sh+Te k+Sh+mAM/ hUM hUM hUM hU~M hU~M/ a a a a a/ o/ tshe rnams dbang dum
260a5: gyur no/ / bder gshegs la yang tshe dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni// phyogs bcu nam mkha' khams bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom
260a6: nas/ / 'gro lnga che rnams dbang du bsdu// phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams bkrugs nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste// snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'khor lo
260a7: chen po yis/ / steng gi 'jig rten khams krugs te// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs dang // bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba las// ni tshe rab tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo'i 'bru las bstims nas ni// de nas yi ge
260a8: 'bru lnga de/ / nri yi gnas lngang bstim par bya// oM oM badz+ra ka pa tsa badz+ra rak+Sha hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga to badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA hA/ phyag rgya bsrung ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru lnga'i yi ge 'bru gcig ste// 'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyings

260b1: su thim/ / oM yid bzhin bum pa rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen phreng bas rgyan/ ni chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // 'bru lnga spos lnga yungs dkar lnga// sngags mkhan rab brtan blo ldan pas// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom/
260b2: rgyan chas lnga dang ldan byas nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bre de yis// yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sgra
260b3: 'phrul dra ba las tshe'i tshi ga dbang dam pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje bsdud pa pos 'gro ba lnga dbang med par smra zhes bya bar yang bsdus nas ched du brjod
260b4: pa 'di brjod do/ / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings// kun tu bzang po thugs rje'i dang // sku gsung thugs ldan yon tan rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyar bar bya// rdo rje rab du gsang ba yis// rdo rje rab tu kun sbyar te// oM dang/
260b5: muM du 'byor par bsgom// thams cad dbyings su thim par bsgom// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang // thig le man tra de dag tu// ni thal man tra bzang po'i thig/ rta babs sgo khyud bzang po dang // rdo rje rtse gcig 'od 'bar dang //
260b6: 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu dam pa yis// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum 'bri// dkyil 'khor rgyud dang ldan par bya// mchod yon sna tshogs mchod par dbul// yaM dung la ye shes 'od 'phros nas// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du//
260b7: dza las lugs kyu grangs med pas// de yis snying du zhugs par bya// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dza las lcags kyu mang po yis// gang dgug de yi snying kha nas// drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya// ma las nyi mi'i dkyil
260b8: 'khor du/ / dza las lcags kyu mang po yis// gang dgug de yi snying ka nas// drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya// sngags 'di rab du brjod par bya// oM dzaHhUM baMb ho/ a nr-i bri dra/ ming pra bo sha/ ci 'dod las de bzlas par bya// lag gnyis

261a1: sor mo spyir stsol te/ / khu tshur dam du bcas nas ni// srin lag mthe'u chung mthe bo gnyis// bar du phreng ba de drangs te// a med pra be sha Am+b+ha/ thal ba srungs dkar drag tu rdeg/ ming de khong du zhugs par
261a2: bya/ / babs nas rdo rje lugs sgro gzhags pas bcing // gang yin zhes ni dris nas ni// lha 'dre la sogs gang yin pa// lha zhig na ni mchod par bya// gdon zhig na ni tsan dan gur gum bsres nas ni// de slad sngags 'di
261a3: rab du brjod par bya/ / oM badz+ra d+ha ka kro d+he sa ma ya hU~M pha Ta gal te spya mi btuban// lag gnyis sor mo phying bsnol te// khu tshur bcangs nas mthe'u chung sbyar// gyen bsgreng dbab pa'i kha ru gtug/ sngags oM badz+raH
261a4: sha ba dzi pra pe sha hUM hUM zhes lan mang du bzlas pas/ ye shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga'// bden pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam// lce'i thor to a dkar po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de steng du// oM rdo d+hing mar po sgor
261a5: byas nas/ / gdon mi za bar smra bar 'gyur// bdag nyid Ta ki hUM bsgoms la// a dang nI la sogs pa yi// lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung // oM Ta ki hUM dang rang sngags kyis// lan 'bum bzlas shing dgug
261a6: par bya/ / pra pe shas kyang bzlas par bya// gzhan yang dzaHhUM ba~M hoHste/ bzhag cing dbab pa'i sa de ni// byis pa lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// gcig dang lnga la dbab par bya// thig le bum la me long 'bar// gzhan/
261a7: yang gnas rnams thams cad ni// smra ba'i cho ga phun sum tshogs// phyag rgya rdo rje spar mo sder// dgug pa'i phyag rgya kun gyis dgug/ dza hU~M dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bsdu// bcol cing bya ba de bzhin no// 6
261a8: hUM dzas mi btub na/ / ha ya grI ba gnas dang yul// zur phyin mgo 'jug rab mnan nas// drag tu bzlas shing ljags kyus dgug/ srog gi snying po ma nor bar// gzir cing drag tu drang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'dzi

261b1: rten pa'i/ / dgug pa'i thab sa yod ci yang rung // nem nur med par dgug par bya// bya ba sna tshogs las zin na// sngar byas bum pa lnga po la// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// rigs kyi yum dang bdud rtsi 'khyil//
261b2: 'dod las rnams thams cad dang // gzhan yang dgos pa ci yang rung // oM badz+ra a mri ta a a a/ oM ma hA badz+ra a mri ta phaT/ dza gad dza gad tsa zhes kyang brjod do// oM bud d+ha lo tsa ni swAhA zhes bzlas su// gsang ba'i
261b3: dkyil 'khor dam pa der/ / ye shes lnga rdzogs nyid las brjod// ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig/ yang nas yang du mngon gsal du// byang chub mchog gis rtag bsgoms shig/ de ltar byas pa'i dngos
261b4: grub ni/ / 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brda' phrad skad kyis dngos grub thob ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir yang ched du brjod do// pra dbab pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
261b5: dpal shrI he ru kas yum kro d+hi shwa ra dang gnyis su med par 'du ba mdzad nas byang chub sems kyi rdo rje las khro bo dkyil 'khor mang pos spros nas 'jig rten pa'i dbang mo chen mo dang / dbang po dang / rgyal po dang /
261b6: rgyal po yang rgyal po dang / blon po dang sde dpon dang / 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te 'jigs byed chen mo rnams de ltar dang / dus phyi ma'i dus su
261b7: la la ni tshe 'phel ba'i las su bskos/ la la ni longs spyod 'phel bar bskos/ la la ni 'byung ba chen mo la thogs pa med par 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni gzugs mi snang bar 'gro bar bskos// la la ni gzugs
261b8: sna tshogs cing yang 'gyur bar bskos/ la la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dbang du bsdud par bskos/ la la ni nyams shing rmongs par bskos/ la la ni bsgoms shing 'phro bar bskos/ gzhan yang bya ba sna tshogs pa ci

262a1: 'dod par bskos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// 'jig rten gtso mchog dbang du bsdud// thugs rje chen po'i byon brlabs kyis// 'gro ba'i don rnams sna tshogs
262a2: ston/ / thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// 'di ni reng byung lha 'i lnga// byams dang snying rje ldan par ro la// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// thams cad kun la sbyor 'gyur
262a3: yang / / bag chags stsogs par mi 'gyur te// bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'gyur rdzogs// thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs par// bzung 'dzin 'khrul tog rdul tsam med// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med byed
262a4: rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas/ / de nas bdag nyid rgyud don gong nas 'byung ba bzhin lta khro bo dang zhi ba de dag gang la goms par sgom/ ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba lha gsal bar gyur pa dang / rang gi lha'i bzlas
262a5: pa 'bum 'bum gdon to/ / lha chen po ni dgug pa'i phyir lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho ta baM// ma hA de bA hUM dza/ dza hU~M baM ho/ lha yi dbang po'i snying kha nas// yang nas yang du rnam par drang // ma ma tra ga sha ma ha de ba grih+Na grih+Na hUM/
262a6: hUM/ lha'i gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar// lus ni rin chen kun gyis brgyan// gtsug na yid bzhin rin chen 'bar// lag pa g.yas na thogs pa ni// yid bzhin rin chen bum chug sol// yon tan rin chen sna lnga
262a7: ste/ / lha rnams kun gyi re ba bskor// btsun mo ud ma ta gnas pa// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan// bdag nyid snang mdzad gzhal yas khang // lha yi gzugs ni snga ma'i tshul// lha yi sa bon 'bum phrag tu// srog dang
262a8: ldan par bzlas brjod bya/ / mdun nas dza hUM baM ho sarbad// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// je nye je nye gnyis med par// lha chen po ni gsal gyur nas// ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ lha chen 'khor bcas thams cad

262b1: kyang / / de grub dbang byed 'du bar 'gyur// gang 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po sde bzhi pasgrub pa'i las 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems mchog tid 'dzin gyi// phyogs bzhi ma lus//
262b2: thams cad kun// rigs sngags 'chang gi dngos grub tu// rgyal chen bzhi yang dbang du bsdus// bdag nyid rigs ba zhi'i he ru ka/ gong don byung ba bzhin du bsgom// lha nyid rtag tu gsal gyur cing // lha ma
262b3: gzugs tshul gsal bar bsgom/ / bdag nyid lha dang gnyis med par// yang dag don du gsal bar bsgom// de nas rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung // gzugs ni gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// mchod sbyin 'od zer
262b4: brgya dang ldan/ / lag g.yas rdo rje tri shul la// lag g.yon bdud rtsi bum pa gsol// in tra sA ya swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ tra mi ta hU~M hU~M su ra ta pa ga ta dzA dzA dzA hUM hUM zhes lan 'bum bzlas nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje he ru ka/
262b5: 'dren pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis// lha yi dbang po'i snying nas drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nyid lha yi dbang gyur nas// las gang 'dod pa byed du gzhug/ thams cad thams cad grub par byed// kun
262b6: la byin cing kun la za/ / lha yi 'khor rnams thams cad kun// ma lus par ni yang dag 'dra// bran bzhin du ni thams cad 'brang // rgyal po 'phags skyes bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid rin chen badra ka/ sku
262b7: mdog rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin/ / phyag rgya rnams kyang de bzhin te// 'od kyi 'phro 'dra byin brlabs kyis// 'phags skyes po ni dbang du bsdus// d+hi ha hI ta swA hA/ dzaHhU~M ba ho/ g+hi swA b+hI snA dur bidi sA hA/ mnyam nya
262b8: rang na dzaHhu ba ho/ / zhes snying po lan 'bum bzlas te/ srog dang ldan par ting 'dzin bya// bdag nyid rang na he ru ka/ 'phags skyes po yi snying ga nas// dza yis rab du bzung nas ni// bdag gi mdun du dgug par bya/

263a1: rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis bu la// de nas mngon sum gyur pa dang // gang 'dod las ni byed du gzhug/ mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu 'bar// 'khor rnams thams cad bdag la bsdu// yid bzhin rin chen gzhal
263a2: yas grub/ / rgyal po mig ngan bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid pad ma he ru ka/ sku mdog gong gi snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya'i tshul yang de bzhin te// snying po 'bum phrag gsal bzlas nas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bsgyur rung zhing // lha nyid du
263a3: nigs la gyur nas/ / rgyal po de yi gzugs mdog ni// shin tu dmar zhing 'tsher ba ste// lag g.yas bdud rtsi bum pa gsol// lag g.yon bdud rtsi lnga yi tshul// nub phyogs klu rnams re ba bskor// sbrul mgo dgu
263a4: gdengs ka can/ / de ni rab du dbang bsdu phyir// b+hi ru ta ka swA hA dzaHhUM baM to/ nA ga shi ni pi ya pag sha phag dzaHhUM baM hoH'bum phrag du ma bzlas nas ni// de ni bdag gi dbang du bsdu// bdag nyid lha ru gsal bsgoms nas// mig
263a5: mi bzang gi snying kha nas/ / dza yis rab du bzung nas drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nas bdag dang gnyis med pa'i// dbyer med par ni gyur pa dang // ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ mig ngan 'khor rnams ma lus par//
263a6: dbang gi las rnams grub par byed// rgyal po rnam thos bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin// gsal zhing 'od 'phro rab bsgoms shing // rang sngags snying po 'bum phrag cas
263a7: ting 'dzin bsgyur du rung ba dang / / rnam thos dag ni rab du 'grub// gzugs ni rin chen bai dUr+ya// yang na mdog ni sngo zhing 'tsher// phyag g.yas rin chen dbyig tho thogs// g.yon na 'dod yon bum pa gsol// dbu la rin chen
263a8: sna tshogs mdzes/ / be shar ma na ye swA hA/ dzaHhUM ba~M ho/ ku be ra kar kang / yang yang / dzaHhUM baM hoH'bum du bzlas shing srog yod par// yang dang yang du bzlas par bya// bdag nyid bdud rtsi he ru ka/ dza yi rnam thos snying nas dras//

263b1: dbang du yang dag bsdu bar bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis pu la// yid bzhin rin chen dbang du 'gyur// gnod sbyin 'khor rnams bran bzhin bsdu// rin chen spro zhing las rnams bsgrub// ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur//
263b2: 'phrul drab las lha chen po bsgrub pa dang rgyal po chen po bzhi po dkyil 'khor bkod cing bsgrub pa'i le'us drug bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la
263b3: shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs kyis klu 'di blangs so/ / hUM ga tu mchen dus mtha' me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'grub bzhin// mche bzang yag za byed che// ho hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir//
263b4: thug che ma ri rab 'bum pa snyi la skad// a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che// dbyug pa'i 'thod rlung g.yeng ba che ho// hUM khros pa'i shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms// sna
263b5: tshogs ye shes thig le che ho/ / hUM khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che to// hU~M bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen
263b6: po/ / bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho// hU~M rdo rje brag chen srab po// rdo rje chu bo bsdud pa po// rdo rje me ste kun 'badar che// rdo rje drung ste 'thor
263b7: rlung chen to/ / bzhes ched du ched du blangs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la
263b8: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bdag dang rdo rje sems dpar dbyer med par yang yang dag pa'i dbyings su 'dus shing bdag gi rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mngon

264a1: sum du mthong ba dan bstan para' byar ched du brngad pa 'ad dusas/ kun rdzo ba l+h+wam sha la mthang bal/ thams cad mag yang sgyum 'argyal// snang grangs sus thams cad cag / t+yAD+ha'i chul du' na
264a2: shing / / yul dang rtog pa gnyis med par// gang gis de ltar rig pa de// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid// ces kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de la gnas// lta spyod
264a3: 'thun pas zhal mthong yin/ / rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer med pa'i// mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o// thams cad byang chub lhun thub pa'i// de ltar gang gi rtogs 'gyur ba// de na
264a4: ye shes gnyis can de/ / de yis yang dag snying po mthong // de nyid cis kyang mi tshugs pa// shin tu sra zhing brtan pa yin// rang bzhin dbyings nas 'od gsal ba// sems dpa' mchog tu yang dag gsungs// de ltar
264a5: togs na zhal mthong yin/ / de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub yin// de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga// rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rtog nyid bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis// lha gsal dngos po
264a6: med bsgoms na/ / mthong thos la sogs med pa'i tshul// rang gi ye shes gsal bsgoms na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// 'grub 'gyur nyid na dngos po med// ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis// bdud dbu
264a7: dkyil du ta la btsugs/ / thams cad byang chub shing bsdus te// gdug pa rang gis mi dga' nas// ta la bcad skams yod mi gcod// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin// bdag dang ting 'dzin mthong gyur pa// de nyid
264a8: rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ / rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bsgoms te// ting 'dzin shin tu 'dris gsalan// thams cad rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// kun la dbang bsgyur cis mi tshugs// bdag dang sems dpa' dbyer med de// las

264b1: 'thun ji ltar snang ba bzhin/ / bdag dang sems dpa' ste spyod cig/ de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chen po rags pa thabs kyi rtogs// so so mtshan 'dzin shes rab rtog/
264b2: gnyis med 'brel ba thabs chen yin// kun kyang shes rab dang du gnas// snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos phyir// g.yo dang med pa gnyi ga med// gnas dang mi gnas dbyed
264b3: med/ / mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// 'dus nyid gnas su thebs pa yi// thams cad de lta bu yi rang // mnyam gnyis dbyer med sus mi tshugs// de nyid sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas yin / de ltar rtog/
264b4: pa'i rigs mchog de// sems dpa' nyid dang rigs 'thun pas// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// rgyur byas phung po khams rnams la// bzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du gcig/ sgyu mar snang ba gzugs brnyan tshul// snang
264b5: pa nyid ni dngos po med/ / dngos nyid de nyid sna tshogs ston// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// dbang po rnams sems byang chub sems// yul dus po de chen mo yin// bdag rtog rnam par khro bo yin// ga
264b6: chad mu bzhi khro mo yin/ / de sems rang rig nyid ces bya// thams cad dbyings 'gyur kun tu bzang // de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin// gang gis de ltar rtogs 'gyur na/ sems dpa' nyid dang dgongs 'thun pas//
264b7: de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang // sgra yis mtshon nas don bstan pa// kun kyang yi ge ming gcig bzhin// gang yang dngos po ma yin te// dngos
264b8: med de nyid sna tshogs snang / / snang ba nyid na gang yang med// bya byed sna tshogs kun byed kyang // dngos po med de yang dag nyid// de ni cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i// sa rdo dran med ma yin te// de nyid shin tu dogs pa yi

265a1: rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas/ / gang gis de ltar rtogs pa ni// rigs mchog dam pa rgyu yin te// rdo rje rigs dang dbyer med phyir// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// kun dang
265a2: dbyer med don rtogs te/ / 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // byang chub sems la gnas bcas pa// dper na mngal dang sgo nga yi// mngon du ma gyur pa sgribs gyur kyang // rtsal chen 'dus pa 'byung ba bzhin// rnam rtog
265a3: gzugs ni bor ma thag/ thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur zhing // rigs mchog dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dang mnyam pa yi/ dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs// bde ba can gyi zhing yang thob//
265a4: byang chub mchog la rol par 'gyur// lha mo rnams kyi ston pa po// lus dag sems la dbang thob nas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// tshad med bzhi la dbang byed 'gyur// bde ba'i ro mchog kun la spyod// thar skye
265a5: rgan 'chi la sogs pa'i/ / sdug bsngal zad pa'i go 'phang thob// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin 'gyur te// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun// rdo rje rigs su 'dren par byed// bdud
265a6: sde tshar gcod nyon mongs 'dul/ / chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bskor// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// ma rtag pa yi tshul yang ston// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul// byang chub rnams la rang byung tshul//
265a7: tha med theg pa sangs rgyas tshul// lhun grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings// kun la 'thun pa'i tshul yang ston// rang bzhin dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du kun du ston// chos rnams ma lus bam
265a8: cad kun/ / de lta bu yi dang du gnas// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// nyid la nyid de skad ces brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las skyes bu dam pa blo rtsal rab gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal

265b1: mthong ba'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs brgyad kyi rgyal po rgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshigasum brgya'i rtsab mdor bsdus nas
265b2: sngags 'chang rnams kyi don du med du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul skad praM/ log rtog mi bzang rdul phran snyed// rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab// 'dul ba sdom pa bas ma yas dang /
265b3: rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun// nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang // rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis// lta ba mthon dman bsam mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir mtsham par bstan// yang dag nyid dang log rtogs
265b4: nyid/ / ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// ye nas ngo bo yod yin na// nyon mongs spangs shing byang bsgrub med// thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur// kun rdzob chu zla lta yin pas//
265b5: cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub// rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// gnas ngan dus na log rtog nyid// bzung 'dzin bral ba nyid rtogs na// bdag med/
265b6: ye shes rang bzhin nyid// snying rje thabs mkhas ting 'dzin gyis// cir yang dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// so so rang bzhin des zhes na// yang dag lam nyid bcos su med// de bas yang dag blo chen gyis// thams cad dngos
265b7: po med par bshad/ / dper na dug gi rigs shes pas// dug gis mi tshugs bzhin du snang // ha la ha la'i dug rnams kyang // bsgrub na ra sa ya sna'i sman// bdud rtsir 'gyur la tshe ring 'grub// nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa// mtshan
265b8: nyid ma nor rtogs pas na/ / rnam par byang pa'i lam du 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang // gang na med de de yin te// nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang // rang dang spri yi don brtags na// mtshan nyid med pas rnam par dag/ so so'i rtsal

266a1: rnams 'dzin gyur pas/ / thabs chen du ni rnam par spro// mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas// shes rab dbyings su rnam par sbyor// gti mug ces ni brjod pa ni// ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te// gnyis med don gcig
266a2: yin par bshad/ / rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams// ngo bo nyid las sogs brtags pa// rtog nyid sgyu ma krung gyur te// log rtogs spros pa'i rgyun yin la// thams cad chos dbyings ro gcig //
266a3: bzod pa'i chos nyid mig gcig yin// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// ma rig pa ni spang du med// rig pa yang dag bsgrub du med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig thim// sbrum dngos por rtog
266a4: pa ni/ / sgyu ma rtog nyid mi dmigs pa// mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang // skyes pa nyid na chos nyid gcig/ dbyings nyid mi dmigs de bzhin nyid// de nyid chos sku phyag rgya che// mi dmigs sgyu mar dngos po la// rtog pa'i yul
266a5: gyi dngos nyid kyang / / chos nyid mi dmigs ye nas dag/ sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// yod med gnyis ga dbyer med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// chos nyid dmigs su med pa ste// mi
266a6: dmigs bzhin du sgyu mar spros/ / 'dul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// de ltar gti mug spang du med// rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin// zhe sdang rang dang spyir bstan pa// kun nas mnar sems rtog pa 'i/
266a7: snga ma'i dngos po thams cad kun// 'jig par mos pa'i rang bzhin can// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// zhe sdang snying rje spangs bsgrub med// tshe kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir// sgyu ma rang bzhin
266a8: mnar sems pa/ / dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs na// bya bar snang ba thams cad kyang // chos kyi dbyings lnga me gzhan te// mi dmigs pa nyid snga mar skyes// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin ni// bdag srog gso ba'i

266b1: rang bzhin med/ / snang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings// mnar sems snga mchos nyid do// thams cad mi dmigs de bzhin yin// kun kyang dbyer med chos phyag rgya// mi dmigs snga ma kun nas mnad// rtog pa kun nas mnang
266b2: sems te/ / chos nyid snum mi dmigs te// chos nyid snga ma mi dmigs phyir// don dam kun rdzob ro gcig ste// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yi ni// mi dmigs kun nas mnar sems pa/
266b3: 'dul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med// nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/
266b4: khong nas 'gying zhing khengs sems pa// pha rol zil gyis gnon par byed// spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// nga rgyal spangs nas zhi bsgrub med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas//
266b5: kun rdzob sgyu mar khong dgying nyid// de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan te// chos nyid mi dmigs 'gying bar skyes// skye 'gying nyid na chos nyid de// 'gying ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs dag/ 'gying dang mi 'gying dbyer med phyir// /
266b6: chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu ma 'gying // 'gying pas zil gyis gnon pa nyid// chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te// sgyu ma chos nyid dbyer med phyir// don dam kun rdzob gnyis ga gcig/ ting nge
266b7: 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/ / thugs kyi phyag rgya cheni ba yin// me dmigs sgyu mar 'gying ba ni// nga rgyal 'dul ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// nga rgyal rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam par byang ba'i
266b8: mtshan nyid yin/ / zhi ba sgrub nga rgyal spang du med// 'dod chags rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni// sred pa kun bzhen pa ste// spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chags spangs ma chags bsgrub du med

267a1: chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir/ / kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// 'dod cing chags ba sgyu ma sred// mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan phyir// mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams bdag las mig gzhan
267a2: phyir/ / mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes// spyod pa sgyu maro gcig phyir// chos nyid chos can dmigs su med// rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i// chos kyi sku yi phyag rgya yin// mi dmigs sgyu mar 'dod cing chags//
267a3: 'dod chags chos nyid mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// bden pa gnyis ga dbyer med gcig/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs dbyings nyid
267a4: 'dod chags spros pa ni/ / 'dul ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// 'dod chags rang dang spyi yi mtshan// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// chags dang ma chags gnyis med pas// 'dod
267a5: chags mtshan nyid spang du med/ / phrag dog kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la// sems dog rtog pa sgyu ma gzhan// thabs kyis sbyor ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can// phrag dog spyi mtshan bshad pa ni//
267a6: mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// phrag dog spang zhing yangs bsgrub med// chos nyid du ni ro gcig phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la// phrag dog rtog pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// mi dmigs pa las mi
267a7: gzhan te/ / mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes// phun sum tshogs pa'i lhag par sbyor ba yi// thabs kyi rtogs pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid de// dus gsum rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pas// chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmi
267a8: sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la/ / phrag dag rtog par 'dzin pa dang // rtog dang phrag dog mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med pa'i// bden pa gnyi gar ro gcig pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag

267b1: pa yin/ / me dmigs gzhan gyi phun su ma la// brag dag rnam par smras pa na// gdul ba byab bsam me khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chan pa yin// phrag dag rang dang skye bstan pa// rnam par byang ba mtshar cad yad// nga/
267b2: paspang zhing yangs bsgrub med// sems can rnam pa mang po kun// nang gi chen po lnga pog ma bstan// rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pa sa// ma grol kham pa gsum 'khor ba yi// de
