267b3: ltar nges par ci mthong na/ / sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'ind// kun la gnod par byed bi nus// de bzhin thabs dang shes rab togs// dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur// thabs la ma khwa pram zin na// lam gyi
267b4: dge sbyong stegs bcas kyang / / mtho ris lha dang mi ru skyes// skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob// thabs mkhas snying rjes zin pa ni// mtshams med sems can ma lums kun// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rjes bsang // bsod
267b5: nams dpag tu med pa thob/ / ma bsad na yang sems can yal bor te// snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag/ gang phyir byang chub sems de ni// rdo rje de bzhin
267b6: gshegs par gsal/ / nyon mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs// ngo bo yin par gsal por gsungs// chos kun rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la//
267b7: nyon mongs thams cad byang chub rgyu// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas// de phyir de bzhin gshegs bas ma yas// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyin ci log nyid byang chub la ma// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin po dmigs
267b8: phyir/ / mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// gsang sngags bla na med pa yi// thabs kyi ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub// bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med// don dam cir yang ma grub la// sgyu ma'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag

268a1: gis zin pa no/ / nyon mongs lam yang rnam par grol// thabs chen dgagis ma zinan// dge bsud kyang grol mi 'gyur// la 'byor don dam ldan pa yis// nyan mangs 'ching ba'i chos spyad kyang // rnam par 'grel ba
268a2: 'gyur ba yin/ / 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyi sa ga yod pa ma yin pas// 'khor ba yongs su shes pas na// de ni mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'// nyon mongs phyin ci log rnams dag/ thabs la mkhas pas zin gyur yang // grol bathar
268a3: par mi 'gyur na/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// 'dul ba'i dbang gis bya byed kun// rngon dang smad 'tshong ston pa'ang srung // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul bzang // phal la med pas mi drang na// sngags mchog shin tu zab pa yi//
268a4: skye bo kun gyis bya ba 'byung // bdud rtsi dang du blang bar gsungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer mad na// sku gsung rdo rje dbang thob gyur// grub pa'i rdzas su de phyir gsungs// shes rab mnyam pa ma gtogs na// byol song la la chos dang
268a5: ldan 'gyur yang / / drang srong 'tsho dang rtag 'thun dang // ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dod pa spong byed pa// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// chos rnams thams cad yongs su dag pa yi// rnam bzhi tshul gyis don rtogs mngon// rgyu rnams rang
268a6: bzhin dag pa dang / / 'bras bu yongs su dag 'gyur te// rgyu yi mtshan nyid rnam par dag/ phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te// sems nyid bzung 'dzin gnyis snang ba// bzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba che// rgyud nyid rang gi sems yin pas//
268a7: 'byung ba chen po rgyu las dag/ 'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni// sems can kun gyi rus pa ste// rdo rje byang chub sems yin te// sha ni pad ma rag ta yin// dri chen dri chu gur gum chu// so so'i lus la gnas pas dag/ don dam dmigs
268a8: med dag pas ni/ / phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang // gang gi ngo bo ma yin te// skye 'gag med pas ye nas dag/ kun rdzob yi nas dag pa ni// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang // chu zla'i tshul du mi dmigs gnas// mi dmigs

268b1: pa nyid sna tshogs snang / / de bzhin gshegs par ye nas mnyam// de bas gtsang sme med par spyod// sems can rtog pa bzlog phyir sman// gtso ru dang du blang bar bya// de bas sems can phyin ci log/ chos rnams thams cad dag par
268b2: ma shes te/ / thabs dang shes rab don ma rtogs// kha cig gis ni 'tsho ba'i bar du zos// kha cig gis ni drang srong ji bzhin du// sha spangs rtswa dang tshul zos kyang mgrub don ma gtogs// rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni// rang bzhin
268b3: yongs kyis dag pa'i phyir/ / mnyam pa'i dbyings kyis rab rtogs pas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi/ the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ dos dang ngos med rtogs pa mtshan/ gtsa dang migatsad rtogs pa mtshag mtshan ma nyid kya mablangs /
268b4: mkhyen pas dbul la gnas mi 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i rdzas su yang dag gsungs// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang // dri chen dri chu rag ta dag/ sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// dngos grub ya mtshan chen po 'grub// tshe la dbang dang rig
268b5: pa 'dzin/ / mkha' la 'byo dang thogs med 'grub// mthar ni skye med rdo rje yis// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gsang ba'i snying po'i don nyid kyis// yi dam mi spad rtag bsgom zhing /
268b6: nas lha yi mtshan nyid ni// dus gsum gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lha spangs dge spyang don med 'gyur// lA ni mi spad don nyid ni// lhun grub ye shes thams cad kyi// bdag dang gnyis med so so ma yin pa'i// dus gsum bde
268b7: gshegs dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag po ste// yongs su rdzogs par bsgom pa'i don// dkon mchog gsum spangs tshangs par spyad pa'i don med 'gyur// bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na/ yon
268b8: tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ / ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor nas su// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs grub// rdo rje slob dpon mang mi bya// byang chub ston pa

269a1: 'dren pa po/ / long ba dmigs su 'dren dang 'dra// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin// slob dpon de la dmod pa ni// dper na mun khung sgron bsad na// mthong ba'i don ni mi rtogs bzhin// sdug bsngal nyam
269a2: thug yun rings su/ / bskal pa mang bor myong bar mngon// de bas de la gus pa rtag tu gyis// lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po bas// shin tu gtso bor blang bar bya// drin chags bskyed pa'i pha ma pas// shin tu lhag pa'i
269a3: ri mo bya/ / rdo rje mched dang lham dral ni// bla med byang chub zhing 'gro ba'i// chos nyid dam tshig smon lam mthus// byang chub rin chen sar nges pas// de la ldog cing 'khu ba ni// rang la rang gis mtshon btab na// rang srog tshe rabs
269a4: lnga brgya'i bar/ / rang gis srog gcod phung par 'gyur// tshe 'di mi bde sna tshogs pa// mi bde bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang // ngan song gsum dang mi khom pa'i// sdug bsngal kha rgyud myong bar
269a5: 'gyur/ / yun rings rtag tu mi thar pa'i// shin tu nyams thag myong bar 'gyur// grub pa gcig bzhin lhan cig spyod// gnyis med dad pas rjes spyod spun// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin// shes rab gsal
269a6: bas rtag tu gdung zhes gsungs/ / gsang ba gzhan la mi bsgrags shing // sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams// rnal 'byor mnyam pa rnam gnyis kyis// thabs dang shes dang 'brel rtogs nas// mnyam pa'i spyod
269a7: pas la dor te/ / phul dang mi 'dra yang dag rtogs// ma rtogs pa yi phyogs rnams dang // skye bo kun la rab du gsang // gsang ba'i brda' dag sna tshogs gsungs// thabs la mkhas pas byas pa yin// gsang sngags/
269a8: skyon yod ma yin te// thugs rje chen pos thabs mkhas kyis// snod ma yin dang blo brtul rnams// las 'phro ngan pa'i don phyir gsang // brgya la gang zhig gsang don 'di// las 'phro ngan la bsgrags 'gyur na// dper

269b1: na grabs shing mes brlabs nas/ / brngubs shing nyid kyang 'tshig par snang // gzhan yang tshig par gyur ba bzhin/ chos dan bzang po ma dang 'angadra// skul ba rlung shing shes rabaskrun// klo nanA 'bras mongs pa rnams/
269b2: mnyam pa nyid la bskur 'debs pas// ngan song gsum du 'phangs par 'gyur// gsang don ma rtogs sdug bsngal myong 'gyur na// gsang ba 'phel bar byed pa yang // smra byed lcel zhing rmo zhing // sdug bsngal chen po myong bar
269b3: 'gyur/ / de phyir sems can don phyir gsang // rlung phyogs tsam du brjod mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad// sngags zhes rab du bsgrags pa ni// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor/
269b4: chen po ru// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM// de la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// phyag rgya chen po'i mchin nyid ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// bdag dang dbyer med phyag rgya
269b5: che/ / gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan// yid bzhin ma chags dbang bskur te// goms shing brtan par bya ba yin// de bas bar chad brtson med na// dper na sa bon tshig pa las// 'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste// bsgrub/
269b6: pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur// mi kho mo 'khor bar gnas 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po la zhugs pas// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad la// dmigs med gcig dang du mar bral// mtha' dbus gang yang ma yin
269b7: pa'i/ / ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med// mnyam pa'i phyag rgya chen po yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad dang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// yon tan skyon rnams skye 'gag med// gang gi ngo per ma grub
269b8: mnyam/ / kun rdzob chos rnams skye 'gag med// mi dmigs gang gis de bo min// chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs par// snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa'i// phyag rgya chen po'i phyogs bcu dang // dus gsum khams gsum thams

270a1: cad dang / / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// yon tan skyon rnams thams cad dang // sgyu mar mnyam par ye nas gnas// sngags 'chang rgyal por rtogs byas nas// bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag
270a2: med/ / ngang las ma g.yos par gnas na// phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang // rdzogs par phyogs bcu du sa gsum gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la// ma 'dras
270a3: brgya yongs mchad pa'i/ / gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas ldan grub ni// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bsam ma khyab// mnyam pa'i dbyings chen rdzogs par bsgom// de ltar dam tshig 'di
270a4: gsum ste/ / de la gnas na grub par 'gyur// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas shing // 'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya// lus dang ngag sems brten 'gyur na// byang chub rab 'byam thob par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po las 'das
270a5: na/ / nyen ni shin tu che bar gsungs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngags kyi spyod pa don bsgrub pa// rmongs pas gal te 'das byas na// de yi srog kyang der zad 'gyur// dam tshig bsrungs dang sngags
270a6: bzlas dang / / phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad pa bzhin// brtson 'grus che zhing brtan pas bzung // rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung 'gyur na// mi 'grub nyen yang che bar gsungs// ji ltar ral gri so la nan tan du// skyes bu myur du ma bzung na/
270a7: lag pa nges par chod par 'gyur// de bzhin nan tan med pa'i gsang sngags pa// 'chi 'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams gsal// don dam ma nyams
270a8: dag byas shing / / brtson 'grus char bskyed myang bar 'grub// sngags bsgom ma nyams phyag rgyags la// cho ga yo byad gcor ma gsungs// tshogs na yang ni nyes pa med// mchogs na yang nyes pa med// mtshegs na yang 'grub

270b1: par 'gyur/ / bdag nyid rang gi ltar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam mtshang na'ang // 'grub par 'gyur te nyes skyon med// ces pa gsang ba tshig tu'o// dam tshig sum brgya pa rtsa ba bcwa lnga mdo/
270b2: bshad pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos bzhugs gnas dang / spyod lam dang / lta stangs bstan pa/ theg pa chen po lhun grub don 'dod na// rgya chen zab yangs
270b3: shes rab myur/ / zab pa'i don rtogs mi ldog bde// nga dang bdag med yangs pa bde// gnas su chos dbyings gnyis med bstan// thabs chen kun mdzad 'od gsal byams// thams cad dgyes mdzad dbyings ma gtum// che chung byang//
270b4: chub sems dpa' 'khor// g.yog 'khor lha srin snga mang gtso// bdag gi mtshan gzugs shin tu spags// tshes dbyings mkha' dkyil yangs pa la// shes rab myur du don 'gro ba// 'gro med 'od med mi gnas pa// byang chub
270b5: sems mchog a re bde/ / shes rab zab med dkyil 'khor la// thugs rje rol pa'i ye shes 'phyo// gnyis med dbyings sbyor a re bde// ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyings su// ye shes sgron ma'i mnga' 'phangs nas// gti
270b6: mug mun pa rnams bsal te/ / rang gzhan 'od gsal bde ba'i mchog/ dge dang mi dge gnyis su med// rnam rtog mtshan ma yod ma'i 'dzin// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i// dge sdig med pas shin tu bde// bde dang mi bde
270b7: gnyis med pas/ / ye shes chags med rnam par dag/ thams cad dbyer med ye shes yin// semapa nyid dang bas a re bde// rgan du dkyil 'khor thams cad mdzes// ye shes rgyu las grub pa yi// phyi nang sgrib med gsal ba'i
270b8: dang / / ye shes blo brtan shin tu bde// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// gtsang dang smra ba'i blo ma 'dzin// thams cad chos nyid ro gcig pas// gnyis med pas ni shin tu bde// shes rab chung chen ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad ma

271a1: nang gsang lags pazhin/ 'bar ba ma snang sa sdug bsngal sad// gnyis mad tsam pas mar bad// thams cad ma lus gcig pa dang // dang / ba gnyis gamang // lanas stonas pa nga ban/ gas
271a2: bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong / / 'di dang pha rol gnyis med phyir// 'gro dang 'gro bar bya ba min// yan lag stobs chen ma mchongs par// phyogs bcu stong khams thams cad na// thub mchog ston pa'i spyod yul ni// dza ltar
271a3: dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ / chos rnams thams cad dmigs su med// chos nyid sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// zag med zab pas don rtogs na// dag par mi 'gyur gang yang med// ye shes ma bcos kun du gsal// rang bzhin rnam
271a4: par dag pa'o/ / ye nas de ltar gnas mod kyang // ma rig rmongs pa'i ling tog gis// gsal ba'i sgron ma bsgribs gyur te// khams gsum mun nag rgyun du 'khor// rnam rtog mtshan mar 'dzin pa yis// lus dang longs spyod
271a5: gnas dang ni/ / bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong // de la su zhig byed pa yod// yang dag mthu chen sus ma byas// rang la rang gis bcings par bzad // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ snying po yod pa ma yin te// sgyu ma man/
271a6: yod sprul pa dang // smig rgyu 'ja' tshon chu zla'i tshul// de ltar gang gis rab rtogs pa// de nyid sangs rgyas yin par bshad// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// skye med phun sum tshogs yin te// byed med pa yi mchog kyang rdzog//
271a7: shes nyid la nyid brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las bzhugs gnas khang pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mi 'chi ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// rdo rje ning
271a8: chen bsgrub 'dod pas/ / thams cad skye shi med pa'i tshul// mnyam nyid dag pa nyid du bsgom// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// dzaHhUM baM hos dgug par bya// bdag dang khro bo gnyis med par// yang nas yang du bsgrub par bya// sku

271b1: rnams gsal bar gyur pa drang / / zhing men 'og tu bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor ma lus der bkod nas// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms// mngag pa'i pho nya phyogs bcur btang // thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdud/
271b2: pa gcig gam yang na gnyis// gsum dang lngar bsgom par bya// pho nya mang pos nr-i bkug nas// zhing la yang nas yang drag zhag/ sngar dang ser dang mdog sngam 'byung // de nas bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis// lan grangs 'dum
271b3: phrag mang por ni/ / bzlas pa'i tshul yang rnam gsum dag/ rdo rje bsngags bzlas rtse mo gsum// de yi bar nas bzlas pa 'byung // 'od zer lnga dang ldan par bya// zhing de ldem ldem por gyur dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis bskul
271b4: bar bya/ / de nas yi ge 'bru lnga dgod// gsal zhing 'tsher bar bsgom par bya// dbang po lnga dang dbang po'i tshul// yan lag lnga la rigs lnga'i tshul// rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis bsgom// de nas zhing de 'gul gyur nas// nang
271b5: de drag tu 'gul ba dang / / shin tu zhags pas bsdams par bya// yan lag rnams kyang zhum par bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu thod pa dang // ha ya grI ba'i skur bsgoms shing // sngags ni 'bum phrag mang du bzlas// phyogs
271b6: bcur spro zhing zhing la bstim/ / de nas zhing de drag 'gul nas// rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis ni// brtan pa nyid du bsgom par bya// de nas bar bar byed pa dang // a nAM bri du gang yin pa// rdo rje drag tu brdeg cing dbab// thod pa'i khan
271b7: ni phyung nas/ / rdo rje ting 'dzin so yis bcad// rdo rje sngags zos khong du bstim// gnyis su med par bsgom par bya// de nas zhing de langs pa dang // rdo rje dbyings nas dbang yang bskur// bdud rtsi chu yang blud par bya// las rnams
271b8: thams cad byed du gzhug/ zhing des rab du smras pa'i chog/ dpa' bo tsab gyi mi rgas skye med chos rnams dang // las rnams ma lus kun bgyid do// de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis// thal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur

272a1: 5/ sgrub pa'i sa ni dur khrod dang // ri brag gnyen po bgegs gnas dang // nags khrod stong pa tsher ma can// ri bos bskor ba'i lhag ma can// rab du rnam par dben pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po 'byung ba'i gnas// de dag tu ni
272a2: bsrub par bya/ / dgra dang bcu gnyis bcu gsum dang // bcu drag man chad bslab par bya// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams// lam lnga'i zhing dang sman lngar bcas// 'bru rnams thams cad
272a3: bcad par bya/ / rtag tu tshogs chen mchod par bya// gsum dang lnga ru bar mi bcad// kha zas rnams kyang thod par bza'// btung ba dag kyang de bzhin te// mar me rtag par btang bar bya// rgyu ni ni yi mar la bya// yan lag
272a4: bsku ba'ang de bzhin to/ / sdong bu pad ma'i rgyu las bya// snod ni dung chen srubs med pa// lung lo yod dang med kyang rung // de byi pu tra ma byung ba// mdog ni phan lang can la yod// rdo rje bsgrub pa bar gcod phyir// rtag tu mtshams
272a5: ni bcad par bya/ / nri yi rkang pa g.yas g.yon nas// sbom po ma yin phra ba nyid// de la ki la ya byas nas// phur bu'i sngags dang khro sngags kyis// lan 'bum du ni bzlas par bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon thal sor
272a6: la/ khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'od 'bar gzungs kyi sku ru bsgom// de nas gnyis med sbyor tshul du// sgrub po rdo rje bsgom par bya// sgrub pa dngos la ma rtogs pa// phyogs bcu rnams su mtshams kyang bcad// dngos
272a7: grub ma thob bar du ni/ / sgom dang bzlas dang phyag rgya gsum// bag yod mgo la me 'bar bzhin// bar mtshams med par bsgrub par bya// de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis// lha ma srin rnams bran bzhin 'khol//
272a8: 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang du bsdud// rdo rje rigs mchog 'khor rkyen rnams// yid bzhin du ni 'byung bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag ni// lus sbed nus nas mngon du dbyung // de ma yin par shin tu gsang //

272b1: sku'i bsgrub pa nges pa'i donar bka' stsal to// ro langs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu pa'o// // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bro gar rtse 'jo bro gar gyi dam tshig ces bya ba nges par
272b2: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / phyogs bcu mtha' yas dus bzhi yi// thams cad dbyer med maNaDa la'i// nyi tha shar ba'i gzhal yas la// pad ma chags med gdan bting nas// rin chen zad med pho brangs//
272b3: che chung dpag tu med pa yi// byang chub bde ldan dkyil 'khor la// bde ldan byang chub rab bkod nas// ma lus kun bsdus dbyings bsdus te// lus bskyod yan lag bskul bsigs dang // dbang po lnga'i/
272b4: spyod kun// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad// gong gi dkyil 'khor tshad nyi zla 'phrugs pa'i sa gzhi la// pad ma mchags gdan bting nas// thabs dang shes rab chags med tshul// yan lag dbang po thams cad kun
272b5: rang bzhin yongs su dag pa dang / / ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs lnga'o// ye nas ma bcings yongs kyis te// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor// yan lag bzhi la rigs bzhi
272b6: 'khor/ / kha dog dbyibs dang phyag rgya dang // thabs dang shes rab gsal bsgoms te// phyogs bcur spro zhing ngan song spyod// gnas su bsdu zhing dkyil 'khor spro// 'das dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// bder gshegs zhing du rnam
272b7: par sbyar/ / yan lag chen po lnga bskyod nas// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor ma lus g.yo// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du mdzad// snyigs ma lnga yang rnam par dag/ bzang mdzes legs pa'i gos bgos nas// 'od zer sna tshogs 'gro
272b8: bar gyur/ / de nas mthar thug med pa'i bar// ye shes lnga yis rgyan par 'gyur// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// rtag tu dkyil 'khor de ltar bsgom// tshig tsam ma yin blo gting du// bdag dang dbyer med nyid du'o// thabs dang

273a1: shes rab ldan gyur nas/ / shar gyi phyogs su kha bstan te// seng ge'i stobs chen mchod par bya// ljags kyi yi ge traM bsgoms la// lce ni 'bum phrag bsam yas dang // hri yang bsam gyis mi khyab s+ho//
273a2: phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su// gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar ba// gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu grags// skra dang ming tshig so sor gas la// ljags kyi dbang po bkram nus
273a3: gsungs/ / thar dang mthar gyi nyid kyi brjod// nges pa kho na yang dag tu// de bzhin nyid kyis yod ma gsungs// sna yi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du// traM gi yig 'bru gas la bsgoms nas// dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi//
273a4: mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste// traM yang bsams pas 'od 'phro 'bar// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ma lus thos// 'gro drug 'khor ba'i gnas kyang thos// skra dang thos pa gnyis med pa'o// de bzhin dri dang ro reg rnams//
273a5: so so'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas// yig 'bru'i snying po de bzhin dgod// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // 'gro drug ma lus thams cad kun// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rol// dri la sogs pa bde mchog
273a6: gis/ / kun la tshim par yang dag mchod// 'gro drug ma lus thams cad la// ji ltar mtsham pa'i don yang byed// thabs mkhas thugs rjes de ltar ston// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// ma chags la sogs shes rab ldan//
273a7: gtso bo lnga dang gcomo lnga// thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms te// chom bu gcig gam yang na gsum// lnga'i dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te// thabs dang shes rab phan tshun du// ljags la 'od 'phro bstim byas te// dkyil
273a8: 'khor 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom/ / ting 'dzin shin tu gsal gyur nas// bdag dang phyogs bcu dbyer med par// gnyis su med par bsgom par bya'o// de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis// lte spyod ya char ma gyur par// dkyil

273b1: 'khor dag lags la bsgoms na/ / dbus nas shar phyogs kha bstan nas// rkang pa'i stabs chen spyod byas shing // lag gi 'du byed kun bskyod nas// bro dang gar gyi phyag rgyar bya// dkyil 'khor 'od zer dkar 'phro ba ba/ nga
273b2: chub sems dpa' rnam par dag/ shin tu gsal dang 'od zer 'bar// thabs dang shes rab de grub shog/ cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yi// bdud bzhi dag ni 'joms par byed// theg mchog rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin pa// thabs dang
273b3: shes rab de grub shog/ bdag nyid rigs pa'i rdo rje yis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal med par shog/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// thabs dang shes rab gsal gyur shog/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal brtsad bcad nas//
273b4: rig mun pa med par byed// thugs rje'i 'od zer nyi shar bas// thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog/ shin tu sra zhing skye shi med// rdo rje thugs rje rol ston pa// 'gro la thugs rje yongs kyis 'byung // thabs dang shes rab byam/
273b5: ldan shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// yon tan phyogs su kha bstan te// lus bskyod yan lag bskul bsigs nas// stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung ba'i gter// zad med nor
273b6: bu rin po che/ / ma lus kun gyi re ba bskong // thabs dang shes rab de grub shog/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi mdog bstan pa// yang na thams cad gser btsem// dkyil 'khor bsam yas zad mi shes// thabs dang shes rab myur
273b7: grub shog/ yon tan rin chen bsam yas kyang // thams cad mnyam pa'i dang gnas nas// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes te// thabs dang shes rab mnyam 'gyur shog/ bder gshegs yon tan rmang po che// ye nas chags
273b8: med byang chub zhing / / yang dag nyid du thams cad gnas// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas nas// yan lag dang po bskyod byas te// gar rnams shin tu

274a1: gsal byas nas/ / stobs chen dag kyang brdung par bya// chos rnams ma lus kun spyod kyang // bad ma la ni 'dam bzhin no// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// thabs dang shas rab dgrub shog/ las
274a2: dang nyon mongs nub 'gyur ba'i/ / bag chags mtshan mardul chil/ thabs dang shes rab skung zub shog/ byang chub chags mad dkyil 'khor ni// ga nas ma 'ongs nyid kyi dbying ga// mi gnas tshul gyis dbying san pa zhugs/
274a3: dang shes rab myur grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// byang phyogs su ni kha bltas te// lus bstod yan lag gar byed cing // phyag rgya so sor gsal gyur nas// rkang pa'i skabs chen brdung par bya// yang dag rtog
274a4: pa'i shes rab kyis/ / bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sgrib pa thams cad byang byas te// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// bdud bzhi bcos nas mi mthun bstsal// bya byed
274a5: med la don rnams grub/ / thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ thams cad ma lus rdzogs byed pa// sna tshogs kun tu 'gyur ba'o// ljang khu'i tshul du mdog bstan pa// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ thams cad
274a6: ma lus don grub pa/ / las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// nan tan chen po bya ba rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ sdug bsngal dra ba tshar bcad de// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun byas kyang // gang nas ma 'ongs gang
274a7: mi 'gro/ / thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ bde gshegs ma lus thams cad kun// phyogs dus kun du bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thabs chen dkyil 'khor
274a8: yang dag pas/ / bder gshegs kun la rnam par 'phro// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// bde ba'i dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bsdu// thams cad ma lus rigs bzhi yi// nang du ma 'dus gang yang med// de nyid bder gshen

274b1: ma 'tshar nyid/ / khabs dang shes rab ba de grub shog/ rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dbar bsdu zhing // ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'gro// phyogs bcugs la bar gang gyur nas// thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog/ de bzhin gas
274b2: mchog 'dzin pa yi/ / thams cad ma lus dbyings bsdus te// thams cad kun du bzang por ston// thabs dang shes rab gcod grub shog/ thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// phyogs dus gnas pa ma lus la// chos kyi 'kho
274b3: lo chen po bskor/ / thabs dang shes rab mchog grub shog/ 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyi sku yod pas// ma mthong rmongs la nam mkha'i mdog/ thabs dang shes rab dbyings grub shog/ sku ni sna tshogs
274b4: cir yang snang / / thabs chen rnams la mnyam pa'i tshul// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul// rang rgyal rnams la ba se ru'i tshul// pha rol phyin rdzogs shAkya'i tshul// lha mi rnams la dge bcu tshul// dud 'gro rnams la e nas/
274b5: gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la// ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du ston// de lta bu'i sku ston pa// thabs dang shes rab sku grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan pasgoms nas// rgyan lnga yis ni rnam par brgyan// yan lag lal
274b6: dkyil 'khor bkod/ / ye shes rgyan gyis pho brang brdung // gnyis med dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul// mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// lhun grub tshogs chen byang chub du// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ chos
274b7: dbyings dam pa bdag med pa/ / mi dmigs dbyings su ma lus 'das// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med pas// thabs dang shes rab dbyings grub shog/ bder gshegs dkyil 'khor dab bstod ni// sangs rgyas ni
274b8: khams ma lus g.yo/ / lag gi 'du byed bskul bskyod nas// rig 'dzin zhing khams dag par byed// rkang chen dag gis stabs mchongs na// 'gro drug gnas rnams stongs par byed// spyan gyis phyogs bcu blta byas

275a1: na/ / bdud bzhi dpung rnams pham par byed// thabs dang shes rab ma lus kun// de lta bu yi don grub shog/ thams cad ma lus de bzhin te// de ni gang yang mi dmigs la// skye dang 'gag dang gnas/
275a2: pa dang // 'ong ba 'gro ba'i dngos po med// rnal 'byor bro gar rtse 'jo yi// sna tshogs byed la byas pa med// de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rnal 'byor las rnams grub par shog/ thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// de lta bu'i
275a3: longs spyod na/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro rnams thams cad la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa// yun rings chos kyi bde spyad nas// bla med rdo
275a4: sems dpa' yis/ / dpe byad mtshan gyis rnam par rgyan// mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// sangs rgyas zhing la dbang bsgyur te// spyod yul kun tu maN Da la// ji ltar dmigs
275a5: pa bzhin du 'grub/ / rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// 'di lta bu'i las rnams bya// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // lus ngag yid la dbang thob nas// sangs rgyas 'byung dang sgor mi 'gyur// theg pa dman par yod mi skye//
275a6: ngan song gsum du yod mi ltung // gnas ngan longs spyod mi bde ba'i// ngan pa'i sa ru yod mi ltung // rdo rje theg mchog brjed mi 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// lus byang bzang zhing yan lag rdzogs// dbang po tshang zhing lkog nang
275a7: med/ / skad gdangs snyan cing 'gro don byed// bdag gi longs spyod thams cad kun// gzhan la gnod pa med par 'grub// tshan po che'i mthu stobs ldan// 'gro ba'i don du yang dag byed// gzhan la gnod pa yod mi byed// snying rje zhing she
275a8: rab ldan/ / mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pa// bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par byed// mthar ni te shi med pa'i sa// sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che// bkod pa'i gzhal yas thams cad la// dbang bskur spyod pa'i dngos grub thob//

275b1: ral 'byong sa shig 'di 'du 'do// lcags kyi dbang po bzla sa nas ni// gsang do ni ngas pa na kun pa// bla med mdog thub par shog/ dbyed pang byang chub bor chags can// shan btan pa thog pa// sngags na
275b2: tshugs me 'gyung/ / beg mchog rdo rjo de lte ba// dal 'khor ma zad 'byung ba'i gaNang// yi bzhin no bangan po ma// byang ngam gyis shin tugs la// bskal pa grangs ma gnas bcas kyang // spyani shin tu gzhon pa'i tshul/
275b3: shi med pa'i rdo rje la// thams cad byung ba'i gter yin te// yon tan phun sum tshogs dang ldan// bla med byang chub 'grub gyur nas// ye shes rdo rje ldan grub shog/ tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs gyur cig/ thams cad kun gyi ston
275b4: pa po/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes// sangs rgyas zhing la dbang byed shog/ de rtogs kun kyang rdo rje'i rigs// su gsung thugs kyang grub par shog/ rnal 'byor pa thabs cad dang shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi dus
275b5: thams cad 'dod yon lnga spyod cing bro thabs bya'o/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bro gar rtse 'jo'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs brgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
275b6: sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phung ste/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings ldan pas// sgra dang dra ba 'brel 'gyur nas// sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang bas// 'thun pa'i rdo rje rang snang ngo // rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba/
275b7: rnam rtog 'thun pa'i las snang ngo // de bzhin sku mchog dri bral dang // bder gshegs sku lngang mdor bsdus te// bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub gzugs// bla med gzugs dang rdo rjes// de la sogs te sbubs ma yas// phyos
275b8: bdungus bzhi sku ston pa/ / thabs kyis 'gro 'dul ba ston te// byang chub mchog gi rdo rje ste// rigs med zhing du su ston cing // dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du snang // kun snang de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// nom dag sku nyonam tshan

276a1: te/ / log 'gro rtog pa thams cad la// so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston// de ci ste shi med pa'i sku// las dang mchags pad ma'i na// thang dang mthar sna tshogs kyang // sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med// snang da rba/
276a2: snang gnyi ga med// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni// badz+ra zhes ni gdags pa yin// ji snyed su ston pasam yas pa// thams cad ma lus rdo rjer bsdus// 'khor lo zhes kyang rjod pa ni// de la sogs te skyabs ma yas//
276a3: byang chub thabs kyi dkyil nas byung // sku ni sna tshogs thams cad kyang // 'ja' tshon chu zla 'dra shes na// dbyings nyid las ni dbyings snang zad // thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor snang // gsung nyid sku'i dkyil 'khor te/
276a4: dbyer med de bzhin yong gis so// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'grub 'dod pas// rtag tu dus gsum thams cad du// bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med pas// ye nas dkyil 'khor yin par brtag/ 'di ni dngos grub mchog yin
276a5: par/ / kun tu rgyal gyis de skad bshad// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen por sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba le'u sku'i dkyil 'khor zab du ni rgyud kyi rgyal ba phyi ma las bshad de/ bod la ma gyur zhes
276a6: 'byung ngo / / rang bzhin sku'i dkyil 'khor du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par sbyor zhing dngos grub myur du len
276a7: pa'i thabs dra ba las 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub ni// mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin te// ma byos ji bzhin dang bzhag dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // ming mig
276a8: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ / ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub// spyod yul thams cad maN Da la// ye shes dkyil 'khor thar byed skyong // longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing // ji ltar

276b1: 'dod pa smon pas grub/ / yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni// phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// de nas rdo rje mnyam yin no// dngos grub myur du grub 'dod na// shin tu phra zhing zab par
276b2: bsgom/ / bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnam pa ni// shan du ma migs dbyings su bsgom// ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang // thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang // sprul pa'i tshul de shes par bya// de bzhin yang nas yang goms nas//
276b3: de nas phra mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom// byin snad bcud hUM du bsdu// gang grub yi ge so so ste// spyir ni gang bsgom kun tu 'ang// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dra// yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid// yi ge hUM du shin tu bsdu/
276b4: dri yi mig gis bltar yod par// yang nas yang du 'dris pa dang // 'od zer mang po 'phro bar bya// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba dang // slar yang hU~M la bstim par bya// hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su thim// thim 'gyur
276b5: dbyings nas a dkar 'bar/ / shin tu 'tsher bar gsal bsgoms la// thams cad a ru gyur par bsgom// de bzhin nyid du 'dris 'gyur nas// a las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spro// e ma gsal bar 'byor 'gyur
276b6: nas/ / nyi zla gang ba'i nyi zlar bsgom// dri gsal pa dam chags med bsgom// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// nyi zla gdan dang gzhal yas khang // thams cad bsdu zhing phra bar bsgom// de bzhi yi ge hUM
276b7: gnas pas/ / mthing ka 'tsher la gnas pa yi// 'od zer 'phro ba rnam par bsgom// 'od 'phro dbyings su slar bsdus nas// shin du rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bar bsgom// rdo rje 'od 'phrogs la 'bar nas// dbyings su yang
276b8: ni bstim par bya/ / de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur nas// shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgom// de bzhin gnyis med gsal 'gyur nas// sku gcig rdo rje dril bur bsgom// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang // dbu gsum phyag

277a1: 1 du/ / dus sta gas / 94 sadas chu sas+ho/ sa pa ban dugs / dang / ga rnas pa / ga dmug
277a2: dngas pa gsal ba bzhi/ / la gams rtogs dgas me gang sa// ga dbang babyung bzhin du grub// mkha' la 'byung ga 'a gnas/ d+hA badz+rag nga rna sa 'phrul/ brag la sogs thags
277a3: 'dzul/ / rdul mi 'bying mes mi 'cheg/ dug dang mtshon gyis 'jigs mi 'gyur// mi snang ba dang mang por sprul// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// lho srin rnams la dbang bsgyur zhing // tshe dang dus la srin btung dang /
277a4: stong gsum yungs 'brur bskyed pa dang // ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du khrug// sbrul dang gcan zan gdug pa rnams// khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// bdud dang gdug pa la sogs pas// tshugs par mi 'gyur
277a5: bran bzhin 'gyur/ / lus ma spangs par rig 'dzinas// ye shes bsod nams longs spyod kyis// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog brnyes// thugs rje sprul pa'i byin rlabs kyis// so sor thar pa'i lam yang
277a6: ston/ / 'gro ba ma lus dor yang byed// las rnams thams cad kun byas nas// skye 'chi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis rgyan// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen ldan// mthar
277a7: byin bya ba med par 'grub/ / bsgrub med blangs med chos kyi dbyings// 'gro med 'ong med de bzhin nyid// de ltar bsgrubs te bsgoms byas nas// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // tshe rabs skye ba thams
277a8: cad du/ / las ngan kun tu skye mi 'gyur// theg pa dman par yod mi 'gyur// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin par 'gyur// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gas

277b1: babya brgyad dngos grub thob par byed pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyad kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las hom rnams kyi phrin las 'di gsungs so// dang po bzhan/
277b2: nyid du gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom// de nas bdag gi snying khar a gsal zhing 'tsher ba gcig bsgom mo// a de shin tu gsal bar gyur pa dang phyogs bcur 'od du 'phros par bsgom// 'od de slar a la bsdu zhing
277b3: bstim/ / ma dang a las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ba stim zhing 'tsher la gsal bar bsgom// dri las pad ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskom// du shin tu 'od 'bar bar bsgom/ snying gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sa mas
277b4: dpa' mtshon gang ba gcig phyag rgya dang bcas par bsgom/ / bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang / yig 'bru dang / phyag rgya yang gsal bar bzlas/ 'bru gsum dang 'bru lnga yang bzlas/ 'dug 'bru bzhis mtshams bcad/ rtag tu hos
277b5: bya/ tshogs dang mchod pa yang bya/ mang po mi nus pa'i don du hom gang gi yang rung / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtso bor spri ni rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang rdo rje/ dbang pad pa he ru ka/ rgyas pa rad na te ru ka/ zhi ba bud d+ha he ru ka/ spyan
277b6: drang pa ni e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru Ni ka zhe sa ho ma gang byed pa'i lha gtso bo nas spyan drang / mchod pa dang arga dbul ba ni drag po'i mgor ni sngags ril hUM/ zhi ba la mgor ri la aM/ bar ma rnams la yang de bzhin sbyar/ spyan drang bi na ga
277b7: mdzad pa'i gca bo nas zhib la shan ting bstan/ / rmyi la so so rang bsngags rdzogs// drag po lho// dbang drug rgyas pa byang / zhi ba shar/ spyi gang yang rung gru gsum dang / thod pa kha gdangs so// thag ma ngang pad / pad ma dang / chags med
277b8: phyag rgya rnam pa bdun la phyag rgya chen po dang / chos nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o// rgyud

278a1: kyirgyal ba chen po sgra 'phrul dra ba las sa ma na pangs bdun can parnamag/ / de nas de bzhan gshegs pad+hA macan pa shA 'bral ba las dang chu ba da pa
278a2: mdo 'di ltar yang bshad de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang nyid du// dbyings su ro gcig de bsdus te// do ni dmi 'gyur yod ma gsungs// yon tan mchog gi 'dod pa ni// snang
278a3: srid ma lus thams cad kun/ / mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyor bas na// chags pa med pa'i tshul du spyod// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam// byang chub mchog tu 'gro ba'i gnas// bde chen mi zad gter du 'gyur// cis kyang mi
278a4: tshugs rdo rje'i sku/ / nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'dod chags ni// lus dang zas kyis bsgribs 'gyur te// yi dgra gnas nas gnas su 'gro// skom dang bkres pa nyon mongs 'gyur// rnag khrag ngan sngags rtag tu mthong //
278a5: bde la spyod pa'i dbang yang med// sdug cing gdug pas bsrungs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po'i zhe sdang ni// 'khor ba'i mya ngan sgo bcad cing // bder gshegs lam du 'dzud par byed// yang dag don dang ldan par 'gyur//
278a6: thugs rje tshul gyis khre ston ning // shin tu mnyam pa'i ngang du 'jog/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba yi// yang dag mchog gi bde ba 'grub// ye shes gsal ba'i bde ba ni// bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med dang // rang bzhin
278a7: med pa'i dbyings su rol/ / thams cad brjod du med pa'i dang // kun du khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba// shin tu 'od gsal rnam dag lam// byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa spyod// sems can nyon mongs dug sel 'gyur//
278a8: thams cad zhing sbyong nga rgyal ni// yon tan bskyed pa'i mdzod yin te// de med bdag med mi dmigs la// su zhig de la nga rgyal skyed// dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i// shin du rgyal ba'i khyu mchog

278b1: 'grub/ / lha srin ba dang sde tshar bcad pa'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thog// phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba/ nga dang bdag med den rtogs na// dog dang yangs pa gnyis med de// bde mchog dkyil 'khor yangs rba
278b2: 'grub/ / phrag dog dngos po mi shes shing // nga dang bdag tu 'dzin 'gyur na// lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye// de nas yi dgas gnas su 'gro// gal te yul sa rnyed gyur na// shin tu mi bde dog par 'gyur// gzhan yang
278b3: spyod thams cad la/ / dbang byar med cing gzhan dbang 'gyur// mdor na nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'grub// phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni// da dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang // phyin ci log la phrag dog ste// thams cad gnyis
278b4: su med par sbyor/ / bde ba mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med don yang rtogs par 'grub// nga med bdag med dbyings su thim// lhun grub don mchog 'grub par 'gyur// yid la lha ni rtag bsgoms na// rgyu
278b5: 'bras lhun gyis grub pa yi/ / bdag gi kun du dbang bsgyur te// rig 'dzin gnas su skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs kyis bsgrub bya ba// sgrol dang sbyor bas mthar phyir 'gyur// sbyor ba nyid ni bsnol ba yin// rang
278b6: bzhin gyis ri spyor sgrol dang / / sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yine// ting nge 'dzin gyis spyod sgrol dang // dbang po yul dus skyong sgrol dang // thabs chen dag gi sbyong sgrol dang // mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo// yang na sbyor sgrol
278b7: bdag la sogs/ / shes rab dbyings dang bdag du sbyor// thabs chen sprul pa bsam mi khyab// dbyings dang dbyings su thams cad sgrol// rol pa'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// thugs rje sprul pa bsam mi khyab/
278b8: spor sgrol phrin las bdag la rdzogs// byang chub sems sprul phyogs bcur 'phro// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// rig 'dzin bde ldan thob par byed// bla med zhing rnams dag par byed// sku gsung lhun

279a1: grub phyogs bcur 'dul/ / rdo rje zhes ni mtshan bsgrags te// theg dman rnams kyang rdo rjer dgod// zad sa shes pa'i gter yang 'grub// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam
279a2: pa'i sku/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/ thugs rje sprul pa dpag med kyis// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus mkhyen// 'gro ba nyid na nyid kyi sku// nyon mongs byang chub lam du mkhyen// 'khor ba nyid ni
279a3: bde gnas so/ / chos kyi dbyings dang sems can mtha'// dbyer med yang dag nyid du'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga 'di ltar yang bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa lnga
279a4: pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa 'di nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// spros pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs rje'i ngang//
279a5: dmyal ba'i gnas rnams tshar gcod pa'i// brgyad gnyis bcu drug zhing du sbyor// tsha ba rnams la bsel ba'i sman// grang ba rnams la dro ba'i sman// bsil drod 'byam rngub che snyoms pa// thugs rje'i byin rlabs de ltar ston//
279a6: byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// chags pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya// ji ltar bde ba'i ro myong zhing // myong tshor nyid na rang bzhin med// chags pa
279a7: med pa'i ye shes kyis/ / yi dgas gnas rnams tshar gcod cing // lus dang zas kyis bsgribs pa'i// nyon mongs gnyi ga med par ston// gti mug ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nga dang bdag med gnyis med pa'i// shes
279a8: rab chen po'i 'od gsal gyis/ / dran smra med pa'i sdug bsngal bsal// rmongs med sgrib pa dag par byas// ye shes gsal ba'i thugs rje yis// bya byed med par nyon mongs sgrol// byol song gnas ni stongs byed cing //

279b1: thugs rje'i sgrod ma de ltar sgron// phrag dog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// yangs pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// nga dang bdag 'dzin rnams la ni// thugs rjes gnyis med mnyam stor zhing // dag dang yangs pa gnyi ga med// rgya
279b2: chen yangs pa'i blo ldan pas/ / 'di la mi chung gang yang med// thams cad yangs pa nyid du sbyor// lha ma yin rnams stongs par byed// nga rgyal bde mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye nas chos nyid mnyam pa la// nga dang
279b3: khyod ces bya ba med/ / thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste// gnyis med mtshan nyid bsnan du med// che chung med pa'i ngang yin pas// bya ba dag ni med par bstan// nga rgyal bdag med rtogs pa yis// dregs pa'i nye rnams stongs
279b4: par byed/ / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa// ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag/ so so'i mtshan nyid gzhig byas nas// rang bzhin med de yang dag nyid// rang byung chen po'i ye
279b5: shes kyis/ / thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// ma bcos ma byas dang gis gsal// ye nas 'od gas la sangs rgyas zhing // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rang bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin//
279b6: sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste// thams cad de bzhin nyid du sbyor// gnyis med dbyings kyi rang du thim// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis// ma lus de bzhin nyid du bsdud// sdud dang mi bsdud gnyi ga med//
279b7: yang dag 'o na nyid du'o// bde ba'i ngang nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus rnam par dag/ nyid kyi dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// bde dang mi bde gnyi ga med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste// ji
279b8: bzhin nyid kyi rang brtsam par/ / yang dag nyid kyis de skad gsungs// bshad dang nyan pa'ang gnyi ga med// de bzhin nyid du gnyi ga 'du// dus bzhi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gong na med pa'i ye shes

280a1: bco/ / thams cad kun la dbang bsna // thams cadamanyam pa nyid nga stod// das dang ma 'ongs thams cadadang// byung dang / 'byung ba mangs pa'o// ye shas rtags pa'i khyang bar gyis// dus pazhi saH/
280a2: med pa yi// mnyam pa nyid du lhan ner skyod// ldan grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// thams cad dbyer med byang chub ste// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i chos// ma bcos ldan gyis grub pa yi// byang chub
280a3: chen 'di yin te/ / thams cad dbyer med nyid du 'dus// byang chub don sgrub ye nas rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du thams cad thim// rdo rje skye gnas zhes bya ba 'di ma tshig ni// theg pa che mchog rigs su nges// rigs te byang chub
280a4: bstan pas bzung / / thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings shes na// rigs mchog kun gyi skye gnas yin// skyes pa nyid na skyes pa med// las dang las kyi bag chags med// cis kyang ma gos thams cad 'joms// skye shi mang
280a5: pa'i sa yang yin/ / byang chub kyi zhing bkod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i// snang grags bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// phyi dang nang gi gnas pa dag/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su thim// mdor
280a6: na zhing khams ma lus par/ / yon tan rin chen bkod pa yi// ye shes rgyan gyis spros pa rnams// zhing de yon tan bsam mi khyab// ye shes bzhugs gnas shes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// de
280a7: bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ / gsang sngags chen po sgrub 'dod pas// bzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes thob// chos kyi dbyings dang sems can ni// gnyis med de bzhin nyid du gcig/ de ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni//
280a8: rdo rje bzhug gan yin par bshad// mi 'jigs pa'i rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rnam par byang dang nyon mongs gnyis// so so yod pa ma yin te// nyon mongs gnyen pos bcos su med// thams cad dbyings su ra

280b1: gcig pas/ / de la 'jigs pa'i gnyen po med// cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing yang yin// nga med bdag med rgyal ma'i mchog/ gzhal yas khang rten zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu dus
280b2: bzhi thams cad kun/ / rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor ba ni// dog yangs ched kyang dpag tu med// sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan// ye shes rgyu las grub pa'o// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// zag pa zad las grub pa yi//
280b3: nams kyang 'jigs med chos kyi dbyings// sna tshogs kun sbyor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gdol pa can gyi chos min pas// ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du grub// rig pa rang dbang gyur pas na// stong par bya'am mi stong bya/
280b4: thams cad dbyer med dang yin pas// kha dog dbyibs dang rin po che// thams cad khyab par yungs 'bru'i tshul// bsam yas mtha' dbus med pa'o// 'dren byed gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ma rig log tog pas
280b5: yas kyis/ / 'jig rten khams rnams bsam yas pa// 'khor ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma// yang dag byang chub sems rig na// ma rig rgyu 'bras rnam par dag/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste/
280b6: thams cad ma lus bde gnas so// lam lnga ston byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom byas te// nyon mongs lam lnga'i sgo bkag nas// lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog yin// rtog dang mi rtog gnyi ga
280b7: med/ / gnyis med de ni yang dag lam// thabs dang shes rab dang nyid du// shin tu mnyam bzhag rtogs bya zhing // bla na med pa ston par bya// yang dag don ston zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// theg pa bsam yas ston pa yang // de ba
280b8: nyid kyis ma brjod kyang / / sems can blo'i rim za bzhin// so sor 'tsham par kun la gsal// 'di ni rdo rje theg mchog ste// rgya mtsho krung du chu 'bab bzhi// thams cad chu yi ngo bo nyid// theg pa thams cad rdo rje'i sa// rab tu

281a1: tog byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ / shes rab blo chen dab ldan pas// don du mi 'gyur yod ma gsungs// srid gsum 'gro ba bas ma yas su// thugs rje snyoms pa bas ma mi khyab// don dang 'thun pa 'bar
281a2: shig ston/ / mi mthun zhags pa 'khor ba gcod// bder gshegs zhing rnams dag par byed// thams cad dbyings su dag par 'dus// myur byed byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rang rig ye shes dbang thob nas// dkar po
281a3: mtshan gyis mdog sgyur bzhin/ / dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin byang chub dug gsum ste// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du sbyor// nyon mongs sdug bsngal thar byed lam// thar dang mthar gnyis med na// thams cad ma
281a4: lus byang chub rgyu/ / mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye shes sgyu mar snang ba dang // lo tog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin mnyam// mnyam pa nyid na mi gnas pa'i// bsod nams
281a5: ye shes tshogs rdzogs te/ / ye shes gnyis kyis dkyil 'khor la// theg mchog rdo rje ma lus rdzogs// dpe byad bzang po dpag tu med// thams cad dbang bskur zhes bya ba'i dmatshig ni// shin tu rtogs pa'i
281a6: khyad par gyis/ spyod yul thams cad smon na mkhyen// de bzhin nyid dang kun rtog la// gnyis su med pas dbang bskur te// ma lus thams cad bde ldan zhing // thams cad byang chub mchog tu 'gyur// ye nas dngos po
281a7: med pa la/ / ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// rig 'dzin gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// shes rab rnam gsum goms byas nas// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te// rtag tu yangs pa chen po bsgom//
281a8: rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs pa yi// rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste// tshe ni bcu dang drug pa yin// brgya brgya dang du bsnur zhing gnas// lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas pa'o// zad med gter ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// shes/

281b1: rab chen po rnam dag pas// spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur// shes dang spyod yul gnyis su med// de bzhin nyid du ro gcig ste// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing sbyor bas// zad med rin chen gter du 'gyur// mi zad par/
281b2: ldan dam tshig mchog/ 'og min mtha' dbus bsam mi khyab// bsgrub med mnyam rdzogs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang byung ye shes 'phyo ba yi// dbyings dang rig pa ga
281b3: med pa'i/ / de bzhin nyid de rdo rje rigs// thams cad gnyis su med pa la// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa yod ma yin// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la// de lam lam gyis bcos su med// thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes
281b4: dam tshig ni/ / chos rnams ye dag gyur pa yang // phyin ci log gi blo log nas// log rtog gnas na longs spyod pa// ma rig 'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab// 'khrul rtog ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po thabs/
281b5: mkhas pas// nyon mongs 'dren cing mtho ris gnas// byang chub la mchen rtogs par ston// gsung mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig tu brtags na
281b6: ston/ / ji snyed mang po'i don brjod kyang // rdo rje gsung la spros pa med// spros med de ni sna tshogs pa'i// kun tu brda' 'jal ye shes gsung // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// thams cad pad ma chags med pa'o//
281b7: bskur ba zad med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// snang sring ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbang bsgyur te/ thams cad ye shes dbyings su bstim// zad med ye shes gter
281b8: ldan pas/ / thugs rje byin rlabs pa sam mi khyab// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor don rtogs rnam par dag/ thams cad skad 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag dang / 'gro

282a1: drug dus gnas ma lus la/ / gsung gcig tshig tu ma brjod kyang // sngon gyi thugs rje byin rlabs kyis// thar dang mthar gnyi ka la// so so ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// chos kyi gsung mchog dam pa yis//
282a2: thar pa'i bskul zhing ngan song spyod// rang rig dbang bskur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs dus bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de na ji snyed yod pa yi// mtshan ma sna tshogs brtags pa yang // rang rig rnam par rtog pa nyid//
282a3: sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang // ye shes sprul par dag pa'i yul// yi ge med 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// yi ge tshig dang /
282a4: sgra spangs pa'i// brjod med dang du gnas pa ni// gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi// chos rnams thams cad ye nas dag/ thams cad thugs su gyur pas na// sgra dang tshig la gnas pa min// thugs la thugs ni mganas
282a5: pa'o/ / bdud sde tshar gcod ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag/ phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// bdag nyid lha'i dkyil 'khor te// skye shi med pa'i g.yung rung gnas// bdud bzhi bcom pa'i
282a6: stes mchog gis/ / dregs pa chen po thams cad bcom// ma rig log 'dren 'dul bcad de// chos kyi dbyings su thams cad thim// stong gsum kun grags zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/
282a7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// 'gro ba'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi// thams cad gdul bya chung ma zos// ngan song sbyong zhing byang chub zhing //
282a8: ye sha ba sngags chan kun du ston// ye shes gsung mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig no// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// yang dag shes pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med la cing yang snang // snang ba nyid na dbyings nyid de//

282b1: de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// kun la dbang bsgyur rang dbang can// thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar snang // 'di ni ye shes gsung mchog yin// bsam yas ye shes rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams bsam
282b2: gyis mi khyab ste/ / mtha' dang dbus med kun du khyab// khyab dang khyab med rdo rje'i gsung // sgra skad sna tshogs bsgrags pa dang // dngos po med la dngos po'i sgra// ji ltar pi par lag thogs na// sgra ni sna tshogs 'thung 'gyur
282b3: yang / / dngos po med pa de bzhin nyid// phyogs dus dbyer med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad dang // dus bzhir 'byung ba ma lus kun// phyogs dang snga phyi med pa yi// thams cad de bzhin nyid
282b4: kyi dbyings/ / 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor snang ba thams cad kun// rang rig rgyal por yang dag 'dra// rang rig de nyid thams cad yin// 'jigs med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'dus ma byas nyid
282b5: 'dus byas yin/ / 'dus byas sdang dang mi snang gnyi ga min// yod dang med pa'ang dbyer med de// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yin// ma bcos ma byas dang gis gsal// 'jig dang bzhig par bya ba min// cis kyang mi chug
282b6: rdo rje'i bdag ces gsungs so/ / de bzhin su nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// de bzhin zhing khams bsam yas dang // 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// thar pa rnams la dag pa'i su// rtog pa can la 'khor ba'i lus/
282b7: so sor 'jab par dor ston cing // ston pa nyid la dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul dkun la snang // kun la de ltar rtog par byos// lhan grub pade gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la
282b8: byang chub snying po yod pa ltar/ / rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i// byang chub snying por thams cad 'dus// phyi nang ma lus thams cad kun// bdag gi dang du gnas pas na// bdag la bdag gis dbang bsgyur nas//

283a1: spyod yul thams cad smon mi dgos// che mchog rnam dag ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rig pa'i rgyal po rang gyur pas// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur ba ste// gong na med pa'i sa mnan pas// thams
283a2: cad kun gyi gtso bo yin/ / thams cad ma lus gnyis med pas// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba min// de bzhin nyid la dbang bskur bas// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig go/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i
283a3: dam tshig ni/ / phyi nang snod bcung bdag rnams la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ye nas gnas// chen po'i gzugs snang thams cad ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sgyu ma'i rtsal rnams 'dzin 'gyur ba'i//
283a4: de bzhin yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro// rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor te// thams cad kun nas 'khyil bar gnas// zad med gter chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// zag bcas gnod sbyin nor dang 'dra// sems can 'phel
283a5: 'grib zad 'gyur gyi/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni// zad med 'phel 'grib med pa yi// mang po spros pas 'phro mi 'gyur// nyung ngu bsdus pas sbom po min// zad med rin chen gter yin pas// thams cad
283a6: kun la khyab pa'o/ / rnam dag byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas rnam par dag pa la// rnam rtog rkyen gyis blo zur du// khams gsum 'khor ba'i btson rang ga nas// rang
283a7: rig sgrib med dag pa yis/ / mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba gnyis// rang bzhin med par don rtogs na// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par dag/ bzung 'dzin dril byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyin ci log tu rnam brtags na/
283a8: bdag dang bdag gir so sor snang // de la 'dzin pa gnyis zhugs nas// rang bzhin med bzhin so sor snang // yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// dngos po thams cad stong pa yi ni// dngos dang dngos nyid mig nas pa/

283b1: de rtogs sdug bsngal bral byed yin// yum 'gyur dbyings phyag ma'i dam tshig ni// 'byung ba lnga la rten 'gyur na// thams cad 'byung zhing ma lus gnas// skye 'khrud ma lus gzhi yang yin// thams cad kun
283b2: kyi chu yang yin/ / de bzhin shes rab rnam gsum gyis// le lo med pa'i brtson pa 'bod// de bzhin dbyings nyid rtogs gyur na// bla med byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas// chos la skyon med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//
283b3: bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun// rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyi ga gang // rang bzhin ye shes de bzhin no// 'bras bu rnam par dag pa yin// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa//
283b4: snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// sems can don byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// byang chub sems su don gcig pas// rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung // thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa spyod// nyon mongs
283b5: lam nas 'gro bar byed/ / nyon mongs khams gsum gnas pa yang // phyin ci log nyid snang ba yin// der rtogs mtho ris thar pa'o// rtogs nas don 'dzin ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad lhun gyis
283b6: grub pa dang / / sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa// gnyi ga rang rig nyid du 'dus// de nyid yang dag yin par bshad// sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni// yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin// ming tshig sgra la mi rten par/ khru
283b7: gting du go bar bya/ / sems la gnas bcas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems nyid las ni gzhan na med// sems dang chos su dbyer med pas// byang chub lam de ring ba min//
283b8: gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// rtog med rang rig kho na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas// brjod med spros med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'o// sna tshogs ji snyed

284a1: brdud pa yang / / mama'amacan byung ma/ gas pa// brdzun pa nga badzud pa dang // bsod rnams canapas pastangs bya'o// sungs rgyas nyid nyi dgas 'o// shugs 'dus ga
284a2: gnas/ / de nyid dbyings las spros pa med// mi 'gyur da rdzogs shes bya ba'i dmachog ni// nam dag sku gsung sprul ba dang // che mchog sa tshogs bstan pa yang // byang chubasems la snang 'gyur te// snang ba nyi
284a3: nadabyangs su 'dra/ / byin ci log g.yo bas ma yas kyis// khams gsum gnas dang lam lngar 'khor// de nyid log togs sna tshogs snang// de las ma gtogs gang yang med// ye nas pa bcas zhes bya
284a4: ba 'dam tshig na/ / bla med byang chub smon mi dgos// 'gro lnga ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas byang chub snying por gnas// de bzhin dbyings kyis kun tu khyab// ji lta ba yi dang gnas la// de ltar rtogs pa'i
284a5: tho'ajug pas/ / gnyis su med par rtogs 'gyur na// su zhig bcos shing su yi rtogs// rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes bya ba dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang rig yenas dag pa yi/
284a6: sus kyang ma bcos dang gis gsal// ma chags pad ma 'dra ba yi// ye shes can gyi spyod yul de// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de// skyes bu bo rtsal rab kyis rtogs// zas
284a7: cad dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i da ma tshig ni/ / mi zad yon tan gter 'gyur ba// zang pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod// bdag dang bdag gi med pa yi// shin tu zab pa'i blo las byung // chos dbyings zab mo'i don
284a8: rtogs na/ / sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// rang rig ye shes don rtogs na// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// byang chub sdom byed ces pa'i dam tshig ni// bzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes kyis// chags med dpang

284b1: la mnyam bzhag na/ / thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi zhing // nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur// chos kyi rang bzhin ji lta bur// bdag gis yang dag rdzogs byas te// theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ thams
284b2: cad mnyam pa'i dbyings su dgod/ / phyogs dus gnyis med ces bya ba dam tshig ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyang // rtogs pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang // snang ba nyid na dbyer med de// mtha' dang dbus
284b3: med zlum po yi/ / de bzhin rang gis rig pa yang // mtha' dang dbus med du ma min// gang du mi 'gro kun du khyab// kun la bde sbyin mi gnas pa'o// thams cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams
284b4: so sor rtogs byas shing / / thams cad gnyis med dbyings shes na// mi zad par ldan rgyan thob ste// kun tu zad med rin chen gter// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste// /
284b5: rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid// mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan// thabs nyid shes rab ces bya ba 'dam tshig ni// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin te// thabs la thabs ni rnam par
284b6: sbyor/ / sbyor dang sbyor ba gnyi ga med// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang // snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// de nyid shes rab yin par bshad// rtag tu thabs nyid mi dmigs pa'o// shes rab nyid la thabs su sbyor ba'i
284b7: zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ / de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las// rol pa sna tshogs cir yang 'byung // 'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med// med pa nyid ni sna tshogs snang // thabs dang shes rab dbyings las byung // mnyan
284b8: bsams bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis/ / shes rab thabs su don rtogs byos// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur na// gnyis med

285a1: byang chub sems 'bros na/ / kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa po// de yis ma byas gang yang min// bdog dbyibs rigs gang yang min// shin tu btas dga' su mi rig/ bdag gis bdag kyang mi mthong na/ na
285a2: gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur/ / thams cad sbyor byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye nas lha dang lha mo yin// dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang // dbang po yul du sbyor ba'o// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba lnga
285a3: nyid yum du sbyong / / dus bzhi'i lha mo nyid du sbyor// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo'o// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba kun// mnyam pa'i dbyings dang rig par sbyor// yang dag shes rab dbyings ma la// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor
285a4: kun bkod la/ / bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar bsgoms te// gnyis su med par ldan par bya// rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas// byang chub pad ma shin tu spro// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dang // 'gro ba mang po de thob nas// slar yang
285a5: gnyis med dbyings su bstim/ / thim 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar// bder gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs// phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag rdzogs// bsod nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs// thams
285a6: cad dbyings su 'byor pas na/ / ngan 'gro mi ltung yang dag 'grub// 'di ni bsgral ba chen po yin// sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba yin// sbyor ba nyid nam lus bsgral// thams cad ma lus par bsgral byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//
285a7: phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// bdag nyid chen por rtogs pa yis// dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya// shin tu khro bo chen po yis// thabs kyis lha chen bsgral ba ltar// chos nyid rtog
285a8: pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ / gnyis su med par thabs kyis bsgral// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas// thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya// ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la/

285b1: gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs te// ye shes me chen bsgom byas na// thams cad ma lus bsreg par byed// dbyings su yang ni bstim byas te// de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis
285b2: brlabs/ / rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bskur// de ltar bsgral ba kun byas kyang // bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med// phung po lnga po bshig pa la// gshi gnas 'byung ba bag la zha// ma gshig na yang 'byung ba yin// rnab
285b3: shes med pas bsang byas na/ / gnas pa nyid na dngos po med// sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgra langs kyang // sus kyang mi zin song ba med// 'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral na// rnam rtog mtshan ma
285b4: thams cad kun/ / phyin ci log las bzlog byas te// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang // shin tu bsgoms pas dbang bskur te// byang chub zhing la dgod par bya// de tsam la ni bsgral zhes gdags// bsgral pa nyid na sbyor ba
285b5: yin/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas// byang chub gnas su bsgral bas na// gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin// thabs nyid shes rab shes rab nyid thabs te// gnyis su med pa nyid byang chub kyi sems so//
285b6: sbyor ba ni lha dang lha mor sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang // dbang po yul du sbyor ba dang // chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar sbyor ba dang // so so rtsa la sgyu ma tsam du yod pa yum du sbyor ba dang // dbang po yul dus lha dang lha mod
285b7: sbyor ba dang / / rtag chad mu bzhi khro bo khro mor sbyor ba dang // mngon sum du sbyor ba'o// sgrol ba ni thabs kyis sgrol ba dang / 'pho bas sgral ba dang / dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du bsgral ba dang / thams cad ma lus par dbyings su
285b8: dus gcig bsgral pa dang / thams cad thugs rje chen pos gnyis su med par bsgrol ba'o// 'di nyid dus gcig tu mdzad de/ ya chang ma gyur par bya'o// dngos grub mchog kyang der thob ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhi

286a1: gshegs pa nyid kyis bshad do/ / ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan na med// rang
286a2: bzhin rang gis bdag med pa/ / kun la thogs med spyad 'gyur yang // spyad dang spyod pa gnyi ga med// thams cad ye nas stong pa la// gang gis len cing gang la spyod// snang srid ma las thams cad la// thogs pa med pa'i
286a3: spyod 'gyur yang / / bcing bar mid 'gyur bsod rnams tshogs// chags med ye shes chen po yin// ma lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings// de ltar rang rig yin par bshad// gnyis su med par rtogs gyur na// blangs pa nyid na kun du
286a4: bzeng / / brdzun bu smra ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lu sa thams cad kun// yin pa dngos po yang ma yin// rang bzhin dang gis 'od gsal la// ming tsam tshig gi mtshan mod kyis// ming dang tshig la dang//
286a5: po med// ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis// nga dang bdag tu med pa la// so so mtshan ma dngos por bathor// 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod med de// chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam// ji snyed mang po brjod pa yang // rjod par byed/
286a6: dang brjod pa med// chos rnams thams cad brdzun du snang // brdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod cing // brdzun zhes bya ba btags pa tsam// thams cad brdzun gyi tshig yin no// rdo rje 'joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thog ma med
286a7: napa phyin ci log/ bdag dang bdag gi med pa la// rnam rtog mtshan ma so sor 'dzin// 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod ma yin// mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// bdag rtog bag chags
286a8: kun bcom nas/ / rdo rje dbyings su thim par bya// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rnams// gzhan gyis bcings te

286b1: 'khor ba min/ / 'dzin rtogs chags pa nyid kyis 'khor// blo chen rab du ldan pa yis// chos kyi don go mchog nyon la// 'khor ba spad med sangs rgyas zhing // thams cad ma lus chos nyid rtogs// rin chen 'byung ba
286b2: zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ / nor gyi mchog ni bkor bdun yin// 'dod pas btsal bar mi rnyed de// sku gsum thugs 'das mi dmigs pa'i// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// gnyis su med par 'byor byas na// nor bdun
286b3: chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ / mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs ldan// pad ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med// pad ma'angam
286b4: nas skyes pa 'dra/ / ji ltar snang ba mtha' yas kun// bdag las ku na cig kyang med// bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas// nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub zhing // don rnams bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rdo rje rigs kyi si thams cad
286b5: bcom/ / rin chen rigs kyis yon tan 'byin// pad ma rigs kyis chags mad 'gyur// sku gsum thugs dang ye shes lnga// thams cad don rnams rdzogs par byas// bzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs te// mnyam pa'i
286b6: dbyings la sems kyis lha/ / skye 'chi med pa lhun gyis grub// sku gsum thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rmad 'byung kun grags pa// gzhan na yod 'od ma yin te// rang 'byung ye shes gnas med yin//
286b7: mthong ba'i tshul gyis gzugs snang dang // bla med byang chub skur snang ba// me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog dbyings su snang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsur rnams ni// sgra dang ni ming tshig/
286b8: kun las 'das// brjod med rang bzhin kun tu go/ nyon mongs med cing bla med sku// ma brjod stong gsum grags pa yi// gsung brjod bsam gyis mi khyab pa// brjod pa nyid na stong gsum med// de nyid sna tshogs

287a1: brjod pa'o/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags pa// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// mtha' dang dbus kyang rtag tu med// de nyid sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// sus
287a2: kyang ma bcos ma byas pa/ / bdag gi bdag kyang dmigs mi 'gyur// dngos med kun la dbang bskung ba// sku gsung yang dag ldan 'gyur na// yon tan nam mkha'i tha dad mnyam// mi 'gyur sangs rgyas zhing du bub// spyod yul ma
287a3: lus thams cad la/ / ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung // mi zad pa'i gter chen 'grub// gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yi// po 'di'i bkor ni rin po che// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// bla byed med par rnam bzhi mdzad// mdzad
287a4: dang mdzad par bya ba med/ / ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos// sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod// spyod med ngang gi dkyil 'khor la// chags med tshul du rnam par rol// bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul// bzung 'dzin
287a5: bral ba'i ye shes ni/ / rtsa ba lnga zhes brjod mod kyis// brjod pa nyid na yod med de// mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs snang // de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid yin// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// de ni rig pa rang dbang 'gyur// bsam gyis mi
287a6: khyab kun tu khyab/ / nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba dmatshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyis kun du khyab// snod bca ma lus thams cad la// snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// nam mkha' bzung du med pa
287a7: ltar/ / snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// brten byengs chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la// sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i// skye 'khrungs
287a8: ma lus thams cad 'byung / / thams cad kun gyi gnas brten te// de bzhin theg chen bla med la// byang chub sangs rgyas kun kyang gnas// theg pa mthon dman thams cad 'byung // thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus// sreg byed/

287b1: ye shes me zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bdag med ye shes rang rig gis// dngos dang dngos med pag chags bsregs// rang dang spyi'i chos rnams dang // sems kyi phrag dog thams cad kun// dngos po med par rtogs byas na// 'khor
287b2: bam spangs rnam par dag/ mya ngan mi 'dab ye nas gnas// 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min// rtogs pa thams cad ye nas tshogs// thams cad 'khru byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad ni// sgrib gnyis
287b3: dag gis 'khor bar 'gyur/ / mnyan bsams bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis// bdag med gnyis ni rtogs byas na// pha rol phyin rdzogs sa bcu bsgrubs// sa gsum yang dag rdzogs byas te// mnyam pa'i zhing la thams
287b4: cad 'god/ / khrus kyis mchog ni 'di yin no// g.yeng byed chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sems can ye nas dag pa la// bdag 'dzin rdul rnyed g.yogs par 'gyur// sems dang rdul rnams med rtogs pas// ye shes
287b5: rlung gis bag chags gtor / / chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra// de la bzung du med pa ltar// kun la de ltar 'byor bar gyis// ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rang
287b6: rig phyin cim log pa'i/ / bzung 'dzin gnyis med rtogs pa yis// thams cad mnyam pa'i dang 'gyur na// thams cad ma lus bdag yin pas// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'gru ba// rje
287b7: ltar spyod kyang bsod nams tshogs/ / mnyam rig ye shes chen po yin// chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// snang ba nyid na 'ja' tshon bzhin// rang bzhin
287b8: med par kun tu snang / / de nyid chos sku yin par bshad// cis kyang ma gos ma spangs pa'o// so sor snang zhing 'thun pa'i gzugs// bdag dang bdag tu ma brtags pa// de lta bu'i dad du snang // chos rnams sgra ltar shes par bya ba'i/

288a1: dam tshig ni// sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa yang // dngos po med las dngos po sgra// brjod dang sgra'i dngos po min// chos rnams sgra ltar shes par byos// thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba// tshig gis mtshon las gung
288a2: na med/ / sgra nyid don gyis dngos po min// don nyid sgra las gung na med// chos rnams dri'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams thams cad dngos med par// sna tshogs 'byung zhing rnam par 'phro// de bzhin dri yi
288a3: po yang / yod pa ma yin kun tu mnam// the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis// chos kun de ltar shes par gyis// dri yis rab du tshim 'gyur yang // dri dang dngos po gnyis su med// dngos grub thams cad de ltar ro// chos thams
288a4: cad ro ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ / chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// bzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // de bzhin dbang po dngos med dang // rdzas kyi dngos po med pa yi// rnam shes dbang po yul tshogs na// ro yi
288a5: dbang po thams cad 'grub/ / ro dang ro ru rtogs pa yang // rang bzhin med pa skad cig ma// chos thams cad reg bya ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gzugs rnams dbu brdos pa 'dra// tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin// mtshan 'dzin
288a6: smig rgyu bzhin du gnas/ / rnam shes sgyu mas dbang bsgyur na// mtshan ma sna tshogs 'byung bar nges// bde ba'i ro mchog kun kyang myong // de nyid bsod nams tshegs chen te// bde ba chags med ye shes yin// reg gi
288a7: dngos grub de ltar ro/ / 'dus byas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'dim tshig ni// yang dag nyid la gnas bcas na// phyi nang snod bcung rnam par dag/ rigs pa snang ba de bzhin gshegs// sprul pa dzin pa gram kyi gyis ga
288a8: ni mtshan ma dngos po med/ / gcig la lnga lngar bshig pa dang // thams cad nam mkha'i dang du gnas// nam mkha' de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'dus byas nyid kyi dngos grub bo// 'dus byas kun tu 'byung bya zhes pa pa dam tshig ni//

288b1: gshegs sku sgra mar snang ba dang // log rtogs sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong // rigs dang rgyud du rtag tu med// rigs dang kha dog dbyings med pas// phyi nang snong bcud rnam par snang // snang ba nyid na
288b2: chos kyi sku/ / car yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grug// kun 'byung dngos grub de ltar ro// glang po brjid gnon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad kun// rnam rtog 'du byed mang pos g.yengs// ji ltar
288b3: bus pa shed ma bye/ / bya byed mang pos g.yengs par gnas// bya byed mang pos bdag med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas// 'du byed sna tshogs mi g.yo brtan// dbang
288b4: lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ / chos rnams thams cad skye med pas// shin tu brtan pa dbang thob 'gyur// rang rig ye shes 'od gsal bas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob// chos rnams thams
288b5: cad dbyer med pas/ / kun la spyod pa'i dbang thob ste// spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul// kun kyang rang bzhin ye nas zlum// thams cad rgyas 'debs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og pa
288b6: rang bzhin chen pos kun tu khyab/ / rang byung de nyid dngos med par// kun gyi phyag rgya sgra yin no// chos dbyings de nyid zab pa yi// bdag la gnas shing brtag dka' ba'o// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// ye nas
288b7: bde gnas zhing du'o/ / chos rnams dbyer med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye nas dbyings su ro gcig pas// de la nga ra dang bdag ma rtogs// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo tsam med// thams cad bder
288b8: gshegs snying po pas/ / rkyen gyis rdul gyis ga la 'go/ shes rab mchog gis de ltar rtogs// ma lus kun 'dus dbyings shes byos// thams cad 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// shes rab blo rtsal ldan pa yis// /

289a1: brtag rtogs mtshan ma kun bshig nas// mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya ru// thams cad 'dus par yang dag rtogs// rtog pa nyid kyang dngos med la// de nyid sna tshogs bar ba yi// snang ba nyid na byed pa med// de nyid
289a2: 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya yin/ / g.yung drung tshe 'phel zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas// gang du 'gro zhing gang du ste// 'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med// dngos med de la su zhig gsod// gang zhig
289a3: gnyis su 'dzin pa la/ / skye dang 'chi ba de la yod// ye shes can gyi brtags pa na// skye 'jig nyid na dngos po med// thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// mchog gsum rdzogs pa man chad nas// ngan song garla
289a4: rnams yan chad du/ / yang dag par ni dbyer med de// gang yang spang bar bya ba min// theg pa mthon dman bsam yas pa// don du mi 'gyur yod ma gsungs// ngan song gnas rnams thams cad kun// bla med byang chub rgyu yod pa'o//
289a5: thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad kun du bzang po yi// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// thogs pa med par spyad byas te// bsod nams tshogs chen yin par brtag/ de bzhin gshegs pa
289a6: lngar yang brtag/ gzhan yang stong khams thams cad ni// shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams// rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyod// thams cad mi chud pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs dus mnyam pa'i dkyil
289a7: 'khor du/ / rdo rje rigs mchog ma rtogs par// theg pa dman dang lta ba dman// des ni theg mchog rtogs mi 'gyur// mi mnyam pa'i don nyid kun khyab kyang // nyon mongs sdug bsngal nyid kyis bsgribs// de yis yang
289a8: dag nyid mi mthong / / ma mthong ba la mi chud bya// thams cad bsrung du med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la// bsgrub cing bsrung bar bya ba med// dge dang mi dge gnyi ga med// nyon mongs spangs

289b1: shing byang bsgrub med/ / de bzhin nyid kyi glong gyur na// bde dang mi bde dbyer med de// ye nas dag mnyam nyid du gnas// de la bsrung bya rdul tsam med// thams cad bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sems can
289b2: khams gsum 'khor ba yi/ / thog ma med nas 'khor ba yi// phyin ci log la 'ardol tog spyod// bzung 'dzin don la shin tu chags// des na 'khor bar rtag tu 'phyan// de bas rang sems rtogs byas te// le lo med par
289b3: yongs spangs te/ / dmed bdag med mnyam par bsrung // thams cad 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rdo rje sems dpa'as bkas bcad pa// sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun// don bzhin du ni ma snangs
289b4: yak+Sha khro bo me dpal gyis/ / snying nas drangs te khrag 'thungs nas// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de yi sdug bsngal bzod brlag chad// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// dam rdzas so sor spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//
289b5: rigs lnga so sor dbye ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa' glang po'i sha/ rin po che ni rta'i sha/ pad ma rigs ni a ri ka'i sha/ don yod namakha' lding gi sha/ bder gshegs rigs ni sha chen no// dbye ba 'am yang na mi dbye bar// des
289b6: par dang du blang ba'o/ / yang na thams cad gcig tu bsdu// yang na mtshan nyid med par rtag/ ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ni// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// ye nas rang bzhin gsal ba la// thams
289b7: cad kun la yod bar bshad/ / ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bla na med pa'i mchog yin te// rdo rje rigs mchog thams cad kyi// bar ma chad par rtag tu bslab// byang chub shing dung skye bar 'gyur// bla med
289b8: byang chub mchog kyang grub/ / skye 'chi med pa'i bde 'grub ste// sems la dbang yang thob par 'gyur// spyod yul thams cad smon na shes// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa'i le'u

290a1: ste bdud bcu rtsa drug pa'o/ / // gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di spangs na// nyon mongs ngan song gnas sus// byang chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// bla med 'gro ba'i rgyu yang chad// rigs chad nyid du
290a2: bar 'gyur/ / rdo rjes pas dpa' ba sgrub 'dod pas// rtag tu mnyam pa'i don rtogs la// spya ni 'ja' tshon tshul 'dra bar// sdang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// 'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par// gsal lang
290a3: bzhin med par bsgom/ / lha yi sku rnams gsal bsgoms na// bsod nams tshogs tshan thob par 'gyur// de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na// ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pas ni u0f7f
