290a4: tu bsgom/ / yi dam lha de spangs byas na// ngan song mi pade rtag tu myong // sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad pa'i don ni// sngags dang phyag rgya bar mi bcad// rnal 'byor 'grub pa'i lam yang yin// mi gtong sdo ma zhing
290a5: 'dren pa'ang yin/ / don mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te// rtag tu mnyam gzhag phyag rgya yin// dus gsum gting 'byin sngags yin te// yang dag don chen klung 'dod pas// dus mtshams med par phyag rgya
290a6: sngags/ / yid brtan drag tu bzlas brjod bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// phyag rgya bskyod dang yi ge oM// rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa// bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa po// yon tan zad med sbyin
290a7: pa yin/ / byang chub lam che 'dren mdzad pa// chags med zhing du 'god pa yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal brtsad gcod cing // 'khor ba'i lam rnams spangs par byad// ma rig mun sel sgron ma yin// long ba
290a8: rnams kyi dmigs bu mkhan/ / de la rtag tu mchod byas na// sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring // rdo rje mched dang lum dral gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa// rdo rje rigs kyi sman yin te// thog ma med nas las 'an

290b1: pas/ / lta spyod 'thun pas 'dir skyes te// gcig la gcig ni mig dang 'dra// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// dam tshig ngan sems dbye byas // dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur// de bas dam tshig
290b2: 'da' mi byed/ / gsang ba'i dam tshigA bstan pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// sring gsum pa lus kun la khyab// phyin ci log gis rab bsgribs nas// dbul po gtar dang gyad kyi nor bu
290b3: 'dra/ de bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'di// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis// chos la ston yod ma yin te// sems can don phyir shin tu gsar // theg pa dman dang phyin ci ldog/ de la gsang don bstan
290b4: brang na/ / rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par// 'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la// shin tu nges pa'i don bzung nas// gsang don de nyid log par khrid// martogs de nyid dmyal bar 'khor// de bas shin tu gas
290b5: bar bya/ / thugs rje chen po dang ldan papa// thar lam kun la mkhas par bya// shes rab mchog dang ldan pas na// sems can snod kyi rim pa bzhin// theg pa mthon dman don nyid ni// so sor mtsham par bstan
290b6: dgos so/ / dang du blang dang mi spang ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spyad// chags pa med par gyur pa dang // dngos gru ba ya mtshan chen po ni// dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung // mtshogs pa zhes spang
290b7: byungang / / yi dgas srin po'i nang du skye// yang ni dam tshig 'di lta bu// ji ltar spyad kyang sdom pa mi 'da' ste// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyisu 'gyur// 'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa na// mnyam pa de yi dbyangs
290b8: raganas/ / shes rab mchog gis tog tu gyis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bye lam na mkha' gcod bzhin gyis// 'dzin chags ma lus thams cad kun// mkha' la rlung chen 'phro ba bzhin/

291a1: yid kyi rtog chags ma lus pa// tshul nya chen 'phyo ba ltar// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar ltos// de ltar rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// tshig tsam ma yin blo gting spos// rdo rje theg mchog kha 'a ches la/ @#
291a2: pa'i don nyid mi shes par/ / gsang sngags dam tshig mnyam zer zhing // thugs thub dag gis spad byas pa// dmyal khams dag tu brgyud par 'gyur// mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// mnyam dang rtogs pa gang yang med//
291a3: dzal mi gnas yul la spyod// spyod par byed dang spyod pa med// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni// rdo rje rigs 'dzin skye ba na// 'jig med kun tu bzang por sbyor// yon tan mi zad gnas pa yin// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi
291a4: shes shing / / kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la// chos dang gang zag gnyis med na// 'di ni byang chub sa pa yin// las dang nyon mongs thams cad la// mnyam pa'i don tu mi shes shing // rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yod 'dzin na//
291a5: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bden bzhi'i dngos po yod lta zhing // spang dang mi spong byed 'gyur ba// 'di ni nyan thos sa ba yin// dge bcu dag la gtsor len cing // dge dang mi
291a6: dge mi mnyam pas/ / lha dang mi'i skye gnas te// 'dod khams dag tu 'khor ba'i sa// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi rtogs shing // tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi// rim pa so sor bdag 'dzin cing // gzugs tshogs
291a7: dag la bdag tu rtogs/ / 'di ni tshangs gnas rim par sa// mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs par// ming bzhi med par ma shes te// skye mched bzhi la gnas 'gyur bas// srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ru s+ye// thams cad
291a8: mnyam par ma shes na/ / ma lus kun la zhe sdang zhing // snying rje yang dag med 'gyur na// 'di ni mi zad chen po yi// dmyal khams bcu drug gnas pa yin// chags med dngos po mi shes nas// thams cad kun la 'dod

291b1: chags shing / / lus kyis bsgribs dang zas kyis bsgrib// yi dgas chen po'i gnas su skye// nga dang bdag med mi shes shing // chos rnams kun la chongs byas pas// shes rab mi gsal don med pas// dge sdig gnyis
291b2: kyi don ma rtogs/ / 'di ni byol song gnas su skye// shin tu nga rgyal cher skyed cing // thams cad bdag gir bzung bas na// kun dang rtsod pa'i las byed pa// lha ma yin gyi gnas su ste// theg mchog mtho dman thams cad dang //
291b3: 'jig rten lta ba thams cad kun// ye shes chen pos rab brtags na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// rang bzhin dbyings las nyams pa med// shes rab chen po mig ldan pas// mtho dman gnas dang lam drug dang //
291b4: rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// so sor de bzhin 'khor bar gzigs// sngags mchog bla na med pas ni// mtshan ma kun dang mi brtag par// mtshan ma kun dang thams cad med// kun dang mnyam pa nyid yin pas//
291b5: 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor lta ba brjod mi bya// spyi ni log rtog bsam yas pa// ye nas yod pa ma yin te// so so'i rnam rtog bag chags kyis// bzung 'dzin dra bas bsgribs 'gyur te// ci yang
291b6: med la cir yang snang / / snang ba nyid la rang bzhin med// de ltar rtogs na bder 'gro'i gnas// rdo rje can gyis de ltar rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i lta spyod ni// cir yang spyod kyang rang bzhin med// mkha' la bya chen lding
291b7: babazhin/ / chu la skyer chen 'phyo ba bzhin// mkha' la rlung chen 'gro ba bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar lta// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod// bde ba'i ro mchog myong bar 'gyur// de
291b8: la su zhig chags par byed/ / spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin// bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs// de lta bu'i ngang du spyod// 'di ni spyod pa brlabs chen yin// lha spyod ya mar ma 'gyur bar/

292a1: sngags 'chang rnams kyis rtag tu sbyar// kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang // spyod pa dag dang yod mi 'thun// kha cig spyod pa rdzogs byed kyang // mnyam pa'i lta ba yod mi shes// kha cig la spyod gnyi ga med// yang dag
292a2: skyes mchog dam pa yis/ / don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pas// yang dag nyid du rab tu rtogs// bla med theg chen dang gnas ni// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de// kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la// dag dang ma dag gnyi gang 'dzin// thabs
292a3: kyi theg pa chen po ni/ / rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob tu'ang dbyer med de// lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo// thabs kyi lha spyod chen po ni// bla med theg pa las 'phags pa// don dam tu ni nor bdun no// kun rdzob du ni mnyam
292a4: rdzogs so/ / mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos bzhin// thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po ston// thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag/ thams cad dag ces bya ba'i yang // dngos po gsal dag ma yin te// snang spyod gnyis na rnam par dag/
292a5: dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las// rigs lnga dag tu bstan pa ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rigs chen dag tu zad par 'dus// ma lus chos kun dbyer mi dmigs// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rigs
292a6: ngan 'joms pas rdo rje yin/ / me dmigs dbyings nas kun 'byung ba// yon tan chen po gnas yin te// zhing khams mi zad gnas kyang yin// 'di ni rin chen rigs su gsungs// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas/
292a7: chags dang chags par bya ba med// de bzhin nyid du gcig pa ste// nyes pas mi gos pad ma bzhin// thams cad ma lus dbyings 'dus pas// 'di la bya ba rdul tsam med// ma byas bzhin du don grub pa// skyon yod byang chub
292a8: nyid du sbyar/ / 'di ni las rnams grub pa yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// mtha' dang dbus med du mar bral// gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid// dbyer med pa'i tshul rtogs te// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

292b1: rig pa/ / sngang srid ma lus thams cad la// gsal zhing dro ba'i gnas byed cing // mtshan ma bag chags sreg byed pa// 'di ni mi'i rigs su bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// dngos por snang lagazung du med/
292b2: bskyed na thams cad kun smra ste// 'di ni rlung chen yin par bshad// dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las// 'byung ba lnga rnams bshad pa ni// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad kun gyi mdzod skyed yin// chos
292b3: rnams ma lus thams cad la/ / sra zhing rten pa'i gnas yod pas// dngos po med pa'i tshul rtogs te// 'di nis chen yin par bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nam mkha' chen po yis// phyi dang nang gi go 'byed
292b4: pa'o/ / thams cad gsal ba'i ngang nyid de// 'byung ba bzhi po thams cad kyang // thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du thim// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'ab// nyon mongs lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig
292b5: ni/ / ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur// phyin ci log ni yang dag ste// nyon mongs lnga po de bzhin gshegs// dngos med togs na byang chub lam// ma rtogs ngan song gsum du 'gro/ de bas thos bsams bsgoms pa yis// yang
292b6: dag don nyid rtogs byas te/ / thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du sbyor// 'dod chags rang bzhin med pas na// yang dag don la chags byed de// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// ma chags pa la chags pa dang // shin tu chags//
292b7: mchog chen po yin// rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'byung 'gyur te// snang ba mtha' yas zhing dag yin// thams cad padam brdzus skyes yin// rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa ra s+ye// zhe sdang chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyin ci log la zhe
292b8: sdang zhing / / zhe sdang dngos po med shes na// sdang dang mi sdang mnyam shes te// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med de// de ltar ma rtogs kun la snang //

293a1: de bzhin pal gyis mnyam mi shes// des ni zhe sdang nyid du mthong // yang dag rtogs pas rab rtabs na// zhe sdang thugs rje chen po yin// gti mug rmongs pa zhes brjod pas// chos rnams ma lus
293a2: thams cad kun/ / don dam du ni dbyer med la// kun rdzob sgyum mig gsor tshul// snang ba nyid na dngas med pas// de la su zhig bdag tu 'dzin// thams cad dbyer med mi dmigs pa// shes rab can gyi gti mug yin//
293a3: de rtogs de bzhin gshegs pa'o// nga rgyal mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mnyam pa nyid la gnas bcas nas// phyin ci log dang theg dman la// shin tu nga rgyal chen por snang // nga rgyal zhi ba so so min// rang bzhin med pas
293a4: dbyings su 'dus/ / 'di ni yon tan 'byung gnas yin// de bzhin dag par shes par byos// phrag dog mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa ste// 'dzin nyid dngos po yod ma yin// mnyam mi shes la phrag dog
293a5: cing / / thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'dus// mi mnyam mal shin tu sdom// de bas phrag dog chen po yin// phyin ci log tu bdag tu bcings// bzung dang 'dzin pas shin tu dog/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// dog
293a6: yangs med de thams cad mnyam/ / de nyid shes pas las rab 'grub// phung po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phung po lnga por snang ba yang // kun rdzob bya ba sna tshogs byed// bde ba'i yul dang mi bde'i yul// so so'i ro rnams
293a7: myong byed cing / / lnga po'i mtshan nyid bshig byas nas// so so'i mtshan nyid dngos po med// gang gis de la dngos bzung na// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni/ snang ba nyid ni rang bzhin med//
293a8: snang med de nyid sna tshogs ston// snang dang mi snang gnyis su med// de rtogs rnam par thar pa'i gnas// gzugs nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// tsher ba'i mtshan nyid brjed pa ni// kun la rnam gsum 'byung mod kyi//

293b1: bde dang mi bde dngos po med// / ma yin lung ma bstan// sna tshogs tsher ba 'byung 'gyur yang // tsher dang 'byung ba gnyis stong // stong nyid dngos po yod pa yin// de rtogs chos kyi go dgos yin// 'du shes mtshan nyid
293b2: bshad pa ni/ / gsum tshogs mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin// so so mtshan nyid bshig pa na// dngos po med de de bzhin nyid// dngos po de ni sna tshogs pa// bya byed med par kun tu 'jug/ khams gsum ma lum thams cad la/
293b3: mtshan ma che chung bsam mi khyab// khyab med dngos po yod ma yin// de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan// 'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar gnas// ba brgyad pa'i grangs 'gyur te// lnga bcu rtsa gcig kun la'apho// der rtogs
293b4: ba yod ma yin/ / med bzhin log g.yo rnam par 'byung // de la dngos por 'dzin pa ni// rtag tu nyon mongs g.yengs gyur nas// khams gsum btson kun tu 'khor// yang dag don phyir rig pas ni// 'phro ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin
293b5: de/ / de la rnam rig 'byung ba ni// dngos po med de skad cig ma// ye shes dbyings la rol pa mdzad// sprul pa'i tshogs chen yin par bshad// kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes te// de yi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni// kha dog
293b6: dbyibs dang rig rgyun min/ / gang yang ma yin nyid mi dmigs// 'di ni kun la dbang sgyur te// mtho ris 'gro 'am ngan song 'gro// togs dang ma rtogs khyad par ro// bzhi po mnyam pa'i dang shes na// 'din ye shes chen//
293b7: po yin// kha dog lnga yi mtshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang // rang gi nam tog bsgribs byas te// ye shes lnga ma don ma mthong // ma mthong mongs pa thams cad la/
293b8: ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // ljang khu la sogs nag por bstan// chos rnams bdag med rtogs byas nas// byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir// shin tu mdog ni dka

294a1: bstan pa/ / de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// pad mar gzhes brjod de// chags dang chags par bya ba med// chags med phyir yang dmar ba'o// yon tan gang chen
294a2: zad mi shes/ / thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// de bzhin nyid dbyings ma lus la// zad med rin chen gter 'gyur te// mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu bstan// chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la// thugs rje chen po'i byin
294a3: brlabs kyis/ / dbyings su yang dag bsdu dgos pas// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// kun tu las ni ljang gu'i mdog/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las// cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su med// kha dog nag po
294a4: dngos po la/ / mtshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med// de bzhin kun la shes par byos// phyogs lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin du// dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la// ye shes rtogs
294a5: pa'i don bya phyir/ / phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya// sems can ma rig mdongs pa la// nyon mongs ma rig gsal bya'i phyir// ye shes sgron ma 'od 'bar bas// ma rig mun pa sel bar
294a6: byed/ / de phyir de la shar zhes bya// sems can ma lus thams cad la// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi gnas shing // ma rig mun pa nub gyur pas// de la nub kyi phyogs zhes bya// sems can kun
294a7: gyi nyon mongs kun/ / ye shes chen po bdag med pas// sdug bsngal rab tu byang byas nas// de la byang gi phyogs shes brjod// de ltar ma lus thams cad la// thugs rje shar dang sgrib pa nub// rnam
294a8: rtog mtshan nyid byang gyur na/ / de'i yon tan chen po rdzogs// de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun// rang bzhin nyid kyis dbyings su 'dus// phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid du zlum pa'i

294b1: tshul/ / phyogs rnams kun la de ltar lha// ma rig phyin ci log rnams kyi// phyogs rnams so sor bzung 'gyur na// rtag tu nyon mongs 'khor bar 'gyur// dbang po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig
294b2: no/ / yul lnga dag la dbang byed cing // phyin ci log ni dngos por 'dzin// dngos por bzung bas khams gsum 'khor// gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la// snang zhing dngos po med pa dang /
294b3: ljang lha mo dadangos por brtag/ bdag dang lha nyid gnyis pa'o// sgra rnams sna tshogs grags pa yang // sgra nyid dngos po med par shes// sku brjod ma lus thams cad ni// chos kyi sgra chen
294b4: sna tshogs yin/ / dri'i dngos por snang ba yang // dri nyid rang bzhin gang yang med// dri snom chos kyi dri yin te// shes rab chen pos de ltar rtogs// ro yi dngos po snang ba yang /
294b5: ro yi rang bzhin yod ma yin// ro bro de bzhin nyid kyi ro// bde ba de yis tshim par byed// reg bya sna tshogs snang ba yang // reg bya'i dngos po yod med de// reg byar
294b6: snang ba longs spyod yin/ / bde ba chen po chos kyi sku// mi shes phyin ci log rnams kyis// dbang po yul la chags 'gyur na// rtag tu 'dod dang mi bral zhing // ngan song gsum
294b7: dang mi khom brgyad/ / rtsa ba sog ma'i me bzhin du// khams gsum dag tu 'khor bar 'gyur// de bas ye shes chags med rtogs// byas la mi sogs bsod nams byos//
294b8: kun la spyod cing mi gos pas// ye shes chen po rtag tu bsgoms// mnyam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa dang // kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang /

295a1: don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dbyer med par mnyam pa dang / chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa dang // rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o// de la don
295a2: dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa ni/ / chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i mtha'// yang dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings// mtshan nyid med cing dmigs su med/
295a3: gzung du med cing smon pa med// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa yin// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// kun rdzob sgyu ma mnyam pa dang // 'dus byas dngos po
295a4: sna tshogs ni/ / sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang // 'phral gyi bya ba kun kyang byed// rtog pa kun gyi mtshan ma snang // 'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te/ bya byed snang zhing dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du
295a5: thams cad gnas/ / thams cad snang la rang bzhin med// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// bzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // yod dang med pa gnyis ga min//
295a6: don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang / snang ba nyid ni dngos po med// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs te// de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// 'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs
295a7: pa lngar mnyam pa ni/ / sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las// ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gzhi rtsa yod pa ma yin te// rang bzhin rang gis de ltar 'byung // so so'i rigs tshogs snang
295a8: ba ni/ / thabs chen dag tu rtag tu mnyam// mtshan nyid so sor gnas pa ni// shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam// rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ni// rnam rtog kun bzhi ma yin pa/

295b1: rang bzhin med pa don gyi bzhi// 'don chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing // kun kyang dbyer med pa yin pas// thams cad me long lta bu'i
295b2: tshwal/ / tha ma ca dkun la yung rtog cing // chog dang brtag par bya ba med// dus gsum kun tu mi dmigs pa// 'di na mnyam nyid ye shes yin// log togs dbang po'i spyod yul spangs// dbang po yul rnams dngos med par
295b3: mas cad dbyer me de bzhin nyid/ / sa sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin// mnyam pa rnam lnga de ltar btags// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang // thabs cheran ldan
295b4: gyis grub par rtags/ / 'di ni yang dag rtogs pa yin// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// ye shes
295b5: bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul/ / yang na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rigs bzhi'i lha dang lha mo dang // 'khor gyi khro bo khro mo dang // yang na 'das pa'i dkyil nyid de// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor yin no//
295b6: tshogs kyis mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing // byang chub sems dang ma chags pa'i// gnyis su med par thim gyur na// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ldan// 'dod yon
295b7: lnga po thams cad dang / / sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // gzugs mdzes lha dang lha mor brtags// thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni// chos kyi sgra chen yin pa dang // ngan
295b8: sor sbyong zhing thar lam ston/ / stong gsum grags pa'i sgra chen dang // thams cad 'jal ba'i sgra yang yin// bde ba tshim byed bsod nams te// brjod med mi gnas ye shes yin// 'di ni tshigs med pad ma'i gsung //

296a1: chos nyid dngos po med pa la// dri yis mchog tu tshim byed pa// bsod nams tshogs chen yin par bshad// chags med ye shes tshul yin te// de bzhin dri yis mnyes mched na// rig 'dzinas rnams sku
296a2: bar 'gyur/ / ngan song gsum du chos kyi dri// kun du bde nas thob par byed// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus la// bde ba'i ro yis mchod par 'gyur// tshim byed bsod nams tshogs chen 'gyur// dngos por
296a3: mi 'dzin bsod nams tshogs/ / de lta bu yi ro mchog gis// thams cad kun la tshim par 'gyur// yi dgas gnas su longs spyod ldan// dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod pa yin// bde ba chen po rdzogs pa'o// rnal
296a4: 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ / rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa dang // sbyor mchod dag gis longs spyod na// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub 'gyur// bde chen dkyil 'khor 'bar 'gyur nas// sdig pa'i mun nag
296a5: sel bar byed/ / dpung gi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i// mthu chen dag kyang 'grub par byed// tshogs kyi phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// kun la thogs pa med par spyad// thams cad ma lus
296a6: 'dul bar byed/ / mi mthun phyogs nas dbang du byed// yon tan chen po 'phel bar byed// khro bo gtum pa'ang zhi bar byed// thams cad kun la spyad bde ba// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// dbyings su bsdus pas/
296a7: dkyil yin te// 'phro 'du mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni// de lta ba yi tshul du gnas// 'khor ba'i phra men tshim byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu// rtag tu
296a8: mnyam bzhag khro bo'i tshul/ / 'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin te// mdog dang phyag rgya thams cad dang // sngags mchog dam pa ma lus 'don// de nas phra men 'khor 'dus nas// so so'i las dang mthun byas te// so so'i gan

296b1: su bzhag par bya/ / dbang du spu dang bsgob pa'i thabs// ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya// ma lus thams cad byos shig par// lhag ma byin nas dbang yang bskur// gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la// 'dod yod lnga yi
296b2: pa gtang / / de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas brtan nas// rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bdag la thams cad bsdu bar bya// de ltar bsgrub pa'i ngang
296b3: 'chang ba/ ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas// rig 'dzin rig pa'i sa la gnas// thag dmen spyod par yod mi 'gyur// mi khom gnas su s+thA mi 'gyur// smye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// sangs rgyas ni
296b4: spyod par byed/ / ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub// dbang po yul du snang ba kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin te// kun bzhi rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang //
296b5: ste/ snang ba'i dngos po rnams bshig na// so so'i mtshan nyid rnam bshig nas// gzhigs na nam mkha'i ngang du zhi// nam mkha' de nyid lngas gzhigs nas// mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim// thams cad kun gyi
296b6: 'byung gnas so/ / gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma// snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin te// rang bzhin med pa shes rab ni// nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni// kun bzhi nyid snang spyod yul la// de dang bdag tu rnam par rtogs/
296b7: bde sdug mtshan ma so sor 'dzin// kun bzhi dngos po med pa la// bag chags stsogs pa'i gnas med de// sna ra ba'i dngos po med pa la// nyon mongs blo yis blang du med// bsgo dang bsko bar bya ba med// de ltar sgo phyar/
296b8: dngos po med// med bzhin sems kyis log brtags pa// khams gsum btson rang rtag tu 'khor// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni// snang dang mi snang gnyis gal// skad cig yud tsam rtog pa yin// rtog pa nyid kyang /

297a1: ma grub na/ yul gyi dngos po gang la 'grub// yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni// snga ma 'das shing mi dmigs pa// phyi ma mabyung rtag tu med// de ltar rang bzhin dmigs su med// rtsi shing kha na rlung 'phyo 'dra/
297a2: rgyud ni yongs su ma chad pa// 'di ni kun du 'byung ba yin// de ltar don rnams dngos po med// chu dang rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba// de gsum gcig dang so so min// de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs yid// gcig pa ma yin so so
297a3: min/ / chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// thams cad ye shes dbyer med cing // gcig tu yang ni brjod pa med// de ltar ma rtogs sems can yin// brtogs na sangs rgyas gud na med// byang chub sems kyi
297a4: de bzhin ni/ / shin du mi dmigs rtag dka' ba// yangs la rgya che gting zab pa// shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// 'od dang 'gro bar bya ba min// shin du brtag dga' mi dmigs pa//
297a5: mtha' dang dbus kyang rtag tu med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang nyid ni// dmigs med tshul du de ltar snang // dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang // rang rig kho na tsam du zad// sems can ma lus thams cad kyis// de ltar
297a6: khong du chud par byos/ / nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// sems can ma lus thams cad la// snying rje'i thag pa ma chags par// nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing // byams pa
297a7: dag gis mnyes par gyis/ / de bzhin 'khor ba'i brtson ra la// snying rje'i zhags pa cher brkyang nas// nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed// snying rje chen po skye ma byed// de bzhin skye bo phal rnams la// las kyi sgrib
297a8: pas mi gos shing / / thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par// dga' ba dag la 'gyod pa med// sems can de dang bdag med la// thugs rjes gnyis rtog mi 'byed de// bu cig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya// thams cad//

297b1: dri ma med par bya// chos rnams thams cad stong pa bas// de lta dngos dang rtog pa med// num mkha'i drang du gnas pa lnga// de la bcos shing bsgyur du myed// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med// snang ba tham ca
297b2: dngos med pas/ / yod dang med pa thams cad kun// mtshan nyid med pas mi dmigs so// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang // bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas// kun
297b3: la smon cing chags su med/ / byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni// shin tu brtag bka' ting zab pas// rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin// mi dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu/
297b4: byang chub de nyid sems yin no// sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsumo chos rnams thams cad yin// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems dang byang chub nyid
297b5: du 'ug bo d+hi chen pos de skad bshad/ / skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// ci lang thogs pa med par spyad// spyad pa nyid na chags pa med// dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la//
297b6: mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong yang // snang ba nyid na dngos po med// de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs// gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces// med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de// ri bong rwa dang mo sham bu// tshig tsam
297b7: gdags su rung mod kyi/ / thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med// thams cad ma lus stong zhes te// dran med brdos pa ma yin pas// rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing // 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// rdos
297b8: pa tsam gyi chos med do/ / shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o// thams cad gnyis ming rtogs gyur na// de nyid don dam dbyings yin te// / gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag du med// yod las btsal na sgro btags 'gyur
297b9: mad las btsal na bskur btab ste/ / yod med gnyis las btsal byas na// de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste// de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med// rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu// tshig gas

298a1: snga phyi yod mod kyang / / don gyi cig char rdzogs par bsgom// de lta bu yi don rtogs kyang // 'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyod kyang // theg chen sgrom las nyams pa med// gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i//
298a2: blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas// ma rtogs la lo snyom las byas// don ma grub par ngan sor 'gro// sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na// tshig gis ma nyams pas sangs mi rgya// de bas don tshig
298a3: ldan par byos/ / 'on tar the tsom med par 'grub// rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis// dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du gcig/
298a4: rtag tu bsod nams tshogs chen ldan// bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// de na byang chub snying po len// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa snyan pa'i le'u
298a5: ste bdun cu bdun pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag rgyar 'dus shing phyi nang snod bcud thams
298a6: cad la/ 'di ltar brtags shing phyag brgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang / dam tshig ni gnas yin no// phyag rgyas bsdus shing spros pa yang 'di yin te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba de nyid kho na las// byang
298a7: chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o/ / mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa'i// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// ye nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid// mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba min//
298a8: de bzhin nyid kyi dang du 'ub// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun// chos nyid dang las ma rtogs pa// log rtogs nyon mongs rdul tsam med// phyag rgya sna tshogs 'do' bar

298b1: yang / de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te// bdag nyid dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi// rnam gsum tshul gyis bsgom byas shing // phyag rgya bskyed cing log 'dul ba// bya byed med pa'i
298b2: tshul gyi su/ / las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog/ bdag nyid phyag rgya kun gyi bdag/ ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// byang chub skye 'khrud d+hA yang yin// 'bras bu yang
298b3: ngag nyid du'o/ / rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa// bcu gsum don grub de gnas pa// mthar byin gang la'ang mi gnas pa'o// rang bzhin phyag ba rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// thams cad shre rab
298b4: ngang du gnas/ / rig sngags bde gshegs yab yum du// ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thabs dang shes rab nyid la rol// bde min ma chags tshogs chen po// yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs// lhag pa'i
298b5: phyag rgya chen po ni/ / narang gi rtags ni phyir byung ste// mdor bsdus phyag rgya chen po dang // gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa// lag gi 'du 'phro bsam yas dang // yan lag stabs chen bskul bsogs kun// nyid
298b6: kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang / / rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar gnas// 'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa// rang byung chen po lha yi lha// thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed// dpa'o zhes kyang gdagra par bya'o//
298b7: las dang las kyis maM gos pa// gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing // ma chags pa la chags pa dang // shin du rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'khor la// sku gsung thugs ldan zad mi
298b8: shes/ / yon tan mi zad gter du 'gyur// bzhi ni mi zad par ldan pa'o// sku gsung las rnams rdzogs byed pa'o// rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// 'dul ba'i don lan

299a1: bsam mi khyab/ / 'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung dang // thams cad dbang bsdus don grub pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ kun nas zlum zhing 'od zer 'phro// rigs bzhi ma lus thams cad/
299a2: kun mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thams cad 'dus// rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste// lhun thub dkyil 'khor dang nyid du// phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni// thugs kyi rtags su bstan pa yin/
299a3: dper na rgyal pos rgyas btab na// sems can kun gyi yod mi 'da'// de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag rgya yin// kun la khyab cing thams cad snang // sku gsung thugs kyis rgyas btab na// bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun// mi 'thun
299a4: phyogs kyis dbang byar med/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs des na// 'di lta bu la rtag tu gnas// rdo rje lta bu'i blo med na// rdo rje'i rigs su yong mi bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi laH
299a5: ste bdun cu brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di ched du brjod do// kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gsham
299a6: pa'i ngo bo nyid/ / gzung 'dzin spros la tshel ba'i// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin// sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byam gyis// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs//
299a7: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// phyag rgyag sang chen snying po 'di// tog nas smra bar byed pa gang // de ni dang yin dbang yang rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// sgong dang skur ba
299a8: zhi ba yi/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na de nyid nges pa'i dbyings las phyung // de ni nges par lung bstan te// sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin// sa rab rig pa 'dzin las gnas zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

299b1: dbyer med par dgyes nas dras bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yongasu gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun bcu dgu pa'o// / 'phags
299b2: pa'i rgyal po rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par
299b3: spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu mchog/ gsang ba chen po 'di yod par// me mar mur gyi ngong 'bogs shing // spu gri so ni gtams las kyang // 'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos// kho na gnas pa'i yang khong du//
299b4: lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdom mo// thams cad la yang me long bzhin// bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo // ye shes 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// rdo rje tha mas sgoms phye nas// yid bzhin rin chen gter phyung ba// skal ldan mchog gis
299b5: spyang du gsol/ / yi ge kun la mi snang zhing // bla ma'i thugs la gnas pa ni// skal ldan mchog gi spyod yul te// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// dper na seng ge'i 'o ma ni// gser gyis phyis bus 'dzin 'gyur gyi// snod gzhan dag tu thugs pa
299b6: ni/ / snod kyang chag la 'o ma'ang po// yong gis gser gyi rang bzhin la// dbyibs kyi khyad par cir yang snang // gser las gyur pa rdul tsam med// de bzhin chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang // mtshan ma sna tshogs cir snang yang // nyid las gyur pa rdul
299b7: tsam med/ / gsang ba'i snying por kho na nyid nges pa las chos nyid kun tu mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad bcu pa'o// / rdzogs s+ho// 6// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo'i phreng zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la
299b8: phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng gi don bsdus pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rig pa'i byin rlabs las byung ba'i

300a1: mchod pa rgya yongs su ma chad pa'i gzhal yas khang dang / bla bre dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa bzhi dang / bdug spos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa bzhis
300a2: mchod de/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas so so ma yin pa'i rig pa'i 'drad pas phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
300a3: b com ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul nyan thos dang thun mong ma lags pa thabs gang gis rtogs pa de tshe 'di nyid pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'bangar thob pa'i don du bshad
300a4: du gsol/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / cang mi gsung bar 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ don 'di dang phyi nang gi chos thams cad 'dra ste bden pa gnyis su 'dus so/
300a5: bden pa gnyis la yang tshul 'di ltar shes par bya'o// bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// phyi nang snod bcung rnam par dag/ byed spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis gyur// pha rol phyin
300a6: bcu rdzogs pa ste/ / sa bcu rim gyis bskyod pa la// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// sa rnams mnyas pa nyid du sbyor// rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis// chos kun sku mar rig pa'i phyir// dngos dang dngos med pag chags
300a7: bsregs/ / yang na ye shes me zhes bya// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam smin ni// med min rgyu 'bras 'thun pas 'grub// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyis// tshig pas tshogs su 'gyur bas so// lam gyi nang na nye lam brda
300a8: rdzogs pa/ / thabs kyi nang na ma nor dam pa ste// bsgrubs na tshe 'dis sangs rgyas che ba yang // blang dor med pa'i sku gsung rdo rje thob// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i

300b1: le'u ste dang po'o/ / sems dpa' chen po dam tshig 'di dag ni bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ngas bshad do// gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags phrag dog chen po ni// bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa
300b2: can/ de ni dam tshig rdo rje yin// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad ma phreng ba las dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po dbang 'di dag ni/ rang rig pa'i rtsal gyis 'thob
300b3: po/ thabs dang shes rab dbang chen te// rdo rje dril bu rig pas 'dzin// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yis// chos la 'dod bzhin dbang byed do// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad ma phreng las dbang gi le'u sa
300b4: gsus pa'o/ / / sems dpa' chen po mchod pa mchog ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'drangs// kun la phan pa'i sman yin te// rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis// thams cad
300b5: bza' zhing brgyan par bya/ / 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // kun du 'od kyis las 'das// pad ma'i sman du gyur pa na// rig pa'i byin rlabs chen po las// rang
300b6: 'byung dkyil du 'phro yi tshul/ / yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen te// mtshan dang dpe byad kun las grol// rngam zhing gtum pa'i gzugs can dang // mgyogs ma mgyogs ma'i bo nyar ldan// de ni thig le rdo rje yin// 'di
300b7: sa gang zag bdag med par/ / rtogs par bya byar ngas bshad de// mkhas pas de la 'byor bar gyis// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi la'u ste lnga pa'o// / dan//
300b8: sems dpa' chen po spyod yul thams cad ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// chen po lnga yang de bzhin gshegs// gcig la'ang lnga lngar rig par gyis// khams gsum bdag nyid yin pa ste// sku gsum zhes kyang de la bya// /

301a1: ye shes lnga dang 'gro ba lnga// mnyam pas so so dbyer med de// sngags dang phyag rgya dbang sgyur na// spyod yul kun tu maN Da la// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad ma the ba las gzug ba rnyan bye dkyil 'dzi
301a2: gyi le'u ste drug pa'o/ / // sems dpa' chen po zhes rdo rje sems dpa' bros nas bshad do// rgyal ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi sku// sna tshogs cir yang snang mod kyi// kun du rin chen lta bu ste// don dang las yin
301a3: bsgoms pas 'grub/ / dbu mig rna ba sna lce la// oM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// gtso bo lnga dang gcom lnga// spyod pa'i tshul du sgom par bya// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la// hUM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa'
301a4: lnga dang sems ma lnga/ / sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya// lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo la// dr-i zhes bya ba lnga bzhog ste// sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa'i sor
301a5: mo la/ / hrIHzhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du sgom par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la// a zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpal lnga dang sems ma lnga//
301a6: sbyor ba'i tshul du sgom par bya// 'phags pa thabs kyi nags pa pad mo phreng las lha'i mtshan nyid dang dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/
301a7: ces rdo rje sems dpa' la khos nas bshad do// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas// lnga zhing lnga dang 'byor pa yis// tshem bu lnga yi lha sgoms na// thams cad bdag nyid chen por 'gyur// rin chen pad ma'i
301a8: dkyil 'jam 'di/ / 'dzum pa'i 'dadas kyis 'phrul lags kyis// dgyes pa rdo rje rab gsol nas// byang chub sems sprin dbab par gsol// rdo rje gsor ba'i dga' mchog 'di// 'dzul zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas

301b1: su gsol/ / mi dmigs bde dang 'phro ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin mar ldan las byung // rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas// na bza' dang ni zhal zas rnams// grub pa'i rjes su dbang bskur nas// gsol/
301b2: na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas// glu dang tshig gi sgra rnams yin// gsung gi ngo bor byin rlabs te// bsgrags na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor rig
301b3: 'dzin mar ldan pas/ / bro dang gar gyis bskyod byas te// 'od kyi 'dul 'bro byin gyis brlab// dngos grub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dngos grub sgrub pa'i le'u
301b4: brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra b+hai ro tsa na oM/ oM satwa badz+ra hUM/ oM rad na badz+ra traM/ oM d+harma badz+ra Sh+T+r-iH/ oM karma badz+ra a/ oM badz+ra A k+She b+huM hUM/
301b5: oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ oM badz+ra rA dza hU~M/ oM badz+ra rA ga hUM/ oM badz+ra sA d+ha hU~M/ oM badz+ra na rad na sam b+ha ba traM/ oM badz+ra ra dan traM/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya traM/ oM badz+ra d+ha dza traM/ oM badz+ra hA sa traM/ oM badz+ra a ma~M tA b+hA hri/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na hUM/ oM badz+ra
301b6: hI/ oM badz+ra pa sha hrI/ oM badz+ra a mo g+ha sid d+hi ha/ oM badz+ra karma ha/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha ha/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha ha/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti ha/ ho badz+ra shwa ra d+ha tu oM/ oM badz+ra bud d+ha lo tsan hU~M/ oM badz+ra mA ma kI traM/ oM badz+ra ban d+ha ra ba si ni ha/ oM badz+ra sa
301b7: ma ya tA rA ha/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badz+ra a ku sha hAM/ oM badz+ra de shwa ra b+ha de hUM/ oM badz+ra mA le traM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe traM/ oM pA sha tre/ oM badz+ra rad na ra ti traM/ oM badz+ra gar+b+he hrI/ oM badz+ra a le ke hriH/ oM badz+ra
301b8: s+pho ta hrI/ oM badz+ra nri t+yai ha/ oM badz+ra ga na d+he ha/ oM badz+ra g+han Da ha/ oM badz+ra ra ti ha/ oM badz+ra muMSh+Ti hUM/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti traM/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti hrI/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti ha// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las sngags kyi

302a1: le'u ste dgu pa'o/ / // sems dpa' chen po nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bos nas bshad do// lha dang lha mo'i ngang nyid du'o// yan lag lnga la 'byor pas na// bskyod pa thams cad phyag rgya yin/
302a2: de skad dpa' bos bka' stsal to// de la drub tu mtshan de nyid ni// thabs dang shwa rab dang nyid du// lag gi 'du byed bsgoms nas ni// thal mo dam sbyar rtse snol gshibs// rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal to// sor mo nang du
302a3: bsnol nas bkan/ / gung 'dzub mthe bo mthe chung rnams// so sor rtse sprad phyir bkyed de// srin lag gshibs bsgreng dam tshig rgya// rkang sor g.yas kyis g.yon pa gnan// laka zil g.yas kyis g.yon pa
302a4: mnan/ / mthe bong rtse sprad dbang du blang // rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yas kyi 'dzub mo g.yon gyis gzung // tshogs pas gcig la gcig gzung ba// 'di ni
302a5: sbyor ba'i rgya mchog go/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe bong chung gnyis// so sor rtse sbrang zlum po lte// lhag ma 'od 'phro rting phye ba// mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya yin// ting spra dgung mo rtse sbyar te// 'dzub mo tshogs
302a6: bcag gung la sbyar/ / srin mtheb rtse sprad mthe chung sba// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yin// gung 'dzub srin lag rtse sprad de// mthe chung ngos la sbyar bar bya// mthe bong rtse sprad zlum po ste// snang ba mtha'
302a7: yas phyag rgya yin/ / thal mo sbyar nas so sor bgrad// bskyod nas 'khor lo ltar byas te// klog gi phreng bas 'khor bar bya// don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya'i rgyal po 'di dag ni// thugs
302a8: kar bcing zhing nyid du mos/ / 'du 'gro sgrol zhing mkha' la dgrol// las dang thun mong nyid du bshad// rdo rje dril bu bzung nas ni// thugs kar rang ni bkur brten nas// bcu thabs zur gyis lta ba ni//

302b1: sems pa'i rgya chen yin// lag pa snol nas khu tshur bcad// gung mo gnyis ci brgyad par bya// 'dzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pa// rdo rje rgyal po rgya chen yin// lag pa khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yon gyi 'theb
302b2: 'dzub rtse sprad de/ / g.yas kyi gung mo brkyang nas gdeng // rdo rje 'dod pa'i rgya chen yin// lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo rnams// so so'i gung mo tshigs dang por// ngos bzhi nas ni rtse mo gzugs// rdo rje legs pa'i rgya chen
302b3: yin/ / ting sbyar gung mo'i rtse sprad te// 'theb 'dzub srin lag tshigs bcag ste// drug char rtse sprad mthe chung bas// rdo rje rin chen rgya chen yin/ mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad nas// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bar bya// lhag ma
302b4: 'od ltar byas na ni/ / rdo rje nyi ma'i rgya chen yin// lag ngar g.yon pa sgreng nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yas pa gru mor bzung bar bya// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgya chen yin// g.yon gyi steng
302b5: du g.yas gzhag nas/ / sor mo'i tshigs bcag sprad byas te// kha yi thad kar bzung bar bya// rdo rje gzhad pa'i rgya chen yin// g.yon gyi sor mo'i rtse rnams yin// ma phrad tsam du bsdus pa las//
302b6: g.yas kyis 'byed pa ltar byas pa// rdo rje chos kyi rgya chen yin// g.yas kyi lag dar sbreng ba la// mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad de// lhag ma gsum yang sbeng bar bya// g.yon pa'i khu tshung
302b7: dkur bstun pa/ / rdo rje rnon po'i rgya chen yin// lag pa rgya gram rtse bsnol nas// mthe bos gnyis kyi rtse sprad de// bskor ba lta bur byas pa ni// rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgya chen yin// sor mo nang du stsol ba las// gung mo rtse sprad
302b8: 'judzub sbyar te/ / mthe bos gung mo mnan pa ni// rdo rje smra ba'i rgya chen yin// lag pa'i khrig ma bsnol ba las// gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang por// ngos bzhi sa yi sor mo brten// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo rnams// phan tshun thabs su

303a1: btags pa las/ / mthe bong gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya// rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// 'dzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas kyang // kha gram gnyis su bzung bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin rgya chen yin// rdo rje khu tshur
303a2: bcangs pa las/ / bsnol te kha ni sbyar nas kyang // thugs kar dam du bzung bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur rgya chen yin// rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni// lag gi 'du shes 'di dag gis// 'dra phro mos bskyed nas ni/ bcing zhing mkha' la 'grol
303a3: bar bya/ / mthe bo mthe chung nang du sprad// gung mo rtse byar bzhi yang sgreng // rdo rje 'dzin ltar rting sprad pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin// rting sbyar 'theb 'dzub rtse sbyar te// 'dzub mo'i mig tu mthe chung drang // lhag ma rtse gsum ltar
303a4: byas pa/ / rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yin// lag ngar g.yon pa sbeng nas kyang // sor mo ut+pal ltar byas pa// g.yas kyi sor mo bzung bar bya// rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin// rkang pa gnyis kyis pus mo dang /
303a5: lag pa gnyis kyi gru mo rnams// sprad nas lag pa gdangs pa ni// kun du bzang mo'i phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur bkur brten nas// ldan pa g.yas su bya ba las// chags pa'i mig gis lta ba ni/
303a6: rdo rje sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa sgong skong po byas te// g.yas pas gru mo bzung nas kyang / bskor shing sor mo 'phreng ba ni// rdo rje bdug pa phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis ni rgyab sbyar nas/
303a7: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// mthe chung spel nas 'dzub mo sbeng // rdo rje lcags kyu ma yi rgya// mthe chung lugu rgyud du spel// sor mo rnams ni so sor bsgreng // thal mo bkan te lta ba ni//
303a8: rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin// srin lag dang ni mthe bo gnyis// so sor rtse mo sprad pa las// phral ba'i thad kar drangs pa yi// rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo

303b1: phreng ba las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang lha mo rnams la phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang 'khor phal po ches dbyangs 'thun par stod pa// oM phyog
303b2: bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byam na/ / rgyal ba gang gzugs 'khor dang bcas// bla med lha dang lha mo yi// grub pa'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// sems dpa' bcu drug rigs kyi gtso// sems ma bcu drug rims
303b3: kyi yum/ / mthu chen khro bo khro mo dang // phonyar 'jig rten skyong bar ldan// oM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal ba'i zhing du bskyor bas ni// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/
303b4: dpa' bo chen po mthu ldan rnams// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rnams// grub par byin gyi rlabs dugaso// oM khams gsum zhing myod la phyag 'tshal lo// migs med chos kyi sku byad
303b5: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ / cir yang sprul pa'i sku phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas nyid kyi thugs kar bzhugs te/ rol par khro bo'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khro bo'i rtogs pa
303b6: bshad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la lag na rdo rje 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na// gcer bu pa dang kun tu rgyu la sogs pas so so'i rig sngags
303b7: kyi las kyis ma hA de ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi lha dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che dang // phra me na ma thams cad bskul nas sems can rnams kyi srog gi bar chad bgyid/ 'tsho bar bgyid// shin tu sdug bsngal
303b8: bar bgyid/ de la thabs gang gi zlog par bgyi// sbyor ba gcad par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos sngon chad

304a1: bshad de/ lagar rdo rje khyod nyid kyis byas pa'i gsang sngags dang // srid pa zad par byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad kyang bzlog par byed do// gnon par byed do// sbyor ba gcod par byed pa kun du rgyu la sogs
304a2: pa gzhan lta ci smos/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje mtshan cha'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags zlog cing gnon pa dang // sbyor ba gcod pa zhes bya ba 'di
304a3: gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra dz+wa la badz+ra hUM// man tra sum b+hi ni/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la hUM/ oM bru~M hU~M bASh+Ta A hUM hU~M hrI/ b+h+rUM A b+h+rUM/ 'di gsungs mdag tu phyogs bcu nas mtshon che 'char chen po phab ste lag na rdo rje nyid kyang arbutra
304a4: bgyel nas khrag skyugs par gyur to/ / lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad kyang // rgyas te lus dum bu dum bur chad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sbyor ba chad par rig nas slar bslang ste// oM badz+ra
304a5: sar+thar dza dz+ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ khyed kyi 'khor thams cad kyang 'di las 'da' bar byed na thas
304a6: cad 'arlag par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du lag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad la sgo shig/ de nas lag na rdo rjes gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni srid pa gsum thams
304a7: cad 'dul bar bgyid pa/ / mthu be che thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa// mthu bo che thams cad kyi nga rgyal gcog pa bdag lags te// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas mthu stobs dang
304a8: l dan pa'i slad du bdag gi ming yang lag na rdo rje zhes gtags na 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sngags 'di smras pas bdag kyang khrag tu klag cing 'grel bar gyur

304b1: gzhan lta ci smos/ / 'di ni 'da' bar dka'o// de bzhin du lha dang gnod sbyin rnams la yang bar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad do//
304b2: ma ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan drang ngo // su ni dud ka chen po la// dpung kham nag ral ba can// dbug sum pa la phyag drug ste/ dmar da
304b3: drung kanag po yin/ / g.yas kyi gsum na pags pa ni// sti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dang // drang chen dmar kyis bka la// rdo rje dkrug cig 'thung bar brtag/ g.yon
304b4: gsum na thogs pa ni/ sti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang // khyung gi khrag chen thogs pa dang // stir phra mo'i sus pa nas// glo snying nang grol 'dren cing zos
304b5: gtsug tu rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ / oM phrag g.yas la/ ak+Sho/ b+h+yo hUM// g.yon rad nas ma b+ha ba traM// rkang g.yas a mo g+ha sid d+hi a// g.yon na/ a mi tAHste/ hrI bru~Mlas
304b6: rdo rje 'khor lo la/ / rdo rje rnams ni rigs sngags brtag/ ke'u ri dang ni tsi'u ri dang // pra mo ha dang be ta le// gzhan yang bya thi mu ShA dang // sing ha la sogs mgyogs ma rnams// sti ra la ni 'bri tshugs su/
304b7: lta zhing rted pa'i tshul bzhin gnas// ha ha de nas skad cig la// rig sngags nyid dang srod gtong bcas// dgug pa'i pho nyar brtag par bya// ras sa ma gro ga'am rtsa rnams la// bro ba'i gzugs su bris pa'am/ yang na skud pa nag po
304b8: btsi/ ha ha gang mo chen po dang / rdo rje bskul ba'i glu grangs te/ pho nya rnams la mdag par bya// de nas rig sngags bzung nas kyang / rtsa yi gzugs la gnas pa dang / 'khor lo la sogs mtshon mamr-i/ de dag phye bar blags par bya// dz+ra tsakr-id+de// phyi mar de dag/

305a1: btubs nas ni/ thod pa gzhung dang bcas pa yis// hom khung gragasum sgo can du// raM zhes bya ba'i me sbar te// drang srong 'khor bcas g.yab mos pod// de nas rigs sngags bsreg par bya// de ltar lha dang bdag
305a2: sbyar na/ / rnam lnga'i chos dang ldan par bya// ma mo chen mo sha la spyon// 'brung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// ma mo chen mo khrag la spyon// glu dang gar dang gad rgyangs kyis/ so sor mchod de bsgrub par bya// zin pa'i
305a3: sems can gang yang ru/ / de dag skud pa nag pos bcing // de yang dum bur bcad par bya'o// de nas mi de snga ma bzhin// tshe gnas bya phyir 'bru lnga yis// gnas lnga dag tu rnam bkod do// zin pa'i sems can srung bar bya// tsha zhing rtsub pa'i shing dang ni//
305a4: sha dang chang dang yo byad rnams/ gnag cing rtsa bar rnam sbyar te// lha chen rnams la mchod par bya// de nas las rnams grub pa dang / ha ha la sogs gad mo dang // glu dang rdo rje dbyug pa yis// lha rnams bdag la thim par bya// 'di ni bdag nyid srung
305a5: ba dang / / las rnams thams cad grub par byed// shar phyogs na 'phra men ma ko re kha dog sngon po phyag gnyis pa ste/ g.yon band tsan dan dmar gyis bkang ba thogs pa// g.yas na zhim chung ngu'i dbyug pa thogs pa// oM badz+ra kauri dza dza hUM zhes sto/
305a6: rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na sangs rgyas kyang dgug nus na gzhan lta ci smos// che ge mo zhig khug cig ces bcol nas gtor ma dang tsan dan dmar chen arga la oM ru lu ru lu pU b+h+yo zhes brjod cing arga lan gsum du bsgreng ngo // lho phyog
305a7: na tso ri kha dog ser mo phyag mda' gzhu 'gegs pa/ oM badz+ra tsau re hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bcol na phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang rdul tsam yang med par rku nus na gzhan lta ci smos// nub phyogs na pra mo had mar mo phyag na chu srid
305a8: gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa/ oM badz+ra pra mo ha hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na rdo rje yang rang gi mthu bzhag nas dbang du 'od na gzhan lta ci smos// byang phyogs na pe ta li kha dog nag mo phyag g.yon zhing chung ngu 'dzin

305b1: cing zab/ / g.yas na rdo rje 'phyar ba/ oM badz+ra pe te li hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ so la 'di rted 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyang grub na 'jig rten gyi bsgrubs pa phran tshegs lta ci smos/
305b2: shar lho'i mtshams na puk+ka si kha dog dmar ser phyag gnyis zhing chung ngu'i pa su ta 'dren cing za ba oM badz+ra puk+ka si d+hu dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na rdo rje yang 'ching zhing 'i'adren par nus na gzhan bcing zhing
305b3: za ba lta ci smos/ / lho nub kyi mtshams na g+hasma ri kha dog ljang khu phyag g.yon na ban da tsan dan dmar pos bkang ba rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol ba/ oM badz+ra g+hasma ri hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol
305b4: na phyag na rdo rje yang myos par nus na gzhan lha mos kyang ci dgos/ / nub byang gi mtshams na badz+ra karma kha dog ljang khu zhing chung ngu lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste snying ga nas zag/
305b5: oM badz+ra karma hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na las gang bya ba thams cad 'grub po// byang shar gyi mtshams na tsa na Da li kha dog ser skya/
305b6: phyag g.yas na zhing chung ngu'i ban d+ha 'dzin pa// g.yon gyis zhing dbyug 'dzin pa// oM badz+ra tsan Da li hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol
305b7: bzam dang / ma ni nga yang rgyud 'phel bar byedad na dbang po cheng zhing nyams pa med pa la rgyud 'phel zhing tshe dang dbang thar 'phel bar bya ba lta ci smos te/ 'dra men ma 'di rnams phrin las bskul ba'i tshe a na dang

306a1: bya/ / gtor ma dbul ba ni gong du smos pa bzhin du brtsi'o// khros nas thams cad phyag na tri shul 'bar ba/ g.yon rjen chung bsnams pa/ gdan ma sdug nag/ sku'i khadog nag mol khrag dang nag dang
306a2: thal ba'i thig les tshom bur byas shing bsu tas rked pa bcings pa/ gsar gyi lpags pa go zur bsgos pa srong ta a dza nas lus brgyan te gcer bu tshog smug gnag 'bar ba/ g.yon rje'u chung bsdams pa/
306a3: g.yas me spug kun ka kha dog nag mo la 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs shing / zad par byas nas slar dpal chen po'i sku la thim par bya'o// de ni phyir rim bshad par bya'o// shar phyogs su sing
306a4: mu kha dog ser mo zhing kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol pa/ seng ge'i mgo can/ lho phyogs na bya b+hU mu kha kha dog dmar mo lag pa gnyis bsnol te mdun na zhing gnas pa la
306a5: lta ba/ / stag gi mgo can/ nub phyogs su prik+ka mu kha kha dog nag mo lag pa gnyis zhing chung ngu 'dzin cing lces ldag pa we mgo can/ byang phyogs su shon mu kha kha dog mthing ka zhing lag pa gnyis
306a6: kyis khong dral te lta ba khyi mgo can/ shar lho'i mtshams su kri ta mu kha kha dog dmar gnag zhing chung ngu'i ba su ta kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa nad g.yon gri thogs pa bya rgod kyi mgo can/
306a7: lho nub mtshams na kang ka mu kha kha dog dkar dmar phrug pa g.yon pal ning lel zhing rkang pa nas bzung ba/ g.yas pa mgo 'dzin pa/ phyag ka'i mgo can mchu ring thor to gugazer
306a8: dmar mo/ nub byang mtshams na ka ka mu kha kha dog nag mo/ bya rog gi mag can mchus zhing thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pas pad ma/ pand 'dzin pa/ byang shar mtshams su uwu ka mra

306b1: kha kha dog sna tshogs lag pa g.yon pa dung chen khrag gis bkang ba la 'thung pa la g.yas pa rdo rje ljags sgra 'dzin pa/ 'ug pa'i mgo can/ nang rim 'ug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyir rim
306b2: bya rog gi 'khor gyis bkor/ de'i phyir rim bya kang ka mchu rings kyi 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyir rim byi rgod kyi 'khor gyis bskor/ de dag thams cad kyang zhing mang po gsar rnying spungs pa'i steng
306b3: na zhing la rtod pa'i phyir 'thab pa'i tshul ston pasha dag go/ / de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so// hU~M ha he phaT hUM/ 'di kun 'bru re re yang lan bzhi bzhi brjod do// hUM gis gtso bo bskyed/ has nang gi
306b4: lha mo bskyed/ / hes phyi'i lha mo bskyed// phaT kyi thams cad khros par bskul// hUM gis thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer 'bar bas phyogs bcur khyab par bgyi'o// lha mo blo ldan tshogs kyi
306b5: bdag/ he ru dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang // rnal 'byor bar du gcod pa dang // dam tshig gnyen po dral ba dang // rdo rje spun la 'khu byed rnams// khyed kyis rdul du
306b6: blags nas ni/ / gnod sems ma lus gtan nas phyung // dpal chen po'i stan dang 'ga' na'i gnas su tshogs chen po la gshegs pa'i tshe sku gsung thugs kyi khro ba'i gzi 'byin gyis gdug pa thams cad
306b7: gtan nas 'byin cing longs spyod chen po 'gying zhing 'gying ba 'bru blangs te/ thams cad dgyes par mdzad pa'i dbyangs 'dis dgyes par mdzad do// rdo rje pad mo'i phyag rgya 'bral bar bcings te/
306b8: phyar nas mchong zhing 'khor thams cad gcer bur byung nas skra gshig cing rgyugs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM aM a ra li ho hriM hriM hraM ha~M/ de nas tshogs su gshegs nas 'khor thams cad pa spyan pa /

307a1: gzigs shing 'dzum pa'i brda ha ha saM saM sgra phyung ste/ 'khor thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu dbyangs 'dis gtso bo la bstod do// e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba// chos don dag pa bdag med pa// nam mkha' dang
307a2: ni mnyam pa'i gnas/ / rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhes bstod pas gtso bo mnyes nas 'khor thams cad la gzigs shing dam stsal ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so// khag l+ya sha ta ba ga/ a la la la ho// ma hA
307a3: a mita/ kha ra lo gi ni kha ra nA ka na~M/ al la la to// ga bAn la Sha kha/ lha mo rnams rnga jug dbyangs len/ rgyud gsum gyi tshig to b+hita g+hA/ ta r+dz+dzatiH/ k+Shak+kASh+ma d+haSh+kaM pags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad ma phreng las
307a4: rigs sngags gcod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / / sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi// 'od zer 'du 'phro'i klong dkyil na// khro bo chen po rnams bzhugs pa// brkyang bskum tshul gyis
307a5: gnas pa ste/ / dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni// dpung gu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de// gshog pa rdo rje btags pa gdedang // zhabs kyang brgyad du rnam par stan// de yi dkyil 'khor khro bo ni// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can//
307a6: zhabs drug rdo rje'i brag steng na// 'jig rten skyong bas 'dud tshul lo// de yi pho nya bka' brnyan ni// rdo rje phra med btum bag can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po ste// de dag cir yang 'grub par byed// 'phags pa thabs
307a7: kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // rdo rje srin mo chen mo ni// 'jigs byed chen mor snang ba ste// phyag kyang srin po chen por ltar// 'thun te zhabs kyang de dang
307a8: 'dra/ / de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor du// rin chen me tog bor nas ni// lcags la bab pa'i lha de ni// gnyer na 'grub pa the tshom med// dge dang mi dge'i chos rnams la// lhag par bsten par mi bya ste// mnyam nyid rig pa'i klu zhum

307b1: nas/ / cil thogs pa med par spyod// rdo rje dbyug pa blangs nas su// g.yab mo lnga yang g.yab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor bzhugs par brtab// mchod pa chen po dbul bar bya// sa gol gtogs pa bsam gyis kyang // mgyogs
307b2: mas phyogs bcu gar yang phyin/ / de la zhon na 'gro byad pa// bya rog mgo can la sogs kun// sred byed ma yis sbas pa ni// mthu chen lha srin gang gis kyang // de la mthong bar mi nus na// gzhan gyis mthong bar ga la nus// bskul byed
307b3: las ni gzhon 'debs yin/ / mgyogs ma'i las ni phyin par 'gro// gsod ma'i las ni grub pa yin// so sor ma bsgrub nyid 'gro ma// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad ma mo phreng las rdo rje srin mo'i le'u ste bcu gsum
307b4: pa'o/ / oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya nAM// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+thAm// e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn dza hUM ba ma ho// ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM// oM badz+ra kro d+ha shI he ru ka hUM/ a a a hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hUM/ gardza
307b5: gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI lad na dza hUM/ da ha da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya man ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya tsa la hUM/ banaH
307b6: ban d+ha banad+had+hU phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ban+d+he// hu lu hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a ba rA tsi tA r+t+r-i/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThatiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mri ta kuN Da li hUM/ ts+tshin da n+tind N+Di nad hU~M phaT
307b7: oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lok+Sha bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+hi b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la nAM/ s+phoT s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las khro bo bcu'i rtsa
307b8: sngags dang las kyi sngags ri ya 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / / oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM/ ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ho hUM/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/

308a1: mamams san+ta/ !T+Ta b+h+yahra()/ dzadza d+ha/ // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhugs pa pad ma phrad las rdo rje sri sngags kyi lanas bcwo lda go// mnyam pa nyid du rtogs byas
308a2: nas/ / bskul zhing gsigs pa thams cad kyang // phyag rgya yin zhes rgyal po'i bshad// medo tsam du ni 'di ltar brtag/ lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng // rkang pa zil sbyar thur du gzugs//
308a3: tshigs chen bzhi yang gcig par bya// mgo dang mtshan yang snying por bstag/ rdo rje rtse gcig gartse dgu dang // bcu gcig tu yang rnam brtags te// 'di ni khrag 'thung chen po yin// phyag rgya yin par
308a4: dpa' bos bshad/ / lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgred// rkang pa phral nas brkyang bskum zhing // gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa// 'di ni hUM gi rgyal chen yin// rkang pa phral mthil zur du gzugs// lag pa
308a5: phral nas gar byed cing / / stobs su mchod par byed pa ni// 'di ni stobs chen phyag rgya yin// rkang pa g.yon gyis g.yas la 'khyud// lag ba gar thabs bskor nas kyang // thal mo drag tu brdabs pa ni// rnam par
308a6: rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yin/ / lag pa g.yas g.yon mthe bo yis// mthe'u chung sen mo'i mthil du gnon// gdangs pa'i thabs su bsgreng ba ni// dbyug sngon can gyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur
308a7: gyis/ / rdeg pa 'thabs su gdangs pa dang // g.yon pa dkul brten pa ni// gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo yis// bdab pa'i thabs su gdengs pa dang // g.yon gyis 'dzin pa
308a8: lha byas pa/ / mig yo mgon sa phyag tu yin// lag pa thal mo sbyar nas na// grang mo rgyab tu maskol bar bya// mtha ba gnyis kyang thal te bsgred// spyi bor bzhag pazeng pa'i rtsa/

308b1: rkang pa g.yas pathar du gzugs// lag pa g.yas pagyen du bsgreng // g.yon pa'i rkang pa lag phyar ba'i// gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon dkur brtan te// rkang pa/
308b2: gshibs te mchongs pa ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya zhes// dpa' bo chen pos yang du bshad// lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba dang // rkang pa brgyad bskum byas pa ni// khams gsum
308b3: rgyal ba'i phyag rgya zhes/ / mgon po dpa' bos yang du bshad// lag pa g.yas g.yon sprugs pa dang // lus kyang drag du gamigs pa ni// rdo rje 'phra men ma rnams kyi//
308b4: phyag rgya yin par 'dren pas bshad// phyag rgya 'di dag bcings nas ni// stobs chen drag du mchongs byas na// khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur// gzhan yang go 'phangs
308b5: thams cad kun/ / grub par gyur te the tshom med// rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos bshad// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng ba las phyag rgya'i le'u ste//
308b6: bcu drug pa'o// // 'khor le chen po'i rtsibs brgyad pa'i// dkyil du khrag 'thung spyan drangs te// mdun du hUM yang spyan drang ngo do// rgyab du stobs chen spyan drangs nas// 'khor
308b7: lo rtsibs kyi steng dag tu/ / bcu po rnams kyang go rims bzhin// so so'i gnas su spyan drangs te/ dmar gyi ang+ga gsol nas ni// mchod yon gzhan yang dbul bar bya// rdo
308b8: rje dbyings kyi sa bstod byas te/ / de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// khros pas yud tsam rlag mdzad de// brlag par mi 'gyur gang yang med//

309a1: 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las las kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // rdo rje 'phra men sbyor ba yis// yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas// rtod pa'i tshul du rab bstabs na// lha yang rung
309a2: ste brlag par 'gyur/ / 'ug pa'i mgo can la sogs pa// 'phra men ma rnams spad byas te// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// de yi sems 'phrogs bsgom nyams 'gyur// 'phra men rnams ni rbad byas te// de yis
309a3: bsgrub pa'i bar bcod cing / / gsang ste 'khrug par bsgoms byas nas// sgrub pa nyams shing 'bye bar 'gyur// 'phags pa'i thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las drag po'i las kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
309a4: hom khung zur gsum gdengs pa la// rdo rje mda' gzhu ldan byas ste// thod pa dag gis rnam par rgyan// spyan drangs bsregs na lha yang 'chi// 'phra men mdags te bkug nas ni// thab kun bsregs na mod
309a5: la 'chi/ / gsung dang bsres pa'i sha rnams kyis// lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje glu ni blangs nas su// 'byung po'i sha ni shin du zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni shin du zhim// 'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa
309a6: ste/ / gsol te thams cad dgyes par mdzod// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las drag po hom gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zung
309a7: gsum/ / khro bo khro mo rnams bsgoms te// btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las drag po'i phur pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // lcags phye dug dang rdo phye
309a8: dang / / khrag las spras te bsres pa dang // mud ga'i chan dang sbyor ba dag/ sbyor bas gtor na de brlag 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las drag po'i gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//

309b1: khro mo'i dkyil 'khor gtun khung du// khro bo thobs brdungs pa yi// rdo rje gtan 'phrugs bsgom byas nas// lha yang rung ste 'ardungs par 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhugs pa pad mo phrang las drag po'i sbyor ba'i
309b2: le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / // drag po'i las kyis bsgrubs pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo bcad nas// rnam shes hUM gis bsdus btums te// 'og min bla med gnas mchog na// gtso ba dang gcom
309b3: lnga/ sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo dang ni khro mo rnams// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las gnas bstabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//
309b4: zla ga ma dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa// khro bo khro mo spyan drangs te// mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// chags pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor bcas pa// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam
309b5: kun/ / chags pa yud la dbang mdzad de// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// rdo rje 'phra men mdags nas su// bkug nas khro bo chen po yis// chags pa'i tshul gyis de lus las// dpa' dang gzi brjid bsdus
309b6: nas 'grub/ / 'phra men rnams ni mdags nas su// de yi mig rna sna dang lce// lus ngag sems bsgyur rnams bsgoms na// kun la mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo
309b7: phreng las dbang gi las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o/ / // hom khrang zla gam gdengs pa la// rdo rje zhags pas brgyan par bya// de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te// mi phan rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub//
309b8: 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dbang gi hom gyi le'u lce nyi bu lnga pa'o// // zangs sam kha dog dmar po'i shing // mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla ga ma// mgol khro bo'i 'khor bsgoms te/

310a1: btab na nges par de dbang 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyis zhags pa pad mo phreng las dbang gi phur pa'i las bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// // bzangs phye dag ni bu ram dang /
310a2: dmar po'i 'bras can la sogs pa// sbyar bas gtor ma gtang bar bya// mthong bas nges par de dbang 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phrang las dang / gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//
310a3: khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// khri bo dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas na// lha yang rung ste dbang du 'gyur// de ni bde ba chen po yin// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dbang gi sbyor ba'i
310a4: le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o/ / // gru bzhi dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par// lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// mchod bklu la sogs pas mchod// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// nga rgyal
310a5: rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ / 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// dpal dang gzi brjid chen po rnams// yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod// khro bo khro mo 'khor bcas dang // rdo rje'ab men 'khor bcas
310a6: pas/ / dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel bsgoms na// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rgyas pa'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // hom khung gru
310a7: bzhi gdengs pa la/ / rdo rje 'khor los brgyan par bya// de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te// bsregs pas mchod cing dpal 'phel bsgom// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rgyas pa'i hom
310a8: gyi le'u ste sum bcu pa'o/ / // gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo brgya mdud rtse zur bzhi// lha rnams bsgoms te gdab par bya// 'di ni rgyas pa'i las la shis// 'phags pa thabs kyi

310b1: zhags pa pad mo phreng las rgyas pa'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gcig pa'o/ / / gser phye 'bras chen ser po rnams// 'o ma sbrar cigator ma ni// rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste// mkhas pas rgyas pa bsgom zhing sbyin/
310b2: 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum bcu gnyis pa'o// // lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom// byang chub sems ni 'phro bsgoms na// 'di ni
310b3: rgyas pa'i las 'grub po/ / 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo grong las rgyas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum bcu gsum pa'o// rnam po dkyil 'khor brtsibs rgyud par// lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// kar po'i yon gyis
310b4: mchod pa bya/ / de nas lha rnams tsam par bya// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// yud tsam nyid la zhi mdzad de// zhi bar grub la phyag 'tshal lo// lha rnams 'khor bcas thams
310b5: cad kyis/ / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi mdzad par// bsgoms na thams cad yud tsam gyis// zhi bar 'gyur te the tsom med// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi ba'i las kyi le'u ste sum bcu bzhi
310b6: pa'o/ / // ho ma khung zlum po gdengs pa la// rdo rje pad mos rgyan par bya// phur pa dkar po drug btab ste// spyan drangs rdul phye sogs pas mchod// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste sum bcu lnga pa'o//
310b7: phu ba kha dag dkar po la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum por// lha rnams bsgoms la gdab par bya// 'di ni zhi ba'i las la shis// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi bI phung pa'i le'u sa sum bcu drug pa'o// ngul dang 'bras chen dag
310b8: rnams/ / 'o mar sbyar ba'i gtor ma ni// zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gtor ma te// mkhas pas zhi bar bsgoms shing gtor// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi ba'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum bcu bdun pa'o//

311a1: lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha yi grub pa bsgom par bya// byin gyis thams cad zhi bsgoms na// lha rnams kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi ba'i
311a2: spyod pa las kyi le'u ste sum bcu brgyad pa'o/ / // mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang // de las dngos byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas ci gar sbyar na 'grub// 'phag
311a3: pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng wa wa bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum bcu dgu pa'o/ / // drag pos thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur// dbang gis 'byor pa mchog kyang 'grub// rgyas pas gzi brjid rnam par 'phel//
311a4: zhi ba bde ba mchog kyang 'grub// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad me phreng las las sgrub pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // dkyil 'khor 'di'i mtshan ni dbang chen bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te/
311a5: de la dkyil 'khor gyi bzhi zlum por bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i don no// 'khor lo rtsibs zur can du bya ba bzhi zlum po'i nang na gnas pa ni chos kyis dbyings spros pa med bzhin du byin gyi brlabs kyi
311a6: lha dang / lha mo dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / pho nya la sogs pa dang nyid kyis 'phro ba'i don no// rnam pa gcig tu chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog pa med bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ci yang mkhyen pa
311a7: lhun gyis grub pa'i don no/ / mtha' gru bzhi bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad la dbang sgyur bas bde ba chen po rgyas pa'i don/ dkyil nas lha mo lnga phyir lta ba// lha mo ni dbyings
311a8: nyid nye ba'i byin rlabs te/ sems dpas dbyings nyid dang nye ba mthong ba'i don no// sems dpa' lnga nang du lta ba ni dbyings nyid nye ba la lta ba'i don no// sems dpa' gzhan phyir lta ba ni// dbyings nyid tham cad sa rje

311b1: lta bu bems po ma yin gyi mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing sems dpa' nyid dbyings las mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go/ sems ma gzhan nang du lta ba ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes dngos po la sogs pa thams cad du
311b2: rnam par rtog pa ma yin gyi dbyings nyid dang ldan zhing dbyings nyid kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes las mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go/ rnam gcig tu sems dpa' phyir lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang
311b3: bskur ba'i don/ sems ma nang du lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/ sems dpa' dang sems ma phyi nang du gcig la gcig gzigs pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i tha tshig go// khrob
311b4: dang khro mo rol phyir lta ba ni/ phyi'i dngos po dang rgol ba la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba'i don// de la dbyings ni dper nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o// mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni nyi ma'i 'od snang zhing gsal ba lta
311b5: bu'o/ / de'i byin rlabs ni dro zhing 'jam pa lta bu'o// phyi'i dngos po la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba ni rtsi shing bskams pa dang tshig pa lta bu ste/ lha mo dang sems ma ni chos kyi dbyings rig pa'i don sems la snang
311b6: ba'o/ / lha dang sems dpa' ni dbyings la sdang ba'i don mthong ba'o// dbyings la nyid la snang ba dang mthong ba'i byin rlabs kyi ngang gis dngos po dang rgol ba'i rang bzhin lhun gyis 'joms shing dbyings su sbyong ba
311b7: 'dul ba ni/ / khro bo dang khro mo las rnam bzhi rang bzhin du mdzad cing thugs rjes 'jig rten skyong ba'i don no// 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa ni byin gyi rlabs las po nya ltar gnas pa yin/ rnam gcig tu 'jig
311b8: rten gyi lha mthu bo che 'khor du 'dus par bstan pa'i don no/ / bkra shis brgyad ni thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing 'khor ba la spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la spyod

312a1: kyang nyan thos kyi zhi ba phyogs gcig par mi 'gyur te/ gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir bkra shis so// de la dpal be'u ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so// 'khor lo ni thams
312a2: cad la dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bkra shis so// rin po cheni zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so// pad mo ni bong bas ma zin pa gra shis so// gdugs ni nyon mongs pas ma gdus pa'i bkra shis so// bum pa ni bdud
312a3: ci mchog dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/ / dung ni rgo thams cad pa dgod par sgra sgrogs pa'i bkra shis so// nya ni lam rgyud lnga'i sems can gyi don mdzad kyang nyam nga ba med pa'o// klong bzhi ni rigs lnga'i byin rlab
312a4: yin pa'am/ / lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yod par bstan pa 'am/ thugs rjes de dag gi don mdzad pa'i tha tshig go/ rnam gcig tu thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don
312a5: de la gtso mo 'khor lnga lnga dang bcas pa ni ci yang mi mdzad do/ / sems dpa' sems ma nyi shu ni kun la bu gcig bzhin no// de ltar byas pa'i shugs kyis khro bo dang khro mo 'khor dang bcas pa ni phyi nang thams
312a6: cad kyi dngos po la rngon pas ri dgas mthong ba bzhin no/ / de ltar zhe sdang gi shugs kyis thams cad dbyings nyid la sbyor ro// 'byor na 'khor ba'i chos la spyod kyang longs spyod chen po ste// nyon mongs pa'i 'ching
312a7: par mi 'gyur bas de lta bsgrub pa ni 'dod chag so/ / chos kyi dbyings dang gis gsang ba phrag dog go/ chos nyid spros pa med pas gti mug go/ chos nyid de lta bu khams gsum las rgyal bas nga rgyal lo// de la
312a8: gtso bo ni 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni thams cad la khyab mod kyi nye bar ni dbu dang / / mdun dang / thod ka yan chad// rgyab mjug yan chad do// mi 'khrugs pa'i 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni phyag g.yas pa dang rtsibs log

312b1: g.yas so/ / rin chen 'byung ldan 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni phyag g.yon dang rtsib logs g.yon no// 'od dpag med 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni zhabs g.yon nas rkeng pa g.yon man chad do// don yod grub pa 'khor lnga'i byed
312b2: rlabs ni zhabs g.yas/ / rkang pa g.yon man chad do// khro bo dang khro mo thams cad ni rigs so so'i byin rlabs bzhin no// de ltar 'khor lnga po gcig la yang lnga lngar 'gyur te// sra ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni rnga
312b3: rje'i rigs so/ / dro ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni rin po che'i rigs so// gsher ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni pad ma'i rigs so// skyod pa'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni las kyi rig so// de rnams cha mnyam pa
312b4: las spyir grub pa ni dngos su bzhugs pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so// thams cad bdag nyid ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni// dbus su gyur pa thams cad do// sra ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni yangs pa'i
312b5: spyan 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs so/ / dro ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni sa mA kI 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs so// gsher ba'i rang bzhin med pa'i gos dkar me 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs so// bskyod pa'i rang bzhin med pa
312b6: no sgrol sa'i 'khor lnga'i byin rlab so/ / don du bya ba byed nus pa sems dpa'o// de bzhin du rang bzhin med pa ni sems ma'o// de ltar rig pa ni khro bo dang khro ma'o// de la sdu zhing spro ba yang thams cad de ltar bya'o//
312b7: phyi nang gi chos thams cad la yang de ltar blta'o// de skad ces dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje gzhon nu sde 'bum phrag du ma yid rangs te 'di skad ces bstod do// hUM bskal pa'i me ltar
312b8: 'bar ba yi/ / 'od zer 'dra 'phro klong dkyil na// khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa/ sku ni cir yang bsgyur ba'i gzugs// hUM dbu skra kham gnag ral pa can// gyen du 'khyil ba srid rtser 'bar// mi mnyam khro
312b9: gnyer sdang mig ni/ / log par lta ba 'dul ba'i mtshan// hU~M mche ba zang yag gtsigs pas ni// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs ni// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang snang / hUM thugs

313a1: rjes byin rlabs sprin ltar 'khrigs/ / byams pa'i 'od zer glog bzhin 'gyur// rngam pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogs// sprul pa'i thog thog char bzhin 'bebs// hUM sngon gyi
313a2: thugs dam chen po ni/ glan ka chen po 'dud la tshol// rgyal ka chen po bgegs la mdzad// dam tshig can la dngos grub stsol// hUM thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlab mdzad cing /
313a3: bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// grub par byin gyis brlab du gsol// 'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil pa la// sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga'// sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste// bsam dang bral ba'i
313a4: ye shes lags/ / hU~M srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid rang gis khro la phyag 'tshal lo// khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'du 'phro khrol phyag 'tshal lo// ces bstod
313a5: de nyid kyis thub kar zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to/ 'phags pa thab kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng rdzog s+ho// ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha wa te tun te ShAn ta thA ga toh+ya ba data te/ ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba mA dI ma hA tra ma NaH//
